links_Review_Text: Lower front than I expected but lovely shape for hourglass figures. Easy to dance in and good quality fabric.

I really enjoyed this dress and wore it to a charity gala that I got invited to. The only real negative was that I'm a D cup and it was slightly more revealing than I'd like it to be. But it's all good, my bf really enjoyed it.

links_Review_Title: Back up dress I didn't get to wear but wish I would have
links_Review_Text: This dress was beautiful and slimming. Definitely required shapewear as the fabric isn't the type to "hide" problem areas however the draping across the belly is flattering. In the end I picked the more dramatic dress for my event. Still wish I could have found a reason to wear this one as well.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress but better for someone flat chested
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a wedding. The issue with it was the straps were too long. I really needed to wear a bra with it but it showed. So i was uncomfortable in it all night, hiking up the straps.

This dress was very sexy! I’m a size 16, curvey, and size DDD. I’m 5ft5in 195 lbs. If you have big boobs, You have to be ok with your boobs out, as it may be difficult to wear a bra with the low cleavage. Since I wasn’t used to it I was pulling at my dress trying not to be all out. But I may be a bit conservative. I really felt beautiful and sexy overall.

This fit like a glove. I had so much fun dancing in it all night and it hugged my curves perfectly. It was lower than I expected, so I couldn't wear a strapless bra (it would show). I used boob tape instead which worked really well. I'm 5'5" 145 lbs 34DD and the MR fit really well (I was wearing 3 inch heels). Would definitely recommend!

Perfect fit! I usually wear a size 6 and the medium fit perfect! It gave me a little more room in the bottom half so I could dance comfortably. I’m about 5’3 and the regular did not drag the ground one I put on 3 inch heels. The dress is simple but elegant and sexy! The material seemed to stretch just a little to be comfortable. Loved it and would definitely wear it again!

links_Review_Title: Felt incredibly beautiful in this dress!
links_Review_Text: This fit perfectly. It was flattering in all the right places and I got a ton of compliments all night. It photographs really well!

This was my backup, but my friend's dress was too short so she wore this instead. The small was too big for me (I have small shoulders) but it fit her perfectly! She's 5'10" and the long was great for her in heels

links_Review_Title: This dress was gorgeous. Got lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: Fit perfect.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for our last date of 2019 at a nice steakhouse.
links_Review_Text: Fit was actually perfect but either it runs a little bigger in the chest/bust area or I just needed a slightly smaller size. Perfect length, didn't drag on the floor in my heels as pictured. Love the material and overall design, especially the slit!

links_Review_Title: New Years Eve Gala-I felt sexy but comfortable in my RTR dress. Process was simple, will do again!
links_Review_Text: Plunge was perfect and classy. Slit on leg was high but not too revealing. Great for women with curves because it accentuates them perfectly!

This dress was amazing! I wore it to a New Years Eve wedding downtown Chicago. I received so many compliments and my husband loved it ;) I feel like if I had a larger bust, I would have felt too "exposed" but it was perfect for me. I did have to be careful when bending over and dancing because I felt like my melons may come out. Either way, I loved it!!!

I am a size 16/18 5'8. Wore 5 inch heels and it was a tad short for my preference (I like it flush with the ground) but not noticeable. I am 36DD chest, and I was adjusting them all night. I wouldn't recommend if you're any larger in the chest than I am. Hugs in all the right places and the slit allows you to move

links_Review_Title: Skeptical about renting a dress and only getting it 2 days before the event. It was perfect!
links_Review_Text: True to form and very comfortable. It was low cut but very flattering. Was able to dance and move in it very comfortably. Great dress!

links_Review_Title: You think it is going to be a simple dress. But it is a show stopper!
links_Review_Text: Fits well and is slimming. I am naturally smaller at the top than at the bottom. So it was a little loose up top. I had a hard time finding the right bra to wear. But a girlfriend helped me pin my bra in place and I was good to go. I received sooooo many compliments

links_Review_Title: I felt like I looked great. I received many compliments on the dress and how I good I looked.
links_Review_Text: Overall, the dress fit well and was comfortable. For me, I think the straps could have been shortened some.
I loved it, but it is just to revealing for the event (Christmas+Winter)

I am 5'3" 125lbs 36B. This dress is amazing. I ordered the XS and small as backup. The small was a bit too large up top, but the XS was perfect. I was worried about the length but it was fine. I had 2 babies in 2 years so I have the mom pouch going... spanx usually help a bit, but the faux wrap and ruching of the dress paired with the spanx made it the perfect fit for me. I got so many compliments and even my husband asked if there was a way I could buy the dress and wear it for every event :)

links_Review_Title: Great fit and would make everyone look good!
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect. I didn't have an issue with the top being loose and it was a very slimming dress. It was also super comfortable.
Such a perfect fit! Not too booby, perfect length, and material made the tightness not show as many imperfections

This was the "free dress" with rental. It might be understated as "free" but it was my pick for the special occasion. I weigh 133, I'm 5'5", I have an athletic build and am a 34A bust. This dress made me feel and look like 100 million bucks. I had so many compliments.
A beautiful dress for a wedding! It fit so well! It was the perfect mix of elegant but sexy. Very happy with my choice!

links_Review_Title: Great movement! Lovely fabric! I felt very elegant!
links_Review_Text: It fits true to size- so order based on your normal dress size. The slit is on the left and is not one you have to worry about showing anything you don't want- which I appreciated! The low cut is nice with or without a bra. I definitely enjoyed the thin material, as it didn't tire my shoulders and I could move easily. Paired well with wedges. Great for any occasion!

Every part of this dress fit like a glove, minus the top part, which was big, but only being a B cup that's a usual problem for me! I just used some fashion tape to avoid any wardrobe malfunctions! I would definitely recommend

I rented this for a more formal wedding and was actually able to try this on at a RTR pop up. I loved this because there's a synch in the waist that is very forgiving and I felt comfortable in it (typically don't wear tight dresses). My only complaint is the top is super BIG. I tried to pin up all night and it was still too big and I'm a 34/36 D.

links_Review_Title: Making heads turn and receiving compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: This dress is AMAZING! Thank goodness I got it as a backup. The cuts are in all the right places and is perfect for curvier/hourglass shaped girls. The best part is you can wear a simple black bra with it and it will cover just fine. I used some fashion tape just to make sure everything stayed in place. The only con of the dress is that it was just a tad long for me (even wearing 3in heels) so it was a little difficult walking up and down stairs but otherwise perfect!
I probably could have worn the medium but I had a great time in this dress and got a lot of compliments!
very beautiful dress and color. Fabric was thick and stretchy so could wear without a bra. got a ton of compliments and was comfortable and covered all night. will rent again and may buy.

links_Review_Title: It enhances and gives you an hour glass. Absolutely stunning. Would buy!
links_Review_Text: It fit a little snug on the hips, but had enough stretch and the slit didn't make it an issue. It was flexible enough to dance all night and it looked stellar the entire time! Wore without a bra and it wasn't an issue -- no tape needed. Honestly I received so many compliments I would buy this dress instead of renting it again.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. Will rent for another occasion
I attended a black tie charity gala event and needed a dress to match the event.
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this dress. I'm rather busty so I ran into some issues with the top. I needed to better utilize my boob tape, because by the end of the night I felt much too exposed- thankfully I had a wrap. But otherwise I just adored this dress. It made me feel 10 pounds lighter. It clings in all the right areas, while still covering the problem areas. I will be renting this dress again for sure. Busty ladies- fair warning, this dress will show a lot off.

links_Review_Title: I didn't like this dress because it had a big gathering of fabric that made me look pregnant.
links_Review_Text: Wouldn't recommend.

Beautiful dress! I'm 5'6 150lb, D cups. Dress fit like a glove. Because stomach rouching I didn't wear spanks, and I wore a normal (non push up) bra. It's a lot of cleavage. I woke a scarf the second half of the night because I felt like my boobs were too out (and I was too tipsy to police them). Bottom of the dress was off the floor in short heels. The straps had a few threads showing. Ultimately I felt like a million bucks all night.
This dress was very classy and flattering, but it was too large in the bust.

links_Review_Title: Nice dress, but didn’t fit quite right on me.
links_Review_Text: The dress was pretty , but I didn’t end up wearing it in the end. The fit was off in the top for me- it was too big and there was a lot of gapping (I’m a 32b/32c for reference).

links_Review_Title: I got tons of compliments all night.
links_Review_Text: Forgot to get a picture, but it was pretty snug/revealing on the top. I'm 5'6, 160 lbs ,and 32 DDD. I was a little self conscious about the amount of cleavage I showed, but the dress fits well and did stay in place without added tape or anything. There was a lot more give in the body of the dress than expected too, I was never uncomfortable or felt like I was going to rip it, sitting down or dancing .
This dress fit and felt great. The neckline was more low cut than I anticipated but ended up being fine and everything stayed in place. The dress is very flattering.

I loved this dress and received a ton of complements! I would suggest fashion tape to anyone looking to rent this dress in the future. The bust was a little bustier then I anticipated, but manageable. The roushing in the waist was great and gave more of an hour glass look as well as helped to hide my lower tummy. I'm a mother of two toddlers and have an athletic build with a small bust.

links_Review_Title: It's simple yet tasteful and overall a stunning dress!
links_Review_Text: I think this dress worked well for me since I'm not very tall and I am kind of busty. I didn't have to pin the front to reduce the cleavage or prevent any wardrobe malfunctions from occurring. I found myself lifting up the straps a couple times but the dress did fit really nicely! The side slit added a really nice touch to the dress. I would definitely wear this dress again to another event!

I rented this for an Evening En Blanc party and while I miscalculated how formal the event was (I was one of few women wearing pants, the horror!) I thought the blouse looked classic and well-made enough that I fit in. Very lovely look for a summer shindig.

links_Review_Title: I liked the top. Very basic and versatile
links_Review_Text: A little sheer but not too bad
This top was great, a true home run piece.
Based on other reviews, I sized up. Typically a small/4. Fit perfect!

I ordered this as part of the bridal concierge package for my engagement photo shoot and loved it! I received so many complements on the photos. It was perfect for the setting and fit just right. The bow in the back gave it that extra pop!

links_Review_Title: Love love love!!! Had to buy it!
links_Review_Text: This was perfect short ... small fit me perfectly (I'm a size 4) must have worn this shirt about 6 times then decided I couldn't live without this in my personal wardrobe!

links_Review_Title: Great top to pair with any pants and jacket or a cute skirt. Flattering!
links_Review_Text: I love turtle neck styles so this top was perfect. Easy to dress up or down. I wore with jeans, boots and a purple jacket for football tailgating!
Love the design of the top cute but run small and dress it up or down. Didn't like the long tie at the neck in the back. Not shown in pictures.
fit well and went with so many things!
Too small to enjoy

links_Review_Title: Great to dress up or down
links_Review_Text: The fit wasn't quite as drapey as it looked in the photo, but was fine. No side-boob, and I wore a regular strapless bra. It's a satiny material, not jersey/knit. The bow is a nice heavy material so it looks great hanging down in the back. I wore this to sing the National Anthem at a baseball game, with dark jeans and nude wedges. But it is definitely dressy enough for a more formal occasion.

links_Review_Title: Tight in the chest and see through
links_Review_Text: I know it is white and I should have expected it to be somewhat see through, but had hoped with the high price tag this would have been made from a thicker material. the cut was beautiful, but too tight in the chest for comfort.

Fits large- definitely size down! Lots stretch, making it comfortable to dance all night! Sequins got a little itchy under my arm by the end of the night. Tons of compliments and would rent again, but not my favorite rental ever.

links_Review_Title: Dress fit beautifully and was very flattering!
links_Review_Text: Only negative was that the sequins chafed the underside of my left arm. The leg slit is also fairly high so just be aware. I was still comfortable in it though.

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable dress, material has stretch.
links_Review_Text: This dress is comfortable. I wore a 14L, as you can see from the pic it didn't touch the floor. I am 5'10 and had on a 3 inch heel. If you are leery about high splits, this is not the dress for you. The split is not for the modest. Material is heavy, so its a good dress for colder climates. The dress is black with gold sequins.

links_Review_Title: Sleek, sophisticated and sexy all in one!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for a formal event I was speaking at in the early spring. It was a space themed event so it worked perfect with the black velvet and gold sequins. It's very forgiving,stretchy material. Side zip I could do myself. I had to size down to a 12L. Usually a 14R. The length was perfect with the smaller size. I don't love my arms but showing one felt ok. Great dress! I didn't even need shape wear. Very flattering. Will rent again.
Looked great and got a ton of compliments. Has some stretch and in my opinion runs a little large. I usually wear an 8 in dresses and a 10 in gowns. The 6 fit perfect
Rented this dress to celebrate my Great Gatsby themed birthday party and it was stunning! Would recommend 1000x over!

links_Review_Title: The dress was very comfortable and elegant at the same time.
links_Review_Text: The fit was very forgiving and the cut of the dress was perfect for someone top-heavy like me.
Fit perfectly. The shoulder was a little itchy.
Absolutely loved this dress!! Wore it for an awards show and it was great. Thick material but it was comfortable and not too heavy. Received lots of compliments!!

I chose this dress for my husbands Masonic Ball and am glad i did. I ordered the 4 and 6 and wore the 4. The length was great (I am 5'2") even with 3" heels. I wore with a simple strapless bra and had no issues there. The zipper did stick a bit when putting it on, so be careful...you may need a hand pulling it up. All in all it was a beautiful dress. I got so many compliments!

I chose the smaller of the two options I rented because I liked the snug fit. I'm smaller up top and heavier of bottom- definitely an hour glass. I would buy size 8 pants. I chose the size 6 because I wanted the better fit in the chest and just lived with the fact that I was showing a little more leg than I expected. And can we just say it doesn't matter what size you are, you can rock this dress??!! I ran into my girlfriend who rented the EXACT same dress and we owned the party together! :)

links_Review_Title: I LOVED this dress! MADE for black tie event!
links_Review_Text: I cannot rave about this dress anymore, I was SO sad to return it! Wore this to a black tie Oscars event and it was the PERFECT dress. It fit like a glove and I've never felt more sexy and beautiful. Got a ton of compliments. Would wear this again and again!
Amazing holiday party dress! Just a little edgy with exposed shoulder and slit but still appropriate!

links_Review_Title: Received my dresses well in advance. Very happy with my experience.
links_Review_Text: Dress fit perfect. Perfect length for me being 5'3". The dress had some stretch so it was very comfortable. Very pleased!

One word ...AMAZING... photos don't do it justice. You won't be disappointed. I felt so beautiful. I'm 5'3" wore a 2 inch heel and length was perfect. All I needed was a strapless bra. I would rent this again in a heartbeat! So comfy and compliments all night long! Ima 16/18 and the 18 was a perfect fit.

links_Review_Title: Showstopper at Screen Actors Guild Awards
links_Review_Text: Sexy & fun! Paired with accessories from RTR ... a winning ensemble ~

Fit was comfortable! A little baggy under the low arm, but that may have been fixed with one size down. It was a cold night and it also felt warm! Beautiful velvet and sparkle! Was the perfect dress for a January Military Holiday Party!

links_Review_Title: if you currently have this dress rented in 14/16 pls return
links_Review_Text: i didn't end up wearing this for NYE and now i want to wear it for a wedding next week - can y'all return your dang 14 or 16 as it runs big in the tummy and i can buy some spanks? someone has had both sizes out for like 3 weeks SOS girl! love this dress, velvet and shiny with a leg slit *chef's kiss*

This dress is incredibly flattering; especially for someone with curves. My stats are not showing below, but I am 5'5" and 145 pounds. I usually wear a 6-8 size dress and this is a 6R. There is some extra fabric in the stomach area that bunches and looks like part of the dress (so if you do have a small belly, it hides it) The only con is the zipper was rather difficult to get on and off on this particular dress.
Fabric has stretch and worked well with my hip curves. Only issue was I danced too much and the sequins starts scratching my under arm. I felt like a million bucks and got a ton of compliments.

links_Review_Title: This dress was very comfortable but still felt glamorous.
links_Review_Text: This dress is true to size and has some stretch to it. Not too tight of fit. Accentuated all the good things and masked the not so good as well. Only small con was some scratching on my arm by the sequins.
Loved this dress for NYE. Was a bit heavy and hot at times during the night but it was really gorgeous and fit well.

links_Review_Title: The dress was absolutely stunning and perfect for a NYE wedding.
links_Review_Text: The fit was a little big on me. I typically wear a 6 but could have worn a 4. The length of the dress was just right I always have a hard time with gowns because they are too long on me. This dress fit like a glove and I was so comfortable in it. It's a must order!

This dress was THE PERFECT dress for a black tie NYE wedding. The length fit me perfectly (in the arm and legs). I was told many times how amazing I looked in this dress, which made me feel so beautiful and special. The fabric is stretchy and wrinkle free and doesn't irritate under the arm where the sequins are. The photo online doesn't really look like the dress in person. I love the puffy shoulder detail it dresses it up even more. Def try this dress, you may surprise yourself!

I was on the fence about this dress because I thought I might end up looking like Vanna White. This dress in person is stunning and so perfect for a sparkly, formal affair. Sometimes sequin dresses can be really tacky but this is classy and definitely a showstopper. I love the velvet under the sequins. The pics don't do it justice. And not to mention how comfortable it was- room in the waist and the sequins aren't scratchy! Absolutely loved it and contemplated buying.

links_Review_Title: Show stopping dress that's great for a winter wedding!
links_Review_Text: A great, classy dress. I wore this to a winter wedding - around NYE. I'm about 5'11 with heels on and this dress length worked well! The only area of the dress that was a little loose was the stomach/waist area of the dress- for the most part, a perfect fit !

links_Review_Title: This dress was AMAZING for the Sneaker ball.
links_Review_Text: The fit was true to size. I loved IT!!!!!

This dress is more beautiful in person. The mixture of sequins and velvet makes it stunning and classy with a pop of sparkle. I received numerous complements at a black tie vow renewal. Fit true to size. Very comfortable. The sequins didn't irritate my arms like I thought they would.
I would suggest trying a size down as well as your normal size, depending on your shape.

links_Review_Title: Someone told me I looked like I belonged at the Oscars.
links_Review_Text: Nice fit. Stunning show stopper of a dress.
Flattering, comfortable and beautiful dress. I'm 5' 7" and ordered the long because that's all that was left in my size and the length was perfect.

Stretchy! The gold = sequins. Perfect for the fanciest holiday party. Slight puff shoulder sleeve. I am 5'4'' and wore 12L only because a 12R wasn't available. The 12L worked with my platform heels. Super fun and beautiful. Stunning!

I was worried about this fit but it worked out. Was a little baggy in the waist but if I would have tried the 4, not sure if it would work in the bust. Loved wearing this dress. Was sexy but appropriate for a work function. Wish I owned this!!!
I got so many compliments with this gown. Felt comfortable and I looked stunning.

This dress is absolutely gorgeous. It is beautifully made and comfortable even though it has sequins. I sadly didn't get to wear it as it was a little too formal for the wedding I am attending but I hope to have a formal event in the future to wear it to. I felt like I was a red carpet star !
This dress was absolutely lovely! Pair it with some simple, fabulous earrings and that's all you need. It fit perfect at a perfect size 14 which is what I always wear. Stunning!

links_Review_Title: The regular size is WAY too long for petites
links_Review_Text: I ordered this in a 2P, and was sent a 2R instead. It was way too long even with 4inch heels, would not recommend getting this in a regular size if you're petite. Other than length, the 2 was a perfect fit for me, and the ruching is forgiving on the stomach area. I tried to tape it to make it shorter, but the fabric is so heavy and sequin encrusted that fashion tape can hold it together. The slit also means you can see any fabric you fold up, so it ended up not even being worth it to do.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit for third trimester moms!
links_Review_Text: Rented this for my baby shower! I am usually a size 4R but ordered an 8R — it did require another person to zip me up past my 31 week baby bump, but otherwise it fit me perfectly! Everyone raved about the dress and it made me stand out in all the pictures without being too loud. Highly recommended!
The colors in the dress really pop. It's very formfitting. I'm usually a 6-8 and the 8 was snug but not uncomfortable. Wore a standard strapless bra.

links_Review_Title: Amazing fit and love the print!
links_Review_Text: This was so chic! So many compliments and the perfect find for a summer wedding rehearsal!
The sleeve puffed out more than the model photos showed, but it made the dress more unique and a standout amongst the wedding crowd! Perfect for a late spring or early fall event.

links_Review_Title: I had at least 15 compliments on my dress! It's unique yet classic.
links_Review_Text: Runs small! I am usually a size 8 in dresses....but needed a 12 in this dress.

I got tons of compliments on this dress. It's out of the box with one puffy sleeve and the pattern is perfect for a spring or fall outdoor wedding guest! Had plenty of room to move and the fabric is extremely flattering and fun. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: This dress was everything! The color the material, the fit was simple amazing!
links_Review_Text: I typically wear a 4 or 6. I ordered the 6 & 8 bc others said this dress ran small. The 6 was perfect on me. The 8 did fit, but didn't sit on me as well as the 6 did. I got complements all night & on social media. My hubby loved it too.
Great for a summer wedding!

links_Review_Title: So fun and easy to wear
links_Review_Text: Great fit. Probably could have gotten away with a six but the 8 was perfect for a larger chest. Either way, size up as your backup!
I am 5’10 165 lbs and a 36 DD This dress was a PERFECT fit.

I got this for a wedding but after also falling in love with my slightly-more-formal back-up RTR dress, I decided to wear it to the rehearsal dinner instead. This dress was comfortable fabric for the hot weather, the color is gorgeous, the fit was perfect. I got tons of compliments and felt gorgeous. It fits snugly, but is otherwise not a revealing dress, great for family events. I would buy it if I had enough events to justify it! Definitely a fun dress.

links_Review_Title: This is my favorite! Omg! Perfect for garden party!
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a industry-type event, outdoors at an estate on the water. Last year it was humid and poured. This year I wanted to account for All sorts of weather possibilities and be able to dance. This dress was amazing! It fit like a glove, and I did wear a strapless bra underneath but could have gone without. Zero would not zip up so I'd say it might run a little small especially with the backside. I steamed it before I wore it but it did wrinkle across the front after driving to the venue but that didn't really detracted from the appeal! The color was spectacular, great for late summer or early fall. I were multi colored earrings and nude shoes No you could play up the black. I would rent this again and again if it wasn't so eye catching, just hard to go double duty on something this vibrant! Loved it so much.

links_Review_Title: The puffy sleeve was what made it fun and unique.
links_Review_Text: I have a very short torso so I did need to do some pinning at the shoulder. Besides that, it fit wonderfully and was very comfortable. I received so many compliments and I felt very pretty and confident wearing it.
Great super fun colored dress! I had the worst sunburn which isn't the dresses fault BUT I still felt beautiful at a gorgeous Cali mountain wedding
Got this as my back up dress and so glad I did! Fit was amazing. Fun and could be dressed up or down. Worn for a sunflower Soiree party!

I wore this to a summer engagement party. The color and fit were so beautiful. I received tons of compliments. The dress was comfortable. I rented the 4 and the 6 but went with the 6 so I could wear a bra. Would highly recommend!
Loved renting this dress! Perfect for a summer wedding! The material is lighter and stretchier than I expected, which was great. I'm between a size 4 and 2, and I went with the 2.
Got this dress for a bridal shower and it was perfect. It was so comfortable and got lots of compliments. Fits true to size. Made me feel so elegant.

links_Review_Title: Great dress between cocktail and formal
links_Review_Text: I was a little surprised this fit me so well - I do usually wear a 0, but others said this fit small and I usually size up when a skirt is fitted in the hips like this. But it's PERFECT. I am literally chest-less though and it fit me perfectly without a bra, so keep in mind that it's a size 0 in the bust. The dress is super super pretty and kind of unusual without being too crazy. The single sleeve, close fit, and slightly longer length are traditional dressy cocktail qualities, but the fabric (a matte cotton-ish sateen) and oversized/multicolor print are a bit more day-dress and the puff in the sleeve is very on-trend. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: The dress is prefect for a summer wedding! The fabric was lightweight and extremely comfortable.
links_Review_Text: The dress is very well made. The fit is amazing, I would suggest to get your regular size and one size up. I absolutely love the fabric and the overall look of the dress.
Loved this super fun hunter bell dress! The sleeve had padding in it for extra puff and I loved it! Fitted throughout, the color blue was bright and cheery.

Received soooo many compliments on this dress. It was perfect for my husband's landscaping association gala. Fits mostly TTS but has lots of stretch in the fabric. Only complaint was there were a few small bleach stains on it but thankfully wasn't overly noticeable with the pattern.
Super cute! Really great print and high quality fabric. It runs small IMO. I got so many compliments - and it was pretty fun to dance in as well.
The dress is a gorgeous color and pattern- you'll definitely get lots of compliments! BEWARE! it runs SMALL. I'm usually a 0/2 and wore the 2 but I could have definitely sized up.
Loved this dress! Compliments all night--stood out in a sea of LBD's; everything about this dress is flattering. Highly recommend!
True to size. I should have ordered a 4 but the 6 was fine. Great structure

This dress is perfection. The fabric is bright, fun and light. The fit is perfect, flattering to many shapes and sizes I am sure. The pattern is gorgeous , the colors pop. The length is a perfect mid calf. The padded, extra poofy shoulder is the icing on this flowery summery cake. So many compliments. A random guy even came up to me and told me my dress was fabulous!

I got SO MANY compliments on this dress! Both in person and on social media posts. The fabric is so soft and the fit is incredible. It was literally the most flattering dress I've ever worn. I'm a high school teacher and got the dress to chaperone the Junior/Senior formal. I wanted something young without being too flashy or over the top and this was perfect. The color and pattern is great for summer and the large one sleeve gave it a bit of an edge. It was formal and comfortable enough to dance in! Overall I was so pleased with this rental and I was devastated to see it go.
I'm usually an 8, sometimes a 10, and the 10 worked here well with spanx. I do have a large bust though. Wore with strapless bra.

links_Review_Title: Stunner! So many compliments at a spring wedding!
links_Review_Text: This dress was a total showstopper! Even more exciting because I was the first to rent it! I ended up ordering the 8 in my unlimited shipment because I was nervous about how it would fit around my hips. While I had a little bit of room in the waist, I needed the size up for the bottom half. Great coverage, comfortable material, easy to dance in, no need for a bra if you have a small chest. Would highly recommend!
The fit of this dress is perfection. The colors and floral print really pop! Loved wearing this dress, will most likely keep.

links_Review_Title: An amazing night with good friends
links_Review_Text: Such a fun dress! True to size and such a standout. Highly recommend!
Absolutely loved it! Fit my hourglass figure like a glove. The fluffy sleeve is so fun.
I typically wear a 12 for dresses/jumpsuits but couldn’t even get this one up over my hips :(

links_Review_Title: It was cute but too tight on the tummy
links_Review_Text: Cute! Just tight in the tummy so sent it back
Lovely feel and fit, many compliments. Exactly the kind of dress RTR is for.

links_Review_Title: Big family wedding (so you better out-dress the cousins)
links_Review_Text: LOVED this dress! Compliments abound, as usual with RTR, but this was perfect sitting, standing, from every angle in pictures, and for dancing!

This dress is so cute!! It's fitted, but stretches nicely. I typically wear a 4 in pants/jeans and a medium in tops b/c I have broad shoulders and little wider chest. So the 6 fit better for that reason. It was perfect for attending a summer outdoor wedding!

links_Review_Title: Fun dress for a fun drinks reception
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress and got so many compliments. Overall I felt it ran true to size, although for me it was a little bit tight across the bust which is why I gave it 4 stars, but the rest of the dress was very comfortable. It was fitted but had some stretch in the material so was easy to walk in etc.

links_Review_Title: SUCH a fun fit, and it dresses up well. Extremely flattering.
links_Review_Text: I am 5'5" and it was a perfect length. If you are short, it will probably be too long.
Really cute. I am tall so was short and wore tights to be safe

links_Review_Title: I usually wear a Small, but glad I somehow chose Medium!
links_Review_Text: This size fit my broad shoulders, was long enough to go over my mid thigh spanx, and turtleneck fit over my big head. I can't imagine wearing a smaller size. Yes, the bell sleeves ended up being long, but it wasn't a hassle. Great for my work party.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a fancy date night!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect! It was the perfect length and super comfy. I thought it would be too plain loking, but with my purse and shoes, everything was perfect. The material is thin, so you could see bra + underwear lines, so I wore spandex, which smoothed over any visible lines. 11/10 recommend!!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress. Definitely more of a winter dress though
links_Review_Text: Sleeves are a little short but it was still super cute
Comfortable, flattering, and warm.
I rented this dress for Valentine's Day dinner. Was super fitted and flattering. Loved the bell sleeves!
Cute mini dress. Like that the fabric had a hint of sparkle. Could have went up a size as XS felt too short .

Loved this dress but wasn't able to wear it. Rented for a holiday party. I had read the reviews and figured with some good spanx it would work, but it was impossible. I am not a big girl and the photo shown is with spanx. The back showed every line as well. Unfortunate because it has such potential to be cute.
For some reason I expected this to be sweater material- it's not. It's also super short (wanted to wear to work)
#festive

links_Review_Title: Short, silver, with a bit of sparkle in the material
links_Review_Text: Cute dress for a party or girls night out. At my age, a little too short for a wedding.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and warm enough to wear in winter. Worn for NYE party. Perfect dress.
links_Review_Text: Just the right amount of sparkle.

links_Review_Title: Fit perfectly, great for Christmas Eve with a scarf.
links_Review_Text: Fitted but flattering.
Gorgeous fit. Not too tight but fitted at the neck. Love the sleeves! Wasnt too short either

I rented this for a work holiday party. It's the perfect mix of fun and flirty, but conservative enough for a work event. It's definitely fitted, but I didn't think it was too tight. I am petite, and the dress goes a bit past my fingertips. May need to size up if you're tall and want a longer fit.
Got this for an anniversary party. Following advice of other reviews, I wore shapewear. Had no issues Witt lines. It was a very flattering and comfortable dress. Thought about buying.
Cute dress that I wore to brunch with a faux fur vest. The neck was a bit tight but was good once you get it over your head.

links_Review_Title: A little bit shorter, but overall a great dress! Tons of compliments
links_Review_Text: A little bit shorter, but overall a great dress! Tons of compliments
So sexy- but still classy enough for work

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing this dress
links_Review_Text: I didn't love how sparkly this was in person, but if that's your thing you might like it!
Too sparkly
The dress was made of a sparkle silver material. This would have been appropriate for a holiday party, but not for everyday work
Wasn't expecting this dress to be so sparkly! Not my style, so I didn't end up wearing it.
the sleeves are magic

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but the sleeves were to short. I didn't wear it.
links_Review_Text: Very cute. It is pretty short....especially in the back, and the sleeves are short.
I'm normally a size 4, athletic build, with a flat stomach...but when I say this dress showed every flaw in my body, that would be an understatement!

I did not realize this was as sparkly as it would be - expected it to be more of a sweater dress to wear to work. Still work once but a little much for daytime. Not super forgiving on stomach (I'm in my second trimester but don't look very pregnant yet) so needed to pair with a vest to hide it a bit
Wore with opaque tights. Perfect!
Unflattering and ugly - the sparkles are way too much and it's pretty tight on the bottom

links_Review_Title: Not bump friendly for third tri
links_Review_Text: Not bump friendly if in third tri! :)

links_Review_Title: I loved the texture of the dress.
links_Review_Text: It was tight around the lower stomach area.

I rented this dress in a small and medium for a girls night out. While the small was very form fitting and perfect for a girls night out. I paired this with navy over the knee boots and received so many compliments!

This dress is very cute and fun. I didn't realize it was sparkly (should have read the reviews) until I saw it in person. Either way, it was very cute! I just ended up going with something more casual. Would definitely rent again for a night out. I thought the fit was flattering.
I was having a more low key New Years, but still wanted to have a little sparkle! This dress was perfect. I wore it with nude tights and black boots with silver hoops. It was perfect.

I rented this dress for New Years Eve but I didn't end up wearing it. The sizing is unusual in that a 10 is paired with XL (I've found 8/10 is usually L). I went with it and ordered an XL but it was just too big, particularly in the shoulders/arms/chest (I'm a 36C). It looked sloppy so I didn't end up wearing it.
Great dress for a more casual New Years. You may need spams or tights with it as it's pretty thin.

links_Review_Title: Pros (sparkly) and cons (short and should be more flattering)
links_Review_Text: I am 5’2” and found it to be uncomfortably short for a house party where I might be sitting on couches. Sleeves were a fine length on me, and the bell isn’t too revealing. Agree that material is surprisingly sparkly (a plus) but a little snug and revealing of undergarment lines (minus). This dress made me get on the scale after trying it on. :(
This dress is way more silver and sparkly in person than it looks online, but in a really good way! It is very flattering on a curvy figure, and the bell sleeves are so cute.

links_Review_Title: Way too short and the fabric was extremely itchy
links_Review_Text: Too short and the fabric was very itchy. I did not wear it

links_Review_Title: My husband loved it and thought it looked great
links_Review_Text: A bit short and required spanx. Shows anything
Loved this dress! Based on other reviews I sized up and it fit well. The print is gorgeous and the fit is flattering for curves. Would definitely buy this dress if it went on sale!

Really enjoyed the dress, VERY flattering. Got lots of compliments! Even though it snowed today, I really felt ready for spring in this dress! Very pretty, very comfortable, I would rent again. I only wish I had ironed it ahead of time - the hem kept folding up on the bottom.

This dress fit me perfectly, it's great for those of us hourglass shapes ladies. I wore it to an event in Florida and the colors were perfect, I even matched the flowers. I will likely rent this again!

Rented this to wear to a tea party themed birthday. 100% fit the vibe, but unfortunately this dress came to me with some purple staining across the chest, which I noticed right as I was putting it on for the event. A serious bummer.
This dress is beautiful and very flattering. The quality is superb. The only issue I had is the embroidery by the arm opening is little itchy on your skin.

Rented this for a parents' night out at a Michelin Star restaurant. Is there ever such a thing as "true to size" when it comes to Kate Spade? I've worn everything from 8-14 in the last few months, though it's hard to measure as I'm losing baby weight. This fit great. I loved the little details - the ruffles, the ric-rac. However, I wish I had chosen edgier accessories to counter the floral tweeness of the dress. I definitely styled it wrong. But overall I liked the dress a lot and got a lot of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Absolute perfect fit for hourglass figure
links_Review_Text: Rented this dress for my sisters baby shower. It fit to a t! I've got big hips and a bigger chest so I was worried this might be snug but it was just stretchy enough to hug my curves perfectly. Highly recommend!
This dress fit perfectly!

Nice thick material with the cutest flower detail on the neckline Fit well in the chest and the waist was big and had several inches to spare. Yet it hung very nicely and wore it three times. Received tons of compliments

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a baby shower and it was so comfy and fit great!
links_Review_Text: The fit was true to size.
Favorite rtr ever!!! Cutest dress. Best shape. Surprise flare!
Fun small on the tummy area. And I need assistance with zipper getting dress.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Actually saw Dylan Dreyer wear it on the Today Show after I rented it!
links_Review_Text: I wore it to the rehearsal dinner! Fit was true to size and very comfortable! Lots of compliments!
Great colors - too short for work and baggy in the waist but great with a belt. Very, very pretty. Happy I rented it.
Wore this to work and received several compliments. Even received an IM from a coworker telling me how pretty the dress was. Kate Spade is very flattering especially for hourglass shapes

links_Review_Title: I wore this for a graduation and it was lovely!
links_Review_Text: It has very little stretch, so I was glad I ordered a size up for my very busty chest. Otherwise it felt and very comfortable. I was 3 1/2 months pregnant wearing it and it did not hug in my waist at all. My husband loved this dress and I got lots of compliments for how happy and fun it was :)

This was a replacement dress for a family wedding after my original pick did not fit. I am so glad I was able to wear this dress instead! The pattern is so fun, and I love the ruffles on the bottom. Will also point out that the event I attended was outdoors in 90 degree heat.. and even at the end the dress still looked fabulous. I found that it was true to my normal size and hit just above the knee. Would absolutely rent again!!

The ruffles got a bit wrinkly after sitting the but the shape was great. Armpit holes run a little high, but nothing terrible. Lightweight material made it great for a hot day. Did not need to wear a bra.
Sometimes Kate Spade dresses are not built for larger busts, but this one has a GREAT fit.
This dress is SO cute. It is light and perfect for spring, with floral details around the neckline. The skirt shape flattered my curvy figure nicely. Got tons of compliments and would rent again!
Lots of compliments, great dress

links_Review_Title: Perfect bridal shower dress, got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I am obsessed with this dress! The detail on the neck and sleeves is so unique, and the pattern is so pretty. I found the dress to run true-to-size - I wore a 2, which is my usual size. If you have a larger chest, you might want to size up. I would definitely rent this dress again!
Loved it!
I received a ton of compliments. I wore this for a family Easter dinner and loved the way it fit. I would definitely wear this again.
Somewhat scratchy dress with stiff fabric but still looked quite cute on, I received plenty of compliments; very spring forward!
This dress is very cute for spring and summer. It was a bit too tight in the chest. Will wear to work this week with a blazer. May order a size larger.

Wanted to love it because it fit well and was appropriate for baby shower I was attending, but I couldn't help thinking it looked like an 80s prom dress with the ruffles at the bottom. It wasn't my color with the pale pinks and blues, and gave me a "sports bra" (uniboob) look on the top. Overall a no go! Looks cute on others on RTR though!

links_Review_Title: Whimsical but too girly for me
links_Review_Text: It is stretchy so it fit, Without a flat tummy it does me no justice. Might be a good home for someone else

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments, very flirty floral and flouncy.
links_Review_Text: Perfectly lovely dress - a pastel floral, with tiny white daisy trim on the arm and neck holes. My only regret is I wish I had rented it in June-August, rather than September, as it just felt too summery for the changing season.
This dress is amazing! The material is thicker, which I liked, and the style fabulous. The compliments kept pouring in when I wore this. I'll definitely rent again.
Loved everything about this beautiful Kate Spade! Perfect for a bridal shower, baby shower, brunch or tea!

links_Review_Title: it made me feel so beautiful!
links_Review_Text: it was snug, but in all the right ways. it has unique ruffles at the bottom that i didn't think i'd like, but ended up loving as soon as i put it on. it's the perfect length and super easy to move around in! great for a summer/spring wedding.

I wore this for a friends' baby shower, she didn't find out the sex so the blue/pink floral pattern was perfect for the occasion! I find Kate Spade to run slight small in the chest area, I'm normally a 4 but ended up wearing the 6 (I'm a 32E). Very comfortable and the ruffle bottom is adorable, I got a lot of compliments at the party :)

This dress was stunning!!! It's very feminine and girly ... and not something I'd normally pick out, but it was so fun to wear it. It fit like a glove and I got so many compliments. Wore my hair pulled back to show off the pretty neckline.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a day at the races
links_Review_Text: So comfortable! Great length, not too long or too short. I wore this for a girls trip to Saratoga and received so many compliments throughout the day. I would definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Fun and girly while being versatile
links_Review_Text: This Kate Spade dress is a fun floral print with daisy piping around the neck and arms. Its sort of 1960's on the top and late '80's ruffles on the bottom. Very little stretch in this fitted dress. I'm usually a size 14 (38 C to D in bust) and ordered a 16 in this dress. It is a little big for my size 14 in the belly, but still wears well. Didn't need spanx with it. Wore it on a 89* day and put on a cap sleeve sweater for in the office. Great for parties, fancier day wear, or an office if you put a cardigan (I suggest navy or white) and flats with the dress. If you're a size 16 and an apple shape, this dress may not work. If you're 16 with a 38 to 40 D bust, you may want to spanx it up. If you're a size 14 with a defined waist and a little belly or are early in pregnancy, this dress will work easily.
This dress for so many compliments. The fit is amazing.

links_Review_Title: I received lots of compliments on this dress, however I imagined a different material.
links_Review_Text: It fit well and was very flattering on a short big bottom girl. Made the event memorable.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a summer wedding
links_Review_Text: Comfortable dress and wasn't too hot for a July summer wedding
Love this dress. Zips up back. Has some stretch in the fabric. I will get it again.

Definitely my favorite color and very comfortable dress. It is very low cut, way more than I normally would do but made it work. The dress is a wrap and so I was able to adjust it using that and it was perfect. I am 5'4" and it hit right at the floor (I'm barefoot in this pic) and so I wore 3.5 in wedges with this and it was perfect. So many compliments were given and I loved how comfy the dress was, but was concerned about the low cut! Still would highly recommend and rent again!
You will need a safety pin for the bust, but a million compliments!
First thing to love is the color. It is STRIKING! The length was slightly long, but in heels it was perfect. Flowing dress that was easy to move in. Loved it!
I wore this for a Winter Formal dance at my school and it was amazing.

If you can stand the very open neckline, this is a show stopper! I got so many complements all night long. I am never comfortable showing cleavage, so this one really put me out of my comfort zone. But I would definitely rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color! Got compliments all night.
links_Review_Text: It’s a little booby - if I went w the 6 the girls looked like they were busting out, in the 8 the neckline end up being v v v low. So booby. Gorgeous color however, fabric seemed somewhat crushed even after running it over w a steamer. But it did the job and was super fun to dance around in!

I should have read the reviews, so this is partly on me. It runs small - a 6 would have fit my waistline better, but the 6 wasn't available so I just got the 4. It would have been workable except for the boob situation

This dress was great. It was beautiful and it was so flowy. It was a crowd pleaser and I got so many compliments. It was pretty thick material so I imagine it would be hot in the summer. It was perfect in the winter. It was true to size and looked great with heels.

This wasn't the original dress I ordered for my event, but I'm so glad I ended up wearing it. The shape is extremely flattering, and the material is thick so the ruffles lay perfectly and the wrap doesn't come undone. The color is a perfect blue! I would wear this again.

A little more cleavage than I'm used to showing, but I felt secure the entire night in this dress. This is a true wrap dress so being able to adjust the fit was great. Definitely recommended, got plenty of compliments on it :)

links_Review_Title: Loved the color and the fit. Perfect for location and occasion.

links_Review_Text: I wore this to a formal wedding in Florida in September. I got a lot of compliments! It's a true wrap dress so I wouldn't wear it somewhere especially windy. Also, if you are busty, I recommend a cami underneath or an extra safety pin: the little clip keeping it shut did NOT feel sturdy enough for me. Other than that, it's great. It's a pretty color and has nice feminine touches like the sleeves.

links_Review_Title: Event ended up being postponed due the novel corona virus outbreak.
links_Review_Text: Rented it in hopes of wearing it to a wedding. I loved that I could wear a regular bra, but the front was simply too low cut and it showed the bra.

I loved this dress. It flattered all my curves perfectly! Other people have said it and it's true... your boobs WILL be on full display if they are larger. Overall, I'm really happy I rented this dress.

links_Review_Title: Wish it would have fit, the dress and color were beautiful
links_Review_Text: The bust was way too big even with tape.

While this dress is stunning and almost perfect, it was far to large in the upper half. It wasn't necessarily the actual bust (it would have fit my 38DDD perfect). However, I needed about two inches taken off the shoulder area to lift it to a reasonable shape to cover my bust without completely popping out of the dress. A smaller size would likely cause a gap in the bust area since the only thing holding it closed is a very thin thread and clasp.
Very, very small in bust. Couldn't even begin to close. Definitely would not recommend for anyone above B cup.
It's a great dress, fun and flowy. It is legitimately a wrap dress and I was a bit concerned about the wrap flaring. If I had worn this, I would have wanted to wear a slip underneath just in case.
Loved this dress! The clasp at the front felt a little tight and I wear about a 36-B, Size 8 I may have gone 1 size up to help with that but otherwise it was very comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but have your safety pins handy.
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments on this dress! It's very hips/butt-friendly, but there isn't a lot of top coverage. I'm normally a size 6 in pants and the size 2 in this dress actually fit me better, but I ended up wearing the 4 for more chest coverage. I ended up pinning it to my bra and even then I was a little worried about the dress all night. This could be resolved by either having a nice bandeau (though it might show under the keyhole back of the dress - I tried), or embracing the cleavage and maybe having some fashion tape handy. A few other things to be aware of - the fabric is pretty heavy, especially because of the full skirt; it's a wrap dress, and while it stayed closed very well it does have something of a slit effect if you're moving around a lot (dancing) or sitting; finally, I'm somewhere between 5'4" and 5'5", and I had to wear probably 4" wedges to not be tripping on the skirt.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and fun to dance in!
links_Review_Text: Loved it! The hook and eye on the bust was a bit worn so I had to safety pin for backup, but was so fun to dance in, and being 6 months post partum was easy to take down to pump halfway through the wedding!

links_Review_Title: This dress made me feel so elegant and beautiful!
links_Review_Text: I wasn't anticipating this dress to be as heavy as it is but it was perfect for attending an indoor winter wedding (it kept me warm walking from the car to venue)! This dress hugged me in all the right places and hid all the places I didn't want highlighted! It also has an adjustable tie around your ribs - which in my opinion makes this dress even better bc of renting/trying on the dress so close to the event. I highly recommend this dress!!
I'm 5'2" and even with 4 inch heels on the dress was dragging. Also, the front is very low for me. Such a shame because the color and fabric and style is SO pretty. Had to return. =(

links_Review_Title: Flows beautifully and gorgeous fabric. Low cut for me so had to wear bralette under.
links_Review_Text: Loved this true wrap dress. The color, the fabric, the flow, the flutter sleeves. The wrap was very open for me (not sure if I neede or it ran in larger?) but I was in a pinch so wore a shite lace bralette with it. Was a beach wedding so that also made it a bit less formal. Hope I can wear this again soon!

links_Review_Title: ended up wearing something else shorter but loved this dress!!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful fabric - nice weight that hides flaws while still feeling flowy and laying nicely. Beautiful color. Very flattering style and fit.

links_Review_Title: Awesome dress; better in person. Fabric is heavy but the design allows for plenty of ventilation.
links_Review_Text: The color is absolutely stunning! I wore it for a thanksgiving dinner; but it’s very dressy, I could have worn it for a more formal event too. It’s very comfortable and the waist part can be adjusted. It was a little long for me but i wore high platform sandals and it worked out perfectly. The chest area was a little tight for me but i used safety pins and that also worked out well. I’m currently in between a d and a c cup.

The dress is bold and beautiful and incredibly flattering. I am 5'10" and the height was PERFECT, especially with heels (beware if you are shorter). The fabric is heavier than expected, which came in handy for a cooler fall event. I was worried the wrap would come open, but the dress stayed put throughout a night of dancing. The neckline is a little low and normal bras would not work. Would recommend and would like to purchase!
I had to use dress tape to keep the dress fitted at the top.

I loved this dress! The only issue I had with it was that the front V dipped too low for me (even with a size smaller than I usually wear), so I had to safety pin it higher. Other than that, it was a super comfortable and beautiful dress. I got lots of compliments on it!
Pretty color. But I'm 5' 4" and this was too long to wear without tripping on, even with 5 inch heels

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for my friend’s formal 30th birthday party!
links_Review_Text: This dress is best for an athletic build with a small bust. I don’t think it’s possible to wear a regular bra. I went without. It was very comfortable and very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Wore it for engagement pictures! Everyone kept commenting how good it looked!
links_Review_Text: Dress fit amazing. Had to use a safety pin in the front due to my bra showing. But was so comfortable, and so pretty. The color was amazing. Really stood out in my pictures :)

Loved this dress! Usually wear a 8 but can typically wear a 6 in wrap dresses. The only con was the neck line, I have a short torso so the V hit really low and it was hard to keep the girls in place ... I'm 5'2" and 135lbs. The ruffles were great for some tummy coverage.

Beautiful color for a fall wedding! A very romantic flowy look. Received many compliments on it all night. I did however have to pin the dress as the top was a little tight and revealing. I'm 5'2" and it was a perfect length with 3 inch wedges. I wore leopard wedges, gold earnings, thin lariat necklace and a smoky red eye look. The only thing odd is there is a back cutout...was easily hidden tucked into the wrapped part.

links_Review_Title: Too small, size up next time
links_Review_Text: Runs small, not enough fabric to wrap around. Awesome dress though, will rent again I'm a bigger size.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color, but tight in the chest
links_Review_Text: Loved the cut and color of this dress but it was too small across the chest. I am usually a 6 or 8 and while the 6 fit my waist fine, it was too small to cover my 34D chest and I was unable to wear it. That said, I loved the look of the dress and may try to rent it again for my next event in a size up.

links_Review_Title: Elegant, flirty dress - slightly see through, but manageable !
links_Review_Text: The dress lay beautifully - and the silk pattern is like a work of art. I wore tights underneath (since it was winter), and that caused a bit of clinging with the silk material, and required a bit of fussing. The see-through aspect isn't really a huge concert as long as you wear a nude bra underneath and either nude tights or black tights all the same on the bottom half. I was worried you might see the top of the line of the black tights, but you really didn't!
Really liked this dress. Great quality! One complaint is that it's super clingy. I wore it without stockings and I think it would have been even worse if I did. Definitely need some anti-static!
Fabric is very thin. Although it's silk it's not quite as soft as other silk I've worn. Also no lining so you need a slip.
Perfection.

Everything about this dress is perfect. I got is specifically to wear to job interviews and it was great for that purpose. I got tons of compliments and why not - the fit is gorgeous, the silk fabric light and divine, and the pink+red color scheme sophisticated. It's great work work because ya very pretty but mature - neither too corporate/severe nor too girlish. I would say it runs slightlyon the small side as I wear either a 0 or 2 and the 2 was perfect and snug.
I got so many compliments wearing this dress! It's comfy and flattering and so gorgeous. Loved it and will rent it again!

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear, it was too big
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress, light lovely fabric but the size 42 was just a little too big all over.

My favorite part of RTR is that you can turn an ordinary day into a fashion catwalk! Wore this to work on a Thursday and got tons of compliments. The colors are fabulous! It is not form fitting at all, and the skirt is so flows. The ruffle across the top is a little weird and made me feel a little matronly...my only complaint!

Gorgeous dress, and a small amount of stretch meant it was very forgiving. Flowed beautifully, but could hold a little static at times. Good nude-coloured foundation garments are a must since as others have mentioned, this dress is surprisingly lightweight and sheer (a black bra showed through and did not work on top). Overall a very pretty dress that I will quite likely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Encore Casino VIP night enhanced by flowery dress
links_Review_Text: I fell in love with this when it appeared on RTR. As other reviews have stated, there is no slip. I wore a spanx piece under and was fine. I am 5'5 and you can see the length, it was perfect. I felt so elegant!
Really pretty dress! Flowy and fun, but also sophisticated. It is see through so make sure you have a slip or appropriate undergarments.

links_Review_Title: I want to give this SIX STARS!!!
links_Review_Text: This dress is absolutely fabulous. The print is beautiful. The material is an incredible silk with great movement. It feels so good on the skin and has such great shape without being tight anywhere. I want to wear this dress everyday (but unfortunately that would be weird). Only thing to be mindful of is that it is just the slightest bit sheer but I didn't care. Might be more stark on lighter skin tones. Love love love this dress!

links_Review_Title: The moment I walked in and all eyes stared at me
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit and got lots of compliments

links_Review_Title: Elegant lightweight loveliness that is weirdly shaped.
links_Review_Text: I love this dress. I love the silhouette and the print is timeless BUT as always with me it seems a bit too tight for comfort across the bust. I'm sizing up and trying again because it's a great and versatile dress!

This dress is very special and extremely beautiful. I loved it. Fit was true to size. The material is very thin so better for warmer weather. Not a great dress for the winter but Perfect in every other way. I loved it.
Beautiful colors, amazing quality and design (of course!), and flattering fit.
Rented this with my unlimited and got tons of compliments. Such a beautiful pattern and fit in a lightweight silk. Perfect for summer. It needs a slip but otherwise perfection.
The material is light and gorgeous. Fit is feminine with great lines. I got many compliments on this dress

links_Review_Title: Be sure to wear a slip!
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress. Great for work. Flowy silk fabric. But wear a slip. You can see through it in the light.
I loved it and might rent it again. Got lots of compliments. However - it's really long.

links_Review_Title: Pretty but not flattering for me
links_Review_Text: Rented a size 46 recommended by RTR and it was too large, fit like a normal size 12 and I'm a full 8. Pretty fabric, light weight, as others have said. For me the ruffle on top looked a little matronly though it looks nice on the people who shared photos. Didn't wear.
Love the print ! But this dress is very see though! Not appropriate for work ( business dress code ) did not have a black slipper to wear , so I had to return right away . Sad
This dress is gorgeous. I rented it for a charity event, yet I was not able to rent it since the zipper was broken. I hope to be able to rent a functional version of this dress in the near future.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments! But a little see through.
links_Review_Text: Tight in chest - I have a B/C cup and felt the 38 was a bit tight
The dress and print fit like a dream but is completely unlined it definitely needs a full slip if you are wearing this out. I returned it without wearing.

I wore this to a formal wedding, and it was such a fun change of pace! The slit is definitely high and made me a tad nervous while sitting. Overall, it fit true to size and the adjustable straps were clutch! Not a ton of wiggle room, but I got many compliments and felt great in it.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for an evening cocktail-style wedding.
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size. The biggest challenge was finding the right strapless bra to wear with it (required with my size and age). I ended up wearing a strapless black bra. The middle section is very forgiving and flattering.
I'm a size 4 & this was a little big. It was sexy but covered everything. The velvet was perfect for winter. The color was a greenish-blue. Seriously loved this!!!

links_Review_Title: This dress is exactly what I wanted! Classy, and simply beautiful!
links_Review_Text: Got this dress for a Mardi Gras party. I liked it because the color gave me Mardi Gras vibes, and this shade of green is gorgeous. I am very short, and the dress did not touch the ground even with no heels on, which is unheard of for me. The chest area could have been slightly more fitted. I am a “smedium” and could have definitely gone for a small. The ruching can look a bit awkward if you are in a slouchy position; it can make you look bigger in the midsection, which is the only reason for the 4-star instead of 5-star rating. Keep good posture, and you’ll look great. Overall, would def rent again in a small.

This dress hugs in all the right places. It's beautifully made and comfortable. You can dance and move around, it doesn't slip at all. I wore it for a warm fall day and it was breezy enough but had the fall vintage look that I was going for. I swore I wanted to rent it again just to have a photo shoot in it again. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Great dress but rather strange fit
links_Review_Text: Loved the velvet floral details and the sexy slit! While overall I loved this dress, the fit in the ruching/belly area was oddly baggy. Didn't bother me too much, but just found it strange and a bit unflattering from the side view. I am 5'6 145 lbs and wore the small.

links_Review_Title: Great winter or fall dress for formal attire!
links_Review_Text: It definitely runs big, I am usually a small and this was an XS and a little big on me, especially in the midsection area. Still loved it though, overall beautiful fabric and comfortable- got so many compliments

This dress is stunning. It played up my curves, fit like a glove, was a beautiful color and cut. Just amazing all around. Perfect and unique for my best friends holiday work party -- everyone was in red and sparkle so it was fun to stand out! Seriously I felt like a million bucks in this dress .. I want to buy this one, it was so stunning. Rent this dress if you can!

I rented this dress for my cousins wedding. It was beautiful! I have thicker thighs, and the slit on the bottom part was a little snug when I tried on the Medium, but the Large fit was perfect! I recommend this dress if you're looking for a comfortable, flirty dress for any occasion! It is fun to dance in because when you twirl the bottom half of the dress spins. Would definitely rent again. :)

Not my favorite fit having a true pear shape- felt a little tight across my butt and hips and a little big on my chest but the color and velvet fabric made up for the fit and multiple wedding guests gave compliments on the dress. As always, thanks RTR!

Loved this dress! It's not stretchy, but it does fit curves well- I was surprised! From the front, the dress was perfect. However, from the side, the dress would bunch by gut sometimes making me looks bigger. It didn't deter me from wearing the dress out though.

I wore this dress to a winter wedding and got compliments the whole night! The pattern was gorgeous and the fabric was very high quality. Only downside was it ran a little large in the waist and chest areas! I tightened the straps a bit and it helped make it fit a little better. This dress is probably better for someone with a slightly larger chest than me, but overall I loved it!! Definitely a unique and fun dress to wear to a wedding.

links_Review_Title: Perfect Fall dress! Fit like a glove.
links_Review_Text: Was so perfect for a fall wedding. Moved wonderfully and for soooo great on. I got so many complements.

Loved this dress. Has so many unique details from the material, the colors, the layers, the necklines. I got tons of compliments. The rouging in the front is super forgiving in the tummy area, the silhouette gives that hour glass look, and the slit and velvet make it subtly sexy. I'm pear shaped and it was a tiny bit too big in the armpit area but not so much that anyone would notice. Fit will everywhere Else.
Beautiful dress but runs a bit small and not for the larger chested. The slit is also very high but got lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Dress was comfortable and was just the style I was looking for!

links_Review_Text: Loved this beautiful dress, because of the cold weather I wore a black shirt underneath and got TONS of compliments. I paired with an RTR jacket I bought last December, perfect match! The fabric is incredible and the fit was sexy and classy.

I got sooo many compliments on this dress! I'm 5'5" and 130 lbs and I typically wear a 4-6 in dresses, size 28 jeans. I ordered a small and it definitely had a roomier fit but still wearable. I could have gone with an XS but the small still worked. Overall I loved the dress and it was so flattering even tho it was a tiny bit big. I didn't even need to wear spanx with this dress because of the ruching on the front, making it suuuper comfortable all day!
Very comfortable all night. Flattering to curves. Color and fabric is even nicer in person - seems higher quality given the price.

links_Review_Title: Who doesn't love a perfect velvet dress?!
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress, hugs in all the right places. I ordered a S and XS and the XS fit best.
This dress is so sexy and is very forgiving. It was my backup dress and ended up changing into it for the reception. I definitely would wear this dress again. 5’1” 155lbs wore a M.
Wore for school dance. Tons of compliments. Slit is high. Made me feel awesome.
Wore for a wedding, very flattering.
I got compliments all night. This dress is so gorgeous and snugs nicely in all the right places. I love that it is loose around the tummy area. The length is classy. Overall A+
Fit like a glove

links_Review_Title: So many compliments! Danced in it all night and no wardrobe malfunctions :)
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly! So comfortable
Beautiful dress. Very figure flattering. I would buy it if I could

links_Review_Title: Was a little tight up top, and I felt like I was swimming a bit in the lower half of the dress.
links_Review_Text: Not enough curves to fill out the dress. There was also a small tear along one of the seams of the dress.

So I am never an XS, I'm usually a S-M but this dress does run large and the XS fit perfectly snug. I felt amazing in it. The colors are rich. The slit is perfect. I cannot say enough good about this dress. Will definitely rent it again.
Lustrous fabric, forgiving cut.

links_Review_Title: Wore it for muy company holiday event - and my dress was PERFECT; I received so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Dress fit and looked beautiful. I was extremely content with everything. I am 5ft and 120lbs (athletic build) and the size I selected (XSR) fit perfect - fitted but not uncomfortable.

links_Review_Title: Okay so many compliments on this thing! I felt like an old Hollywood movie star wearing this stunner
links_Review_Text: I got away with wearing NO BRA and for us curvy women, you know how much of an accomplishment that is. I loved the way the dress cinched around my "bigger" areas and I really truly felt like Marilyn Monroe in this thing.

rented this for my husband's holiday party, ended up loving it so much I bought it. Fit is perfect, super flattering. I got a small - for size reference I am 5'2" 120lbs 34D 28" waist. I even slipped a grey pullover sweater on top during dinner and got lots of compliments just on wearing the skirt portion, so more versatile than just a fancy dress. Love!!
Very flattering! I was able to wear a strapless bra with it. Runs large. I usually wear a medium/size 6. The medium was large on the top, so I wore the small which fit great

links_Review_Title: Was beautiful. Loved it. Hugged all the right places
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'0 and it was Ankle length was more of a Maxi Length but the slit fit nicely without looking too sexy.

links_Review_Title: Always on time for delivery, Always quality product. Great customer service.
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress, very figure flattering .. loved it.

Unfortunately, the ruching on the stomach was oddly loose and gave me the appearance of quite a tummy. I don't know if this was a quality issue or just the dress, because usually ruching can be quite flattering! Otherwise, would have been adorable.

links_Review_Title: Highlights the curvessssss. Love the pattern and material. Overall a show stopper
links_Review_Text: Be careful with thigh slit while sitting. I have thick thighs it was a little snug around my legs. Even though it didn't fit me exactly right it was perfect for a fall/winter wedding and fun to dance it. Got a TON of compliments.

I was so excited by this dress, but very bummed when I received it. The dress is way too big in the midsection and way too small in the bust - even two sizes two big wouldn't zip over my boobs, and it was hanging in the waist. Did not wear, but got a great replacement.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit my large chest and I didn’t even have to wear a bra. It was great! The straps are the perfect size and supportive. The slit and rouging were so flattering. I love this dress!
Loved it - cute and flowy, and I got so many compliments! Think I'm going to wear it one more time before I send it back.
Flowy and shapeless but it's great for maternity. Lightweight and airy.
This dress was so free and forgiving. I wore this to work with a jacket, to church with a sweeter and on the weekend with nothing. I absolutely loved this gorgeous dress!!!

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and perfect with a bump!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so comfy! I wore it at 26 weeks pregnant. Love the pockets and received tons of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Cute but not what I was expecting
links_Review_Text: Love the feel and freedom of fabric. Not very flattering and the armpit was a little tight. Otherwise, true to size. Great for a lazy sunday, stroll at the farmer's market

I tried to love this. Beautiful fabric and print, love the details and style but the cut just did not work. I like flowy dresses but this almost looks like it's meant to be maternity? Cuts wide in the hips so it made me look like I had hips that I don't and then cut back in towards the bottom. Maybe could work for more of an hourglass shape but it was a miss for my straight build. Disappointed because it's beautiful otherwise.
Pretty dress though lots of fabric and kind of fits like a bag
Nice dress, very roomy and forgiving for hot summer work or everyday wear. Good for moms to be! I would probably size down if I rented again, which I might!

links_Review_Title: Prego Review: Perfect Flow, great colors and cut. 25 weeks and it was the BEST flattering dress!
links_Review_Text: Really enjoyed this dress. Fabric is great for travel as well. Very forgiving, and flattering. I am pregnant but would rent again pregnant or not.

links_Review_Title: Easy, flowy dress with a cool print.
links_Review_Text: A comfortable, flattering dress for plus size or pregnant people!

Great dress, fun print and colours, flattering fit, funky cut. Received loads of company, would buy it if it weren't so expensive. Amazing that even for large busted people like myself one doesn't need to go one or two sizes up

links_Review_Title: Not slimming, but oh so fun
links_Review_Text: Very unusual shape, but high end fabric and supercool.
was a little large (I sized up, but probably could've taken two sizes smaller). easy to throw on and go, looking polished

links_Review_Title: Wore this for work and got a bunch of compliments
links_Review_Text: Ran large and roomy

links_Review_Title: Really liked this dress, but it was slightly too big
links_Review_Text: Love that it has pockets! Very flowy and comfy
Love the dress, would likely buy in a 2 but not available. Ordered the 0, will see if it works. Gorgeous!

This dress is beautiful and very feminine. It is also super comfortable and lightweight. I am normally a 4 and sized down to a 2 based on other reviews. It is loose in the waist, so I paired it with a belt and it looks great that way!

Beautifully made dress, I wore while 8 months pregnant and had plenty of room to spare. Sized up by 3 from my regular size, but really could have worn one size down, it just wasn't available. This can be dressed up or dressed down and works for work or any other event!

The perfect summer dress! I absolutely adore this dress so much I wish i could keep it. It's well made and a features very forgiving, yet flattering cut. The high-low hem makes it interesting and adds a sweet, feminine flounce. Wore it twice in one week: once to work and once to a baby shower. I'm often between a 10 and a 12 because I have a large chest and broad back. The 10 was perfect. Would recommend sizing down.

Love this dress but at 6 months pregnant it looked like a house dress on me. Just baggy and unflattering. I could have sized down but the smaller size wasn't available and I'm not sure it would have made much difference. At 5'1" it was also too long in the back.
I rented the 4R for my baby shower and could have gotten away with the 2 even at 32 (almost 33) weeks pregnant. Received so many compliments on this beautiful dress!

Print is lovelier in person than online. The cut is beautiful, but a little generous. Love that it comes with pockets. Cute ruffle along the bottom looked a little more "sweet" or "southern" than the look I was going for. Would be perfect for a baby or bridal shower, brunch, or church. Great for warm weather -- fabric is breezy and lightweight!

I like this sort of easy sundress quite a bit, and this is nice. The pattern is pretty and the stitching on the skirt is a nice touch. Not my favorite rental ever but a pretty dress I'm glad to wear and swap out for something else!
This dress is not made for a petite hourglass figure. It pretty much swallowed me up, so I am returning. I think it would be a better fit on someone tall with a thin or athletic figure
Really wide at the waist so I had to belt it and wear a cardigan to make it look good. Got lots of compliments.
I loved this dress! It was my favorite rental to date! If you're in between sizes, size down!

I'm 5'3" or 5'4" and the length was perfect with flats. This dress is so forgiving and flattering at the same time and it has pockets so it's functional too! Size down as it is pretty roomy. I'm usually a size 2 but the size 0 was perfect on me.
