This was the best dress I have ever rented from RTR. Amazing quality, fabric, beautiful print & style. The way the dress is cut makes for a very easy looser fit. A very flattering dress ...I received so many compliments when I wore on family vacation!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for summer, great print, cut, and hem
links_Review_Text: Runs large. I'm between an 8/10 and the 8 would have been much better.

links_Review_Title: Darling dress, but watch the size!
links_Review_Text: This dress is darling and came to me new with tags - how grand! But alas, it had to right back, it was swimming on me! I am 5'2" 110, and it was absolutely huge. So, be sure to know the sizing before ordering.
Great dress and very easy to wear. Has pockets and would likely fit almost bag body type. At 5'2 I had to wear heels to ensure it wouldn't drag on the ground.
Fits true to size and is very comfortable on.
Comfortable and really really elegant. Can definitely dress up or down depending on the occasion.
Wore this for my mom's surprise party and got tons of compliments on it!

I wore this to a concert and it was perfect! Comfortable enough to dance in and not have to worry about the shirt staying up or down like other off the shoulder tops. The long sleeves make it look chic and dressed up.

links_Review_Title: Better than just a black shirt
links_Review_Text: Thick, quality material. Perfect length to tuck in. Very chic and clean.

I wore this for a presentation in LA and felt so chic and classy. Thick, well made material and it is flattering. Slightly shorter in the torso than I expected, but I wore this multiple times during my rental. Definitely a winner!
Thick material so can't be tucked in, it'll bunch. Other than that this thing made me look incredible at work, on a date, and on a bachelorette party in Nantucket!
Only con is the sleeves occasionally got in the way, other than that, it was a great to. Will rent again.

I wish I could have bought this top. I wore it to dinner for my husbands birthday, our with friends, and on vacation. I may tent this again and purchase. Loved the off the shoulder look. Next time, I would size down to see if the fit was a little better

This might be my favorite rental so far. Will definitely rent again. The drop shoulder gives a bit of sexiness without feeling overly exposed and the drama of the sleeves makes it a standout piece. The material has nice structure so it was form fitting but not tight. It was a smidge short for my long torso, but I think if it were longer the material would have buckled oddly when sitting. My stomach definitely would have been exposed if I lifted my arms. I do understand why some reviewers commented that sleeves got annoying after a while, depending on the event you're choosing for it. I didn't have an issue with them while eating, but found washing my hands a bit awkward trying not to drag the sleeves in the basin.
Runs a little big but it made me feel sexy without being too revealing
Fitted around waist, off shoulder stayed in place
This top is elegant and sexy. Wore it with blue jeans and heels for a night out. Would definitely rent again, and may even size down next time.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and easy to wear sweater
links_Review_Text: Material is thick enough to feel sturdy and warm, but not bulky at all. I loved the dramatic sleeves and would totally rent it again!

Rented this for going out!!! Such a beautiful top but it has SOOOO much stretch. Definitely size down- wish I had!! Super cute and wish I owned it. Beautiful black top bags great for going out. Slits were fun too!!! Also the material was thicker so it made it great for winter time.
Falls perfectly off the shoulders. The material is a thick and of great quality. I loved the sleeves. Will rent again

links_Review_Title: Classic and edgy! This top is to die for!
links_Review_Text: The fit is amazing, as is the fabric! The sleeves are long with a slit at the bottom, so it could be annoying at times, but it’s all in the name of FASHION!

This shirt by Solace London was extremely comfortable! I actually did not realize I had the incorrect size on until after having the top on for some time. Running on the larger side with a lot of stretch in the fabric, I recommend going down for your back-up. I am normally between Sizes 8 & 10 and the Size UK 6/ US 2 fit me without any issue. The shirt can be tucked in to pants or a skirt or can be worn as a crop top but the cut outs on the sleeves give it the perfect edgy look! Overall, this shirt is perfect for a work or semi-formal event!

Beautiful black cold shoulder top. These sleeves are amazing and so much fun to wear. The only downside to this top was that the material was a little rough so it rubbed after wearing all day. But overall high quality and fun piece to wear!
Love the fit and the long sleeves on this top. I wish I could afford to purchase it. Classic, edgy versatile piece.
I wore a size 14, but Im usually a size 10. I could have easily worn a 12, or a 10 if I wanted it more snug. I wore this top 3 times and may look into buying a size 10 or 12 :)

links_Review_Title: Style of the shirt was flattering
links_Review_Text: Sleeves were a little long, but fit well

links_Review_Title: Cute shirt with a little extra flare
links_Review_Text: great fit. stretchy material.
Wore this a few times before returning and will rent again. I like my tops not to snug so I ordered up and it fit perfect. Very flattering and great for a night out.
This is a great date night or going out top. Great cut but you will want to tuck the sleeves if you wear it to dinner as they do hang down. I'd rent this again for a fun going out look.

links_Review_Title: Fit great but I sized way up. Typically I'm a 6 or 8 depending on brand and fit, and I wore a 10.
links_Review_Text: Thick fabric so you could get away with no bra if you dont have a big chest. I wore a 10 and the fit was perfect. I have really broad shoulders so I sized up, I typically wear a 6 or 8 depending on the fit and brand of the top. I rented a 10 and it fit perfectly. If you don't have broad shoulders maybe the fit would be more true to size, but I would say size up.

links_Review_Title: Cute top you can dress down with jeans, or dress up with slacks or a skirt.
links_Review_Text: perfect fit
This top makes any accompanying piece sophisticated and sexy . I will rent again a size smaller

links_Review_Title: Cute top that could be dressed up or down
links_Review_Text: I am usually a size 4/ small but by accident I saw this top in black & didn't realize it was a size 10. It fit like a size medium...

links_Review_Title: Wore it to dinner with jeans.
links_Review_Text: fit nice, cute with jeans.

Gorgeous top, love the exposed shoulder look. I'm tall so the sweater was a bit short for me, I think that ladies with shorter torso would enjoy it more since I constantly had to pull it down. Also, the sleeves are really long. Having said that I would definitely rent again.
Cute top but too form fitting for my body.
Nice material, stretchy, fitted, great with a skirt!
Amazing quality, speak and sexy, fit perfectly!!

links_Review_Title: Fun top. Adds a bit of sexy shoulder without being too revealing.
links_Review_Text: The sleeves were insanely long on me. I wore the shirt to dinner so there were times I had to watch out that I didn't accidentally dip my sleeve into the sauce. The fabric is thick and stiff. It's like old-school polyester. But, it had stretch and was thick enough to hide flaws.
I have a long torso so it fit well but I did have to keep pulling it down when I was seated. The material is great and I loved the sleeves .

links_Review_Title: LOVE this top - felt very classy and sexy
links_Review_Text: I normally wear a 2-4 and they sent me an 8 and it fit perfectly. It's kind of a body con material; a nice, thick texture that's flattering and easy to go braless if you can. It was just long enough not to show any stomach with midrise jeans. Wish I owned this. So many compliments!
super cute style with a dangled pair of earrings and hair pulled back but it runs really big I would possibly order a size down or honestly two sizes down.

links_Review_Title: Nice way to be covered up but interesting in the winter
links_Review_Text: Nice way to be covered up but interesting in the winter
This is perfect to dress up or to wear with jeans. The sleeves are a bit long but still comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Great fit, unique and classic style
links_Review_Text: Love it

So this was my first time ordering and this dress was not my original first choice but boy am I glad I got it!! I was renting a dress for a black tie wedding and wanted a long dress. I had found the dress on here that i wanted and since this was my first time when I went to check out they let me pick a second just in case dress. This one just popped up and I was like ok that's cute get that. I ended up wear this instead and LOVED it!!!! It fit so well and looked so classy

Wore this for New Years Great Gatsby themes party. Fits true to size. This dress has some stretch to it, fits true to size. Liked the asymmetric top and bottom of the dress. Great for smaller chest, but may fit larger size. Only complaint: the dress would ride up a little on the left side in the hip area, nothing that a good tug couldn't fix.
This dress was the perfect little black dress without being super revealing. Tons of compliments all night.

I wore this dress to a fundraiser for my husband's work. I wanted something sexy but classy. This dress was perfect! The quality of the material was way better than ordering something cheap online. The fit was perfect for my body type. It has enough stretch in the material to hug your body without looking like a spandex dress. I was comfortable in the dress all night. At first I was a little hesitant about the slit being high, but it wasn't trashy and pushed my comfort zone JUST ENOUGH.
The fit hugged all the right places! Very comfortable, and felt sexy!

This dress was smoking hot! Wore it for a masked Mardi Gras party and it was a hit. I typically wear a small (5'4" 130lbs) and this dress was snug in all the right places. I might've worn the medium instead but the bodice on the medium was missing some parts.Not sure but someone must have altered it previously. Customer service was great and sent me a third style for free to replace the medium. I'm very pleased with the cost and the ease of using this service and I will absolutely order again!

I wore this dress to a special needs prom. I was looking for something simple but unique and fell in love with this! It is usually hard to find things that fit me length-wise as I am barely 5'1, but this was perfect. It stays put, no need to pull all evening to keep it up. And there was need for a bra for me as it was pretty supportive. The only Cons: The slit goes high when sitting, so you have to be careful. & The piece of plastic that help up the top angled section was poking me occasionally
Great fit!!
Wore this for New Years and loved it! Very flattering and if you have a big chest, no worries on the strapless. Felt super secure but the girls didn't feel squished. Will probably buy this one!
The dress has thick material which is great! The fit was perfect. It wasn't very noticeable but there were a couple snags on the dress which is why I gave it 4 stars.

links_Review_Title: Strapless and slit, I felt so sexy!!
links_Review_Text: I loved everything about this dress and I would totally recommend it. I loved the neckline. I didn't have to wear spanx with it because of the way the dress laid. Only con was the internal boning on one side stuck out and would poke me when I sat.
This picture is not the greatest...taken AFTER NYE festivities were long finished, but this dress is amazing! Fits like a glove, super comfy and just the right amount of "wow!"
The dress fit perfectly and flattering to my curvy shape! I got complements all night from complete strangers! I felt like a movie star!

links_Review_Title: Rented for black tie NYE party. Soooo many compliments. Figure flattering.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly! Easy to wear, comfortable.

Absolutely loved this dress! Wore it to my company's holiday party. The irregular shape made it standout, not so "normal." Fit was wonderful, I debated between a XS and S, went with S just for comfort factor. Super comfy dress. Received compliments all night long. Wish I could buy it! The perfect little formal black dress. Don't hesitate on this one!

Loved loved loved this dress. Really comfy, easy to dance in and stays up the whole night without any issues. This is a great choice for a woman with curves, it truly accentuates your body and leaves you feeling like a million bucks! 10/10 recommend!
Loved the fit! Super comfortable. Got tons of compliments. The fabric is stretchy but elegant so it fits and hugs your curves. I am 5'4" 160 lbs and curvy on the bottom.

I am 5'1 138lbs. I ha e a more muscular/athletic build. I selected size SR and it fit like a glove. The slit was perfectly placed for my short frame and the asymmetrical design was amazing!! I received soooo many compliments in the dress! I think this has been my best rental to date! LOVE THIS DRESS

links_Review_Title: Friends, food, fun and the dress :)
links_Review_Text: Super cute and flattering, nice weight fabric, fun gold tone exposed zipper in the back, so I paired with gold shoes and jewelry - although a black dress, it wasn't simple and I received a ton of compliments!

This dress was perfect for the Christmas Party I rented it for! I loved the chest detail and slit to give extra pizazz to a LBD. I received a ton of compliments the entire night. It was easy to wear and the fabric is thick enough to hide any imperfections. I didn't want to take it off or even return it.

The dress fit great the only problem was the built in metal support was poking me which made it a bit uncomfortable but i tolerated because I really liked how the dress fit. I am a size 6 and the M fit perfect.

Fit was fantastic. It didn't slide down and the point detail didn't fall down due to the boning and grip on the seam. It was extremely flattering and interesting. Got compliments all evening. Good for short torso and curves. Wore a strapless bra and knee to under bra spanx. Spanx probably were not necessary

I got so many compliments on this dress! It fit really beautifully and was super chic! Only slight complaint I would have would be that the wire structure in the dress would poke through and would randomly stab me throughout the night. It hurt sometimes, but beauty is pain!
Dress was cute but had too much extra fabric around the middle. I may try to size down and see if that helps.

I love this dress! It was comfortable and flattering. The length didn't look unusually long, even though I'm 5'2. And the boning allowed me to wear it without a bra (32DD) and still feel supported. My only concern was the zipper; There was no clasp, so the zipper kept coming undone by about an inch. It didn't make the dress feel noticeably loose, and for a person with long hair it won't be an eye sore. But because I have short hair, and I knew it was visible, it did bother me.

links_Review_Title: Fun black dress for a gala!
links_Review_Text: This dress was great for a grad school gala. The slit was fun but not too high, still appropriate for a work/school event. Wire structuring in the top helps the point stay upright, but digs in to your ribs if the dress is too small. I go between a small and a medium - the medium fit like a glove, the small poked me in the ribs. The dress is stretchy so I could get both on, but I went with the medium for comfort.

links_Review_Title: Super cute in all of the right places
links_Review_Text: I'm in between sizes now (having gained a bit since moving south) but this dress was very forgiving around my mid section. It actually was very shapely and gave the appearance of a nice set of boobs that I really don't have LBS! All in all, I received many compliments all night...GREAT choice
This dress fits like a glove and is extremely flattering! I would definitely size up. This is one of my favorite rentals. RENT IT

Fit true to size. I'm 5'2" 135 lbs and the 4 was perfect. One complaint I do have was the boning in the bodice was poking out on the inside. I had to get an undergarment shaper to save the skin on my torso. These areas need to be reinforced. But I did get a lot of compliments and it was great paired with some snake print heeled sandals.

I loved this dress! I wore this for a mad hatter gala I attended for work. It was figure flattering. The material was heavy enough to provide support, yet loose enough to be forgiving. It was stunning and perfect for the occasion. I am 5’3” and weight 130 lbs. I usually wear a size 4. Both the small and medium fit me fine, the medium was a little looser and longer, so I went with that one since this was a work event.

I absolutely loved this dress - I'm usually an 8/10 (150lbs, 5'10''), so I ordered a medium and chose a large as my backup size. The large was way too big and the medium was also pretty roomy. I feel like I might have been able to wear a small. Even though it was a hair larger than I would have liked, I absolutely LOVED wearing it. It was very comfortable and super flattering. The slit was a bit high for me (although I'm taller than the average girl) so I had to be careful to not let it open up when I sat - but other than that, there is nothing I would change about this dress. I would absolutely rent it again.

I picked this dress up last minute for a charity Gala at the Chicago storefront. It fit great and had some stretch to it which was awesome for dancing. I’m 5’3” so it fit me longer than it appears on the model in the picture but I liked that.

Definitely a dress to wear with heels. Dress looks frumpy/ little house on prairie with something more casual. Overall though very pleasantly surprised at how well the dress fits. Length hits mid calf and I do not find the neck to be too plunging.
Nice transition to fall dress. Maybe not the most flattering, but would be nice if you are trying to hide a bump.

The print and lace detailing ahead a fun edgy, yet romantic vibe. Would be cute with black lace up army boots. A size 10 wasn't available, so I did a 12, and thought it fit perfect and would size up again in the future. The tie wasn't done upon arrival, and I'm glad I noticed it was done in the pictures, cause it didn't seem obvious to me- but definitely needed it.

Love the way this fit on the model in the pictures, but felt that it was very frumpy in person. I am usually a 2 or 4 in dress size, but the 2 felt too big on me.. and then front ruffle was not flattering. Great quality and beautiful details, but disappointed in the fit.

After reading reviews, I was ready for this to be frumpy or bulky, especially being a short woman. The material was flowy and I enjoyed the Laura Engalls Wilder chic vibe of it. I found it to be flattering and lengthening. I wore this twice - once at work and once for a casual night out. I can see myself renting this again.

links_Review_Title: This dress is for a straight and slim girl!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress but it runs a bit small and the photo doesn't show the little flaps in the front which are NOT made for a more curvy girl. Definitely the dress for you if you need a little more flair in your slim body.
The dress is a beautiful pattern with lace detail but runs large. I felt like it was a mumu dress on me.

PROS: This dress is very comfortable. It has very cute lace details which give it a little something different. CONS: It did not have as much shape around the waist as I would have liked. Made me look a little wider around the middle than usual. This may have been one that I should have sized down. Also, the neckline really plunges. But if you wear a bralette or tank underneath you should be fine.

links_Review_Title: Rented for a church memorial service
links_Review_Text: Very little house on the prairie with a little more cleavage. It's a little big, I could probably have sized down to a 4. Perfect for a memorial service I'm feeling the knitting circle vibe this fall.

links_Review_Title: Big swishy skirt but formal at the same time.
links_Review_Text: Made for people taller than myself. If the torso hadn't been so long it would have been more fun to wear.
Fit great and true to size
Flattering, interesting, comfortable. Feminine but edgy. Would be good with sandals or boots.
ran a little big in the chest and waist, but with the tie detail the extra fabric was masked.

links_Review_Title: really like it. very comfortable and fits well. Great dress to wear to work and after work.
links_Review_Text: loved the fit

links_Review_Title: It was too big, so I didn't wear it.
links_Review_Text: This dress is attractive, but the size ten on me with a 31 inch waist was too generously sized to look right. I will need to try a size down -- an eight, to see if it will fit.
Length and roominess around stomach make for an awkward fit. Print is cute and lace detail is nice though.
I love Thakoon. I was excited to wear this dress, until it came. It's really frumpy and something a librarian or someone from little house on the prairie would wear. It's really not flattering.

links_Review_Title: This is a dress for a petite or slim gal.
links_Review_Text: Fabric is a little stiff, and the overall effect on me was matronly. I'm a size 12-14 with a D cup so that could be part of it. Wanted to like this more than i did!
Didnt like the way this looked on me

The cut and flow of this dress is divine. The pattern is delicate and the lace accents were subtle. It is a long dress. I wore it for a baptism with kitten heels and then with sneakers and a denim jacket for a dressed down look.

I ordered this in a 0, but I found it to be too big. It was loose all over, which isn't necessarily a deal breaker, but the v-neckline also came down very low. The length was very unflattering on my 5'2" frame - not tea length, not maxi, just at a super awkward spot at the ankle. The print is pretty, but on me, this dress just looked like I was trying on a modern version of my grandma's nightgown. On someone taller, this could look great.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and easy to wear but would probably look best on a slim, petite frame.
links_Review_Text: I paired the dress with a cardigan because on it's own it felt a bit frumpy and reminded me of something my kindergarten teacher wore in the 80s. But with the cardigan it looks nice for work.

This technically fit me: it was fine in the bust and waist, but the skirt was a little too long/voluminous for my frame and just wasn't particularly flattering. Otherwise, cute print and well made. Would be a nice transition for Fall.
I loved the color of this dress and that it has pockets. I found the top and straps were large for a petite person- otherwise great dress.

links_Review_Title: Felt a little bridesmaid-y in person and was large in the bust.
links_Review_Text: I probably would have worn to the wedding if I couldn't get an option in, but overall, it felt a bit like a bridesmaid dress in person. In the bust, it was a bit large and I am average-chested.

I loved this dress. Very comfortable for a long wedding day. Material is great quality. Does wrinkle, so needs a heavy steam before wearing. Seaming on bodice is a nice detail. Pockets are great, too!

When it came, it was a little wrinkly and in this fabric that really shows. I was able to get some of it out by spraying it lightly with water, but the very bottom was still kind of folded. It was in a decent condition but you can tell it's been worn before. It was really gorgeous tho! I also wasn't able to get my size (0R), so it was a little big on me.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress for a recent wedding I attended. I received tons of compliments & will reorder!
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size EXCEPT in the chest. I ended up wearing the larger size I ordered only because I have large breasts. Otherwise, it fit nicely, was comfortable, great material, beautiful color and style. Loved this dress and brand- I will be ordering again!

Incredibly flattering dress with POCKETS!!! The color is stunning, the fit up top is tight giving you shape while the bottom is flared. My only wish is that the straps were adjustable, but that's what fashion tape is for!
Got lots of compliments! So comfortable and easy to dance in.

I got loads of compliments on this gem of a dress. It's very flattering for a petite build. The tea length was more floor length for my 5'3" stature. The color is stunning. Great for a holiday wedding.
Gorgeous color, comfortable overall great dress. Pockets are massive. Straps were a little loose on the 8 but the 6 fit perfectly.

The color was absolutely gorgeous, the style was so comfortable (I didn't even need a bra, which is unheard of!), the fit was perfect - it was like it was made for me! I received so many compliments all evening. And I was the only one wearing an emerald dress!

This dress was perfect for the formal affair I attended. I am 4 months pregnant and the poof from the skirt hid my little bump perfectly. Though i would absolutely wear this if i hadn't been pregnant as well. It has pockets which made it perfect to carry my phone and lipstick in. The fabric is much prettier and brighter than it appears in my photo. The stock picture on RTR represents the color perfectly.

Had a blast in this dress and it was super comfortable. Went to a black tie optional wedding - the high low hem was sort of half cocktail/half black tie. The top is a soft material that's stretchy. Was a little worried about seeing down my top while dancing but it wasn't too bad. I had to keep an eye on the straps falling down and might pin them tighter next time, but I'd rent this dress again. Danced the whole night!

This dress literally made several people stop in their tracks to tell me how great it was. AMAZINGLY comfortable! The front wasn't as high as I thought it would be, but that didn't matter. It was the perfect dress for a December Christmas wedding!

I loved loved this dress. I wore it to perform on a concert and the color was so rich and vibrant on the stage. It was a bit low cut and there is some pleating in the dress that can make you look wider if you are an hour glass shape. I should have rented the 10 but they didn't have it in stock. The bust was slightly baggy, but you couldn't tell from the stage. overall I loved this dress. Will rent again! I received so many compliments!

True to size. Chest was a little large, but with a strapless bra it worked well, without the fabric is not sturdy enough to hide anything. Love the 2 types of fabric. Pockets were great and love the high-low style! Would absolutely wear again!

links_Review_Title: I loved the color and style of the dress!
links_Review_Text: I loved the high low hem and color of the dress. Empire waist always fits me better, so that was great too. I got so many compliments! There was a little bit of stretch in the fabric, so I probably could've gone down a size. Overall it was a good fit and great for the formal wedding we attended.

This dress was beautiful! I saw that many of the reviews said the dress was big, so I wanted to order a 4 and a 6. The 4 wasn't available, so I got the 6 and 8. The 8 ended up fitting and it was gorgeous! It was a little difficult because I am bigger on top, especially because I couldn't wear a bra, but it worked out! I did feel a bit exposed though. The straps were loose and kept falling down. It was long but I am very short and we were ready to fix that. Overall a beautiful dress!

links_Review_Title: Unique statement dress for a black tie wedding!
links_Review_Text: I received so many compliments on this dress. The color was beautiful. Did not need to wear a bra. I probably could have gone up a size, the waist was pretty tight. Thankful for back-up sizes! Another successful dress rental.

links_Review_Title: Just as pictured... classic and comfortable
links_Review_Text: Fit was great. I'm 5'10" and typically wear a 6 in a-line cuts. This dress was still a bit loose on the top, but the 4 would have been too snug. The torso was just barely long enough, so if you're taller than me, the dress could hit in an awkward place. Other than that, it was lovely. Also... it has pockets!

This dress has the most beautiful emerald color and I was complimented on it all night. However, the zipper is a bit tricky, so I ended up sliding it over my head while it was zipped up. The straps tended to fall down a bit, but that wasn't a big deal.

links_Review_Title: Big Hit! Lots of compliments- has pockets!!
links_Review_Text: I'm usually an 8/10, the 4 was small but I made it in, a 6 would have been perfect.
Rented for a black tie wedding. Fit perfectly, hid my alcohol bloat, and has HUGE pockets. Love.

I wore this to a friends wedding and received tons of compliments. It seems to run a little big, and the straps tended to slip off my shoulders, but overall I was very pleased. The pockets were a big plus too!

links_Review_Title: All night I was told I looked just like Grace Kelly in this gown!!
links_Review_Text: The dress was perfect. The color was phenomenal and I received dozens of compliments all night! It did run a little long, so shorter girls (I am 5'2) wearing at least a 2 inch heel is necessary. I could've used a bit of a shoulder strap adjustment , but the dress did not have adjustable straps. It was not bad, just something I needed to keep an eye on throughout the night. Overall, I couldn't have asked for a better gown!

Really comfortable and fun to dance. The top is a soft stretchy material. The dress poofs out in a fun way but hits a bit too high, which is why I gave it one less star. Still got tons of compliments. The color was amazing and unusual among a sea of black, navy and reds.

links_Review_Title: Compliments galore and the right amount of style and wow factor for the setting.
links_Review_Text: The color of this dress is what caught my eye and it didn't disappoint. The skirt has lovely volume without being overdone, the bodice is just tight enough to look presentable for a wedding with the right amount of cleavage. I got several compliments and felt like the belle of the ball. Since the color and style are attention grabbing enough accessorizing is simplified, which I appreciated as well.
Rented the dress for a family wedding. Received so many compliments on the color. It does run large but it's super comfortable. Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: It was a great dress for a black tie wedding
links_Review_Text: Like the other reviews say it does run a little big but true to size. The straps do fall sometime but overall a comfortable dress.

This color must be in because so many ladies were in emerald green at the wedding i attended! It was perfect for an early September wedding in upstate New York. So many compliments on this dress and as always, people love the pockets! This does run big, so I was able to fit perfectly in the 4R. I paired it with gold statement earrings from J.Crew (also RTR) red lip stick and nude heels.

links_Review_Title: Rented for a black tie optional wedding.
links_Review_Text: This dress is COZY. The pockets are huge- in the picture I had sunglasses, multiple chapsticks, my wife's wallet, pack of tissues etc and you cannot tell. No shapewear required for this dress, and the top is stretchy. 4 stars because the center of the sweetheart neckline was pulling apart, and the zipper was TOUGH. Took three of my sisters to get it past the transition in the fabric. Once it was zipped, it was amazing! It is also long on my short legs, so while it is a high-low skirt, it didn't appear as it does on the model on me.
Wore this dress for a wedding and I loved it. It's very high quality. Feel comfortable and the color is amazing.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a formal-black tie wedding!
links_Review_Text: I read the reviews before renting- ordered a 4 and a 2 just in case. In general, I wear a 4. The 2 fit perfectly. I had to wear heels the whole night because the dress is a little long for me-- I'm 5'4 and I didn't want it to drag on the ground. Got so many compliments :-)

links_Review_Title: For a beautiful wedding in La Jolla CA
links_Review_Text: This was my first time renting from RTR and it was great!! LOVE this dress. Pros: - Gorgeous deep emerald green color -Beautiful structured skirt -Stretchy top -POCKETS. Cons: -Ran a little large (I am typically an 8 but wore a 6 for this) -Straps were a little long Overall, 5 stars! The pockets were amazing (I didn't have to carry a purse or make my bf carry my stuff - the pockets fit my phone, wallet, keys, and lipstick!!) I love the high-low design and the thick structured fabric on the bottom, it felt very regal and I wasn't always tripping over it. Definitely recommend this dress.

Fits true to size. All I needed was a strapless bra, some accessories, and my look was complete! I have gotten SO many compliments on it. I was very comfortable in the dress all night. My shoes on the other hand..
This dress was exactly what I was looking for! Great for a black tie affair. Beautiful color and so flattering for my pear shaped body!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but did not wear it for event.
links_Review_Text: This dress was very pretty but I ended up using the backup style for my event. The cloth is comfortable and it is true to size. It was a little to long for me since I didn't plan on wearing high heels. So, I decided to not use is for my event.

Loved the color of this dress! It was perfect for a work gala with a pop of fun with leopard print heels. Wish it had sinched at the waste a bit more but all-in-all, comfortable and received a ton of compliments on the skirt. Plus, POCKETS!

links_Review_Title: I felt so timeless in this gown! Got so many compliments on the style and color
links_Review_Text: This fit a tiny bit big on the waist and chest area. I think if the straps could be tightened it would have felt more comfortable. I loved the way it looked and felt regardless of the straps. I felt so comfortable in it and loved the style

links_Review_Title: Perfect but go down a size!
links_Review_Text: Runs a little large so I added a gold glitter belt and it was perfect! The pockets are phenomenal. I got a ton of compliments. I’m 5’7 and it was a little long on me. Definitely recommend!

Loved the fit and color of this dress. Of course, couldn't help but show off the pocket feature every time I got a compliment on the dress (which was often). It was the perfect color for an outdoor wedding and was really comfortable to wear. A few pro tips I wish I would have known before renting: 1) even though the skirt is a high low, the high is actually very long (for me, 5'6, it was below mid-shin. When looking at previous pictures I expected it to be a little shorter and therefore a little more casual of a look than it actually was. I lightly tripped on the back a couple times even in 4" heels because it really is floor length. 2) though the dress didn't look particularly wrinkly when I put it on, a lot of wrinkles showed in the photos- I wish I had given it a fresh steam right before my event. 3) the top dips a little lower than I had anticipated so found my bra showing a few times- had I known in advance I would have done a lower cleavage cut strapless or planned for stick ons. Overall gorgeous dress that I would rent again.
I rented this for New Year's Eve in Las Vegas. I wanted to wear heels but the weather was freezing!!It also was a lot of walking so my boots worked out great.
I wore this for a 80s themed fundraiser and it was great. The backless feature is striking and got tons of compliments about the color and shape

links_Review_Title: Amazing event dress. Wore it to a glow in the dark party.

links_Review_Text: This dress is so unique and fun!! Hugs in all the right places! It is a little short so possibly size up if you are really tall.
Love the color. It's so video. Definitely will turn heads. I got the XL based off of reviews and it fit perfectly.
so fun and unique!! nothing quite like it!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for sorority date party!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect! I got so many compliments on it!
I ordered this to wear to a formal in New Orleans and got so many compliments! I am 5'5 and 125 pounds and the small fit perfectly! Definitely rent this dress!

links_Review_Title: wore this for a girls club night out in Vegas
links_Review_Text: The dress is short, but I opted for the smaller size because on the back up size, the top was too big. It is indeed a mini mini but not an issue for me as I am short. The back is open, which made it fun, too. Great color, looked great in pics, and I felt great in it!

I wore this to a party and received endless compliments all night. The back is amazing. I was worried that the sequins would become itchy but no problems all night long. It was a really comfortable dress. It ran true to size. Love this dress!
This dress is beautiful. I wore it for NYE. I wore an XS.

links_Review_Title: confidence I felt in this dress
links_Review_Text: definitely true to size but fit so perfectly, the perfect length, the fit accentuated everything one would want accentuated :)

Great dress, extremely comfortable because it's lined really well. This dress is a show stopper. I attended a New Years party in my city and people said I was the best dressed person at the party. !! For Love and Lemons really can do no wrong as far as I'm concerned.
Rented this for NYE, but honestly I would wear this every day of my life if I could. This dress was so fun and fit perfectly!

This dress was absolutely stunning for a New Year's party I attended. I am a 6-8 and ordered the medium and large. I fit perfectly into the medium but my 5'10 stature made the dress just barely in appropriate length-wise so I went for the large the night of. Highly recommend this dress I received compliments all evening!
Really loved this dress but the front draped too much because my chest wasn't big enough. The back also gapped a little. May work o better for someone with a longer torso.
I sized down because other reviews said it ran large. I'm usually a 2 or 4. The small fit perfectly! It is short, though. I got so many compliments! It's a stunning dress.
LOVED this backless sparkly dress for our annual Christmas party. Got complements all night. It was comfy and sexy at the same time.

I had strangers tell me how amazing this dress was. My only complaint was the back was gaping a little- maybe I have a short torso or maybe I should have sized down. The length was fine on me- at 5'5". I didn't do much sitting. It was comfortable for an all night party and warm for a (indoor) winter Christmas party.
It was a little big in the bust and forearms. Overall good dress and I got so many compliments!
I absolutely loved this dress! It's more beautiful in person, I like that I could remove the shoulder pads, it was sexy and fun! It's definitely short, but so flattering.

I loved this dress so much! The sequins are such a pretty color. I'm about 5"6 and I would say the dress was just long enough. I know FL&L dresses usually run small so if you're y'all I'd order up a size! Other than that great fit and the prettiest dress. Shoulder pads come with it but they are removable which was a plus.
I went to the NYC store with my sister and she picked this stunner for our night out. Cool sculptural dress!
Perfectly fun party dress! Open back was super cute and sexy, pretty short, tape up the girls!

I wore this to my senior homecoming and it was so beautiful!! It's great for short people because it is a mini dress and it's very flattering overall! It has a very unique color and photographs very well!

links_Review_Title: Super sexy mini with an open back
links_Review_Text: Wore it for my birthday festivities and it was perfect. Definitely an attention grabber. Great for petite women. Hides your tummy too.
Fit was great-- shoulders are a little poofier than I usually like. Not the best for large breasts, but overall was a fun dress for my birthday party!
It's a very bright teal. It's a little form fitting around your hips and thighs. I didn't end up wearing as I thought it was almost too Vegas for Vegas for me. I felt like a show girl from the 80s.

I loved this dress!! The color, the sparkle!! It is very, very short. I had the Large (I am typically a size 10) and it fit with room. I probably could wear a Medium but my concern is the length. I have a short torso so there was a gape in the front & the back of this dress above the waistline area. I do have a flat rear & I must say that the way the gathers were done in the back actually made my rear ended look good.

links_Review_Title: Great fabric but way too short!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit everywhere up top, but it was WAY too short. Definitely order a size up!! The fabric is really fun and would be the perfect party dress if the length were more appropriate. There's no give to the skirt either, so keep that in mind if you plan to do any dancing. But the color and fabric are really unique and would be perfect for a party!

links_Review_Title: Back Too Low For My Taste
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress! The color is amazing and the style is super cute...except, the back was way too low for me so, I didn't wear it. I don't feel comfortable with my entire back being exposed...guess I overlooked that when ordering. If you're comfortable with that, then this dress is awesome for you. Fits true to size. The top is a little baggy (in a fashionable way) so, perfect for small or busty ladies.

I fell in love with this top! So much fun the high neck with the ruffled collar and slight poof to the sleeves was so flattering. The pink and the shimmer really dressed it up for a fun night on the town. I rented for a work event in Nashville and it was perfect, received so many compliments! The cami that comes with is definitely a little loose and doesn't go with the dress, used my own cami and it worked out perfect.

Rented the dress version of this for a nice dinner date and I loved it! I was excited to see that there's a top version of it and it did not disappoint! The only downside about this piece is the black camisole - the strap keeps falling off.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful top to switch up your work wardrobe
links_Review_Text: You def need a black cami under this and the neck is kind of high but I like it like that. Beautiful shirt with beautiful colors to add some sparkle to your black suit.

links_Review_Title: My favorite rental to date - I received compliments all night long!
links_Review_Text: This blouse is stunning! I received sooo many compliments - the photos don't do the top justice. The fabric is stunning. Love the little bit of "pouf" in the shoulders, and love the high neckline. Even though this is lace, it's not itchy, even on the neck. The shirt is fairly loose fitting, I probably could have sized down one. My favorite part is that it buttons at the nape of the neck, but the button is inside the collar instead of on the outside, so your hair doesn't wind up tangled in it!

links_Review_Title: So fun yet professional for work
links_Review_Text: I wore this for my new company headshot, it photographed very well. It was a tad bit but that was my fault, I sized up not being familiar with the brand.
Very lovely. Comes in 2 pieces, with a black tank top for underneath. Comfy, classic and the gold thread adds a lovely shine. Paired with black jeans and petal pink Rothy's flats.

links_Review_Title: Weird fit in the shoulders. But fits everywhere else
links_Review_Text: Did not wear this one. I actually couldn't wait to take it off. Was not digging the extra material in the armpit area.
Gorge- got lots of compliments!
True to size, the cami provided was not my favorite fit so I wore my own black tank underneath. I am 5'3" 32DD 130lbs and wore a 38.
This shirt was amazing! Got so many compliments and definitely will wear again

links_Review_Title: Pictures don't do this top justice!
links_Review_Text: This top is absolutely stunning and incorporates 2 trends I'm loving right now into one - Victorian styling and dark florals for fall. The shoulders have the slightest little puff to them to give the top more structure and the bow at the neck is so delicate. The top itself is sheer lace, but there is an attached black silk undershirt so you can wear regular undergarments without exposing them to the world. I ordered a size 6 to accommodate my chest, but didn't need to. I would size down because the length was a little long and the the overall fit looser than what I wanted. The only reason I gave the top 4 stars is because the metallic threads are super itchy when you first put the top on. I eventually got used to it, but if you are sensitive to fabrics or have sensitive skin, the metallic thread could be irritating to your skin.

Super comfortable and cute. I'm on the taller side so it's hard to find jumpsuits that fit me properly. This didn't give me any trouble. I received plenty of compliments on it during my Zoom meetings. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Loved this outfit! Super easy to rent and very comfortable !
links_Review_Text: Super comfortable outfit and fit very well. I was nervous about it being see through a little but it was really nice quality and was not see through at all. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: potential option for bridal shower. Very flattering!
I loved this jumpsuit! It was so comfortable and so flattering!
links_Review_Text: Wore this for my courthouse wedding. I received so many compliments while wearing the jumpsuit. I did wear some nude colored shape wear because it is a bit see through. So comfortable. Ordered a 4 and 6, and the 4 ended up being the best fit.

It fit really well, I am glad I got the free extra size in a two because the 4 was too big. I wore this for my Bridal shower and I got so many compliments on it. I will be renting this again for my rehearsal dinner for sure!

links_Review_Title: It fit like it was made for me!
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit fit like a glove! Wasn't sheer at all, which is a typical issue for white pieces. I would absolutely buy it if I could!
This jumpsuit was perfect for the occasion. Simple & elegant. The material was not see-through, as you might expect in a white garment. I would definitely rent again for future events!
This wasn't first choice for my wedding welcome party because it seemed a little plain; boy was I wrong. Throw on some sexy heels and earrings and this baby is a knock out!

links_Review_Title: Great for work day to night
links_Review_Text: This is a perfect warm weather work outfit. I've rented this a few times. It transitions well into evening.

links_Review_Title: Wonderful outfit for my wedding shower!
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit fits true to size and was good quality. Nice thicker material so it didn't show any undergarments underneath and I just felt really pretty. It also was great for my early January Texas shower. I received a ton of compliments and was so comfortable the whole day. I would buy it if it had a reason to wear this outfit again!
This fit me like a glove and was very comfortable to wear! Loved it and would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Flattering and classic winter white pantsuit
links_Review_Text: Very flattering to my small waist and fuller thighs. Loved pairing it with red heels for night out. The suit is lined, too, which makes it hang nicely. Only downside is my rental has clearly been washed and worn a lot, and the white is getting dingy. But that was really only noticeable to me. Overall, great and unexpected choice for a pre- Christmas event

Absolutely loved loved loved this jumpsuit! I got so many compliments on it. I ordered both a 6 and 8, because jumpsuits can be tricky for me, as I have a long torso and no one likes camel toes. I'm usually an 8 but it was actually too big and the 6 was perfect!! Couldn't recommend more!
This jumpsuit fit well and was easy to wear. Really liked it but wasn't obsessed.
I wore this for my son's baptism. I received so many compliments and this was such a comfortable outfit. The fabric was great and the fit was perfect.

Loved this jumpsuit! It was very comfortable and easy to dance in. I went with a size 4 but thought I could have possibly sized down if I wanted it to be more fitted. Wore at an outdoor party - very breathable fabric. Would definitely recommend!
LOVED THIS JUMPSUIT! It was comfortable, flattering and I was actually able to wear the 8 instead of the 10. I got so many compliments on my bachelorette party.

This was the most perfect jumpsuit for my bridal shower!!! It was so comfortable and didn't have to compensate on style! I got compliments all afternoon and felt so beautiful in this romper. I'm generally a size 4 and it fit true to size. Totally recommend this romper!!

links_Review_Title: Love this white jumpsuit! Feeling like a Charlie's angel!
links_Review_Text: I loved this jumpsuit so much and did not want to return it! I was tentative to rent it at first because it was white, but I'm so glad I did. The material is high quality and thick enough so that it's not transparent. I'm fairly short, and this jumpsuit was the perfect length. I could have worn either flats or heels with it. I would definitely rent again!
This fit was perfect. Honestly fit like a glove. I didn't wear a bra but needed to wear 'stickies'. It was comfortable and easy to dress up.

Loved this jumpsuit. Might look plain, but it is gorgeous on. Typically don't rent jumpsuits because I'm so darn short, but where this was ankle length it was just fine. 5'3, 120 pounds, 31 Bust, 35 Hips

links_Review_Title: got so many compliments on this outfit!
links_Review_Text: It was comfortable, soft, easy to wear. I definitely could've gone for a 4, but they didn't have the backup size when it shipped. Luckily the 2 fit like a glove, it was a bit tight when I bent over and the zipper in the back was hard to reach by myself. I wore it all day from 8am until late at night and it was insanely comfortable and easy to get around in. I want to buy it!!!!

This jumpsuit is great and was actually a lot cuter in person than I thought it would be. I have a super long torso so had to size up and even then it was still a bit tight and crowded downstairs. Loved it and received lots of compliments!
I wore this jumpsuit to our rehearsal dinner. It was comfortable and led to a lot of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Endless compliments, absolutely obsessed with this jumper!
links_Review_Text: I wore this for my recent engagement party, and I got compliments alllll night! It was so comfy, effortless, and high quality! It fit true to size, and wasn't see though at all (surprising because it didn't feel super thick and heavy either). It was the perfect material considering it ended up being a little hot that day, and I never felt overheated in this outfit. My only complaint is it is hard to get in and out of by yourself, I hate to bring someone with me to use the bathroom every time. Fabric doesn't have a lot of stretch. I would definitely recommend this show stopper to anyone!
Perfect for my bridal shower- I could've worn the 2 but went with the 4 because it was more comfortable. Absolutely amazing- my fiancé wants me to buy it!

I rented this jumpsuit for my bridal shower and it was perfect! It was beautifully tailored and fit surprisingly well. I’m typically weary of jumpsuits since I’m a 2 on top and a 4 or even a 6 on bottom depending on the brand. But this jumpsuit had enough room in the hips and still hung beautifully.

Rented this for my 30th birthday dinner to pair with some red earrings and flats and it did not disappoint! Not too dressy but that perfect in between spot between fancy and casual. I'm 5'2 and the length was perfect (could have been one inch shorter) but it wasn't dragging and could wear flats!
Had a lot of fun wearing this white jumpsuit around. Perfect for a warm weather event.

links_Review_Title: The fact that they offer another size choice, or another outfit besides the one you chose to rent.
links_Review_Text: I LOVE the way they ship out their rentals - It was my first time renting something and it won't be the last. It's awesome to not have to worry about finding a box or printing out the ship back label. Made things super easy! I also really can't express how awesome it is that they give the option for another size/outfit besides what you chose to rent. I am usually between a side 4R-6R depending on the clothing..I am 5'7 so when it comes to rompers something things are too tight length wise for me with the size 4R. Everything else fit great. The 6R provided me that extra wiggle room so I didn't look like I had a wedgie during my Bridal Shower haha. Quality of this romper was great!!! Didn't have to worry about bra or underwear color (MAJOR PLUS)

I felt confident in this jumpsuit. I thought it was good for work and everyday but I got compliments all day about how glamorous the jumpsuit was, which made me feel good but also over dressed. Anyway, I liked it but couldn't ride my bike to work in it.

I wore this jumpsuit to my bridal shower in April. It was perfect! I would say it runs pretty true to size, maybe a little big (especially if you don't have much of a chest like me). I could have maybe gotten away with a 2, but I didn't choose a backup size and the 4 fit well. I felt very much a bride while still being a bit trendy. The quality was fantastic - thick material, not see through. Loved it!

Loves this jumpsuit. Ordered both a 10 and 12- I am fairly small on top but have very wide hips and was worried this wouldn't work out. However it was actually very roomy across the hips. I measure 44inches at the hip and the 10 fit beautifully. I wore this to the courthouse for our civil ceremony! Can be dressed up or down. Perfect for the bride for pre wedding events!
Wow! I love this. It is SO comfortable. Effortless. Shockingly flattering. Bump friendly (4.5 mo pregnant). Sexy but sophisticated. Neckline is plunging but not too low.
This jumpsuit is beautiful and fits very true to size - and despite being an all white jumpsuit, it is not see through at all! I definitely recommend renting this!
Very cute white jumpsuit. Can dress up or dress down and very comfortable!!

I had been dying to wear a white jumpsuit for one of our wedding showers and this one exceeded all of my expectations! I ended up wearing the 4R (didn't try on the 6 because the other fit) and it was great. It was comfy and didn't bunch up weird when I sat down. It also is lined so I didn't have to worry about any undergarments showing through. I got so many compliments on it too! I wish I had another occasion to wear it to! Highly recommend

My daughter wore this for a concert she sang in and for her graduation photos. It fit her perfectly and was very flattering on her. She is 5'9 and 135lbs. She usually wears a S or M, and loved the fit of the 4R. She might have even been able to do a 2. Stunning jumpsuit!
I didn't live this. Felt like it was tight and not flattering.

Wore it for my engagement party. Very chic, elegant and super comfy. Sexy without being too revealing or overly tight (great for parties when your parents will be there and you want to look great but not super sexy!) I loved it and considering buying it in Black because it's so comfy and I got tons of compliments!

Pros: received many compliments. Great fabric/quality. It fit very well. Very vibrant red and amazing detailed dress. Cons: I am 5'4" and don't usually find dresses that are too short but it was pretty short even on me.
Gorgeous dress very well made. Love the flower details! I usually wear S, but I've noticed Alexis dress runs pretty small. Medium was a great fit.

This dress is gorgeous and the handiwork is high-quality. It's very short. I'm barely 5'6" and if the dress had been any shorter on me it would have been scandalous. Also, runs a little small. I normally wear a size small or a 2/4 but the small was extremely short as well as a bit tight in the shoulders. I ended up wearing the medium, which was looser in the waist than I would've liked. So if you are between those sizes you will want the medium.
A must rent! The quality of the lace is top notch. The dress is the perfect length. I got so many compliments!

I LOVED this dress. It feels so high quality and is even more beautiful in person than the photos. The color is stunning and would complement any skin tone. My ONLY complaint would be that the skirt lining rides up a little bit over time, but this was such a minor inconvenience for such a beautiful dress I didn't even care. Rent this, you won't regret it!

Got lots of compliments on this dress! Beautiful color and design! Runs very small and not easy to raise arms up when wearing but other than that, it's a gorgeous dress! I usually wear a size 6 but had to get a large. Great dress for special occasion!

links_Review_Title: I love this dress! So gorgeous and got tons of compliments
links_Review_Text: The only con is that the zipper does tend to get a little stuck at the seam because there's a lot of material. I'm normally a size 4 and had to get a M which is sizing up for me. Otherwise, it is PERFECT!
I loved this dress. I felt pretty and festive and classy and sexy. Lots of compliments. Well made. Yes yes yes!

links_Review_Title: This dress is absolutely gorgeous for a holiday party!
links_Review_Text: I was unsure about this dress based on the photos, but the fabric is absolutely stunning! I got so many compliments on it. It does run pretty small. I usually wear a large and had to wear the XL. I have large hips too so I was slightly concerned about the dress rising up. There is a little slip of fabric to protect against that, but you don't be dropping it to floor. The range of movement for dancing was pretty good though. The zipper sticks quite a bit so you need someone to help you by jimmying it back and forth before it'll zip up, almost couldn't wear it due to this. Wish i didn't have to send it back!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful lace detail & vibrant red color!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress! The lace detail was beautiful, the color was a vibrant red, and the fit was perfect! I typically weary a size 6 and this dress was a size Large but it fit perfectly! I'll be watching for this dress to go on sale to purchase it!

Such a fun, beautiful dress. I'm 5'7 and with heels the small was very short. I ended up wearing the medium to give me more length- didn't really change the fit in other areas. Wore it to a work Christmas party and was scared it would be too short but it wasn't and received so many comments.
Work for Christmas party and loved it.

links_Review_Title: Stood out in a crowd of 800 people!
links_Review_Text: This dress was everything!! I was the belle of the ball. The fit was perfect; however there is not stretch anywhere, so you might want to size up.
A little on the short side for my taller ladies, beautiful details, warm enough for cooler weather, got so many compliments! Love, love, love!

There's so much detail and beauty to this dress that I received compliments all night. When I rent, I like to feel like I'm wearing a really unique and designer piece and this dress accomplished that. It was perfect for a formal wedding but because it was short, it was so fun and flirty. I also loved that it really didn't make my bust look too big or overpowering (as is often an issue for me). I did feel that it ran small though, I don't normally wear an XL in anything.
This was one of two dresses I rented for this wedding. This is the reception dress. It was perfect and I received many compliments!!! Love it!!!

This dress definitely runs small. I ordered a L but am normally a solid M if not a S. It is pretty short, I'm 5'6, so it requires a little...caution. But! It's really bold red color is gorgeous and the details are cute and flirty.

I am obsessed with this dress. Reviews said it ran really small but I usually wear a medium and the medium fit me perfectly! I will say that I'm 5'4" and if you're any taller than that the length would be borderline inappropriate. I can't even tell you how much I was complimented all night. It's a stand out dress and I felt amazing in it! If you're thinking of renting, DO IT!!!

links_Review_Title: I absolutely loved this detailed red dress! I received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Felt luxurious because it's a heavier lace with lots of details! The color and fit were great for me!

The most amazing dress! The fabric and skirt ruffling are show stopping. It does run a bit small, mostly in the bust for me. I'm 5'1 and this dress is SHORT, I wore shorts underneath to be safe, the dress lining is not attched to the skirt which may have helped.

links_Review_Title: I felt like a million bucks!
links_Review_Text: I ordered a 2 and 4. Went with the 4 and it fit like a glove. Material feels very heavy and expensive. I love the swishy skirt part.

links_Review_Title: This dress was a dream to wear. Love love love
links_Review_Text: The fit was form fitting from my hips to my arm pits. I couldn’t raise my arm up very high without the bottom up the dress coming up. Not a big deal, just don’t try catching the bouquet. It was a lot of fun to dance in, sassy and flirty. I definitely wore spandex under, with my height, sitting down, my rump would be touching the chair. I knew it would be short, but the size S wasn’t that much longer and didn’t have the fit like the XS.
Divine! If legs are your thing, this is the dress for you! The details of this piece felt so tailored and were very flattering to this apple shape lady. Only sad I can't wear this one everyday.

Comfy, beautiful dress. Could have sized down which would have fit better/cinched in the waist. I was worried it would be right across the chest but no problems there either! It's quite short so have to be careful when bending over. Material and details are stunning. Zip is sticky so needed help getting in and out of it!
Liked it! Very unique dress. Loved the detail of the lace. A bit short in length.
Wow, this dress is stunning! Everyone loved it! Red with dark red trim. I'm 5' and 105 pounds. The small fit perfectly.

I felt sassy af but super comfortable wearing this to a wedding recently. Everyone loved it. Glad I read the reviews, it def runs small! I'm a 4/6 and the M fit well. I thought it was a littttle too short but went with it anyway. Fabric and details are super luxe.
This dress is GORGEOUS. For fit, a M in Alexis fits me as a glove like always ... I'm a 28 in jeans, 4/6 in dresses.
I received so many compliments all night, what a beautiful dress! It was so fun to wear, but it was short, I would definitely size up. One of my favorite dresses of all times

links_Review_Title: I rented it for a photo shoot for my blog. You can see more styled outfits on my IG - @kat.proano
links_Review_Text: I rented it for a photo shoot for my blog. You can see more styled outfits on my IG - @kat.proano
I'm 5'4, 150 lbs and the large fit fine but ended up going with the XL for a little longer length. The quality and detail of this dress are breathtaking.

I needed a dress for a wedding and this dress was perfect! I still have a little baby weight in my mid section and the style of this dress was very flattering to that area. I got so many compliments. It was also very comfortable. It was an outside summer wedding, but the holes in the sleeves made the dress breathable. I'm usually a medium, but after reading reviews went with the Large and it was perfect! Stunning dress!
I have a broad back and bigger arms and this was still very comfortable. I got so many compliments! It's not too short and very flattering. I will rent this one again.

links_Review_Title: Usually I wear M size but this one I used L. I'm 5'5, for taller girls can be a little too short.
links_Review_Text: Usually I wear M size but this one I used L. I'm 5'5, for taller girls can be a little too short.
This dress was AMAZING! Honestly I may try to buy it! Caution - it has zero stretch - so make sure you size up!
The dress fit perfectly! I'm a size 10 and got a large. I got so many compliments!

Absolutely loved this dress! The small was a little tight on my hips and the medium was loose on my waist, so if you have some curves it may end up tight or loose in some places. This rental couldn't have been easier! I had sooooooo many compliments on this dress. I can't wait to rent again! Highly recommend this dress.
Got lots of compliments on this dress!! The only thing I would caution is that it's a little short, so I had to watch it when I sat down. Otherwise loved it!

links_Review_Title: Live the color! It was a hit!
links_Review_Text: Everyone turn to look at me. Every person ask me where did I get the dress and the fashionable people already new who I was wearing. If you want to turn heads get this. I'm usually small or medium but because I have a huge bottom I have to get them a size bigger it was ok at the bottom but big on the top.

links_Review_Title: Best RTR dress I've ever rented
links_Review_Text: Perfect dress for an outdoor wedding. Got a million compliments and it was easy to find shoes and earrings. Color and lace are gorgeous and fit was perfect. Only issue is that it was a little short, I had to wear a spanx underneath. Could not twirl on the dance floor and could not bend down to pick anything up but it was amazing and I would definitely rent again!
I'm 5'4"- clearly this jumpsuit was made for someone at least 5'8" or taller. Also, the shoulders were way too big on both sides. I really wish this would have fit.
I wore this to my best friends wedding dress try on day - so many compliments. I love how unique and chic it is. I also rented a romper suit from the Alexis brand.
I am 5'8" and 149 lbs...the XL was too small and I wasn't able to wear. The length was perfect but the sleeve was about 2 inches too long. Very poor fit on me.
Extremely long. If you are under 5'3" this is definitely a no go.
Great dress, so comfy too and got tons of compliments. I wore to my best friends wedding dress appointment. One of my faves. Was a bit tight In shoulders on me but worth it
Perfect for a baby shower for a little girl. Loved the bell sleeves and fit. Ended up using the wrap feature a little extra and double wrapping as the ties were very long.
Cute polka dot wrap dress. A little tight in the shoulders for me and the ties were very long.
It was a little tight in the arms and short waisted on me, but I'm 6'3 so that's not the dress' fault. I loved the very feminine and flirty style!

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress! It's fun and flirty! I absolutely love this!
links_Review_Text: It does run a little large , I could of sized down and the bust area was very big and I have a hit chest but overall a beautiful flirty dress.
Some girls could pull this off! I don't have the chest for it and didn't want to wear a tank top underneath. Not my fave. Color is more salmon than the photos let on, if that's your thing.

The pop of color is everything you need in the summer. The wrap nature of the dress makes it very comfortable and easy. I felt secure and wasn't worried about showing too much. It is a little short but that wasn't an issue. I would buy this, but I typically only wear statement dresses like this once. I highly recommend it!

links_Review_Title: Very tight arms - but very cute
links_Review_Text: I definitely should have ordered a size up. I usually wear a 10/12, but had this been a 14, it would have been perfect. The arms were incredibly tight. I could get it to kind of work, but was afraid to move my arms too much. Otherwise very cute. The wrap part hot perfectly. Rented it for a Derby Party, but ended up not wearing it because of the arms being too tight and it was going to be very warm out. Otherwise, LOVED this dress
I wore this for my daughter's bridal shower. It's flowy and comfortable. Fits true to size. Adorable. The color is pretty . Lots of compliments!
Sleeves were a little snug but you couldnt tell bc of the print. Wrap detail is flattering as is the deep V.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a spring baby shower!
links_Review_Text: This dress is adorable and perfect for a spring baby shower. It runs a little right in the arms but wasn't constricting. Tons of compliments!
absolutely in love with this dress!! I usually wear a 4/6 and went with a 6 based on the length. I've rented three times, it is one of my go-tos. Perfect for transitional weather.

links_Review_Title: Fun flowy wrap dress for a party!
links_Review_Text: Loved the color and flow. Worn to my husbands birthday party. He told me multiple times he loved it on me so I'd say success. It was very comfortable and although a little big, it was a wrap dress so it was adjustable

links_Review_Title: Beautiful - got a bunch of compliments all night long.
links_Review_Text: True to size - very flowy and looks great with a tan! Bit tight in the shoulders if you're athletic.

links_Review_Title: Wore it to work, probably too frilly for my work place but got lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Pretty color and pattern Love the detail Too frilly in the front Really tight in the upper arms

It's a true wrap dress which makes it nice to fit around waist. However it also gave me the impression that it was flipping up constantly which made me feel slightly uncomfortable wearing it for work. Overall though very pretty fun dress.

This has been one of my favorite dresses from RTR! The color was beautiful and the length was perfect. I did need to use a safety pin in the chest area because it was a little low cut for me to wear it through the day.

The color is pinker than the images, it's more of a salmon color pink. I love wrap dresses because the fit does not have to be perfect. The slit up the side goes up high so showing some leg is unavoidable. The slevese on the dress are tight. The dress is shorter than expected and a few instances I had a Marilyn Monroe moment when a breeze came by haha. I still loved this dress and would rent it again! I received a lot of compliments! BTW the purse in my image is also from RTR!

links_Review_Title: Elle Woods would wear this to court.
links_Review_Text: Pink and polka dots are NOT my usual style, but I loved this dress! Fun & flirty.
A little bold for me to buy for many wears, but it fun for a night at the theatre!

Perfect to throw in a weekend suitcase and travel with. Great fabric. Light, easy to wear. I'm 5'9 and I think it was a good length. I wasn't worried about my goodies showing. Def get a bra that isn't high on the front though, because your bra may show. I wore a nude bra with a deep v front.

Love the color but that is the only good thing I have to say about the dress. While it's true to size the arms were tight. The ruffles were too much so I tucked them in. The wrap portion of the dress hung awkwardly and the chest looked like it was 5x too big. Will not rent again.

links_Review_Title: Terrible fit. Nothing like the model
links_Review_Text: As you can see from the photo, this was a giant misshapen bag on me. I could try a smaller size I suppose, but based on the size of their size 2, I would need a 0000. I have more figure flattering bath robes.
This dress fot my body very well, hid the right areas and accentuated the right areas! Will be renting again soon.

links_Review_Title: Cute print if you can pull it off
links_Review_Text: I loved this print and color so much, but it just didn't fit right. The ties are really long, the arms are a little tight, and there's too much material that made me look really frumpy. I wish I could've worn it!

links_Review_Title: Didn't get a chance to wear it was far too small in the arms
links_Review_Text: Would not rent again, even a size 10 I'm not sure would fit my arms and the body of the dress would then be too big

links_Review_Title: Cute dress for summer, lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: Pretty and feminine dress. Fun colors. Too small in the chest for me (32DD).
All my rentals are the same size and fit perfectly. This dress wouldn't even fit over my arms.

links_Review_Title: Loved the femininity, but too small on my arms
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress so much when I saw it! The color and the feminine ruffles were adorable. I do have large arms, which is why I sized up, because I know things can run tight on them. But this was next level, I couldn't even get the dress on over my arms, let alone, squeeze them in. I sadly couldn't even wear this.
Very light weight

This dress would have been absolutely perfect for what I needed it for but I could not move my arms. I'm not sure how a size 16 has arm holes for someone who's completely emancipated but they nailed it with this dress.
Loved the fabric, color and design of this dress- I only wish they had made the top of the sleeves for adults- if you have any upper body strength this probably won't fit you. Sad to send back

Wish I had listened to other reviewers! The body is fine but the sleeves are incredibly small. I have 3 other dresses from this brand and ordered the same size. It seems like the proportions for this design are just off.
just ok, not what I wanted. Too short which made me not wear it.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but tight in the arms
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress and I wish I could have worn it. Very very tight in the arms and could barely get it on. Otherwise it would have run true to size.
The arms run very small, I wasn't able to wear the dress.

links_Review_Title: Nice but too tight on arms to properly wear
links_Review_Text: Overall looked nice,, thin fabric so great for warm/sweaty days. My arms are a little more muscular/thick so i could not get the sleeves to properly fit over my arms so I did not wear.
Dress is mid thigh and chest reveals cleavage.
Had to pin front
This was a fun, flirty dress that was cute for Valentine's Day. I ended up pairing it with black tights and accessories because it was cold and rainy. I felt like an edgy cupcake.
This is a thick slightly stretchy velvet. It is really comfortable and made my shape look a lot better than it really is.

This dress is a dream! The fabric is lush and the fit is sexy and flattering. I would wear it around my house and vacuum in it- its that comfortable! I do recommend wearing a sticky bra to provide a little lift for the girls as it comes off a little flat without.

links_Review_Title: Fit as described and delivered on time
links_Review_Text: I haven't worn a formal dress in 15 years and to say I was nervous was an understatement. The dress fits like a glove without a lot of difference between sizes. What I love most is how it hugs all of my curves and how thick the velvet is. There are no zippers, buttons, or closures affecting the fit which I love. I wear a 14 and a 40 DD and felt very comfortable. My husband absolutely loved it and I received a lot of compliments.

This dress is so flattering and beautiful! It's stretchy and is a pull on dress so no fussy zipper. If your busty you will need tap or a strapless bra. Got so many compliments, would definitely rent again!

Perfect for a winter event, stretchy and clung in all the right places, with ruching and gathers in just the right spots. So comfortable and easy to wear, no spanx needed! Modest neckline makes it even more comfortable but still attractive. LOVE the long length!

This dress was by far the most beautiful dress I've ever worn. Extremely comfortable, stretchy enough but not baggy. No zipper, just glides right on! Hugged all the right areas, so definitely recommend this dress if you have hips and made my a$$ look incredible lol The velvet material of the dress was incredible and just made the whole dress! I'm 5'6 and wore the 40R, with a 2 in heel and dress just hit the perfect length. Received compliments the whole night!
I got soooo many complements on this dress! It fit beautifully and was pretty comfortable. Very classy and chic! I’m 5’3”, 127 lbs, and wore the 42R (size 6) for reference.

links_Review_Title: Had a great time and many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I am so grateful to have rent the runway for the last two years! It’s so easy to pick a dress when you can see women with your same body type, size,weight etc. This dress was very comfortable and easy to move around in. Would highly recommend!
This dress fits like a glove and is incredibly comfortable. I got compliments on it all night and absolutely LOVED it!

links_Review_Title: This was my first rental and I found the entire process enjoyable. I got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: The fit was great because the velvet was stretchy enough to keep the dress firmly in place, even off the shoulder. The lack of zippers and buttons was nice too... just slip it on. I'm 5'4" and the length was fine with a 3" heel. The hardest part about the dress was the narrower fit at the knees, which impeded stairs and restricted some dancing. The velvet was heavy and quite warm, so a coat wasn't necessary.

links_Review_Title: This luxurious dress really amplified the drama of my masquerade ball look
links_Review_Text: This dress made me feel gorgeous! The dress fit true to sized, very formfitting and definitely highlighted my curves in all of the right ways!
This dress feels like luxury. Also, ruching on the side contributes to the overall flattering fit. I'm 5'4" and the dress was not too long--a coup!

Fit like a glove, has the perfect amount of give to be very flattering. The velvet is just luxurious. I liked that no bra is needed. Also, the dress is extremely comfortable to wear, and allows for plenty of movement. Classy and conservative yet still eye catching and curve hugging!

links_Review_Title: My evening was dream-like, and it started with the dress. I felt comfortable throughout the night.
links_Review_Text: This dress is amazing. The feel and weight of the fabric is luxurious. The 42 R fit well on my 5’6, size 6 frame. An inch and a half to two inch heel is a perfect compliment. I highly recommend this spectacular gown and would not hesitate to rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful velvet hourglass dress - comfortable and stunning!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so comfortable and just stunning. The black velvet for a military formal affair during the winter was perfect. I'm 5"8' and wore the long with 2-3" heels. It was the prefect length. I wore a strapless bra but some might be able to get away without. Would definitely wear it again.
Incredible incredible dress that had me getting compliments all night

links_Review_Title: Awards event for Motion Picture Sound Editors. My company sponsored the VIP Cocktail reception!
links_Review_Text: The dress fits snugly hugging and curving in all the right places. A little hard to get in and out of, because no zippers, but can be managed. Dress curves below shoulders so strapless bra would be best choice. I put mine on with straps, but just pushed the straps down over my shoulders and didn't think about it again. Compliments all night long. Looked great in pictures too!
There isn't a zipper and it's very fitted so I had to put on my dress and go to the hair salon.

This dress is absolutely GORGEOUS! It feels expensive and looks fabulous! It's heavy so I definitely wouldn't recommend it for warmer weather but it's perfect for cooler nights.
