It's the perfect balance of elegant and sexy. I am 5'5" and could have easily worn 3" heels. The length was great. Having this as a second option was exceptionally hard. I loved it so much! When I sent this image to my friends, they almost unanimously told me to wear it; I just decided to go with my first choice. I wish I could have worn both!
I rented this dress for my engagement photos, it was amazing! Got perfect and was very flattering. I would definitely rent again.

This dress was so elegant, and hugs you in all the right places. The fit is true to size. Perfect for a formal wedding. I am 5'2", wore 3.5" heels and the dress just brushed the ground, so taller ladies may need kitten heels or flats with this dress. Overall, extremely happy with this dress!

links_Review_Title: RTR was the perfect way to get a gorgeous gown for my brother-in-law's formal wedding!!
links_Review_Text: Pictures don't do this dress justice. The fit was perfect and I was surprised by how comfortable it was. The material is a little stretchy but tight which helped keep everything in place. I got so many compliments on this dress. I'd definitely rent it again! It was perfect for the winter wedding I attended.

links_Review_Title: Fab customer service made this possible!!
links_Review_Text: After receiving 2 options that were both a terrible fit for me, RTR overnighted 2 more options! This black velvet dress made me feel so glamorous! It was an awesome stylist pic that saved the day! I didn't even have to wear spanx! It was Regal!!!

links_Review_Title: This dress was absolutely perfect. I got compliments all night long.
links_Review_Text: This dress fit like a glove! It was figure-flattering and didn't bunch in the middle or slip off the shoulders at all. Also, it wasn't super heavy or thick. I felt comfortable wearing this dress all night long.

links_Review_Title: At the ballet with people from all over the world and tons of compliments. Stretchy and form fitting
links_Review_Text: Hugs curves but very forgiving. I wore 3 inch heels with a 1 inch platform and it was about 1.5 inches from the ground.

links_Review_Title: If you are petite, GET THIS DRESS!
links_Review_Text: This dress was absolutely perfect for my body type. I'm 4'11 and very petite and it fit so well! I wore it to two friends' weddings and received so many compliments on the fit and style! The fabric is perfect. It was a teeny bit long so you have to wear heels. I would highly recommend this dress!
Such an elegant, comfortable, and well fitting dress. I received so many compliments throughout the night.
Beautiful dress and very comfortable!

This dress made me feel amazing. The ruching hides any problems areas in the belly you may have. I had a baby several months ago and my body is still transitioning and this dress hides every flaw! It is also incredibly comfortable. I felt so great in it!

Super comfortable and easy to get on/off -- no zippers or anything... you slide it over or from the feet. The neckline makes the dress -- absolutely stunning. The bodice doesn't have any constructed support, so you could definitely do a strapless bra or even a bra where you tuck the straps down your shoulder if you like that better. Cinches at the waist in the most flattering way and accents all the right places. The fabric feel luxurious -- it's a good quality velvet that feels thick and soft but isn't too thick to make you look heavy or anything. Very comfortable to wear all night long. The length is a bit shorter for a usual R size -- if you like to wear super tall heels then maybe get the L. I'm 5'3 and in photo not wearing heels. Extremely highly recommend this dress. Got compliments all night long and felt great wearing it.

Great quality, extremely comfortable and you feel held in. Didn't wear it for NYE but I will be rerenting for a wedding in 6 weeks. I got the 38 long and the length was perfect with 3-4 inch heels. I'm 5'6 and wear a 26/27 jean and 34c top.
This dress did not disappoint.
This dress is so comfortable! Easy to wear, length was nearly to the ground. Material is superior. I loved wearing it and received many compliments. Want to wear it again!

This dress was one of the most elegant and comfortable dresses I've ever worn. I got compliments all night long on how timeless and beautiful it was. The material is stretchy so it hugs your curves while the ruching at the waist hides anything you may want to. This dress does not have any zippers or fasteners of any kind so be aware you will have to step in and pull it on. Overall one of my favorite rentals from RTR.

links_Review_Title: absolutely killer - worn to the MET opera
links_Review_Text: This dress fit like a glove, the fabric is so supportive that I didn't even have to wear a bra! (That's saying a lot as someone with a DD chest). It was perfect for the occasion and comfortable. the only thing is that if you're taller than 5'5 you can't really wear high heels. I wore wore with kitten heels and the dress didn't touch the ground.
Perfect fit, I loved it
Loved the fit

links_Review_Title: Incredible dress that is incredibly comfortable.
links_Review_Text: Dress was show stopping, have friends who have reserved it for separate occasions after seeing it, dress feels like wearing yoga pants, but looks like glamour. Would wear it every day.

This is the most comfortable formal dress I've ever worn. You know how many dresses require fidgeting with straps or pulling it up, etc throughout the night to stay comfy? Not here!! This dress fits like a glove. Slightly stretchy velvet material. Super soft and cozy. No zippers or pockets. Wore flats (I'm 5'9) and dress hem was above the floor a bit so it didn't drag.

Order this dress for engagement photos. My fiancé loved this dress it fit in all the right places. I will be renting it again since the photos did not happen due to the COVID-19 but love the dress. I hate having to send it back after not being able to wear it.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress and it photographed so well for my engagement photos
links_Review_Text: The fit was a little strange in the shoulders. It fit like a dream with my arms down, however I couldnt lift my arms up all the way when wearing it. For reference I'm 5 foot 6, 115 pounds and dont really have broad shoulders.
I wore a small but the medium seemed smaller on the bottom. Really cute romper. So many compliments.
Make sure you have a girls friend around to help you zip and unzip it to go to the ladies room!

I am 5'1" and weigh 127. I tend to only rent things that come in petite sizes, but took a gamble on this one. I loved that it was a jumper - super comfortable and easy. I was able to wear it without a bra (which was fantastic!) however, I am fairly small chested (size B cup). If I had any larger of a chest, I would not have been able to zip up the back! It was pretty tight in the ribcage area. Arms were a bit snug as well, but I have shorter arms, so that worked for me also. All in all, if you are small framed and have a small chest, you'll probably love this!

I'm 5'6", 110lbs, 32C and this little number fit perfectly. I have a long torso and worried it would be too short to be comfortable, but it actually was quite perfect. I loved this so much I wanted to buy it. My husband was a big fan of this.

links_Review_Title: Great romper for a fun occasion!
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size but def restricts movement a bit.
Fit perfectly. I got a lot of compliments. Wore it to a baby shower. Was perfect for a fall day with knee high boots
This has been my favorite romper yet. The embroidered flowers on top of the lace are gorgeous. You have to wear a backless bra since it's all lace on the back.
The medium fit great but I think the small would have been perfect. It looks black and can be worn with black shoes but it's actually blue! Highly recommend, comfy and very sexy.
Perfect for senior pictures

The shorts are a bit billowy, but with the right wedge or heel you can pull it off. Hides a pooch, or sometimes makes one where there isn't one, but not the end of the world. The crotch seam is a bit tight, in that bending over means you'll have to pull out a wedgie. But it's a cute romper that you can rock without a bra to show off the full lace back.
Flattering outfit. It's a little sheer but great summer even though it has sleeves

Cute romper that you can wear to a dinner party or event. Love the sheer sleeves with embroider details- so beautiful. I think this runs slightly small bc I'm usually an M in tops and 4/6 in pants. Rented the Large and felt like the arms were comfortable but on the snug end. I don't think this is entirely my style. The shorts are really short (maybe bc my bum is too big for this lol). Nice flowy material, might wanna pair w leggings if cold out. Ended up not wearing it bc it didn't vibe with me. But if this is your thang, check it out!
Medium fit perfect on me. Very flattering. As with alot of rompers- i needed a friend to unzip me every time i went to the bathroom. It zips in the back up to your neck.

links_Review_Title: Short but made me feel amazing!
links_Review_Text: I'd say the romper typically runs true to size. I'm 5'7.5" and weigh around 118lbs. I did opt to wear the small over the xs because it's so short (a gentle warning to my fellow long legged friends) Length aside- this romper made me feel amazing. From the details on the front to the lace back, the whole outfit is a show stopper. My partner planned me a birthday evening full of surprises and this romper was perfect for each element- rooftop cocktails, dinner, and the ballet. The best part- the whole outfit is so comfortable! Absolutely recommend.

I received SO many compliments. Was a little snug in the arms. I'm 5' 5" 135 lbs and usually wear a small, they were out of mediums, so I opted for a large backup and I'm glad I did! Looks a little scandalous to those who assume it's a dress and not shorts.
I rented this for a holiday work party and couldn't be happier! I got a ton of compliments and was comfortable all night. Highly recommend!
Fit true to size. Very elegant.
This fit very well. I thought it was too short.

links_Review_Title: Loved it for a midsummer night's dream-themed spring formal
links_Review_Text: The zip got a bit sticky where the fabric changed types, so I had to get two people to zip it. Definitely on the shorter side, but still very flattering. Didn't love how it sat around the chest because I had to go bra-less, but still looked really good in pictures.

This was a fun romper! I got a lot of compliments on it. If you have a longer torso I would recommend sizing up. The medium fit but was a little too short in length, it pulled if I tried to raise my arms up to high, which would have been problem if my event had involved dancing, luckily it didn't!

links_Review_Title: Loved this romper but impractical!! Read before you rent.
links_Review_Text: Okay this romper looked AMAZING but had one serious draw back. I could not zip it or unzip it myself. So anytime I had to pee I had to have a friend unzip me! So if you rent this romper keep your friends close and warn them of your dilemma! It could just be a problem with my short arms but be warned! Other than that I would buy this romper in a heart beat! Cute, a little edgy, easy to wear! So much more interesting than a plain LBD!

links_Review_Title: This romper was great for a late spring/summer outing!
links_Review_Text: I loved the fit, it was very figure-flattering and I especially loved the sheer back! The pockets are an unexpected surprise and total bonus. I styled it with a denim jacket and tights for a chilly spring date, absolutely adore this piece!
Wore for a bachelorette party and everyone loved it

I wore this for a night in the city (drinks, dinner, dancing) in celebration of my birthday. I rented the S and XS, and wore the XS (never tried on the S). I felt confident and beautiful and wished I owned this piece. I would definitely rent again. Pros: The piece is interesting and the embroidery is beautiful. It was the right amount of modesty and sexiness. I felt so good in it. I also liked that the dress was busy enough that I could wear minimal accessories and simple shoes. Definite wow factor. Cons: The XS was definitely short. If I bent over, you could definitely see booty (but I didn't mind). The arms were also tight, so I couldn't lift my arms above my head. The waist seam was also tight, and became uncomfortable the more I ate. Overall though, these didn't phase me enough to distract me from a wonderful night. Well worth the hassle, and probably easily avoided if I had worn the S.
The fit, style, and quality were just fine. Overall it wasn't really a wow for me, though. I wore this for a bachelorette night out in NYC. Wouldn't rent again

I ordered this for my friends Wedding Shower and was in love with it. It's cold where I live so I did wear tights underneath. I normally wear a size 8 (M) but ordered the size 10 (L) just in case and I'm glad I did. The medium was too tight because of the lace and my booty was hanging out of the shorts. The large was perfect! Overall, great rental :)
No bra. Lots of complements!

The top part is fitted and the bottoms have some give. I loved wearing this romper! Some notes - The shorts are short ! If you have a longer torso, be careful not to reach your arms overhead, as it will ride the shorts up.

This romper was so fun and the perfect choice for my birthday celebration! I paired it with dark black tights and black booties. The only issue with this romper is that it runs vey small, specifically if you're tall. I'm a usual size 4/sometimes 6 and I sized up on this rental because of the reviews and I'm glad I did. The medium fit everywhere except length. It was so tight on the bottom half length wise I couldn't wear it. (I'm 5'7" for reference) I wore the large and it was a little big on the top half but nothing noticeable. The bottom half JUST fit in the large. The detail in the top half was incredible and take note, the whole romper is not black. The top half/lace section is navy blue! An added surprise!

Loved the detail of the lace & embroidery. High quality item, super comfy, flattering fit, and got lots of compliments! The only con is that it is impossible to fully zip/unzip yourself from the back unless someone helps to bring the zipper down to a level you can reach. With other rompers I can usually manage to reach and bring the zipper down myself so unless you are super flexible and a contortionist good luck! :) With that said, don't wear this to go out to a club/party where you'll be drinking and in need to make frequent restroom stops.

links_Review_Title: Super cute, just look out for short torso & right/high waist
links_Review_Text: Looked great! The torso almost felt a little too short (which never happens to me since I'm only 5'2") so this is prob best for the shorties. Also, it fit true to size everywhere except the waist - it sat up high on my ribs and was a little tighter than I would have preferred
This romper is super cute. Not itchy at all, just beautiful delicate lace. If you have larger hips, go for a large, otherwise M should work.
I loved this romper! I usually wear a 0 or 2 and the small fit perfectly. It could be a little too short if you are taller.

links_Review_Title: Loved the romper style as opposed to a dress.
links_Review_Text: Loved the embroidery detail. Got lots of compliments. Could be a bit short for those who have a long torso, not a lot of stretch and it might ride up. Need to wear a backless bra.
So cute. The lace details are amazing

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous! The sheer with embroidery was such an elegant look...plus shorts are so comfy! + POCKETS!
links_Review_Text: Loved this outfit. It was perfect for the red carpet at a film festival event. The small fit...but it was about a half inch too short in the stride. I'm not long waisted at all as I never have this issue, but I did with this one. But the shorts are full (and there's pockets!) so there was no evidence of a camel toe! The size of the bodice was snug too...so much so that I didn't even zip it! I just pinned the top closed and acted like it was supposed to be an open back. Otherwise, I would've hulked out if I tried to go in for a hug!

links_Review_Title: I felt like I was wearing something unique and trendy and not just a regular black dress.
links_Review_Text: I am usually a medium, I am 5'2, 125-130 lbs. The waist band is a bit tight depending on your waist size, as I have an athletic body type so I don't have many curves. Other than that, it was lovely and perfect for a sorority formal!

Paired up with stockings and boots or worn bare legged with heels, I LOVED this rental for my 30th. It ran slightly small on me in the body or torso so I chose the size up (L) but true to size in bust and length. So many compliments the night of and from friends seeing photos!

Like others have said, this tight waisted number is really navy and not black. Other than that, it's STUNNING. I wore it with a thigh high boot and simple gold earrings, because that's all you really need. The delicate embroidery on top of the lace give a quaint feminine feel to stylish fashion forward high waisted shorts. I also loved the pleats on the shorts that covered up everything I shoved into my pockets. It was a great autumn option to feel covered but not stuffy because of the open lace back. Cannot recommend this more highly.

links_Review_Title: Adorable skirt, got lots of compliments

links_Review_Text: I wore this skirt for my bridal shower. I loved the length and how vibrant it was. I normally would have worn it with black, but it actually paired very well with my white top. The pockets were perfect to keep my phone on me. The skirt was a little big because the elastic may have been slightly stretched, but it didn't affect how it wore. Overall, I loved it!

links_Review_Title: Loved this skirt. Ca was the right size because of elastic waist and had pockets!
links_Review_Text: I tried this skirt on with so many different top and blazer options but black ended up looking the best. Loved it and would rent again for work, a casual date or vacation.
The waist is elastic and the skirt is full, so I could have worn a size or two smaller. Cute enough look for work, though nothing to rave about. Light fabric, so better for spring or summer.

Beautiful skirt with fun floral pattern. Lightweight but when paired with tights a good winter option. It has an elastic band so sizing down is fine. There is a lot of material but it makes for a pretty flowing look when moving.
This skirt is soo comfy and looks adorable. Perfect tea length. Loved this so much
Super comfortable elastic waistband plus pockets! One of my favorite rentals yet. Wore it to a Spanish wine tasting event.

This skirt has an elastic waist and apparently renders it size-less - I rented a smaller size than I would normally wear and was positively swimming in it. Just too much skirt to be flattering or stylish IMO.

links_Review_Title: One of my fav rentals ever- wore 4x!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to work twice, on vacay, and on the the Fourth of July. Looked great with a bodysuit (pictured), t shirt, or blouse tucked in. With sandals or flats. So easy to wear, super comfy, can be dressed up or down, flows so nicely when you walk. Very lightweight so perfect for a hot day. Just absolute perfection. Someone stopped me on the street today to compliment it. I'm in love.

links_Review_Title: I am in love with this skirt
links_Review_Text: This skirt is amazing. True to size and lots of fabric, wore with black silk blouse and black pumps. This skirt makes everyone smile. Probably works best for narrow waist

This skirt was so lovely! The print is vibrant without being too loud and has a really nice lift to it without feeling bubbly or overly voluminous. I don't know if the skirt runs large so much as the waistband is elastic and so pretty forgiving. I usually wear 14 erring towards a 16 and the 12 fit me comfortably.

I rented this skirt with my unlimited membership for a family party and ended up also wearing it to work. Pros: love the print and light weight cotton fabric. Doesn't crease but if it did you would be able to tell, very comfortable for a food centered event- very stretchy waist Cons: LOTS of fabric, not very flattering on a boxier body shape like mine. At my family party I wore it will a black low cut cashmere top and black strappy studded flats- it felt very 1950s to me! For work I styled as shown and topped with a black rain trench for the commute.

links_Review_Title: I didn't want to have to give this back
links_Review_Text: This is a really pretty skirt that can be worn multiple ways. It has an elastic waist and it was really easy to travel in.
Love this skirt! Can be styled for work, night out or casual. Feminine and stylish but also extremely comfortable.

I loved this skirt so much I wore it more than any previous unlimited rental and every occasion I could find - work, date night, church, networking event. Nonstop compliments. I wish I had some different tops to match it with but beyond that its a beauty.
Feels special, appropriate for work or fun, very comfortable while still very stylish

links_Review_Title: TO DIE FOR! Comfortable/flattering skirt. Featured in VOGUE. Appeared is if I had fashion for once
links_Review_Text: RENT THIS!!! I was able to pair this skirt with numerous black tops in my closet. Can be worn with heel, flat, or sneaker. Show stopper 100%. Travels well... wrinkles easy to get out. I wish I could own this for life

links_Review_Title: Cute print but not very flattering
links_Review_Text: I wore this to work but I felt like it showed my hips more than I would want

links_Review_Title: Favorite rental - wore at least 10 times
links_Review_Text: Love this one – tons of volume but very light (stiff, crisp, thin cotton material), great print. In terms of fit, it’s on the longer side so petites may find it to be too long, and the waist is tight but I would say true to size, and it’s very stretchy. Despite the fitted waist, I would not say it’s the most slimming shape – something about the volume of the gathered material, or maybe the height of the paperbag-style waistband obscures the cinching at the waist, but I love how it looks regardless and plan on keeping for several wears, and probably renting again later in the summer.
Elastic waistband, pockets, gorgeous florals, the length was perfect, it was so full I felt warm when sitting and flowy when I was moving about. So lovely, a total dream to wear.
Great skirt! Very comfortable and eat to wear. I won't recommend it for boat rides.

links_Review_Title: As seen in Vogue - as seen on me!
links_Review_Text: This poplin Marni skirt is so happy. How fun is it to wear something seen in the pages of Vogue?
This skirt has an elastic waist band which makes it super comfy to wear. The length was a little long but it still totally worked. Worn with a turtle neck and tights.

I work from home so I wore this skirt to take my partner to chemo, I wore it to fetch groceries, drop off my RTR bags at the UPS store, pick up my mail, liquor store, walk around the neighborhood. It's really easy to wear. The colors are black or midnight navy, a dusty lavender, poppy red, white, there's some green. Very easy to style. The print is small enough to make it easy to wear but it's busy enough to hide a ton of wrinkles. I am typically a 4/6 with a 26 waist and big hips, I could have easily gone down a size. I could have dressed this up if I had anywhere to go. Mostly I wore it with different solid Vince little boy t-shirts and then I arranged my earrings, necklace, belt, shoes, and watch band to coordinate. I'd rent again for sure.
Love the colors and pattern. Great material, very comfy love the pockets!
Great for work, I'd wear it again.
If you're not careful it looks like a couch because there's so much fabric. But it's so pretty and the quality is to die for!

links_Review_Title: LOVED it! super comfy for long days, always got amazing complements.
links_Review_Text: pro: amazing. cons: none!

It can feel a bit big with the elastic waist, but the flowy fit, the fun print and the POCKETS made it something I wore 4-5 times - twice with a black, long sleeved bodysuit, once with a tee shirt tucked in, once with a jean shirt and once with a long sleeved white button down blouse.

links_Review_Title: Amazing skrit for a night out in NYC
links_Review_Text: Paired with a black tank top, and leather jacket. Super comfortable, and perfect for dinner and drinks in NYC

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this skirt!
links_Review_Text: It fit true to size. It is a cotton poplin fabric and a beautiful print. I would've purchased this one if it wasn't still so expensive. It has pockets. I wore it to church and to work, once with a black shirt and once with a white shirt.
Great skit, super cute, perfect for a casual or dressy event

Really nice skirt, which I will be renting again when the weather is warmer. Can truly be worn with loads of different types of shoes and tops. Works slightly better with some height for the shorter ladies (like me). I decided not to bring with me for vacation to save space.
It's an elastic waste skirt, which is good for early maternity wear. I liked the fit and the pattern.

links_Review_Title: reminded me too much of middle school; too conservative; just not me
links_Review_Text: LOTS more fabric than I want in a skirt
It's not a big WOW or overly flattering skirt - at least on me. Honestly I feel a little swallowed, but I love how comfy it is. Big wins for me were the elastic waist & the pockets!

I wore this to work and also to a baby shower - at 27 weeks pregnant. Can be dressed up or down but very comfortable for the bump. I gave it 4 stars because it does have a lot of fabric and can be unflattering.
Gorgeous

links_Review_Title: Love the skirt and style. W/ a muted top and suede boots it was fun to wear for a winter work look.
links_Review_Text: I have a small waist and larger hips. I could have easily sized down 1, maybe even 2 sizes. For reference I am a size 30 in jeans.

links_Review_Title: Best skirt ever. Will rent again.
links_Review_Text: I felt SO CUTE in this skirt. I paired it with a white v neck sweater underneath.

Wore for a friends bachelorette party. Fit was good, not great. was a little worried that the wrap could come undone at some point or at least loosen. Overall though I thought it was flattering and would probably rent again.

links_Review_Title: Flattering, wore it over an LBD for day wear
links_Review_Text: I'm usually a small but the medium was better. It is a crop and open v neck. Have a safety pin ready or an under top. Looked fantastic, very comfortable
This wrap top is really beautiful and pairs well with skits or jeans. The wrap is really low, unless maybe you go up 2 sizes. I needed to layer it over a tank for a formal event.

links_Review_Title: I liked this shirt! The v neck is pretty deep, so I used fashion tape and a safety pin.
Loved this look - the top helped me feel great in my own skin
links_Review_Text: Be prepared for cleavage! Although it's not crazy, it was way more than I was used to, henceforth me tugging at my top the whole night
I loved wearing this. The pattern and sleeves were probably my favorite part. It was a crop so I had to find the right bottoms to wear it with. But I would rent it again!

links_Review_Title: I loved this top so much!!!
links_Review_Text: This top was ruffly and beautiful. I wore it with high waisted palazzo pants out to dinner in Paris and then for Easter. It's short but perfect with high waisted garments. I was very sad to return it.

This top is amazing! It definitely runs small and is intended for those with a smaller chest. The Medium was perfect for me and I'm 5'6", 135-140 lbs and a 34B. Perfect with high waisted jeans or shorts for a fun weekend or date night option! I rented this as part of my unlimited subscription and it will likely be staying with me for a while :)
Wanted to wear this top for Coachella but it's too revealing! Runs small so here is a warning
Perfect if you have a chest to show off! Very delicate and feminine.

links_Review_Title: Cute but not good for big boobs
links_Review_Text: Its really a cute top to pair with high waisted jeans but for me the cleavage was way too much and i didn't want to style it with a top under
This is definitely a crop top. I am very flat chested and even I couldn't pull it off. I don't think sizing up would have mattered. Gorg print!
It didn't fit at all. Was more like a size 12.
Fit Too loose in the bust/chest but the crop waist was okay/little small which made the tie look awkward.
True to size

links_Review_Title: I thought it would be a cute work shirt but it was much too short.
links_Review_Text: Too short
This is shorter than I expected and showed *way* more boob than I expected. It's not cute; it's not sexy... it's going back without being worn.
The tie made for a strange fit. It just wasn't flattering.
The top is great with high waisted jeans, it is low cut so I would a body suit under it. Loved this shirt though!
It is VERY booby, not like pictured. If you want to be modest I would size up.
Take it seriously when reading this top runs small. It didn't even cover a quarter of my chest. I couldn't wear it

This top is super cute, but does fit very small. I am usually between a S and M and because of the reviews, i went up to a L. Happy i did! The L fit perfectly! It was perfect for our Vegas weekend! Highly recommend, as long as you go up a size or two! It's cropped perfectly (I am 5'-4") and was kind of low cut / booby on me (I'm a 34D), but loved it!
Super cute top, but a bit too short for me!

The top ties around the highest part of your ribcage. From the pic on the model, I was hoping to wear it with some high waisted pants and not have my full mid section showing but that was wildly not the case.
Much more of a crop top than in the pictures - did not wear.
Was just too cropped for me. Cute but didn't have anything high waisted enough to feel comfortable, even with a jacket because I felt that took away from the look of the top
Loved it!
It was much shorter on me than the model's photo shows. The fabric is practically weightless. Very soft and silky. If I were crazy about this top, I would size up and try again.
Very well aware that it is a crop top but it barely covered my boobs when wrapped! I wore a black tank underneath it to make it through the day but up your size for sure!

links_Review_Title: It is a super cute shirt but perhaps not meant for a full bust
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'8" and this shirt come about 3 inches under my bust. I wear a D cup and I spill out of this shirt to an extreme. I'd try an extra large but still afraid that it wont be long enough to wear casually with high rise pants. It's a super cute shirt, it just doesnt fit me.
The dress was beautiful and it was a tough toss up between this one and another. Ultimately, I loved a different one more. Fit well

This is one of those dresses I wasn't sure about but tried and loved it. Very flattering! Was complemented all night on it. The shorter layer is pretty short and hit me mid thigh. Sleeves were great and not too tight (sometimes I find lace sleeves hard to wear.)

links_Review_Title: Elegant & classy & sexy at the same time
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. However the small regular fit me better but it was to short. The medium regular was a little loose in places but the length was perfect.

The dress is beautiful on. Fitted but not suffocating, it was very comfortable also in the fact you can wear a regular bra. It is a long gown. I am 5'8 and wore heels, it still touched the ground. I prefer long you just have to be careful not to get a heel caught in the lace. Loved my first experience with Rent the Runway! Wore this to a black tie affair. I wore the small size, am 5'8, 140 - if that helps for reference.

links_Review_Title: Felt good! Easy to wear! Elegant
links_Review_Text: Glad I got the two sizes. I needed the large. Also probably would have asked for tall next time. Overall very happy with the dress

This dress fit me great and is good if you have a little bit of curves. Wore it to a work holiday party and I stood out just enough. I'm 5'7" and I was able to wear the dress with 3" heels and it did not drag. If you are shorter this dress is going to be too long.

I'm 6' tall and this dress was perfect length. I wore 2.5" heeled boots and it was floor length. Unfortunately I didn't take any better photos. It fits close to the body. It was comfortable and sexy. I got many compliments "haute couture witch" vibes. I wore this to a witches dinner party on Samhain Oct 31.

Stunning dress but don't bother renting unless you're at least 5'7" AND willing to wear heels. I'm wearing 5" heels in these photos & it's still 4" too long. Also the lace is very staticky & every piece of lint or hair stuck to it making it necessary to go over it several times with tape. Even with all that, I'd still wear it if I was tall enough. Tall girls - this one's for you!
This dress is a stunner. It fits perfectly. I received loads of compliments. It will be perfect for the upcoming holidays and festivities 💕
I ordered this ahead of a charity ball - it fit great and looked pretty -- BUT my family deemed it "not work appropriate" ;) So I wore my back-up.
Sexy, without being revealing; Long, lean and elegant. I wore with 3” heels.
There is a lot going on here but it is very pretty.

links_Review_Title: super elegant yet sexy! i normally have a hard time with the bust, but this was forgiving!
links_Review_Text: lace has zero stretch. slimming in all the right places. no spanx required ;)

It's somewhat Elvira-esque so find for a Halloween or autumn party. It rubs small though. I ordered the largest size in a long because im 5'8" and the short skirt underneath was SUPER short like just barely covered

links_Review_Title: Celebration for my work and needed something sophisticated
links_Review_Text: This was a great dress but did have some problems with gapping around the plunging neckline. Definitely need to wear a bra but it showed every time I moved so most of my pictures it was poking out.

I usually rented a size 2, and the dresses would fit me well. However, this rental seemed a bit long and big on me when I tried it on. The dress was still beautiful and went well with the lace mask I wore for the masquerade gala.

Great quality and super figure flattering! I had bunching in the hip and butt area, but I'm also very narrow and have that fit with most clothes. Otherwise, perfect in every way possible. Would definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Comfy versatile jumper, ran small on top
links_Review_Text: Fabric was very comfortable/stretchy so made wearing it a dream. I'm normally a 4 and got a 6 and was still tight in chest area. Could've used an 8 on top (and I'm not big chested) and 4 on bottom. Afraid if I sized up pants would be too long and hips too wide. If top were slightly less tight would've bought.
Very well made. It's backless and top was tight enough to hold me in without a bra. Tall enough for my 5'9 frame.
I'm usually between a 6 and 8.. this 8 fit perfectly!
This is classy, sexy and comfortable. It stands out in a crowd, but can be dressed down conservatively with a variety of jackets. I loved it so much, I bought it!
I loved this outfit for a Friday night wedding welcome party. It was simple and sleek and fit great, and I dressed it down with a denim jacket (and dressed it up with heels)!

Rented this for a bachelorette party but ended up wearing it to one of my weddings for the summer! It was perfect paired with mustard yellow flatforms and a bolo tie for a "mountain formal" wedding. I knew this was going to be a very dancing focused wedding and I was happy to be able to move freely without worrying about the jumpsuit falling down! The bride's cousin commented that, aside from the bride, she thought I was the best dressed there. If you want to feel confident in your wedding dance moves and get compliments, this jumpsuit is the way to go.

links_Review_Title: A little weird across the front
links_Review_Text: Nice thick material, I didn't have to wear a bra. However, the front is a bit weird looking. I'm not sure it was flattering but my husband liked it

This jumpsuit fit super well! The material is stretchy so it's comfortable to wear all night. You can easily wear with a strapless bra, but I chose to go without - which did have me pulling it up a bit throughout the night. Seriously considered buying since it is versatile and classic.

links_Review_Title: Slightly baggy in the stomach/legs but still a ton of fun
links_Review_Text: I wish i sized down in this jumpsuit because I think it had the potential to really "wow," but i wore anyway, despite it being a little baggy! Nice material & easy to zip!
Great piece! I actually wore without the jacket for a date night and then added the jacket for a work event. I would rent again!:)

links_Review_Title: Fits great minus line down the front
links_Review_Text: All good except weird seam in the center Fit snug in the bust- any tighter my back fat would have been squeezing out but it was great
Love, loved this!! Was a little big (I'm normally a 10) and long (I'm 5'2) I just tucked the pant leg under. Very comfortable, totally loved it!
The length was great. The fabric was very soft and the fit was great. I could have gone down a size but either way I looked great

links_Review_Title: Stomach looked weird (the way that most jumpsuits do). Top was too tight, despite going up a size.
links_Review_Text: [required field]
I hosted a dinner party and this jumpsuit was perfect! It was comfy and flattering. What more can a girl ask for?
I'm 5'3" and about 130lbs, small on top (34A) and muscular arms and legs. The 4 fit great. The cut was slimming, and it was perfect length for me.

links_Review_Title: A jumpsuit that doesnt make me look like a heffer?! Yes please!
links_Review_Text: I was really skeptical, as im very tall with thick thighs and really worried this would cut me off at the crotch and give me thunder thighs. It was so adorable! I did size up one size, which made the top a little big but with a NuBra it took care of that and gave me a little boobage :) . Super cute and crazy comfortable--strongly recommend.
fit perfect, I am 5'2" and size b

links_Review_Title: As almost always zippers are a challenge, but this fit true to size (I'm a true size 4)
links_Review_Text: True to size.
Weird fit- baggy in the middle and tight at the top. Long torsos should avoid. Not sure there's a body type that could pull this off
Great fit. I received many compliments. The only complaint the zipper is very stiff. It was very hard to zip up.

I wore this for a 70's disco themed work gala. I'm 5'2 and the legs were fine in 3" heels. It stayed up all night - I didn't wear a bra with it. It was very comfortable and stretchy material and I got lots of compliments on it. I did have to have help getting the side zipper zipped and there was no way I could go to the bathroom during the event. The zipper on my particular item would get stuck at different seams which was annoying. I'm not a fan of jumpsuits in general, but if I was, I would probably rent this again. As someone who's short and struggles to wear things like this because of leg length, I was really happy with the overall fit.

links_Review_Title: I could not wear because it looked worn and faded!
links_Review_Text: This piece needs to be replaced. The color has faded and you can tell it has been dry cleaned often. I did not feel comfortable wearing this to my event!

links_Review_Title: Cute but didn't fit me right.

links_Review_Text: Amazing fit, no bra needed, very flattering and comfortable!
Was nice. I shouldn't have dozed up.

links_Review_Title: Cut on the model, not on me!
links_Review_Text: Did not wear this jumpsuit. It was like a spotlight on my mom pooch. Not flattering. Would look great on a tall and slender person with no tummy.

This is cute before I put it on I’m a little thicke in the middle but the rest of me is average. It fit ok in the middle it in general large everywhere else. If I lose w I gut I would definitely rent again.

I love it but need the next size up. Im small (5'1") but I'm not super petite so the fit was a little tight. I often like clothes to run slightly big because it makes me look smaller :) so if you like a tighter fit I'd say it's true to size.
I was so excited to get this, but it was super baggy through the midsection and behind. I may try a 4, hoping it won't be too tight in the chest!

I'm typically a size Small and in Numerical based-brands a 4. I got this one in an 8R because I figured, this was an unfamiliar brand to me and I wasn't sure on sizing. Let me tell you, the top half was impossible to close. I would try this brand again but I suppose I would be at least 3 sizes higher or a 10R to get this to fit.
Fits very well up top. Somewhat loose in waist. Stretches while wearing. But very comfortable
length was perfect on me (5'5). Loved the fit of this, will definitely rent it again!
It's a classic piece, just don't rent it in the summer months because the fabric is way too thick.
Need great accessories to elevate.

links_Review_Title: Classy, but not a stand out piece
links_Review_Text: Flattering and classy and sexy but not a show stopper.

I totally got this thinking it had pockets. I was a bit disappointed but girl.. the fit is great. It's like wearing a onesie pajama. It's so soft and stretchy. Even if you're small/athletically shaped in the chest, it's got a sticky seam to help everything stay up. Super cute.

links_Review_Title: So comfortable and fit like a glove
links_Review_Text: Girls night out
didn't fit
Rented for New Year's Eve and received so many compliments. Very flattering but runs small
The sleeves and peplum do not lay down witch made it a stand out piece
This shirt is beautiful, I wore it for a work event reception happy hour. Everyone loved it, it's dry flattering if you have a small waist and large hips.

links_Review_Title: You truly do need to rent serval sizes up...
links_Review_Text: ... especially if you have boobs! I'm usually a 2/4 and I rented a 10 in this. The 8 would have probably worked, but the 10 was fine as well. SUCH a fun shirt- I couldn't love it more and got so many compliments!!

Rented this with the black pencil skirt for a Kentucky Derby themed party I will be attending with my daughter. Chose another outfit she preferred. But I love this one!! Top runs tight and bottom portion is see through and a bit scratchy- still would wear for its bold statement to a different event. Needed help with the zipper and definitely need racer back bra. If I order again will go size up so I can eat what I want and slouch a little in it - tight!

links_Review_Title: Loved it but it was tight
links_Review_Text: I'm always between a 4 and 6 for tops and went with the 6 but I had absolutely no wiggle room. Loved the fun lace pattern though! Kind of has awkward placement on the nipples and belly button but nothing that noticeable.

This top is beautiful and well made and was perfect for a Broadway show date - but sizing is definitely off. I'm normally an XS-S in tops so ordered the 4 based on other reviews. It worked but was very tight; I would have been much more comfortable in the 6. I'm looking forward to renting this again but definitely going up one more size!

I am in love with this cute statement top by NHA KHANH. Its great for any bust size. Its fitted at the bust comfortably but there is comfortable room in the midsection. The floral design makes this top a one in a million find. I recommend wearing your true size and going up a size for your back up.

links_Review_Title: Pretty and unique but with some qualifiers!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a cocktail wedding reception but didn't end up wearing it and instead wore it to a performance later. It's pretty and unique but I thought the silhouette looked better with pants than a skirt. It does run small- I sized up one size and it just fit, but if you are curvy or have a chest, one size up probably wouldn't be enough. It's lined but still a tiny bit itchy at the bottom and it cuts in on the back so you'll have to pin straps if you wear a regular bra. All in all, it's unique and I'd wear it again!
Gorgeous and classy especially for a short girl. This blouse is short waisted and sheer at waist. If you are taller than 5'5", it will show midriff. Ordered in a four and returned for an eight.
Tailored and perfect for girls night out and work (wore skirt). Need high waist jeans or skirt.
This top is stunning. Very structured with beautiful embroidery, wore to work and to a wedding, loads of compliments.
The shirt's quality is spectacular! The lace details around the sleeves and bottom hem flare out beautifully! Only problem is that the skirt ran small and I was unable to wear it

links_Review_Title: This was SUCH an amazing top. I wore it to work under a blazer, a formal work event, and a date.
links_Review_Text: Don't need a bra, runs tight, but very flattering.
Lots of reviews said this shirt runs very small and to size up 2 sizes. I did that and it was way too big. I didn't end up wearing it. Cool piece if you order the right size.
I sadly wasn't able to wear it.

links_Review_Title: Didn't get to wear it because it didnt fit
links_Review_Text: Small fit in the torso. Looks nice like in the model photos.
Very cute but I believe the sizing is British (US+4), so the size 4 was to tight Across the bust for my normally 0-2 frame.

This top runs small, but is still a good choice even if you are a little thick through the waist. The lining does end at the natural waist, so you might bare a little skin depending on the fit of you pants/skirt. It was a little over the top for work, but because I wear a sweater in our freezing office, it was ok. At the monthly gathering that evening, one friend said, "You always have the best clothes," and another said she was "obsessed" with the top. Definitely unique, memorable, and a standout piece!
Oh my goodness this was tight. Like I could barely breathe. But it was really classy - I would sacrifice for this top! (and DID) LOL

links_Review_Title: Didn't end up able to wear.
links_Review_Text: This top is beautiful! The fabric is gorgeous and aside from the neck the fit was quite nice. The neck was so tight, I could not make it out my door before needing to swap the top for something more comfortable. I am fairly thin and my neck is not wide so it is surprising that the fit is so tight around the neck. I might try a larger size in the future.

links_Review_Title: Loved the top, but didn't fit
links_Review_Text: Would love to have worn this, but it was too small. Hoping to order for another trip.

This top is FANTASTIC. However, do size up 2 sizes if you have a bust. at least one size even if not...runs very tight up top. I wore the size 6 uncomfortably (flattened my chest), but next time will get a size 8. I'm usually a 4 on top, unless it's tight like this. I'm absolutely renting this again.
The fit completely off! I'm usually a 6 or 8 and I couldn't even zip up the 8. You have to size up at least two sizes I would imagine!
Unfortunately I didn't get to wear this beautiful top because my bust was too large so it wouldn't zip. If you have large boobs, size up.
It is made of stiff material and made me a little boxy. I would say size up.
Was a really cute piece but didn't look great with curves. I'm a D cup and it made me feel like I looked pretty awkward.
Really beautiful top but no stretch at all and I couldn't even zip it up. I would rent it again but in a bigger size.
The top was beautiful but the size ran small and unfortunately I was not able to wear it
Beautiful top! Unique details, gorgeous fit (it does run small though) and love the peplum.
It was too small and I normally wear 12-14 but this top wasn't made for people with larger chests.

Fit tight but very flattering with someone who wants to show off their shoulders. I wore with no bra. Sheer but there is a gab of the sheer nude underneath but there is a two inch gap that stops so my bare skin was showing - may be issue with those who have long torso. You couldn't really tell though. Loved it overall under a blazer to work.
Loved this top but would've been more comfortable up another size.
Loved this top! Got a ton of compliments on it being one of a kind. Runs VERY small. Go two sizes up.

links_Review_Title: I ended up not wearing and returning immediately
links_Review_Text: RUNS VERY SMALL. You need to size up at least 2-3 sizes. I sized up based on the reviews but I wasn't able to even zip this up in my normal size. Would be curious to try it sized up even more, but not sure how that will affect the look of the shirt while on

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and different... But size up!
links_Review_Text: This top is absolutely gorgeous! It's very unique and can be dressed up for a formal event or down for date night with jeans. Definitely SIZE UP on this. I went 3 sizes above my normal (which is an 6 or 8 depending on brand and style) based on previous reviews and what was available. I prob could have gone with a 12, but it wasn't available when I rented. I am glad I went with a 14 as it gave me some breathing room. The waist is very snug so if your rib cage or waist are wider, consider 2 sizes or more up. And wear with high waisted bottoms - I'm pretty short and when I lifted my arms my midriff was showing.
The shoulders made me look like a linebacker, beautiful material and print though. The neck was very snug as well as the bodice
Memorable couture top. zips in back
Gorgeous top; beyond itchy, so itchy I couldn't wear it!

This was a cute top until it. Same time to zipping it up. It is as if this top was intended for an A cup max. Though in the description it claims to be for larger busted women... apparently these women are supposed to be a block when it comes to shape
Fun dress, got tons of compliments. Wore it to temple services and also to a casual wedding. Great for travel, doesn't wrinkle.
Great for work and wear into the evening. Super high quality and high fashion feel. Fits great on a taller frame. Ideal for summer, but cute with tights and boots in winter too
This dress was perfect for a mid week charity event. Loved the fit and floral print.

I loved this dress! I kept it for several weeks and will probably rent it again. The lace is fun and the asymmetrical cut. I paired it with a light denim jacket. I colors are beautiful. It has no stretch what-so-ever though so keep that in mind when considering the size to order.

links_Review_Title: A relaxed fit but love it
links_Review_Text: Dress felt a tad on the baggy side but I think that's how it it supposed to fit and I loved it! So comfortable to wear and a beautiful dress that you could dress up or down.
I loved this dress so much. It's feminine, flowy and flirty. It's really comfortable and at the same time looked good on my figure. I'd definitely rent it again.

This dress is why I RTR. It was perfect for a downtown party. I got so many compliments and felt like I wore just the right thing, but I couldn't justify buying this (even though it's great- modern and Stevie Nicks reminiscent.)
I loved this dress! Wore it to work and received lots of compliments. The upper half was a little big, but I wouldn't have sized down due to the waist. Would rent again!

This was a risk and it did not pay off. It was unflattering, large (even though I sized down to a 2!), and had a weird side closure. It zips most of the way and then stops for a series of buttons - makes no sense to me! This went back unworn.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but side closure is weird
links_Review_Text: Fit well and easy to throw on for an interesting every day dress. But the side closure has small snaps that are hard to close and so I had to use double sided tape to keep it closed.

This worked well for a charity beer tasting at an old Air Force hangar. It is conservative but also a bit funky with the hemline. The silk fabric was comfortable and cool in hot temps. I liked the combo side closure with both a zipper to maintain the slim fit at the waist, and small snaps above on the blouse part. Smart design!
Loved this dress. Easy, glamorous, light and perfect to pair with sandals/heels/ flats etc. Definitely size down (I went 2 sizes down and it fit beautifully!) Enjoy!
I wish I could buy this. Stunning and unique dress. Love love.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments. Fun dress for the holiday.
links_Review_Text: I added a belt to break up the top and bottom of the dress. Nice addition.
Good fit Comfy and super with black leather jacket

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, perfect for fall and great detailing
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress, perfect work work! I'm tall 5'10" and this is a long dress on me, so take that into consideration.

I really wish I could submit a photo, but every time I try I get an error message saying the file is to large. I find customer photos very helpful and wish I could contribute. Loved this dress....romantic and feminine..
Nice, comfortable fabric. Perfect fit, great length, love the lace details but I dont think it was really flattering on me
Can dress up, wear with tights or flats. Nice swing shape.

links_Review_Title: Elegant and comfortable enough for everyday
links_Review_Text: I was worried it would be too long for a shorter gal, but with a pair of booties it was perfect. It's surprisingly slimming and gives you a bit of a waist, even if you don't have one. I felt very chic in this and got loads of compliments. If you add a hat you can morph into a maxi dress wearing hipster, but edgy jewelry and more substantial boots can make it more gritty. It can change again into weekend wear if you add sneakers and denim. I teamed it with a black suede jacket and wore it to work. Wish I could buy it since it is so diverse! I absolutely loved it!
Fits perfectly. Love it
Comfortable but interesting design
You can dress this up or down, and I received a lot of compliments. Comfortable to wear beautiful fabric. Highly recommend.
This is the prettiest dress. I really want to keep it. Will definitely rent again. It fit very true to size, I wear a 4 in most brands.
Fits like a dream. Perfect weight. I want to West it every day. If I had an extra $585 I would buy it.
Super cute dress but runs large. I'm usually between a 0 and a 2 and ended up belting the size 0 because it was baggy around the waist. The length was good for me (not too long) and I'm 5'5".
This is very very long. Or I'm very short (5'4").

links_Review_Title: Runs big, a long style that I wished was a bit shorter
links_Review_Text: I felt ok in this dress. Could have sized down and I have hips. The length was longer than I was hoping for, was more of a maxi than a midi and I'm 5'8". I tripped over the side hem a few times. Wore with converse sneakers for a more casual look, but again, wish it was shorter for summer months. Got a compliment from someone on the train. It is pretty, just too much fabric.
Loved this dress. My hips are on the slimmer side, but this dress could really work for any shape. It drapes beautifully and doesn’t cling to trouble areas. Flows and flattering.

links_Review_Title: Low cut but fun for a night out!
links_Review_Text: I was looking for a cute LBD for a dinner & night out. Found this at the RTR store and loved that it had a sexy neckline but was still flowy and had a statement sleeve. I did use fashion tape to not worry about my bra popping out while wearing. Probably wouldn't rent again but served its purpose for one night.

Man I was so sad my plans changed and I didn't wear this. I'm usually a S not XS, but glad I listened to the other review about the neckline being low and got the XS. I could definitely go bra less and but feel self conscious. Super sexy yet classy at the same time
Cute flirty dress for NYE. Deep v in front but not too low, you can still wear a regular bra.

links_Review_Title: I didn't wear this - too low cut for me.
links_Review_Text: Fit nicely. Very low cut.

The dress was really cute and fit nicely. However, I did not wear it because it was so low cut in the front - I just wasn't comfortable. If it had been a little less plunging it would have been perfect. Also ran a tab big - so it is possible that a smaller size may have not been as low cut.
This dress is simple and comfortable, but it was so flattering and I got tons of compliments. I absolutely loved it.
Adorable, subtle details. Wore for work, went from day to night flawlessly!

Obsessed with this dress!! I wore it to a funeral but would be perfect for a party or work event. Great LBD & felt dressier with the jacquard details. Think it was the most flattering dress I've ever worn-- Covered my tush & accentuated my waist but didn't make my hips look humongous. I have a smaller chest & didn't feel too exposed by the cut-might size up if you are bustier. I'll def get this again!
the snap at the top of the dress pokes the back of the neck. I had to put a bandaid on my neck for the second half of the day
Beautiful standing still in front of the mirror, but when I tried to dance in it, it was tight around the ribcage and loose in the bust.
I'm busty so this it was a bit tighter in that region, but overall, the material was too lightweight and I didn't like the floral background pattern.

The print of the dress is really nice and overall it was a good fit, true to size. The structure of the sleeves adds something interesting to the dress. However, it was a bit too long for the occasion I chose it for (a formal work holiday party). Also, there were buttons on the front and the sleeves that weren't obvious in the pictures on the website but that made it look a little less sophisticated. Just be warned that it's not exactly a "little black dress"--it's a little too long and a little too retro for that. Could be good for another occasion though!
The material is very comfortable and it's a classy style dress. Will rent again.

Love this dress and wish I could keep it forever. It's super cute and doesn't ride up or anything. I wore it on the weekend with tights and boots, but it can definitely be dressed up more. I did size up to a 4, though.
A little short and the shoulder details made my wide shoulders look wider.

links_Review_Title: Great for my company's holiday party!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit in all the right places. It's very flattering and perfect for a holiday party.
Fitted right where a pear shaped gal needs it; lots of compliments
Cute dress for work or a party. Fits a little tight in the chest but I am busty. The rest of the dress fits true to size.
The beautiful fabric makes this black dress fun. The rouching on the top adds a slimming effect. The dress is long and modest enough for work.
Great fit, good for day or night

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress. Very flattering and comfortable! I loved wearing it!
Great detail on this black dress
links_Review_Text: Perfect for an hour glass shape. Loved the button detail and subtle floral print. Can easily dress up or down.

Ended up buying this dress after getting tons of compliments during fashion week. It's a really slimming little black dress with ruching, a light floral and puff sleeves. Can be dressed up or down. You can wear a regular bra with it which is nice and it's a flattering length.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful pattern, but potential for wardrobe malfunction
links_Review_Text: I rented this wrap dress to wear to take my boyfriend out for his birthday dinner. It's 100% silk, so it was very comfortable, but I found the bottom part of the dress felt static-y when I put it on. I'm so glad I decided to pair leggings under the dress, because the dress definitely had a tendency to slip open (especially when sitting at dinner). It's a beautiful dress, but I couldn't help but feel that I was just wearing a high quality bathrobe.

links_Review_Title: Silky vibrant comfortable work dinner dress
links_Review_Text: Nice tie side dress with a very eye catching print, was very appropriate for a work dinner. The top is big and would accommodate a larger chest w no cleavage showing. Great length for being conservative too.
Gorgeous pattern. Wrap dress with plenty of coverage on top. If the wind blows, be ready to show some leg.
Nothing too special with this Mari dress. It's a wrap dress so be careful when walking outside when it's windy.

Haha I rented this for an everyday work dress. I wore to morning meeting and host sent me this photo later. Look at the guys in background! They are all staring at this beautiful dress! Later at another event, I got so many compliments. I looked at price tag and knew immediately that is why it is so striking! Love it! Great for full figure women. A little short, had to hold the front closed walking up steps. The valet guy probably got a good shot of legs!

I rented this for a business trip. The fit was great everywhere but the length - it was basically a minidress on me. Would be cute for a night out or probably ok for work if you are shorter, but I had to return it so I could bring something else.

links_Review_Title: Great silky fabric, a little short for work
links_Review_Text: It's a drop shoulder dress in a lightweight silk with a great vibrant print. I like that you can adjust the tie at the waist. Was just a tad short for my office environment but liked the rental.

You'll like this dress if you like wraps and don't mind a short length. (I'm petite and it is short on me.). The external tie is a little above waistline, which is flattering. Beautiful print, beautiful fabric. Long sleeves, a bit too long for a petite.

This is a pretty easy dress for work. I am slightly concerned I may flash someone as it's a wrap, but the top has good coverage. I almost always wear a 4 in Saloni (as well as most brands) and it's true to size.

links_Review_Title: Beautifull Dress, Doesnt Wrap Far Enough
links_Review_Text: The dress and material are beautiful, but the dress itself doesnt wrap far enough on the inside, so a lot of leg will show while you sit or if you take a normal step. The top seems to run a little big, the arms are long and there seems to be a little too much extra fabric. Comfortable to wear until you realize the front is open too far on your leg!

links_Review_Title: did not wear due to sizing
links_Review_Text: The sleeves were really big and the whole top half of the dress was big on me-- so did not wear it. The length was good and the fabric absolutely gorgeous-- but it just did not flatter me at all!
Sleeves were super puffy/baggy and didn't look right on me so I sent back before I wore. The fabric is pretty though!

links_Review_Title: Pretty pattern and style., but no lining or way to keep wrap dress from revealing everything. Could.
links_Review_Text: No lining so the wrap dress really doesn’t work since it opens at legs so easily. Was too short for me to wear to work.
A little bunchy in the front. But not bad. Felt easy to wear. You really have to be careful of the dress opening up in the front. I found it hard to keep it closed when I was sitting!
Sleeves long with shoulder seam below shoulder. Length a bit short for me for work. Not great for me, sent back unworn. Usually love this designer's dresses :(.

This dress was amazing! I felt so great in it. I was thiiiis close to buying it, but I'll definitely rent it again. It was a little tight around my butt, but a size up would definitely have not fit my chest/shoulders area. Overall, I loved it so much!

links_Review_Title: Fun and unique for black-tie optional event
links_Review_Text: Fanastically fun, comfy dress. Much cuter in person than in the photos I saw on RNR website. Sleeves are gorgeous. Can wear any undies and bra with it. Does run short--I'm 5'1" and it hit well above my knee. True to size--I'm an 8 in everything including this dress. I worried that being hourglass-shaped (and 34DD), I might look like a potato in this dress, but not at all--it's body-flattering even though its cut is straight. Recommended!

I loved this dress! It stood out but was perfect for a summer wedding. It has POCKETS. The liner got a bit clingy once we hit the dance floor, but I overall loved the dress and received many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Had to size up, overall nice
links_Review_Text: Ordered this for a wedding, tried on the 12- and it fit everywhere except my chest. Unfortunately I had to wear the 14 (the backup size) which ended up fitting my chest but being a little baggy throughout everywhere else. It did the job, got a lot of compliments, and the pockets were a plus. Fabric is kind of heavy but still comfortable. No stretch at all so if you have a big chest definitely size up

Absolutely loved this dress and received so many compliments. Pockets definitely make your hips look wider, which caused me to size up so they'd lay flat. The material is really nice and sleeves make a statement.

I rented this for my brother's wedding. It was super comfortable and the pockets gave it a relaxed feel. I rented the 20 and 22 based on reviews saying it runs small. I am normally a 16/18. I decided on the bigger size the day of the wedding since it's really short. I was perfectly comfortable and enjoyed my overall look!

links_Review_Title: Nice colors received lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: True to size very nice material I received a lot of compliments.
Beautiful dress, definitely runs small, I'm not a size 16, it was a little large in the shoulders but fit everywhere else. Perfect for a summer wedding!

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and elegant for a summer wedding
links_Review_Text: I wore the larger dress only because the smaller one was more fitted which caused the pockets to stick out at the hips. Overall comfortable and light dress for a summer wedding

Wore this on a booze cruise and had fun taking portraits :) It's shorter than I normally wear but not ridiculously short. No stretch so it was a little tight on my hips. Not super flattering on my bum but overall a fun dress.
Fabulous dress for a spring/summer affair. Very flattering, received so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress... I got lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: I carry most of my weight in my stomach area. This dress was very flattering, a little short like most said.

This dress was cute and fun. I just had a baby and am still breastfeeding so I am a little top heavy. I felt like it made me look a little more too heavy but it flowed well and didn't cling to my postpartum belly. Overall it was comfortable but the material was a little heavy for summer.
It was too boxy on the arms. It made looks life a football player. Nor fattening at all.

links_Review_Title: RTR arrived on time. Dresses were true to their reviews.
links_Review_Text: Easy to wear dress for this summer wedding

I am 3 months postpartum and am carrying extra weight on my hips and in my midsection. I've been wearing 10/12 clothing and all of the size 12 items I have are currently baggy on me, except this dress. The dress fit fine on the top but it didn't fit my hips and the effect was not flattering at all. The shoulders are fun but they didn't look right on me at all.

I usually wear a 16 but I ended up wearing the 18. I really loved all of the colors in this dress and the detail of the sleeves. The cut is boxy but I actually found it to be rather flattering. The length is nice when standing but it rode up pretty bad when I was sitting. All in all I loved this dress and felt really pretty wearing it.
I am 5’11” so it was a bit short. Very forgiving in hip area. I had size 10 and size 12 and ended up using the 12 because I wanted a boxier look and not to be so snug.

I wore this dress to a fun luncheon with some of my good friends. It was perfect for the occasion and I got lots of compliments. The dress is very pretty and comfortable and it has pockets!! Highly recommend!
Loved the fit of this dress! It was a cool night so the thick material was wonderful! It has pockets with is an added bonus!!

I LOVED this dress and got absolutely SO many compliments on it. From the sleeves to the colors to the pockets, this dress was a 10 in my book. It was pretty snug around my hip area and the pockets didn't REALLY help in the "not making me look like I have a big ole tire around my waist" category BUT I really don't think that going up a size would've done much besides making me look like a big sack of potatoes. I will say it really is a heavy material. I wore it to an outdoor wedding in Atlanta on Memorial Day weekend and was sweating within minutes of stepping outside so my hair went on top of my head before the wedding ceremony started but i still felt cute the whole evening and would probably even order this dress again. I would just think about the hip situation and the weather/venue style next time!

links_Review_Title: Fun colorful dress with pockets ! Wow!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. It was a bit short and low cut but it worked great and I felt good in it. Must say it was right in the middle when sitting and got shorter too so make sure you try it before heading out the door. Great material - loved the sleeves !

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress! I was told I had on the best dress of the night!
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable, fit my body frame, and love the lining!

links_Review_Title: Dressy enough to wear to theater or night out, but I wore it to work.
links_Review_Text: Super cute, great material! Wore with hot pink booties. Received many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress- total fashion statement piece
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a cocktail reception. It is a beautiful dress but doesn't really have much shape. Felt loose and kind of baggy but still felt gorgeous in it. Wore it with black heels and can also be worn with tights. Got a lot of compliments and definitely felt like I was wearing a statement piece.
I was hoping this shift would be more flattering but it billows a bit at the hips. Probably because of the pockets. Great Spring/Summer dress print. Still cute on!

This dress is a gorgeous pop of color! The fabric is a beautiful heavy weight tapestry. It was very comfortable, has pockets and really shows off your legs. Size appropriately based on your hips since it is a boxy shape, it needs to be able to hang comfortably, otherwise it would probably ride up and look bulky.
This dress is cute but the material is super thick so it doesn't "flow" at all.
The fit is a little boxy on me, but I'm so into the colors and fabric that I still think it is a very fun dress.

links_Review_Title: Great dress, just a bit short and wide
links_Review_Text: I loved the print of this dress and it was comfortable. As a more athletic body type, I don't have as much size around my middle but have a wide back and large chest. The dress bordered on tight when lifting my arms, although still comfortable, but there was a lot of room in the middle since the dress is cut straight down. Was also a bit short, but I got lots of compliments and enjoyed wearing the dress overall. Mixed reviews from my husband who said "I can't tell if that dress is cool or you look like a weird 80s couch."
Wore this to a wedding in Hawaii and loved!

links_Review_Title: Sleeves are no joke! Big sleeves and will look short on taller girls.
links_Review_Text: Material was nick and thick with a slight sheen. Very short for 5'9" and above.

This dress was perfect for a summer wedding from the church to the outdoor reception. The fit was super comfortable all day long. Loved the sleeves and the bright pattern. The fabric was a nice thick, textured material. Would definitely recommend this piece!!

it hides the two-children-no-time-to-workout-tummy-pooch, but shows off your gams. i ordered the 8 and the 10 b/c i was worried about sizing. both fit, but i opted to go with the 10 so i'd be more comfortable. def runs one size large. i also loved that i could wear a regular bra with it.

links_Review_Title: colors and pockets were a plus on this dress
links_Review_Text: fit was slight loose so very comfortable through out the six hour occasion. enough room to enjoy good food and drink LOL

I ended up not wearing this- last minute changed to my back up look because I felt that this was a tad too informal for the event I was attending. This dress is comfortable, allows for wearing regular undergarments, great pockets. Colors and texture are vibrant and flattering. I would rent again and wear to a slightly less formal event.

links_Review_Title: It was beautiful and flattering for a girl with curves!
links_Review_Text: Fit well and it was in great condition!

links_Review_Title: I wish I could wear this dress to all occasions !
links_Review_Text: I got endless compliments on this dress! I don't often like v-neck because it makes me look wider than I am but the beautiful sleeves off set that. The fabric was structured which is important too me, not showing every imperfection. The colors and design are amazing! I could not love it more! POCKETS!!!!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a fun dinner
links_Review_Text: I thought this dress was a lot of fun. It's short, though, so best be confident in your legs!

Beautiful colors! Fabric was slightly thicker due to texture but fine for a summer event. Sleeves were fun and playful. Pockets were on an odd spot for a plus size woman with hips, so those were not used as it would pull on my belly and emphasize my mid section. Being that I'm 5'10 it was a little shorter than I would have wanted but just meant I had to be more careful as I sat. There's no stretch to this dress but overall very comfy. I went up a size because of the mid section.

Rented this dress for a wedding in February and it was perfect. The high-low hem of the dress made it easy to dance. I originally (and ambitiously) ordered a 10 but had to get a backup 12 since the chest was a little snug.
Wore this at a gala for our church. It was chic, stunning, and smart. So many people complimented me. I felt like a million bucks! And the dress was very comfortable
I am a 34D so it was a bit tight on the chest but not terrible. It was super comfortable and was fun to dance in. I am 5 foot 2 and the petite was the perfect length with heels
We loved our dress! Super cute and comfy!

Didn't wear. Doesn't do a lot for the waistline. Reminded me of pride and prejudice or a bridesmaid. Loved the floral details and the colors. Arms were loose. Generous fit in the hips. Can look a tad pregnant from the side. Felt sweet but felt too young. I maybe would rent for a super specific and conservative occasion. It was a "safe"dress, but it fit, which is half the battle on the RTR search!

This dress was comfortable, minimally wrinkled out of the package, beautifully detailed, and I received many compliments. It does run a little big in the arms, so I sized down and still felt unconstricted when dancing. Only disadvantage is I had to pick up the back of the dress when going outside so it didn't get dirty in snow and salt.

This was my first time using RTR and I was not disappointed. I'm 5 months PP and wanted a dress I would feel beautiful and comfortable in and this dress was perfect. I wore this to a wedding and received many compliments.

Lovely dress and so comfortable. Received a lot of compliments. I didn't think it was the most flattering but it was easy to wear and the colors and detailing are beautiful. It was perfect for an outdoor fall wedding.
I didn't end up wearing this but I absolutely loved modeling it around the house. The details are really elegant and the flow is so fun. Would be great for a winter wedding!
15 weeks pregnant and squeezed into my regular size. Could have gone up to an for an easier fit, but preferred the 6. So many compliments and easy to wear!
The dress fit perfectly and I got so many compliments!

This dress was absolutely gorgeous. I was so close to buying it. I received compliments on it all night! The quality is fantastic. I usually wear a size 4 but I ordered a 2 because the sleeves/ arms looked baggy in some of the photos and I have a small chest. The 2 fit perfectly!!!

This was an amazing dress for an evening wedding on a slightly cool summer night. The only struggle was the zipper. The dress is true to size, but the zipper gave me a little bit of a struggle getting It completely zipped. Im so glad I purchased the 8Long! Strapless bra is a must! Wearing heels with this stunning dress and allowing it to still flow, looked beautiful. I would definitely rent this beauty again!!
Rented this dress for my friends' wedding and couldn't have been happier. Absolutely beautifully made, comfortable, and unique. Super happy with my experience!

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a charity event and literally got 5 compliments (4 from complete strangers)
links_Review_Text: I went out of my comfort zone for this one, but wanted to try something different (not into high/low hems or ruffles), but I really liked it and as I said above, got 5 compliments that evening. I wore a wide black wrap around belt with it (felt it was needed) and it looked great in both heels and flats (switched as night progressed). I agree that the arms are tight, but manageable and not restrictive. I am 5' 6.5" and at the time weighed 175

The dress was very comfortable and easy to dance in, which was one of my main criteria's for choosing a dress! I wore it on a summer evening where it was probably 80 degrees and it wasn't too hot. I generally wear a size 4, but got a size 6 as my backup - but the 4 fit great! The zipper does tend to get stuck a bit I the middle because the fabric is thick around the zipper, but with a little patience it worked fine! I also got the long size which was perfect since I am 5'8" and wore 3 inch heels. Since the fabric is so pretty, I didn't;t need to wear a necklace or anything as it would clash with the flowers. Received tons of compliments!

I felt so beautiful in this dress, it fit perfectly, TTS, was comfortable and was an all around show stopper. I'm just under 5'4 and glad I went with the Petite since a few of the reviews showed the length and I wasn't wearing heels.

I loved this dress, which I wore for a "country chic" wedding. A couple of guests stopped me to compliment the dress, calling it a "showstopper"! It fit me perfectly, but I think women with larger busts or more muscular arms would find that the sleeves/shoulders did not have much stretch. The dress is nice and roomy in the waist and hips, and the high-low cut is very flattering.

links_Review_Title: So classy and yet also comfortable!!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to my junior prom and LOVED it!! I felt like royalty and it was so flowy and fun to dance in! Also the fabric was very comfortable! It was a little long but I’m pretty short so most dresses are too long on me. Overall it was amazing! ;)

I'm 5'7", small bust (about a full A), approx 135lbs. I wore 4" heels, and the back portion just ever so slightly drug on the ground. I originally ordered a 4L (with 6L as a backup), and the 4L fit me fine, but there was an inch of room on each side of the rib cage (I have fuller hips, smaller rib cage). It's the type of dress that just looks a little better if it's more form fitting.
