The smaller size wasn't much tighter in the arms or other places, it just really helped cinch in the upper bodice look. Luckily RTR has great customer service, because they were able to overnight me a 2L for a very small fee. It was very cozy for a semi-chilly evening (upper 60s, lower 70s with low humidity). I think it might have been super warm in the sun with a higher temperature, so if you're outside a lot and it's not a cooler season, I'd be wary of that. Otherwise, I'd recommend this for any formal event. Lovely dress all around.

links_Review_Title: Getting the box is so exciting.
links_Review_Text: The dress was comfortable and I received many compliments!

links_Review_Title: I can't count how many compliments I received on this dress. I felt beautiful in it!
links_Review_Text: I'm between an 8 and a 10, and the 8 ended up fitting perfectly. I'm just under 5'3" and by the guidelines on the website, it sounded like I should get a regular over a petite, especially since I would be wearing heals. I wish I had gotten a backup petite because I kept stepping on the back of the dress and ended up holding the back up when I walked or danced. Other than that, it was the perfect dress!

links_Review_Title: Wish I could have kept it
links_Review_Text: This dress was so perfect. Comfy, fit tru to size, and stunning! Dressy, but not overly formal.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for black tie optional wedding
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit of this dress. Conservative but still stylish. Got so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Loved the fit and quality of the dress got so many compliments
links_Review_Text: Love the detail on the dress the length was perfect I'm 5'1 135

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress with beautiful details, works for 5'11'' +
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for our engagement photo session, and it photographed so well! The dress was comfortable and fit well for someone with hips. I normally wear a sz 10 dress, but I will say this was a bit big on top (I'm a 36B). If you have a small chest, possibly size down. It works well if you are tall - I'm 5'11'' and the 10L worked well with a 2.5'' heel! Overall, I loved this dress and would recommend it!!

links_Review_Title: Great petite size! Lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: This was my second choice and I'm so glad I ordered it! The petite size fit really well and I was comfortable all evening.
Slightly tight in the bust.

I loved the embroidery detail on this dress and the style was perfect for a black tie wedding wear everyone didnt take black tie completely seriously. A good in between! I was also 4 months pregnant, so not showing a ton, but the dress was still roomy enough to accommodate the pudge. I got lots of compliments!
I wore this for my sons baptism and it was beautiful. Forgiving to my postpartum body but still stylish. It is a little low cut

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for prom--I got soo many compliments.
links_Review_Text: It was a little loose, but it was comfortable and I loved the detailed embroidery.
The fit was great but the dress was not quite formal enough for my event

links_Review_Title: My husband...who never dances...danced w me 🧡
links_Review_Text: The dress is beautiful! I received so many compliments! I wish I could have purchased it! The details are amazing!

links_Review_Title: I felt like a mix of a princess and a dark-haired Stevie Nicks. I am OBSESSED with this look!
links_Review_Text: I was very hesitant about this not fitting because of the mesh, but it fit absolutely perfectly! It wasn't too snug or too big. It zipped right up and I wasn't uncomfortable at all the whole night (and it was a long night - new years eve black tie wedding!). The only issue was I'm not a heel person. I wore slightly heeled boots and I still felt the need to lift up the dress when I walked so it wouldn't drag. I'm sure if you wear heels at my height, it wouldn't be an issue!

links_Review_Title: Felt like I was Wearing a Piece of Art
links_Review_Text: I received this dress as a replacement for my original rental when my requested size wasn't available. It turned out to be my favorite dress I have rented from RTR! It was so comfortable & easy to wear, but also beautiful and unique. I really have no complaints about this dress.

I rented this for Thanksgiving this year! I loved the high- low hem which looked great paired with a heeled ankle bootie. The sheer yolk and sleeves added to the feminine style. I added a floppy felt hat and pea coat for November in Chicago. Got so many compliments especially from my fiancé that I bought the dress with the Unlimited discount. One of my all time favorite rentals!

links_Review_Title: I wore this to my firm's holiday gala. I felt like it was a pretty, safe choice.
links_Review_Text: It was fairly comfortable if you don't mind a strapless (or no) bra. I got a lot of compliments on the dress, and I liked the colors and embroidery. Next time I think I'll rent something a little more exciting, not so sweet and safe, though it is a perfect choice for lots of occasions.

links_Review_Title: Rented for a Black Tie Wedding - Too Many Compliments to Count!
links_Review_Text: This dress might be my favorite dress I have ever worn! (Aside from my own wedding dress.) I'm 5'3 with an hour glass figure, and it fit great, including the length. I got so many compliments, and I felt comfortable and confident all evening. I'm definitely going to rent this again for my next black tie event!
Everything about this was perfect. The high low worked since I'm so short!

Such a great dress for a formal winter wedding! The 6L was way too tight in the shoulders so I went with the 8L instead. It was still a bit snug in that area but was fine for the wedding. I got so many compliments on the dress throughout the night! I would highly recommend.
This was the perfect dress! It hugs in all the right places, thick quality material, lining, and the symmetrical neckline is so unique. I would definitely wear this again.
Fit like a glove!

links_Review_Title: Dress was so fun , unique and stretchy!! Totally Perfect
links_Review_Text: True to size, fit. in all the right places. Sexy and Curvy. I wore to a wine dinner with my husband on a Thursday night and a wedding. in Naples on Saturday. It was a great dress in both places. Tons of compliments and comfy. Highly recommend.
Beautiful dress. Loved the deep green earthy color. Shoulder detail made the dress and was very unique. Would rent agin. True to size. Wearing a small.
I'm so happy I tried something different!! This was such a classy, sexy, and unique dress! I received compliments all night, and felt amazing! Such high quality material too! Oh, and that color!!
I am curvy on the bottom and this dress accented in the right places! Loved it!!!

I originally chose this dress for a wedding but ended up wearing something else. BIG MISTAKE! When I finally worn the dress to it was just so flattering and feminine that I didn't want to take it off. I got so many compliments and my boyfriend was absolutely in love with it. Highly recommend.
This dress has a beautiful color and excellent fit. Perfect for tall slender bodies.
A little tricky to zip up yourself but overall super flattering in all the right places and the perfect length! Loved this dress!
Absolutely beautiful dress!! I received SO many compliments the night I wore it. It is true to size, a slightly stretchy material, and comfortable. I highly recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: Love the way it looks, true to what you see in the picture.
links_Review_Text: The only reason I say it runs large is for the top part, the fitting of the body really hugs. Unfortunately, the top part is a bit loose if you have a B cup or less.
Fits like a glove and the material is thick and hugs your body. Could be hot for a summer dress but perfect for a winter wedding.

I rented this dress for a black tie wedding, and it was stunning! The medium fit me perfectly, I am 5'6 at 145 lbs. I got so many compliments on the stunning neckline and gorgeous color. I normally don't branch out from black, but I am so happy I stepped out of my comfort zone for this beautiful dress! I would highly recommend and will rent again.

The dress is beautiful and the fabric is nice but the dress was way too small. I always wear a size 4 but couldn't even zip it. I recommend sizing up. I could not wear this dress and went with another option.

It fit perfectly body wise but i guess is ment for someone taller in the torso area because it was big at the top and couldn't find a way to make it work fo to the design was a shame i couldn't wear it because it looked great except for that detail at the top
The dress fit like a glove. Thick quality fabric that keeps everything held in. The neckline is very unique. I would recommend this dress.
Lovely dress but not for me. Overall nice fit but I would need a spanx, I just didn't feel comfortable in the dress.

links_Review_Title: Fantastic. Compliments all night, felt sophisticated yet comfortable.
links_Review_Text: The dress was well made, and the best part is the fabric was forgiving (no need for spanx) stretchy- so doesn't restrict on the dance floor. Absolutely loved it. Paired it with the Oscar de la Renta flower earrings love it.
This does run snug so was my backup dress - I opted for the other but likely would rent this one again. Very strong fabric. Holds in. It’s a flat tummy day dress only!
Fitted but comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Super cute. A little tight, one size up might have been better.
links_Review_Text: Couldn't get it zipped all the way. Would try a size up. Not sure if it was formal enough for my event.

The material is thick enough to "hold things in" a bit, slightly like wetsuit material. The small was super tight and I didn't feel like I'd be able to eat a meal and relax. The medium fit well, but because I'm short, the one strap that holds up the off the shoulder part was a little too long. It also had annoying clear hanger straps that were sewn into the seam so they were visible and I had to use some double sided tape and keep checking to make sure they weren't flying around. The sleeve style obviously was slightly restrictive for doing any hands in the air dancing, but that didn't stop me from having a great time on the dance floor. Overall, I felt glamorous and really enjoyed renting this dress.

I adore this dress!! It's fitted but still comfortable enough to sit in, and the tie in the back makes it even more customizable and flattering. I love the way the bottom of the skirt is flowy and moves when you walk or are dancing the night away. It's flirty and fun, but the length makes it feel sophisticated and put-together. My only con was that the straps were a little long and kept falling down, but that's nothing a couple of safety pins couldn't fix! Overall a great pick, would totally rent again!
This dress is amazing, so comfortable and flattering! I didn't even need a bra and I am a 36DD, so that was a huge plus!

links_Review_Title: Good for tall girls! Classic midi that's comfortable and easy to sit in! Lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Fit is definitely small, I am normally an 8 and the 10 fit perfectly. Great for small chested women like myself, I can see this not fitting well if you have a larger chest. Straps were also long but that works for me because I am 6'0 tall.

The dress fits SMALL! I sized up two dress sizes based on the reviews and it still was a little tight in the bust area ... but once you have your right size, you will be the star of the show. I am 5’2 and a 32DD and the dress had support and the length hit right at my ankles. I received so many compliments and loved the ruffles for dancing. Rent this dress!
Light, comfortable fabric with a very flattering cut and pattern. Loved this dress!
The materials wasn't very forgiving so it made it difficult to dance. Overall the fabric was beautiful and light weight! I just recommend sizing up!
Super cute dress but runs small and is tight in the chest. Would wear again and size up.

I was nervous only a 10 was left since I usually wear an 8 but this fit perfectly. The shoulder straps were a little big on me and they aren't adjustable but they stayed up during the night anyway. This mermaid fit had just enough room for me to move but also maintain a great waist
quality material and love the pattern

links_Review_Title: The bartender told me I had the best dress at the entire wedding!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! I got one size up and it fits in all the right places. The straps were a bit long and fell a few times throughout the night, but it's nothing a safety pin wouldn't fix. I would buy this dress if I wasn't so picky about wearing the same dress multiple times :)

just like everyone else, I had to size up (regularly a 10), so i got a 12 & a 14; ended up wearing the 12. This dress is freaking beautiful and I felt like a dang angel. Hugs ur curves and makes u feel like a goddess, yet I was still able to drop it low on the dance floor. Endless compliments!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful length - runs tiny in the hips!
links_Review_Text: For what it's worth, it wasn't apparent to people who saw me how badly this dress fit! I'm normally a 4-6 on top and 6-8 on the bottom. I ordered an 8 and a 10 in this dress and didn't even try the 8 on. I'm a true pear, and the 10 was SNUG on my hips/butt/thighs. This made it tough to dance as much as I like to at wedding receptions. The top, however, was quite loose and the straps way too long (that was fixed easily with pins). Pictures of me in the dress look nice - but if you're hoping to be comfortable, it's probably not the right dress if you've got a body type like mine. Might be good for an hourglass IF you size up 2 full sizes.

I cant tell you how much i loved this dress. It was flattering, and beautiful. I'm not usually a fan of Likely dresses, theyre so fitted and run so small, but I went two sizes up in this dress and cant get over how fabulous it was. This is the perfect wedding guest dress - grab a pair of black heels, maybe a fun earring, and a red lip, youre ready to go!
I usually wear size 6, I was reading all the reviews and ordered 2 sizes up to a size 10. My mistake, it was way too big and should have stuck to size 6.

links_Review_Title: loved this dress! the length is amazing and it's so fun!
links_Review_Text: It was TIGHT. I normally am a size 6/8 and I wish i would've ordered a 10!

links_Review_Title: Super beautiful dress - fun and flirty, but RUNS SMALL.
links_Review_Text: I should have paid better attention to the reviews. I ordered a size 6 and would probably get a size 8 or 10 and would have fit perfectly. Would definitely order again in a bigger size.

links_Review_Title: The straps are too long. The cleavage is too low, not flattering for the bust. The dress too tight.
links_Review_Text: It forms well and looks good from the bottom of the breast down, but you can't breath if you sit down. Had to sit on the edge of the chair so I wouldn't break it! Not comfortable to drive in with. I would've have gotten a size 16 to be more comfortable

links_Review_Title: Adorable dress - not made for petite frame
links_Review_Text: Great dress, loved the pattern. However, the straps were unbelievably too long. 2-3 inches too long.
Really pretty dress! Runs small in the hips and chest. The straps also felt long. But I could not zip all the way so maybe theyd be fine if it was zipped.

Loved the dress - very flattering. I am a little small up top, so the straps were a little too long, but I was able to wear the dress! The dress material was better than I thought it would be, but it truly had little to no give. Didn't do a lot or bending over. Good for the rehearsal dinner, but don't know if i would have been able to boogie down in it at the reception. So sad I don't have a picture of me in it!
Sized up one size and fit perfectly

links_Review_Title: Ton of Compliments, But Weird Fit!
links_Review_Text: Perfect dress for something that looks polished and formal, but is still fun and summer-y. Runs very small but has super long straps, I'm around 5'5" and felt a little short in it. Was really happy with how it photographed, but was worrying about the straps all night.

links_Review_Title: Fun print and style for a summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a destination wedding in Florida. It was a little snug, but the length and straps were ideal for dancing. Loved the print and style for summer.
Can be dressed up or dressed down so flattering. Im a 38 DD and the top was a little tight.
Agree with other reviews. Cute dress and shape, but runs small and straps are a bit long. Would rent again in one size up.
Size up at least 2 sizes - I'm normally a 6/8 and the 10 was still too snug. Gorgeous fabric and quality, too bad the sizing is so off!
Beautiful dress, but I didn't end up wearing it because it was so tight on my rib cage and left me feeling like I couldn't breathe.
Will not fit a C cup or over.
runs very small - no give in the material. Did not wear.

I normally wear a 4-6 so I ordered an 8 since it is designer and it barely fits. The dress itself is beautiful but the fit is off. The straps are slightly too long as it is, but the would probably be too long if I got a 10. Probably works best for girls who aren't very curvy.

Obsessed with this dress. It's definitely limiting depending on your body type, as there isn't a lot of room to move. The legs are cinched and the stomach area can be loose but that can change depending on what you eat. I highly recommend for dressing it down and/or could see it being dressed up for a spring/summer wedding. With Likely, I'd always recommend sizing up one size
Bust area too small couldn't zip/ wear.
very cute print and cut, if it fit

links_Review_Title: Easy to dress up or down
links_Review_Text: The length was perfect. I loved how versatile it is. I can wear it to walk around during the day or pair it with heels in the evening. The top was a little loose but not too bad.

Hid my post-partum belly beautifully. I agree with other reviewers who said the torso is short - I have an average-sized torso and felt like it JUST fit. A bit loose in the chest, but I'm still filling that area out after the baby....can imagine it being too floppy in another few months.

I love this and wanted it to work for me but ultimately it just didn't. The bust is made for bigger boobs than mine, I couldn't really fill it out. It looked ok regardless but the overall length was just a tiny bit short for my long torso so I sent it back without wearing. It would've been tight and uncomfortable on my crotch all day. Definitely recommend if you have bigger boobs and a shorter torso. Gorgeous fabric and color.

Loved the color, how comfortable it was, and flattering on my body type! It showed off all the right things and hid any little imperfections. A really cute outfit for brunch or even work. Highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: Fun for a wedding! Lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: I really liked the style, length, and color of this romper. It was really comfy except I wish I had body tape so that I could tape the fabric to my bra. It fit a little too low cut for my liking so I kept pulling the straps back all night. My bra showed a little on the sides too. But overall really liked it :) got a lot of compliments too!
The color was a nice pale orange and the material was on the heavier side. However, I rented this piece for everyday and found that the front was too low cut for work.
Wore to a rehearsal dinner. Loved the color for summer. It was very comfortable and flattering. So fun to mix it up from a dress. Definitely recommend.

links_Review_Title: Too big in chest, size down for a snugger fit
links_Review_Text: Too big in the chest but fit right in the hips, not well suited to curvier folks. Great fabric and styling.
Overall I did love the looks of this jumpsuit. Color and fabric were amazing, I just wish it fit better on the top. The sides did gape a little, but it was only noticeable to me.
This romper was perfect for a summer party!

I love this romper, the medium size fit great around my hips but was a bit bigger on the chest area & I am a 34DD. It was also almost riding up and I'm only 5'2 so I wouldn't recommend to anyone taller than 5'5. Otherwise, great piece to wear to a wedding or nice dinner.
Everything about this was amazing! The fit, color, style! It would be better for someone with a shorter torso but being 5'9", it was still doable. Love love love

Overall, the fit was pretty comfortable. It was a little loose up top and I did have to adjust throughout the night -- beauty tape wasn't very helpful since it was a jumpsuit. Wasn't too bad though and the jumpsuit was great for dancing!

I rented this for a baby shower. Loved the fit, it was fitted around the waist and then loose around the hips and legs. It was a flattering length on me, hit around mid calf. I got lots of compliments and it was very comfortable. Definitely recommend!
Received tons of compliments on this jumpsuit. Super flattering and comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Torso was too short for me
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'7 with a long torso and this jumper was too short on me. As a plus it's cut great so you couldn't tell at all that it was too close to going up my crotch. And it's lined so no worry about lumps and bumps. The color also looks great on tanned skin. Im a true 2/xs and this fit perfect except I needed an extra inch of crotch length. For reference my measurements are 35-25-37. Highly recommend for shorter or average torso gals.

There was very little support in the boob area. I am a 34d but it felt like there was still a lot of room in there. The torso is also short for my 5 foot 6 inch frame so a larger romper would have helped in that area- but then the pants and boobs would be too big. Would not rent again.

I'm 5'8 and have a small chest. I had to pin the chest to make it fit. I also had to wear too pairs of spanx to hide some of the ~revealing~ aspects of the dress in the bikini area. This jumper was cute and I got compliments but it's not for women with long legs!

links_Review_Title: Fun jumpsuit for tropical wedding in Costa Rica
links_Review_Text: It was tight at my rib cage but fit perfectly everywhere else. I'm 5'8/120 lbs. I wore it to an outdoor wedding venue in hot and humid weather and danced the night away. Jumpsuit did not show any signs of sweat even though I was definitely sweating while dancing. Would wear with spandex underneath so no VPL.
This jumpsuit fit in all the right places! I'm pretty short and the length was perfect. I got a lot of compliments AND it was so comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Super cute, great color for Cancun work trip
links_Review_Text: Everything was perfect except it wasn't quite long enough for someone with a longer torso. Adjustable straps would solve the problem!

This was a fun jumpsuit - loved the color and fit. Was a little worried about the crotch being too high but it ended up being fine, and I was able to wear a regular bra with it, too. Ran true to size. Would recommend!
This was a gorgeous jumpsuit that fit perfectly expect for the top - it was far too big in the chest area. But otherwise amazing color and I got tons of compliments!
Loved this though I didn't fill out the top so had to be careful when sitting or leaning over. Other then that it was super comfy, fun and does not wrinkle.

links_Review_Title: It was such a cute outfit! I got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Loves this!
Wore for a vacation weekend. So comfortable & flattering. Beautiful color. Will definitely rent again!
Fit was good I have a long torso and it fit, wasn't too revealing and didn't give me a wedgie. Cute and perfect for curvy girls
showed a lil more cleavage than i was expecting but otherwise was a perfect fit.

I rented this for my friends' co-ed wedding shower and it was amazing! I felt so confident and comfortable and that's saying a lot, given the Southern heat! I wore a bustier underneath but you can probably try wearing a bra, if that's your preference- though I would recommend a strapless one in that case. Would totally have kept this if I could!! You'll love it!
Great summer jumpsuit but you can't wear a bra with it due to low sides so wish it was a bit tighter in the upper body area for more support

links_Review_Title: The Most Fun Piece of Clothing I've Ever Worn!!!
links_Review_Text: Between the wide legs and this brand (I've rented an Amanda Uprichard Jumpsuit before and it didn't work out), I knew I was taking a risk with this piece but I am so glad I did. The color is beautiful and the cut is really fun. I got compliments all night, but more importantly I felt awesome in it. I said the jumpsuit runs small because when I went to put the medium on it gave me some major camel-toe action, but I think this brand might run smaller in general for girls with boobs and a butt. I would definitely rent this again!
This is a great outfit to go from daytime exploring to going out at night. For bustier girls, wearing something under to cover cleavage is recommended.

So many compliments from all ages! The color was different and stood out without being over powering. I didn't have to wear a bra (it would show on the side) but I would normally go for a Medium and the Small was perfect. I would size your normal, and down for a back up. I was able to dance and be comfortable and cool at the day wedding and the backyard after party!

I have never worn a jumpsuit before, so I was hesitant to get this at first. I'm so happy I did! I received so many compliments and it was extremely comfortable. I was going to wear the small at first, but I guess I am a little too tall because it kept riding up, so I switched to the medium. My bra kept showing on the side as well, so I had to pin it. I would this rent again!

I wore this for a friends wedding shower. I love the color and got a ton of compliments on it. It's a great bright summer outfit! The bust is a little large which was fine for me but if you are small chested I would probably not recommend it. I did have to skip the bra because the ties come around the front and every bra I tried left it exposed on the side. The fabric was very nice and comfortable! Would definitely wear again
Loved it

links_Review_Title: The perfect orange! Not too bright
links_Review_Text: I got sooo many compliments on this jumpsuit. I wasnt able to wear a regular bra like some other girls did. The top is a little large so be careful moving around. I used fabric tape to hold it down on my skin. Either way I really loved this color and reccomend ordering!

This is a great jumpsuit for summer. Loved the fit as well - I wore with wedges to work. The only problem was the top portion ran a bit loose and I felt like I was falling out of it - overall everywhere else fit wonderfully. Also was mid calf and not full length which I loved
For perfectly. Rented for a family BBQ and received so many compliments!def considered buying it!! It was also on one of the promo emails
I will rent this over and over again. I wore it to three separate events and still couldn't get enough of it. Fits well. Longer torsos may have a hard time since the straps aren't adjustable

As other reviewers have noted, it runs really slim through the hips. I was expecting a silkier fabric, and was also surprised to see that this dress is actually red (it photographs orange). Despite these quibbles, I'll probably rent it again for a spring or summer event.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful pattern and flattering fit (if you can make it work)...
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress but it took some tweaking to make it work. The top half of the dress runs big and looks best off the shoulder. There is too much fabric in the back and the zipper causes it to poof out in the back which looks strange. I ended up tucking the excess zipper in at the waist and pinning it. The waist and hip area was tight but looked great with shapewear underneath. The draped tie in the front also was flattering. The slit is pretty high and rides up when you're sitting down (a little risqué for a church wedding)... Overall I loved the dress, got several compliments and would love to rent again!

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress! Weird fit and huge slit!
links_Review_Text: Am I the only person who noticed the huge slit? I'm small, but it was ALL the way up my leg!! I'm not sure I can wear this! Otherwise, it's an adorable dress. I love the pattern and the style. As other reviewers mentioned, it's small around the waist and the really loose on top. Kind of an odd fit. If the fit was slightly better and the slit not so high I'd love it!

Loved this dress! I rented for a Wedding welcome party (theme was Havana Nights which this was perfect for). Got lots of compliments and the dress was comfortable and super flattering. It does fit a bit weird though - I am smaller chested so the top was a little big and then bottom was a little tighter. I probably could've gone a size up but ended up going with a 4 and worked perfectly!

Loved this dress! Bought as a backup when I couldn't get the other dresses I was planning to wear to Easter. It was different yet perfect. It fit well and was comfortable as I ate all day. It would also be good for a lot of different occasions.

This dress definitely runs small. I went with a 4, and I usually wear a 2. I could have even went with a 6. It's bigger up top and tight on waists. I love this so much, though! It's so flattering and classy!!

This dress was fabulous!! Fit really well on my curves - the waist is tight and it's fitted around the hips but the tie in the front flatters your tummy. Can be worn with a regular bra. I have a large chest which filled out the dress well. The pattern is brighter in person.
But fit for me was slightly off--too tight in the hips/butt, too loose in chest.

Rented this dress for engagement photos and so happy with the selection. It fit like a glove and really flatters and shows off your curves. Only downside is the way the upper back poofs out (which i think is slightly eliminated by wearing the dress off the shoulder), However, in general i think it's just too much extra fabric there.

links_Review_Title: The fabric is perfect for a outdoor wedding
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for an outdoor wedding in November in Sarasota. I'm 5"11 and usually a size 2 or 4. The dress was snug in my bum and perfectly fitted in my waist, which is hard to find. I was so thrilled with it. The fabric is light and the pattern is gorgeous. Would definitely rent again!
The neckline fit differently on me than the app photo which I didn't mind. It ran a tad small but loved it!
Love the fit of the dress!! But I would say if my hip was one inch wider it would not have fit, literally a tight wrap. But still, very nice and sexy. Loved it.

I normally wear a 2 in this brand but based on other reviews went with a 4. It fit perfect on the bottom and I think a 2 would have been too tight but the top was quite loose causing it to be a bit low cut and for the zipper to pouch out in the back. Still a beautiful dress.

links_Review_Title: Loved pattern but slit was so high you could see my undergarments
links_Review_Text: I'm a 4-6 but know Saloni runs smaller so I went with the 6. The fit was great and I was super excited until I saw the slit was so high it showed my undergarments. Sad because I really wanted to wear to Thanksgiving dinner with the family!
I'm a 4 or a 6 and I always wear a 6 in Saloni.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and bright colors. Very flattering!
links_Review_Text: I'm usually between a size 2 and 4 in dresses. Usually a size 4 in Saloni. It fit like a glove but I could still dance comfortably. Very flattering for your rear and cleavage. Would rent this again.
This dress is a head turner. It is such a beautiful color and pattern. The cut made my figure look amazing and I didn't want to take it off.
This dress was a teensy bit tight in the hip area for me, but not a problem whatsoever. Loved the loose fit on top, and the pattern is a total knockout!

Beautiful dress, worn to a daytime brunch party. It's tight around the hips, shows off curves very nicely! I found the shoulders to stay put just fine. The colors are a bit summery, but really any chance to wear this should be taken! Adore this dress!

Once I figured the flowy top portion of the dress and made some some adjustments to the neckline with double sided tape the rest of the dress fell in place. A little snug in the waist and rear, I could have gone with a size 4 too. Felt so pretty and feminine in this one.

Beautiful dress but on the delicate side. It's blousey in the top and tight on the bottom, so size for your hips, not your bra size. I'm usually a 2 or 4 depending on the brand, and only the 2 was avail, so I took a chance. It wasn't too bad but I would probably go a size up if I wore it again, as fantastic as it looked. Also, the hook holding the top together is super flimsy and broke immediately. Glad I wore a matching bra because it ended up hanging out for half the day! Still, it looked amazing and I got a million compliments. I would definitely rent again.

Not something I would have ever thought to buy, but took a chance and fell in love! Gorgeous colors, comfortable fit, sexy without being too revealing. Wore this to my husband's art opening & was stopped multiple times by compliments—and they didn't stop once we went out afterwards either! True to size. Wore Spanx since silk shows everything. Wasn't too hot for Atlanta!
Wore this for a Dance Parade event. Material is so light and flowy. Amazing cut. Very high slit in the front. Im 5'10 tall and lanky. Perfect fit for a tall girl!

links_Review_Title: Loved it! Tempted to keep it!
links_Review_Text: Great dressed. Originally ordered in a 2 but switched to a 4 (for the hips) and it fit great! Loved it!

links_Review_Title: LOVED but too tight on the booty
links_Review_Text: This dress is so so cute. Flatters a full chest, fun color, flirty ruffles and slit up the leg. It's just way too tight on the lower half. I wore it anyways because I didn't have time to replace it with a size 4 but if you're reading this I would advise sizing up so you don't have the same issues I do.
I never want to give it back So so pretty and flattering yet sexy

As others have said, the dress is gorgeous but the top is ill fitting and baggy/droopy. Too bad because the bottom of the dress fits beautifully but the top has a couple of inches too much fabric so it sags. Fashion tape might've helped but the proportions still wouldn't have been right
Got so many compliments. I forgot to pack a strapless bra and it did work with a regular one but had to keep an eye on straps so would recommend strapless. Great with nude sandals and fun earrings.

LOVEDD this dress. It was so comfortable and makes your boobs look smaller (a plus for someone with a large chest!) I am usually a 6/8 and I went with the size 6. I love this dress...fabric is so quality and it fits on your butt super nicely!

links_Review_Title: I love all of the colors in this dress
links_Review_Text: The main con was the cut up top - it kept sort of flapping open and too much of my chest was showing
The back awkwardly drapes but otherwise I loved it!

links_Review_Title: Tight in hips loose on top
links_Review_Text: Too tight around my hips and too baggy on top for me. Weird fit for my body type. Oh well
cute dress- runs small in the hips, big in the bust. slit is pretty high so be prepared !
Beautiful dress but, too much fabric at the top and was tight in my abs. It you have an athletic body, the midsection does not stretch. Could have worn it but, would've been uncomfortable.

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing the dress.
links_Review_Text: I was unable to wear this because it runs a little on the small side. I sort of thought that might be the case when I rented it, but I thought I would take a chance. The other thing is that I'm 5'5" and that slit went up way too high.
Like some other Saloni dresses, this runs really small. I am a true zero with a small waist/ribcage and I could not zip it. Definitely size up.
tighter in the skirt
Runs small
order up if you have curvy hips and thighs

i'm typically a 4 and this fit true to size. there wasn't a lot of give at the waist, but it wasn't as rigid as other saloni dresses around the waist. hit tea length for me and looked best w a heel. slit made it easy to walk. the neckline was quite wide so i needed to wear a cami. really love the print. highly recommend.
Awesome color but way too much fabric in chest and back for my 5'2" bod.

links_Review_Title: Got this for Valentine's dinner out with hubby, also wore it before then b/c it's such a fun dress!
links_Review_Text: I love all things Derek Lam to begin with, and this dress does not disappoint! The material is a terrific silky medium weight, and it has nice details, like the grommets, and a sweet flat little ruffle above the hemline. It is fully lined. The top of the back is a little puffy, I think because of the darts that give it a nice cut into the waist but it looks fine. It fit very snugly under my rib cage but was not constrictive. Zipping up to the top and unzipping it by yourself is a little work; but to unzip it more easily, just be sure to leave the hook attached at the top so it holds the top material for you while you unzip. I tried on the 2 and it fit so well that I didn't try my back up size 4. It is very low cut, especially if you have a small bust like I do, so I used a white cami underneath. I will try a nude cami the next time I wear it. It feels and looks very feminine, and although it is a little shorter than I normally wear, it was windy outside the day I wore it and it did not fly up to expose me. The cut is terrific for pear-shaped girls like me and I found it very flattering. I will wear it several more times - it is good for a date, or you can dress it up more with high heels and jewelry for work.

The fabric is gorgeous, but the fit is kind of funky. I had to do some creative taping to keep the neckline from showing all my goods. The grommets in the neckline weigh it down a bit, which contributes to the need for tape.
But a little low cut / needs a cami under
Beautiful and flattering. Tight through the back and arms.
I'm normally a 6-8 - rented the 8 - and this was about 2" away from even zipping up on me. Couldn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: I was unable to wear it, but I am a great date, so I made the concert under the stars unforgettable.
links_Review_Text: It's a lovely dress, will keep my eye out for size 8 to become available.

links_Review_Title: Cute Fall dress. Tight across ribs.
links_Review_Text: Cute dress. Odd fit. Great length but a bit roomy in the chest (for small chested women) and oddly tight over the ribs and torso.

links_Review_Title: such great details on this dress
links_Review_Text: was a bit too low cut and short for work but great party dress. love the metal cutouts. only downfall was that it was hard to lift arms up. the arms were constricting and trying to brush hair, the whole dress would lift up.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress, good quality, can be dressed up or down
links_Review_Text: Great color, really pops. Silky high quality fabric. Looked great with a black leather jacket. Fits quite small around the ribcage and fabric has no give, so would suggest sizing up.
Dress was super cute but designed for someone with much larger in the chest area....definitely a bit gaping for me even at the smallest size.

Pretty color, super flattering however the base under bust area of dress runs small. It was difficult to lift arms if you have a larger chest. I also had to keep adjusting the neckline to avoid flashing people.
Im shorter-5'5" and it was just long enough for my casual work length and is so flattering for this athletic/curvy girl!
The dress was too small and I wasn't able to zip it up. It did look beautiful though.

links_Review_Title: Too small on the belly. I didn't wear it
links_Review_Text: The fabric is nice but the dress shows all the problem areas. I looked like I was 6 months pregnant. Didn't end up wearing it

i'm typically a 2, but this designer runs large so the 0 fit fine. the fabric is rather thin so it will show every lump. pattern is gorgeous. didn't work for my chest because i'm busty, but wld be fine for someone w a smaller chest. overall cute dress, but you will need a cami if you are a bust

I absolutely loved this dress! Got so many compliments. I saw some of the reviews said it ran small, I would say if you have a large chest this is probably not the dress for you. I found it very flattering!

Wore this for a hot and steamy summer wedding, the dress was lightweight and breeze. Definitely flattering for curve/column shaped women, needed some fashion tape to keep the top in place but overall felt good in the dress.

links_Review_Title: This is way prettier than i expected
links_Review_Text: P.S Size: order it one or even two size up. This is one of the prettiest dresses I've worn this year! Super comfortable and it is prettier in person. Light strawberry like color and if you have big-medium breasts, it will be even a plus. Definitely need to try this on gals!
This dress was cute but the snap for the chest does not stay closed at all! Would be perfect for someone with a smaller chest
So feminine and beautiful, but really accentuates the behind. I was not looking for any extra attention there.

links_Review_Title: Size up! Not for a big bust.
links_Review_Text: I was bummed I couldn't wear it. I'm normally a size 4, the 6 was snug in all the right places. Even though it fit my chest, it was too much cleavage for me so I didn't end up wearing it. Suggest its best for a C cup and below.

links_Review_Title: I loved that this dress can be formal (high heels) or dressed down (sneakers, jean jacket).
links_Review_Text: There is no give in this fabric. I usually wear a Size 4 in dresses (I'm flat chested but bigger on bottom); this dress was loose in the bust (I didn't wear a bra) but hardly fit at my ribcage (hence no bra). Overall I love this dress if I could alter it to be perfect for me.

Wore something else since this was a tad too dressy. Would have needed fashion tape for the chest area. Wish It would have worked because I really liked this dress as it was a nice mix between sexy and sweet.

links_Review_Title: It had very weird proportions, runs very small
links_Review_Text: Very weird fitting dress. So pretty in pictures but does not fit normal

links_Review_Title: Such a cute dress, very flattering
links_Review_Text: Love the fit, color and everything. Fits me perfectly too!

links_Review_Title: Could not wear. Chest too exposed with zero support. I didn't realize cotton-y, frilly fabric.
links_Review_Text: Overall the fit was fine and even flattering; however the chest is so exposed due to deep v and very little fabric, there's no way and no where I can could possibly wear it. I'd guess anything above a perky B cup, no-go.
The dress fit me perfectly everywhere but my chest. I'm a 34 DD. The clasp in the front wasn't strong enough to keep the fabric together near my boobs. Without that, it was too riskay for me.

This dress is gorgeous. I loved how it fit through my hips, however it was very small around my chest, I wear a 34a bra and I could not snap the snaps for it to close. I might still wear it as I think it will be fine not being snapped, but beware if you are larger than an A cup.

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear this. Way too small.
links_Review_Text: This dress wouldn't zip. I expected it to be snug but this thing was tiny. Had it zipped all the way up, it would've been tiny in the chest.

This dress is stunning and would look amazing on someone with a small chest. Unfortunately for me, the one little button they have just doesn't hold and I was hanging out. Unwearable. Too bad. I'm usually a 6 in dress size, but got this in an 8. Fit great everywhere else but the boobs.

Definitely size up. I usually wear a 0 or 2 and the 4 fit. I ultimately couldnt wear the dress because I need boob support and there is NO room, support or coverage in this dress for boobs above a size C... too bad! Otherwise the dress is a soft pink-purple and flows nicely, accentuating any curves.
I think this would have been a very cute dress but it runs extremely small. I wear a size 4 consistently and couldn't even zip this one up half way.

I was so excited to wear this, but couldn't make it work. I'm usually a 0 or 2, but I would have needed the 4 to be able to accurately review the dress. I simply couldn't make this fit. Way too tight on the hips and butt. From what I could tell, this will display a lot of cleavage.

links_Review_Title: I couldn't wear this dress it was too small.
links_Review_Text: There is no stretch so beware if you have hips get a size up.
Love these- they go with practically anything and are a fun change from my usual habit of wearing jeans. They're super stylish!! I wore them with booties and many different tops and sweaters

links_Review_Title: Love them so much I bought them!
links_Review_Text: Rented these for work to try to mix in something other than my usual slacks and loved them so much I ended up buying them! I rented the MR because I am a little bit bottom heavy (usually a size 26-27 in jeans), but probably could have gotten away with the SR. They are nicely cropped on me, and look great with booties and heels. Perfect for work and play!

links_Review_Title: Too baggy and long for short pants
links_Review_Text: I thought these would hit me just below the knee, but they hit mid-calf and just looked like short pants...

links_Review_Title: Perfect for late Fall heading into holiday season
links_Review_Text: Good fit, pants rode up a bit at the crotch

links_Review_Title: I got a size too big!
links_Review_Text: These pants were super big in the waist but fit well in the but and hips. Culottes usually are a tricky fit for my hours glass figure.
Wore for a family picture and to work. Very fun and comfortable. Very versatile.
It's a little tight in the chest, but it's more or less true to size. Really easy dress to throw on.

I originally rented this dress for a casual rehearsal dinner. I wore it with heeled sandals for the dinner but also wore it with a pair of sneakers for a walk in the park. Super comfortable with deep pockets!

I adore this dress. I have broad shoulders and a long torso and the fit of this dress was spot on. The straps covered my regular bra and the color is such a fun pop in my wardrobe. The buttons are affixed a bit loosely but they're strictly ornamental so no worries on keeping everything together. Will rent again!
Loved this orange dress ... perfect for vacationing or just a casual weekend on the town.
Rented this for vacation in Charleston. Held up well in the heat, fabric is high quality, and it has pockets!

links_Review_Title: Wore to a wedding shower and it was perfect
links_Review_Text: Great fit, color is great for summer

It's hard to tell color on digital devices, so I included a pic of this dress with our alumni banner. As you can see, it's a perfect match. It was a little low-cut for a day outing, so I paired it with a tank, but it's a fun, casual choice.

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments on this outfit. The straps were a bit loose. Still looked great!
links_Review_Text: Pros: color and fit Cons: loose straps

This dress was almost perfect for my summer vacation to the South (95degrees + humidity). Good color and lightweight enough fabric. I only ended up wearing for a few hours because the chest area was really tight, with no give. I don't have a large chest, but this really squished me in there. I would go up a size, but my only concern is the shoulder strap length might get too long. Overall, the concept of the dress was great but meant for a smaller ribcage/chest.

I felt it ran a bit small. The bodice is pretty fitted, there is no stretch to the fabric. I didn’t love how it fit my chest the top was weirdly cut, I am C/D and would not recommend for bustier gals. I unfortunately don’t have a great pic to show what I mean. The fabric is like a cotton canvas, so it is thick and heavier, not ideal for hot temps. Overall, it was a cute casual style, and despite not having any give, was very comfortable and I was happy overall with it.

links_Review_Title: Straps aren't adjustable but very cute!
links_Review_Text: My only complaint with this dress is that the straps were not adjustable so they kept slipping off my shoulders. Aside from that, it's perfect. The color is gorgeous, good fabric, good fit. Can go bra-less. Great for a vacation!

I wore this dress on a girls trip to Sonoma Ca and it worked out perfectly!!! Was great for a sunny spring day with the vibrant orange color. The buttons are super cute but the fabric is a little thinker than I would have imagined. If you have a bigger chest I would advise sizing up because it was a little tight on my chest,but still worked out. Hits at a great length and is very flattering. Deff would recommend!!
Barely closed the zipper and cannot wear a bra with this dress. Very cute with great cut and length.

links_Review_Title: Ran a bit small and the ribs and wrinkled way too easily
links_Review_Text: I'm normally an extra small, but sized up based on reviews. Glad I did because it was slightly tight in my rib cage. Great everywhere else
super cute and comfortable. the S fit fine but the XS probably would have fit better.

I really wanted this to be an easy summer dress but the fit just wasn't right for me. The busy was too small for my boobs, felt like I was popping out the top and side and had to keep adjusting myself. Also the 2nd button placement is not so flattering on a bigger bust as it's like underneath
Color is great, straps were a tiny bit long for me. Still looked good.
Bust was loose but overall a great get

This is a fantastic day dress. It is longer and baggier in the bottom but the fitted top makes it look very nice. I wore shopping, walking around nyc and to dinner had so many compliments throughout the day. I have a larger chest and the top fit perfectly and I didn't have to wear a bra. Smaller chest should size down and that shouldn't be a problem because the bottom has room.

links_Review_Title: Super cute but just a little small
links_Review_Text: An XS usually fits me but this was tight around my torso, and I'm a 32B. Would have rented the small had it been available - sorry it wasn't!
I wore this without a bra and was comfortable all day. I got so many compliments on the color as well!
Maybe I should've gotten a different size, but this dress just wasn't for me.
Like everyone else mentioned, the chest runs small, so I went up a size, but the straps were way too long. So it was a pass!

As a 38D I was comfortable wearing this with no bra and it looked great! A bit short waisted and the button that sits on your Center above the seam does face down but I didn't really care. Pretty long. I'm 5'6 and it was lower mid calf. Great color
Unfortunately, my chest was too big for it to zip up so I was unable to wear. Nothing to do with it being too small just me being pregnant and my body.
I got the wrong size in all of my excitement I think a medium will work better. Will update then.
Wore it as a pinafore dress. Buttons are heavy and point down. Still cute though.

links_Review_Title: definitely not boob friendly. Fit around the waist but couldnt zip around the chest
links_Review_Text: tight around the chest. beautiful color though

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing it because it didn't fit right.
links_Review_Text: Really cute but it runs small in the chest area so I recommend sizing up if you have a larger chest.
Runs small, especially if you have a large chest (I'm 34C or D and usually a size 8, but couldn't zip up). Also the buttons look cheap

I love sparkles and this dress was amazing. I didn't end up wearing this to the wedding I got it for (nothing against this dress, just rented another one that was better suited) so I'm not sure how comfortable it would be for a long night. I worry that the sequins would chafe/irritate my underarms. Other than that it was a great dress. Very pretty and sparkly but not tacky. But it really pushes your chest down so if you have a small bust and don't want to look totally flat you need a good bra
This dress is really fun. I typically wear a small and this was a little tight but the medium was too big so I squeezed into the small and it wound up working great.

links_Review_Title: I felt like a Movie Star!
links_Review_Text: I recently won an award at work which we go away for 3 days. I wore this for our award dinner and received so many compliments! The large was a little snug but the XLarge fit my 5'5 163 lbs 38DD frame perfectly. I suggest wearing a body smoother and racer back bra

I'm 5'7" 148 lbs I wore the medium. With it being true to size it still had some stretch and was comfortable to dance in. Wore it to a February wedding. I was given so many compliments! Very happy with it!!

Loved this dress! It was super comfortable (ie, stretchy) and flattering, and you can wear a normal bra with it. Just the right amount of sparkle for a wedding so that it was a fun and beautiful dress, but didn't detract from the bride. Would 100% rent again!

I really loved the feel of this dress. The sequin were light and non scratchy as dress was expertly lined. The silhouette created by the dress was perfect! It runs very true to a European size so please order honestly.

Wore for a fundraiser for the local theater "glam casual" theme. It fit like a glove! I wore spanx just for smoothing but probably could have gone without. I tried to rent it again a few months later but was bummed I couldn't find it.
This dress made me feel glamorous. Compliments galore all night long!

This dress is so great for showing off toned arms and shoulders. I wore the larger size bc there was a slight difference in the cut of the M and L. (The medium was a nearly identical Slate and Willow dress, not Dress the Population). It hugs you tight, but it doesn't feel uncomfortable bc there's enough stretch in the fabric. The sequins provide a little camouflage for any lumps or bumps. I felt amazing and youthful in this dress. I could wear a regular bra... yay! Rent this dress.... you will not regret it.

First time renting and this dress was everything! The color and thick material were amazing. I got so many compliments:) I liked the length and fit better on the small. It fit like a glove, but wasn’t too tight! I could move and dance easily.
Fit perfectly and was comfortable even for full of sequins

I rented a small based on fit reviews of others and it fit perfectly! I'm 5'5" /130lbs /34DD and it fit every curve. It also fit my mom who has a smaller chest just as well! And that's the best part about this dress... it has the perfect amount of stretch to fit so many body types and figures. Absolutely loved it!

This might just be my favorite RTR rental so far. I was scared about the midi length on me because I'm petite but I just wore some high heels to give me more height... this dress was so absolutely gorgeous and I got so many comments on it! I feel gorgeous. If you like to conceal any little bumps here or there you may want to size up. I'm usually in a medium but wore a large because it was more forgiving... and don't forget the spanx!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and comfortable dress for New Year's Eve.
links_Review_Text: Easy to wear. I Didn't even need to wear a bra, and I got a lot of compliments! I would rent again.

This was a beautiful dress. I am usually a small, sometimes an extra small. The small fit me but was a bit snug. It is a bit stretchy and the medium would have been large in the waist so it worked. The front armholes were not cut as deep as I thought, so it was a pretty conservative neckline. And with all sequin dresses, it was a bit scratchy under the arms after awhile. But I loved the color and it matched my new sapphire engagement ring :)

Body-con - the dress is practically made of spanx. I'm usually between XS and S, and this S was perfect (aka runs a little big). Wore for NYE but it could work in any season with the navy and pink ombré color. Found the top to be a regular "sleeveless" cut - no racer-ish shape as some photos seem to suggest - so wore a regular bra.
This glamorous dress was super flattering and comfortable. The sequins were not scratchy at all. I would absolutely rent again!

This dress is so cute and fits like a glove. I'm 5'10" and it came just below my knees. Everyone complemented me and said how much they loved the dress. This dress is fun and fit like a glove. Note I sized up and it fit perfectly.
I rented this dress originally for myself and when it came in, my mom was in love. This dress is magical, it hugs & flatters in all the right places.
Love it. Lots of compliments the ombré was neat. It was tight but not in a bad way.
Gorgeous and comfortable dress. Received a ton of compliments...the color is even more stunning in person. Fits true to size. Very flattering and forgiving.

I'm normally a medium but read the reviews saying it was small so I sized up to a large and I'm glad. It was perfect and comfortable for a work Christmas party. The blue and pink sequins are perfect color for any skin tone. Loved it!
This dress is so beautiful and comfy. Received so many compliments on it. Show stopper for sure!

This dress had a nice fit. There wasn't much stretch to it at the top but the rest of the dress was comfortable. It definitely is an attention grabber and perfect for a wedding or a night out on the town.

I'm a size 6, I wore the size medium in this dress. Super comfy, slightly stretchy, very flattering on my curves. The sequins made it pop and I got lots of compliments all night. Easy to move and dance, I could wear a normal bra, didn't show panty lines. I would definitely rent this again!

I am a true 4, the small fit tight as advertised, but was comfortable. Nice and thick, wore a regular bra, and hit below the knees which is nice for something so fitted (I'm 5'10). Got tons of compliments and felt great!
Literally everyone loved this dress! The colors are amazing and it's perfect for an hourglass figure, so flattering!

links_Review_Title: First time with RTR was a success for my best friend's wedding
links_Review_Text: I am always very cautious with anything designer and my size. I'm 5'3 and 135 and run into lots of problems in the hip area with clothes. This dress in the small fit perfectly probably due to the fact the stretchy material hugs in all the right places. Super convenient for anyone who worries about their bust as it allows for great coverage. Easy to move in and comfortable to wear!

This was a tad bit tight but that's because I have a few extra pounds now but I loved the dress! It's beautiful. Have to be careful with the sequins though I ended up hurting my nails when they got caught in the sequins.

links_Review_Title: Shapewear is a good idea. Was able to wear a J Hook bra! Dazzling dress.
links_Review_Text: Like everyone else says, this dress is a show stopper. It is comfortable and relatively stretchy. I was able to find a bra that has a J Hook to allow me to have good support. Great length too! I wore this to a charity auction.

links_Review_Title: Great for showing off the baby bump!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a formal, warm weather wedding at 20 weeks pregnant. Pre-pregnancy size M-L, 8-10, since getting pregnant I've been wearing Large. Would have ordered the XL as a backup that may have been a bit more comfortable but it was unavailable - the Large worked and was comfortable and stretchy enough that I felt confident in how I currently look. The sequins under the arm were definitely scratchy (had red marks by the end of the night) but didn't bother me otherwise. Overall great!
I love the colors of this dress!! One drawback-the armholes were cut back so that my spanx straps showed. Really liked it! Seriously considered buying it

This dress was great. It was form fitting but not suffocating, and very comfortable! The only downside is the sequins under your arms. They definitely scratch your skin a bit, but I would not say it's a reason not to rent this beautiful dress! I received compliments all night at the wedding, as well as while walking around the city before and after!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress to feel sexy and sophisticated
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! I was a little worried about how I was going to look in it but it was the perfect dress for this late fall outdoor California wedding. No one was wearing a dress like this, I felt special and beautiful.

Absolutely loved this dress. Rented it for a wedding and got SO many compliments. The S was a few inches longer than the XS, but the fit didn't feel much different otherwise, so I wore the XS. The dress is pretty unforgiving if you have a bit of a tummy; spanx or some other undergarment that smooths things out a little bit definitely does the trick, though. I can see how the sequins could be a bit irritating around the arms, but I didn't have that issue, personally. Would recommend this dress!
True to size, but the fit is very form fitting. Loved every moment getting comments left and right about how good I looked in the dress! Made my night since me going out doesn't happen.
A little longer than expected- I'm 5'4". Received lots of compliments and was very comfortable. The pink wasn't too much. Overall I was happy with the dress.

I felt beautiful in this dress! I received so many compliments about how great it looked. It did fit a little right through abdomen but I don't have a flat stomach by any means so that would happen with any fitted dress. I was very happen it was not tight in the bust despite being a 38DDD/F. It is a long dress coming midshin, I might have preferred just below the knee.
This dress is incredibly comfortable with the perfect amount of stretch! The ombre color is stunning and overall received many compliments! I really loved this look!
I loved this dress! I am 5'4" about 120 lbs and I typically wear a size 2-4 so I got the small and medium sizes. I went with the medium and felt very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: We threw a surprise 40th birthday party for our best friend. She thought it was just a get-together.
links_Review_Text: Fun and easy dress to wear. No Spanx required. Definitely recommend this dress for any cocktail event. Runs slightly large.

The fit was true to size and flowy for ease of body shape. No bra necessary due to the flowing top! The length was great for my petite height to ankle even though it wasn't a petite dress. I received a ton of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Looked great and felt great. Got a ton of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! It felt great. Supported but not too tight. The straps fell down a lot but it was tight enough to have no wardrobe malfunction. I would definitely recommend this dress!
Great dress for NYE! Good length and fit. Four stars because I was adjusting my straps all night.
Super fun dress that fit like a midi since I am 5'3". Threw a Helmut Lang blazer with sharp shoulders over it to break up my broad shoulders. Awesome dress!

links_Review_Title: Loved it so much I bought it
links_Review_Text: It's a strange cut but it is SO FEMININE AND FLATTERING. looks great in photos and on stage. Really a wonderful dress. But it's definitely bold.

I really loved this dress and I got a TON of compliments on it. However it was shipped to me SO wrinkly that I had to spend almost an hour steaming it and it still didn't get all of the wrinkles out but managed to eliminate the dress's pleats in the process. Definitely doesn't travel well, but salvageable if you have time....

It was absolutely amazing dress - I loved it so so so so much! I got compliments all night and I felt like a million bucks. It was comfortable and perfect for dancing. Honestly? Rent this! Right now. It's amazing. I loved it so much I wish I could own it and wear it to every future formal event. For reference I'm 5'2, 165lbs 36B and wore the 12 (but could've prob gone w the 10). The top was a little loose (fabric tape to the rescue!) but overall it was PERFECTION. Rent & feel like a queen!

links_Review_Title: 6.5 months pregnant and loving this dress!!
links_Review_Text: Surprisingly I fit my pre-pregnancy size even though I'm in my third trimester, which makes me think this probably runs a little large. Would definitely rent this again! Loved the length and the drape!

links_Review_Title: Glitz and glamor, this dress was all the rage.
links_Review_Text: Super fun dress. I received a lot of compliments. It's a dress I wouldn't actually purchase, but so glad I had an opportunity to rent it instead.

links_Review_Title: Tons of compliments. The theme of the party was "Rhinestone Cowboy"! Dress was perfect!
links_Review_Text: The dress was very comfortable and fun - easy to move around in and easy to take on and off! The 14 was ok but the 16 was more comfortable for me. Highly recommend!

So different from mostly everything I've rented. I wanted something fun and this hit the nail on the head. Difficult to steam so I had to just let it hang for a couple of days. It's flowy and not form fitting so if it's a little big it's not a huge deal. Adjustable straps really help!
This dress was a dream.. it was the perfect romantic, funky dress for a friends Brooklyn wedding. I got so many compliments AND it was super comfortable! Highly recommend!
Fit true to size and was super flattering, forgiving, comfortable and fun to wear. Highly recommended!

I was very excited to rent this dress, and all expectations went above and beyond! It is such a fun dress to wear for a variety of different occasions - I wore mine to a wedding, and received compliments all evening. It's flowy and has a hidden zipper in the back. Runs on the larger size for sure! Very flattering to a variety of different body types.

I absolutely loved this dress and found it to be so comfortable! The straps fit me weird so I just tucked them in to make it strapless. It was a little tight in the chest area, but not uncomfortable at all. Got so many compliments on it!

links_Review_Title: I felt like a Golden Goddess!
links_Review_Text: I’m very Cury so the dress fit amazing !
The dress fit comfortable loose to the body and flowed very nicely! What would of made this dress better would be pockets ;)

This dress is a real show-stopper! I thought I'd wear the 6, but the 4 fit snugly, which worked well because I decided to fold down the thin straps and make it strapless. It's got a real 70s disco vibe.

I rented this for a disco themed party but would recommend for a holiday or special night out! Throughout the evening I received so many compliments on the style. Literally 0 negatives about this dress, the fit was true to size.

links_Review_Title: Super gold, super shiny, super comfy!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a Celine Dion show in Vegas and it was the perfect amount of shiny - think gold aluminum foil but comfy. All of the comments I read said to size down so I did (14), but I wish I would have gotten my normal size (16). I carry all of my weight in my bust and waist and that's the only place the dress is fitted. I was able to get it on and you couldn't tell it was tight because of the pleats and design, but my ribs didn't have very much fun. Other than that it was perfect! Super gold, super shiny, super comfy! I loved the length too and the fact that my boobs couldn't escape and start their own party. If I knew I had at least 1 more reason to wear it again I would buy it.

I wore this dress to my Senior Prom, and it was a hit! I liked the length (I'm 5'9" keep in mind) and the dress is super shiny. The only concerns I had was it was a little tight in the bust. I usually wear a size 18, but I looked at reviews that said it ran large, so I thought going down a size would be alright. Sure enough the dress fit okay, but I would've liked a little more wiggle room in the top. Overall I would recommend this dress to anyone that wants to stand out at their next formal event.

links_Review_Title: Getting to wear such a fun color made my night! Loved the metallic gold!
links_Review_Text: Wore this dress for a "rockstar" themed charity event. I'm on the shorter side, so I wish the dress were a little shorter. It fell below mid calf on me. But overall, it was such a fun dress to wear and I received compliments all night.

Wore this dress for my gold themed 30th birthday. Very comfortable to wear. Arrived a bit wrinkled but once it hung out for a while it flattened out. Wore a size 0 comfortably but I am typically more of a 2-4.

This dress was fabulous! I rented it for my birthday party and received so many compliments! It's light, loose, and fun. I went with my usual size of a 16. The top was a tad large for me but I needed the bigger size to fit my curvy bottom half. Absolutely loved and wanted to keep it!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a Gatsby themed wedding shower!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so comfortable. I am 5’3” and curvy - I wore a size 10 which fit perfectly. There is a hidden zipper in the back so order your size based on your rib cage area. The straps are adjustable so if you are shorter like me, you can tighten up the straps. When standing this dress hit me a few inches above my ankles, but I’m sure it would be more of a midi fit on some average to above average height.
This dress is beautiful, so many compliments on it, the skirt moves so nicely & shimmers when you walk. I could've gone one size down, I did not need a bra with this. I will rent again !
Wore the 00. Good quality m. Super comfortable. I am 5’3” 118 lb

links_Review_Title: So comfy! So flattering! So stylish!
links_Review_Text: The size and length felt perfect. The quality is great! I got constant compliments.

links_Review_Title: It was really fun to wear!
links_Review_Text: This dress was really fun to wear and perfect for the occasion. It was a little bit larger than I expected but a size down probably would've been too small.

I needed a dress last minute for a charity cocktail reception. This dress was a lot of fun and I got a lot of compliments, and the price was right. I am normally a 12 or a 14 in dresses but the 14 wasn't available so wore the 16 which was a little big but doubt anyone noticed but me. I don't tend to show off my curves, so this was perfect for me, but it is still a bit of a sack.

The dress fit is a little strange but forgiving. It was the only thing in my order that fit so I went with it. It was really comfortable and felt festive and dressed up enough for a formal cocktail party.
This gold diamond dress moves beautifully as you move. It's comfortable yet stands out. This dress runs large. I'm usually a size 12 but I wore a 10 without any tightness.

I really wanted to like this dress because the fabric is awesome. Unfortunately even the smallest size was huge in the skirt and also big on my 32A chest. Overall a fine piece if you're layering under a jacket or something, but wouldn't recommend as a stand-alone piece.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a NYE wedding - Endless compliments!
links_Review_Text: Perfect for a NYE wedding! This was the most fun dress I have ever worn, not to mention maybe the most comfortable. I have wide hips and a larger rear so when I wear dresses, if the bottom fits, the top is usually too big. The way this dress is with the wide skirt, it left PLENTY of room for my large hips. Paired with black block heels and long earrings, I have never felt flirtier.

links_Review_Title: Pretty but not good for my curves
links_Review_Text: Don't get me wrong, this dress is super pretty and the fabric/color is perfect for a fun event, but it did not do anything for me since I am a curvy gal. I have wider hips with a smaller waist and this dress made me look very wide and overall unflattering. I am normally a size 14 and the 16 fit so it does run a little small. I hope this helps!
Runs a bit large

links_Review_Title: A dress that makes you feel like magic
links_Review_Text: If I could own this dress, I would. As a petite 5'1 individual, it can be tricky to find dresses that make you feel this good. Fit was absolutely perfect.

I absolutely lovedddd this dress! I rented it to shoot holiday content for my fashion blog and I wish I had it for longer than the 8 days! The straps are adjustable which definitely helped to make sure the waist fell in the correct place. I wore a size 4 because it was the smallest one available, but I would have gone with a 2 if I had the option. The dress is extremely comfortable and a perfect option for work events or weekend events.
Loved the look online but not great if you are shorter and on the petite / athletic side

This top looked amazing on me and was so special. I paired with with a muted metallic a-line skirt and a pair of embroidered mules, and joked that I looked like renaissance Barbie the whole night. It was a little big on me, but mostly fit true to size. Docking this some starts because it was very very itchy in the arms. It's been weeks since I wore it and I still have chafe marks around my biceps!!! Was not even tight, the fabric may just have been worn through because it was fine in the bodice.

Wore this a few times going out and it was fun! Runs a little small in the breast area I barely got mine to fit and I'm a 36C. It made them look really good though and I got tons of compliments! Would rent again, however be ware the material does wrinkle very easily so it might not be something to take on vacation. I also have a very short torso and question how this would look on someone taller as it was almost too short for me.

links_Review_Title: Cute but lining fabric super uncomfortable
links_Review_Text: I don't know if it was how the garment got dry cleaned or something, but the lining felt literally felt like sandpaper on my bare skin. It was awful. Which is really a shame because the top does look so cute on. But I just could not wear it because of how it felt. It was so uncomfortable how it rubbed. Disappointed, especially since the retail value of this top is around $800 and the quality felt more like $20
flattering but I have larger breasts and it made me look completed flat chested
I have a very small chest, but even in a size 8 I was unable to zip it up. Runs very small, I recommend going up two sizes.

There's really no way around it: you'll look like you're a dancer in Hamilton. It's basically a corset with decorative sleeves, and the way it's cut means you feel pretty exposed without actually showing any cleavage. I'm not really sure where or when I'm gonna feel comfortable wearing this, but it is a gorgeous and well-constructed (and very expensive-feeling) shirt. I may just wear it when I have friends over this weekend and then send it back.
I wanted to try this on, but it was so tiny! It's built like a corset, which is fine but runs really small.

links_Review_Title: Loved so much I had to wear despite the event being cancelled!
links_Review_Text: Unfortunately our event got cancelled due to the Covid pandemic. Decided to get dressed up and have a fancy dinner at home despite everything being closed, I just could not let this dress go to waste! Got tons of compliments. Fit great. Only issue is I'm 5'8 and I'm not sure what shoes I would have worn if we left the house. Slightly too long for flats and not really long enough for heels. Otherwise I absolutely loved it!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, a bit snug and a bit long
links_Review_Text: Overall, loved it. But, it was way too long even with heels-- great shape tho. Very slimming. With my DD chest, a bit snug- def ware a bra because material too thin.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for in-between September weather/outside wedding
links_Review_Text: Super easy and beautiful to wear. Got tons of compliments and felt totally comfortable in it. Travels great--no wrinkles!

I LOVED this rental. I typically wear a 10 in dresses and the XL fit perfectly. I'm also very tall and the dress just hit the floor with sandals on. I wore this on vacation in Hawaii and it was perfect.
This dress was perfect! The fit was amazing and best of all it is so comfortable! Highly recommend

I instantly fell in love with this dress. The colors are vibrant, the design is lovely, and it moves beautifully. The slit adds some drama, too. I highly recommend this dress. I have a shorter torso and am 5'6"; I was able to wear it with flats.

I'm 5'0" 109 lbs so the XSR ran long. I wore 4" heels but the dress still grazed the floor a little bit. Wasn't a problem though as the slit helps move the dress while walking. I got so many compliments. Some friends and family asked to borrow the dress for another occasion and I've told them, "RTR is the way to go!" Thanks RTR for making me feel so glamorous and fabulous for the wedding! #wedding #feltglamorous

This dress was perfect!!! I was worried that it would be too small, but it fit perfectly! I received SO many compliments! I wish I could buy it! It is the perfect length with wedges/heels. Amazing for a late summer/early fall wedding. LOVE IT
This dress is beautiful and comfortable. It's long. I'm 5'6", wore 3.75 inch heels and it still brushed the ground, which is why it gets a 4 rather than 5, but still a nice rent.

links_Review_Title: Vibrant beautiful dress- perfect for a summer wedding
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress and the beautiful vibrant blue- this was the perfect dress for a summer wedding. There's a nice long slit at the leg that I loved and the fit was perfect, fitted on top but comfortable. #wedding #summer #day-to-night

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress for a gorgeous wedding
links_Review_Text: Got tons of compliments! Fit me perfectly. The length and cut were very flattering. The slit is fairly high, so keep that in mind if you are modest. I am not tall but thankfully was already planning to wear pretty high heels (3-4") because the dress is full length.

I loved everything about this dress. I am in between a small and medium in most things. Both looked great on me but I went with the small because it showed my figure a bit more. Love the high slit- very sexy.

I loved this dress so much! i got so many compliments and I could wear a non-strapless bra, which made me happy. I wore standard 3 inch heels and the length was just right. super light material and i loved the color. The slit was what set this apart outside of the color!

Rented this for a summer wedding on a hot day. It was beautiful and so comfortable. I'm often between a S and a M so I rented both. I liked the fit of the S through the torso but the neckline cuts in (like a racer back, but on the front) and I couldn't make the front cover my bra straps. In the medium with a little tape it covered it easily. I'm glad I wore the M because it was really hot and the fabric skimmed my body instead of being tight. I got so many compliments! It's a long dress- I'm 5'9" and wore about a 2" heel and it still brushed the ground. The slit is higher than I expected, up to upper thigh, but it's a gorgeous touch. Must rent!

Good fit and fine for a bigger bust, although it may be tricky to find a good bra to wear underneath.
