I wore Spanx underneath and regret not pulling front leg of the Spanx all the way up (which you can maybe peep in this photo.) As I walked, the skirt and slit did a fun/sexy flowy thing, and the pattern was perfect for a late summer wedding. A lot of other reviews mention needing a higher heel and I had great luck with a platform heel.
Loved this dress! So comfortable. Flowy and fun. I got so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: I felt beautiful in this gown and received compliments all evening, especially on the dance floor!
links_Review_Text: True to fit, the small worked better for my smaller chest. Racerback detail make this dress work for formal, semi-formal, or even cocktail attire. Beautiful detail, pattern, and fabric. The slit is sexy and makes the dressy extra flowy when dancing.

links_Review_Title: Most beautiful dress I have ever worn. Perfect for a summer formal wedding. Hard to send back!
links_Review_Text: Flowing silk dress that moves with you. The generous skirt hides the slit but it shows as you walk. The dress was very comfortable. The top was fitted. I normally wear a medium but it wasn't available. The large was a perfect fit though due to the tailored bust (I am a 36C) and fitted waist (I am thicker around the waist). It was great to dance in. I am 5-10 and wore 2 inch heels and the length was perfect. I will rent this dress again if the opportunity comes up
Snug through the bust but in a way that makes a bra feel unnecessary. Flowy with a slit that's just high enough. Loved this dress and got a lot of compliments!

This was a great dress! The color is identical to the picture, very vibrant. The top fit well and the slit was not too high. Everything flowed like a runway model when I walked. I'm 5'3" and wore 4" inch heels, the dress barely skimmed the ground. Probably could have gotten away with slightly shorter heels but I didn't want to trip. All in all, I loved this dress!

This dress is hands-down gorgeous. Tailored fit, sexy slit up the leg, moves beautifully when you walk, and a nice light material for summer. I used a racerback bra clip on my everyday bra and it worked great. I would definitely rent again!
Perfect for a summer wedding. Gorgeous electric blue and a little leg makes pictures pop

Loved this dress! I'm 5'6, 130lbs and wear a 4 or 6. The small fit well. The top was a little snug but worked fine with a sticky bra. I wore a nude dress sandal with a small heel so the dress just barely touched the ground. Had to be careful not to step on the bottom of it. And the slit was a fun touch. I received many compliments with this dress!

The dress was beautiful! It flowed behind me when I walked. Literally, the dress turned the heads of people around me. It fit appropriately tight on top and loose on the bottom. I wore an athletic bra for extra support. The fabric is very light and airy. I highly recommend it for a summer wedding or date in a warm climate.

I wanted something different for the wedding of a good friend, and damn if this dress didn't deliver! I recently lost a little bit of weight, and this helped to show it off. I was complimented all night and was able to feel comfortable the whole time. My only complaint is that it was a bit long. I'm 5'3" and I wore 3" heels, but it was still about an inch too long. Never fear, though! The dress is so flowy that it whisked away from my feet whenever I walked. I felt sexy, but still appropriate. The high neck covered my chest, but still gave me all the definition in all the right places. Thanks RTR!

links_Review_Title: I wanted to buy it! Sad to send it back
links_Review_Text: Just about every person I talked to at the wedding complimented my dress. Absolutely loved it. It fit so perfectly and wasn't too hot despite being long bc the slit allowed for ventilation! I seriously wish I had more events and could wear this every time! So nice being able to wear a regular racer back bra and the material was so flattering and light. Highly recommend

I rented this dress for a wedding recently and received plenty of compliments. I'm so happy I did. I'm currently between sizes and rented XS & S. Had to go with the S. The dress fit was a little loose in the back but fit much better than the other size. I'm 5'2 and it was a little long for me, even with 4" heels. That didn't stop me from dancing as holding the sides gave me that twirly feeling. I would still rent this dress again. It was so fun.

links_Review_Title: Felt so sexy with the high slit!!!
links_Review_Text: Wore this dress for a wedding and I felt so beautiful in it! It fit snug, but held everything in. The slit is so sexy! I got compliments all night. And this color is EVERYTHING!

The dress is so vibrant in color, extremely comfortable and just so beautiful! I wore it to a bridal shower and I lost count of how many people asked me where I got it! Endless compliments and so perfect for a summer bridal shower or wedding!

links_Review_Title: Love this dress! It fit like a glove and the high slit makes it subtle sexy.
links_Review_Text: It is a little snug in the top so if you are bigger up top I'd recommend going for the larger size.
Great fit and comfortable material. Fit well and was easy to dance in. Ran a bit long but with higher heels it would have been fine. Can definitely be worn with a razorback bra if needed.

I rented this dress for a summer wedding and it was perfect! The fit was flattering and the material was silky and flowing, not clingy at all. The racer back was very pretty, and works with a regular racer back bra. I was comfortable all day and night. I would definitely rent this one again!
This dress was amazing. Light and airy while having a formal look to it. I will definitely rent again!

The dress was perfect for a summer wedding. It fit well and true to size on top although it was a little long. I had to wear 4-5 inch heels to compensate for the long length, but it was no big deal since my heels were that height anyway. I'm 5'6, 130, and typically a size 4. The S was a good selection for me. Would definitely wear any Yumi Kim dresses again!

Wore this to a casual wedding on the beach and it was perfect for the occasion. It was very flowy, and light weight so I was not overly hot despite being a full length. I am short and I had to wear heels to avoid stepping on the dress, but that's what happens at 5'2 haha. I found it tighter in the bust, but I wore it with a padded bra. Maybe a less padded bra would be better. I would rent this again in a heartbeat. I got soooo many compliments, and it was perfect for dancing. Loved this dress.

Got soooo many compliments! Dress does run long (and I’m 5’6”), but beautifully flowey and the slit wasn’t too high. I do wish I would have gotten a smaller size, but went with what my weight usually is and not what my weight currently is. Highly recommend!
Gorgeous dress. Super comfy and light weight. True to size in the waist. A bit long even with a good 3.5 inch heel. So many compliments.

links_Review_Title: This dress was exactly what I wanted!
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments on this dress! It was a perfect fit and so versatile. I wore it to a fundraiser one night and a backyard wedding the next night. It was absolutely great for both! The pattern is so beautiful and the material was very comfortable. It was also really great for showing off my tattoo! My only complaint is that it was a little bit long and I had to be careful not to get my shoes caught in the hem. I also had to wear heels so it wouldn't drag. For anyone with a fuller bust (I have a pretty flat chest), you may want to size up or it will be too tight in the chest. Overall, loved this dress and wish I could have kept it!

I'm a huge Yumi Kim fan, and this dress didn't disappoint. I wore 3" heels and they were perfect with the length of the dress (I'm 5'5). It was form fitting but not too tight. Love the racer back. Gorgeous floral design. Slit on one leg goes up the thigh.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a "SoCal Formal" wedding
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! I tried on both small and medium regular length but went with the medium to have a little more breathing room. I wore a 3" heel and it fell perfectly at ground level- didn't drag or catch on anything and was easy to dance in. I love the high neck and razor back- I wore my bra with cross crossed straps and they hid very well but you could go strapless and be fine too. Felt great in this dress and would definitely rent again (but probably won't since there are so many great dresses still to try on RTR!)

links_Review_Title: So soft and comfy! With pockets!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress and got lots of compliments! It's so soft and hangs beautifully. It was a smidge too big, but belted it and it was perfect for a garden theme party!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric and print, runs large
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear because is just too large on the top. Recommend for larger breasted women...or size down. Love the fabric and print though.
Loved this! It was flowy and comfortable. Love the pockets. It was flattering! Great for a bridesmaids luncheon.

links_Review_Title: This is how this dress made me feel. The delicate fabric moved so beautifully.
links_Review_Text: I loved the fabric---this was a wedding atop a hill in Northern California. It was quite warm, but the breeze made it feel perfect. The one issue I had is that the neckline plunges and opens. I thought I'd need a tank top underneath to avoid major exposure. However, I found that a single safety pin, in just the right spot, kept the neckline in place. I hated to say 'goodbye' to this dress.
It's a beautiful bathrobe- but it's a bathrobe.

This dress grew on me. When I first tried it on at home I didn't think it was flattering; the top is large and the draping obscures your waistline. However, with a belt, this dress was a winner. I'd rent again but would try a size down. Lots of compliments!

This is a pretty lavender floral dress. I waited weeks for this to become available. When it arrived it was crumbled up and soaking wet in its plastic bag. But the garment bag itself was dry. Who packages a wet garment to ship? Not your best moment RTR. I rinsed it, dried and ironed it so I could actually wear it. A lot of work, I know. I liked the pockets. Should have come with a lining. It is slightly see-through.

links_Review_Title: Dress is a unique piece, showed off what I wanted, covered up what I needed!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. Wore to a spring wedding and felt very pretty and comfortable. It does run large on the top, but nothing a little fashion tape couldn't fix. I'm currently between a 12/14 and the 44R fit perfectly.

I am a size 10 - 36C and 30 in denim, and wore a 40. I technically sized down in this because the top is billowy. I safety pinned it for more security, but this dress was FLAWLESS overall. I could not be more excited to wear this, especially since the weather is breaking and these colors were perfect for the May wedding I just attended. Paired with metallic accessories, this dress was a hit. I just returned it and I'm sad to see it go! Words of advice: give this a try, wear nude underneath, and size down 1-2 sizes and you will love it.

I rented this for a spring industry lunch. I usually am a 4, but sized down to the 2. I recommend sizing down one. The dress is very feminine and the material is silky and flowy. Got TONS and compliments on the dress
I did not look like a football player! Loved the pockets & ruffles! Would be a pretty Easter dress! Lots of compliments from the girlfriends! Thin silky fabric.
Wore this to host a female founders forum and it was great. Pockets were appreciated! Did need to pin the neckline to avoid being to revealing, but with that it was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Lovely, comfy, pockets. What's not to love?
links_Review_Text: Overall fit is a bit large but not unwearable. Loved the unusual lilac color and elegant floral print with turquoise/teal and gold accents. Pockets are always awesome. Fabric is incredible quality–light and flowy but substantial. The ruffled sleeves and faux-wrap top do add a little bulk but the fabric is light enough to move well and lay nicely, so I didn't feel top heavy. Super cute with leather or denim jacket, boots or sandals. Great transitional piece for winter/spring or summer/fall. Recommend, especially for hourglass shape!

links_Review_Title: Lovely dress, large in the top
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress in person. The drape, sleeve details, and spring flowers were endearing. Plus pockets! I wore this for a formal event and it was definitely a standout. The only notable downside was the top runs quite large. I pinned the top v neck so that the front of the dress wouldn't slip forward and reveal my bra.
Aside from the top being a bit large, this dress is gorgeous. The fabric is so soft and flowy, and the color is beautiful. I even wore it to work and received so many compliments!

i think i wore the 42R because it was the only one available so it was a little bit big and the shoulders kept sliding off, thank goodness i had a cami on underneath, but i loved the color and the shape and that it has pockets! it felt really good to wear on a date with my husband. would definitely rent again.
Super feminine and beautiful colors, the details on the sleeves were fun. Loved the dress, but be aware super transparent, can't wear without a slip. Got a lot of compliments.
Very low cut front required a pin at work. Oh also it's a bit see through! At least if your underwear is a bright color. Should be fine with a neutral panty.
Wish I had a photo in this dress because I adored it so much. A perfect special occasion dress made of beautiful material

links_Review_Title: Weird fit and fabric is not silk
links_Review_Text: Was excited to order this dress. I was expecting it to be silk but it was a "silky" synthetic. The print and colors were beautiful but it did not look good on me. The cut of the dress was strange and it fit badly. Tried to wear several times with a belt but I gave up and sent it back.

I saw the photos on others and they looked great. I really think you have to be long in the torso and taller for this. I am petite and curvy absolutely not large and the top of this dress has so much of a blouson it looked ridiculous, like my arms were attached to my waist and shapeless to boot. One thing I think I am learning from all of my rentals with unlimited is that torso length matters in some styles, and long legs in others. Petite frames fit certain styles and it's hard to tell until you put the dress on. But when most of the models wearing it are 5'8" to 5'10" it puts a damper on a five foot four frame. It is a learning curve But I believe in these reviews we can help each other. Long torso required for this dress. Long legs would probably help as well but the bulk of fabric at the upper part of the dress could only be helped with a longer waisted. My suggestion for this community is that we all detail as much as we can when give a review. I read them and I still make mistakes but I appreciate all the information anyone shares. I love this dress just doesn't help enough!
Omg this dress is everything! I paired with some fuschia pumps. Conpliments alllll day

links_Review_Title: Busty but love the pattern and sleeves
links_Review_Text: I am a 34B, wore the 2, and definitely some fashion tape in the bust as I wore to a work event. Otherwise fabulous dress with unique sleeves. Slightly sheer but I didn't need a slip to wear during the day.
The fit ran big and the top was really loose. I had to pin it to keep it from just falling open constantly. Size down.

Has a care free 80's vibe with gorgeous material and construction. I'm between a 12 & a 14, typically closer to 14, and I made the mistake of getting the 44. If you're between sizes, definitely go down 1. I know it's supposed to be oversized, but it is so oversized that was able to easily slip in and out of the dress without using the zipper. Sent it back the same day without wearing.
Seriously gorgeous dress but I don't think I can wear it because I'm swimming in it. I went with RTR's suggested size but it's way off. If this were two sizes smaller, I bet I'd love it.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but too big for petite girls
links_Review_Text: The dress is absolutely beautiful! Gorgeous print, quality fabric but far too big for my petite frame! Even if I sized down I would have problems. The dress is big and blousy through the chest and shoulders so I think it would work well for someone who is bigger busted and has a longer torso. Wish it would have worked for me!

links_Review_Title: Great for new moms who want ready access to breasts!
links_Review_Text: This dress would be perfect if you want to breast feed because the flaps covering your breasts are loose and can fully be pulled down under your bra. Short of that specific activity though, why would anyone want a dress where you are giving free shows all the time? Maybe pinning it would help but I still don't get why a designer makes a dress that doesn't provide the basic function of covering your boobs.

links_Review_Title: One of my friends said "It really moves with you and makes you look like a goddess"
links_Review_Text: A bit sheer, but my friends assured me I didn't need a slip. I had to use sticky tape to make sure I wasn't falling out of it and pasties instead of a bra, but ultimately got a million compliments. Considering buying it in the future. It was so fun to dance in!!
Beautiful Flowy floral! Slightly see-through, slip advised.

Really beautiful fabric and color. Smooth and silky. The skirt falls beautifully. The chest is meant for larger chests. I’m 34 DD and 145lbs. The ruffles on the arms make you look really broad and if you already have broad shoulders it will be really unflattering. Wish it didn’t have the ruffles or that they stayed down.
This dress was very pretty. There is a lot of fabric. Looks great with heels or boots
requires camisole with deep opening surplice neckline great sleeves and fabric
One of my favorite RTR pieces to date. Super flattering, great print, lightweight, easy to dress up/down, and beautiful embellishments on the sleeves. Wrinkles easy.

links_Review_Title: Beware if you have broad shoulders
links_Review_Text: The print is beautiful. There are pockets. It feels dreamy. BUT the shoulder details will make you look like a linebacker. I wore it under a moto jacket and it worked well but I would never wear it without a jacket on top to tone down the shoulder drama. Would also recommend a skip or nude thong.
Received compliments but feels a little frumpy. Might have been better if i sized down. Overall just big
This dress want the most flattering. It runs quite large through the waist and chest material is super soft and light, is see through.

links_Review_Title: Not flatters. The shoulders make you look broad, and the detail is cute but not flattering.
links_Review_Text: Did not wear. Not flattering.

links_Review_Title: It was okay. Came in very wrinkled
links_Review_Text: Returned
Couldn't wear it cause event was cancelled but at least i got a photo with it on. The large was a better fit.
I wore this to a charity gala and got compliments all night. The slit is high, but not too high. Sexy but still very classy.
I loved this dress, I got compliments all night long.
Comfortable and sexy dress. The material is thin so must wear a sticky bra. There is a long sash that is a little strange but can be worn in the back or tied.
Fabric was a little thin! But she was stunning!

links_Review_Title: This was my backup dress and I LOVED IT!!
links_Review_Text: It for perfect, aside from being slightly tight in the chest. I loved the dress and I felt great wearing it. I got compliments all night long.
very very thin material but beautiful dress and stunning back.

This dress was perfect for a black tie event that had a sexy vibe. It definitely shows everything, and a lining would've been nice though that might make it less slinky. I'm 5"10- didn't need heels with the long. I weigh 142, but my weight is more in my lower half. No Bra was worn, which seeing in pictures after it's quite obvious nips action. I had fun and lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable and several guests asked where I got it! Thank you RTR!
links_Review_Text: It’s thin fabric so be prepared to wear appropriate undergarments (I chose seamless underwear and a “silicone sticky” bra). Loved the cut and color but I should’ve gone with a SL instead- looked great with flats though! Last note: I never had a bow on the left shoulder but I thought it looked great regardless!

It fit great. Very clingy so it will show every bump! I normally wear an 8/10 and I got both the medium and large. Ended up wearing the medium because the large gaped a bit at the back. Such a great price for this dress!

Great for someone with a small frame due to stretchy fabric. Good choice for those who have proportions that are harder to fit. I'm shy of 5'2" and 100 pounds. I wore 4" heels and the length was just about perfect. The strap that goes around the back was a tad loose on me, but nothing to worry about. The fabric is thin so be careful about your choice of underwear. The dress does not have built in bra pads and will show every little bump. The dress was navy (not blue grey). Tons of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Fit exactly how I hoped it would, hugged in all the right places
links_Review_Text: The long dangly sleeves were a little annoying- however, I still loved the dress. It fit well and hugged curves in all the right places.

Very sexy dress. My typical size fit like a second skin so I sized up. I didn’t want to look *too* sexy at a wedding. The slit is perfectly placed. The material is jersey and very thin, so if it were warm outside I would have been very worried about sweat marks. Overall not quite the level of formal gown like I was going for, but it looked great anyway!

links_Review_Title: truly so figure flattering and comfortable!!
links_Review_Text: It is really thin so either go pantyless or get no show undies!
The material for this dress is quite thin BUT it's cut in a way that is more body skimming than skin tight. Ended up being a beautiful look with a stunning back.
Dress hugs every curve because the material is that spandex jersey type

links_Review_Title: It was the perfect dress and color for our anniversary photoshoot.
links_Review_Text: I went to this location looking for a dress and I didn’t find anything that I liked on my own. An associate kindly asked what I was looking for and found the dress for me. She was extremely helpful. It was the perfect dress and down to the color. The rental price was also great. Only downside is that I wear larges in dresses and there were limited options in the store. Gladly, this dress was in a small and FIT! It was made out of a stretch like material and looked great on. Only con about the actual dress was that as I was walking, the dress rode up - the split on the side was pretty high. I’m sure if the dress was actually my size, it’d be fine. The photoshoot came out PERFECT and I was happy that I found a dress.

links_Review_Title: Loved this! So easy to wear, perfect for a wedding
links_Review_Text: Pretty sheer material so not very forgiving, high slit is well placed though, love the open back. Pasties could work but I went without

This ran true to size, and I wore 4 inch heels to get it not to touch the ground (I'm 5'2"). It is a very thin and soft, stretchy material. It will cling to and expose every curve, good or bad. Beware what undergarments you wear. Highly recommend pasties as you can't wear a bra since it's backless. I also highly recommend no-show panties or going commando because the lines are easily seen. I loved being able to tie the strings anywhere I felt like it and actually tied it on the other side.
This dress is very comfortable and an attention getter. It is very clingy-so best if you are in great shape. The slit on the thigh shows off a nice leg. Very Jennifer Lopez looking!

I absolutely loved this dress. The material was a bit thin but overall a great fit. The back is open so Spanx are not an option. For reference I'm 5'4" 116 lbs and the small was perfect. Would recommend this but just FYI it's not very forgiving!

Wore this to a literary/fundraising event I was hosting. Great fit, perfect for the occasion. Loads of compliments. Would recommend it for formal evening events in the Spring/Summer months bc the fabric is thin.
I loved this dress online but read the reviews and was nervous. I never took it off the hanger because the material was so thin. Glad it was a backup dress and the original worked out.

links_Review_Title: Thin material - can't wear anything under
links_Review_Text: Did not wear because it was too thin. Couldn't wear underwear without lines showing. Plus the back is open so couldn't wear a strapless bra. This was the only XSP dress I could find on the site and would love to see more *truly* petite sizes (as many dresses that claimed to be petite were still way too big on me). This was the only dress that fit me and I still couldn't wear it because the material felt too thin. RTR - please add more XS/XXS/00 options
Comfortable, true to size, classy
I am rather tall so I got the SL size. However, it's not long enough and the leg slit goes way too high for it to look at all appropriate.
The best part of the dress is the open back. The thin fabric did little to compliment my shape. Didn't end up wearing.

The material is extremely thin, almost like slip material, and because it is sleek, it shows every bump and lump and hugs every curve. Even wearing spanx, I felt uncomfortable. Unless you're extremely comfortable with your body, do not get this.

links_Review_Title: Standout dress, just wish it was lined.
links_Review_Text: Veryyyy slinky fabric. Overall very flattering and received a ton of compliments - a great value for the cost of this rental. I wore the ML (usual dress size is 4L) and it fit snug. Didn’t even try on the SL backup. You’ll need an adhesive backless bra, if this dress was lined I would give 5 stars. Dress runs on the small side however fabric is stretchy. Form fitting & hugs your curves. I found it slightly tight in the shoulder/armpit area. Length is always my biggest concern but was not an issue- I’m 6’1” 135lbs and 34B and in flats this dress was just a couple centimeters from the ground.

I typically wear a 4 or 6, but 6 wasn't available so got an 8. It fit in the waist but I couldn't fill out the top, which wasn't a huge deal. Loved the fabric and the dress has pockets! Would highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: I felt great in this dress!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit fine in the bodice, but my spanx helped everything feel smooth. The dress would work very well for hour glass figures, For me, it was a bit loose in the chest, which manifested itself in a gap under my arm at the zipper. I pinned it but it probably wasn’t that necessary. The pattern and fabric folds gracefully disguised this imperfect custom fit. My 3” heels meant the dress just brushed the floor. I had to be cautious but not annoyingly so. The worst part of this dress was the zipper. It should be replaced, it is awful, it sticks.

This dress is beautiful. I wear anywhere from an 8 to a 12, depending on the cut/style. I'm hourglass shaped so I was surprised that the waistline was super tight on me but there was plenty of room in the bust. I just measured & the waist is about 29 inches on the 10R & just about the same on the 8R. There is zero give at the waist seam. I couldn't find any measurements to correspond to the sizes so I hope it helps anyone trying to decide on which size. The dress is gorgeous.

I really loved wearing this dress! It's super classy, but still comfy. The band under the bust is kinda tight and not stretchy at all, so I went with the 4 instead of the 2. The 4 was still snug, but I will say I was 12 weeks pregnant at the time, and showing a little since this is #2. I usually wear a 0-2 but going up a size made it work perfectly. Under the bust, the dress is very flowy and forgiving. There was a decent amount of room in the bust area, but I'm also pretty small-chested.

I ordered a 0R last minute but needed a petite. It was about 5 inches too long for me with heels and a little large under the arm (I'm 5'2" on a good day and 105 lbs). I remedied this with hem tape and saftey pins and it worked! Highly recommend

Loved everything about this dress! It isn’t heavy, and the colors and pattern were so much more vibrant than on the website. It has a flattering cut, which is nice for someone with curves. There is no give in the bodice, so be sure you know your size before ordering. I had the 6; it was snug without being too tight. It also has pockets—why haven’t designers always included those? I would wear this one again.
This dress fit true to size and provides a flattering feminine silhouette that accentuates the waist, while allowing ease of movement. My favorite feature is that it has pockets!

links_Review_Title: Anniversary party featuring 30, 40, 50, and 55 years of marriage.
links_Review_Text: I did not wear a bra. I didn't feel the dress needed one. The material was thick enough. I believe wearing one would have made it a bit more snug in the bust. The waist fits as expected. There is no give here, ladies, so if you're in doubt, go up a size. I wore pumps, and the dress lightly grazed the floor, so it was a great length. Otherwise, the fabric isn't heavy and I received SO MANY compliments.

This was the absolute perfect gown for a professional black tie gala at the museum. I typically wear a size 8 in regular clothing but went up a size in this because prior reviews said the waist was tight. I'm so glad I did! Even as a 34DD, I did not need to wear a bra with the dress (lots of folds to cover up any immodesty!) The length was good for me because I did not intend to wear heels (I'm 5'10 and rented the long length gown). I'm not sure this would be long enough to wear with heels.

The dress was gorgeous, I received complements and on it. But the dress had a small malfunction with I received it. The zipper came off when I was removing it from the hanger to try on. Other than that, it was a beautiful dress.

Wore this dress for a symphony fundraiser in the month of February. Perfect dress for the occasion! Classic and elegant with a bit of pop in the red color and sass with the one shoulder - extremely warm in 30° weather which was perfect for this indoor/outdoor event. Highly recommend this dress for anyone especially in light that it has pockets! A serious show stopper that you will not regret renting.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress and I loved having pockets!
links_Review_Text: The dress was tight on the waste/rib cage but I wore it anyway; a larger size would have been too long.

Loved wearing this for a black tie winter wedding. Super comfortable, has pockets, and it wasn't slipping down at all. It runs a little small on the top/around the ribcage, so I had to size up from what I usually wear. Also it was very long, but fine with heels.

I'm 5" 4 1/2, came EXACTLY to the floor with a modest two inch heel. If you are tall, might be too short. For me it was the perfect length and SO comfortable. One of the few dresses I could go without a bra (34 DD) and it look appropriate. Beautiful taffeta-like material. Photographs beautifully!
POCKETS!

Getting the zipper up on the side was a little challenging, but once it was on it was actually really comfortable and not heavy like I thought it would. The pockets are stellar (I didn't need a purse for the event because I just kept a couple things in the pockets), but the dress is REALLY long. I'm 5'6" and with 3" heels I still needed to temporarily hem it up with tape by a few inches. I would have gotten an 8P but it wasn't available, so I had an 8R - might be why. I got tons of compliments all night, and never got uncomfortable or overly hot. I'm 5'6", 36B, average/athletic build. I have a small bust - so not having a bra wasn't an issue for me.
Loved this for the Marine Corps Ball! This was my second Rent the Runway experience and I loved it! For me, would've gone a size up but made it work. Otherwise, would definitely recommend it !

links_Review_Title: Dress it up or make it funky! I had a fohawk with braides and rose vans

links_Review_Text: I would have loved to have worn this dress but I received it with a hole under the arm that was quite visible.

the dress was spectacularly beautiful, legit felt like scarlett ohara. bc i am a little extra, i ordered this huge hooped petticoat to make the skirt extra puffy. i am 5'6" barefoot and i wore 4" heels. the L dress length was a few inches too long without the petticoat BUT the petticoat lifted my skirt up a tad bc of the horizontal girth and the dress gracefully skimmed the floor afterwards. wore white pearl studs and had my hair done in a curled low bun updo at a salon. it was GORG.
5'7" Wear 8-10 jeans. 10R was the perfect length and fit. The pockets were a great addition, I received compliments all night. I did add a belt to break it up.

Felt like a movie star in this dress! I wore the teal color last year to this same function, and loved that one, too! I'm 5'7" and with flats this was the perfect length. I wore a regular bra for support and just tucked the right strap inside. I was nervous that the 12R would be too tight because I've gained some weight and my back up size (14) was damaged so they sent a totally different dress as my back up. But thankfully the 12 fit around the waist perfectly. And pockets!!

This dress looked amazing. I had the size 8 & 10. The 8 was too tight around my chest. I wore the size 10 and it fit perfectly. I received a lot of compliments. There was a person at the event with the same dress in another color.

This dress was perfect for my event. I have wide hips so finding a flowy dress that still fits up top is the key. This dress was perfect for that. I got so many compliments. Wish I could wear it everyday. It will make you feel so pretty! I'm 5'8" and I'm glad I rented the Long. The regular would have been too short. Also I wore flats. No heels.

The zipper on this dress was extremely difficult. I almost had to wear the backup because we just couldn't get the zipper up. I'm between a 4 and 6, but the 6 was more comfortable. I got lots of compliments and felt glamorous.

This dress was perfect. We had a Halloween theme wedding. Our colors were black and red, When i saw this dress I fell in love with it. It fit perfect, a true 10. A little struggle with the zipper getting stuck but once it's up it fit great. Best part - the dress had pockets!!!!

Loved wearing this dress for a formal event! Received tons of compliments. It was very slimming and the pockets were fun. It was a little long even with my tallest heels but not too bad. It was a little under my arm on the side with the sleeve and the dress was definitely a little snug around the midsection. There was also some damage to the lining that made it fit a little weird but hopefully they'll fix that for future rentals!

Did I get your attention? Seriously one of the most comfortable formal dresses I've worn (did I mention it had pockets??). Length was perfect with 3" heels, and I received numerous compliments all evening. Travels well, hung in hotel bathroom when I was showering and any small wrinkles fell out.

This was the perfect gown for a formal evening wedding. I ordered an 8 and 12 because the 10 was out of stock. This dress does run a bit small. The 10 would have fit me perfectly. Regardless of my sizing issues I would order this dress over and over. After having a bay, I haven't felt good about my body but this dress made me feel like a princess. I ordered the long which was perfect for my 5'9" height and 4 inches heels. The best part of the dress is it has pockets!

links_Review_Title: Elegant Dress for a Formal Affair
links_Review_Text: I loved his dress once I slipped it on. Lightweight material, formfitting in the bust and beautifully flowy on the bottom. TTS. I'm a 34B and didn't need a bra although it would work with one. Pockets for the win! Zipper took a little work but wasn't a problem once it was on. Red color is a little more maroon then in the edited photo shown here. I received so many compliments and felt stunning and unique in a see of black and more plain dresses. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous colors, interesting details but still modest neckline and back. Tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Had a little trouble with gaping/drooping under the right arm - I had to use safety pins to hide my bra. Otherwise, the fit was beautiful and very slimming. I am 5'6" and wore a 10 with 2 inch heels. It was a tiny bit too long.

I love this dress! I got so many complements! I'm 5'7", 135lbs and went for the 6petite which was a perfect length for the very low heels I wanted to wear. The dress was flattering, felt glamorous without sacrificing comfort... did I mention it had pockets? Highly recommend!

Ran a little long so I had to do a temporary hem. But it worked nicely with comfortable heels. Dancing was super fun, but I wish I would have used the pockets more. It was late in the night that I remembered they were there! But they comfortably fit my phone for dancing. :)

I rented this dress and the same one in a 6L. The fit was PERFECT. The length was great with a 3inch heel. The one shoulder strap is great so I wasn't worried about it slipping down all night. The waist was snug but still comfortable. The best part are the pockets! I didn't have to bring a clutch/purse! I got many compliments on the gown. #blacktie #operaball

links_Review_Title: Rented this dress for a cruise.
links_Review_Text: Extremely comfortable, love the pockets!

links_Review_Title: This dress is so comfortable and I received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit is true to size and it has pockets ! I am 5’8” and wore the long size. I tripped over the dress a little bit , but I prefer the longer size . This dress is amazing!

links_Review_Title: Absolutely loved this dress, I would wear it again in a heart beat but it runs small.
links_Review_Text: The pockets are the best part.
The fit was great. I loved the look and it was a show stopper for sure

links_Review_Title: Very flattering perfect for a formal wedding
links_Review_Text: It fit tight right under true chest area so I size up! Very elegant and super flattering for a formal wedding. Not super hot. I've never tried a one strap before but SO GLAD I took a chance.

LOVED this dress. This dress is super fitted so size up or get a friend to zip you in. I've got a deceptively large bust and never wear strapless bras because they slip down. I wore a convertible bra with the straps across my back and, honestly, I could have gotten away without one. The way the fabric draped and the fit of the top made me look tiny/flat-chested which was perfectly fine with me. It was a bit small on the bias but overall very comfortable. I wore flats and the pockets are huge. Super amazing. The fabric shows NO wrinkles so I didn't have to worry about steaming it.

links_Review_Title: Cute skirt in a fun color
links_Review_Text: Wore this for a dinner out on vacation. The orange color and ruffled design are perfect for a tropical destination. I paired with a plain white tank which felt a little boring but it worked!
I felt great in this skirt on vacation. I wore it to the pool, to the beach and to lunch. Good orange color. Love the linen. I'm considering buying it for future vacations. It's great!!
Loved this top paired with the matching skirt. It was perfect for attending a Havana Club themed immersive theater show in Miami!

I rented this for a night out down the shore. Definitely not your typical beach bar outfit, so I got some interesting looks. Not for larger busted girls, definitely a revealing look. Loved it nonetheless!
Great skirt to wear as a cover up, I wore higher on my waist so a medium fit perfectly, and I got a lot of compliments!
I ordered a size XS and the skirt fit me well, the skirt was cute but not very flattering and was slightly annoying to wear for a long period of time

Rented the top and skirt to wear to a party for work. The skirt is a wrap so it's completely adjustable. It's flirty, breezy and keeps it shape. I was in the Bahamas and it stood up to the humidity all night long. Possibly my favorite rental ever.

This was a clear choice for a Hawaiian themed party and I'd gladly grab it again for vacations or even summer weekends. The color is bright and the skirt wraps so nicely with great movement when walking. Only con is it does wrinkle very easily but it's linen so that's to be expected. I am usually a 26 in jeans and the XSR fit me really well - I was able to wear it high waisted with a crop top and I didn't have to over-wrap it, nor did the tie come undone at all during the day. Loved this skirt!
I love two piece sets - please add more !!!! This set was gorgeous, comfortable, fun and flirty ! I highly recommend for any summer occasion can def dress it up or down!

This skirt wraps so it's super comfortable and versatile. I wore it as a late afternoon beach cover up and then straight out to dinner. Worked equally well for both scenarios! Lightweight and color is gorgeous too! Only negative is that it wrinkles super easy
Fits great and is so comfortable, and the color is great for Spring. I'm tall and it was a great length. Go for it!

I wore this for trip to St. Lucia. The "high side" I hit me a few inches above my knee which was perfect. The "low side" wasn't too low. Stayed secure. No worries about flashing anyone as I moved about. Great color. Felt very pretty on.

links_Review_Title: Skirt is beautiful. Wore it during the day on vacation in Cuba and it was the star of the show!
links_Review_Text: Color and fit is awesome - It's a wrap skirt, so you can adjust it, but the way it's made has enough overlap that I never felt nervous about being exposed. Downsides- you have to use two spaces for each piece of this outfit. RTR should fix this!! Also, the material shows sweat very easily. Still, I got both Marcy pieces and LOVED my outfit.

links_Review_Title: Great skirt to throw on for vacation.
links_Review_Text: Wore this with a white crop top on vacation and it was really pretty. The material has a thicker linen feel to it and wrinkles fairly easily so make sure you have access to an iron when you plan to wear it.

links_Review_Title: A little see -through but very pretty and good length.
links_Review_Text: A little see -through but very pretty and good length.

Cute skirt in an awesomely breathable fabric. Would be great for a vacation or a date. It was a bit sheer, so wore with nude underwear. If you don't want the outline of your legs to be defined as you walk around, then you should pass on this. If I could justify keeping a sheer skirt in my wardrobe, I would have kept it!
I rented the top and matching skirt for a rehearsal dinner. The skirt fit well but the top provided minimal coverage so I could not wear it.
Rented this for something cute to wear around town. Wore with a white tank and gold sandals. Very pretty. An easy way to work some interest into an everyday look.
Maybe in a larger size but the side landed way to high to wear to work

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a summer beach vacation + Wrap skirt - easy to adjust - Linen - wrinkles easily
links_Review_Text: #vacation
This wrap skirt fit very well, looked great and got lots of compliments. Loved the color!

links_Review_Title: Lovely but a bit small for me
links_Review_Text: Nice but for it to wrap correctly it makes it on the tighter side at the waist. Like others said it is adjustable, which is great, but for it to lay correctly I had to tighten it more than I would have liked.
Great fit and look!

links_Review_Title: Cute skirt, but arrived very wrinkled. The linen is tough to wear.
links_Review_Text: The fit was fine, but the hem was a little awkward and the wrinkles were very distracting.
Looks more coral than orange as it appears on site but beautiful skirt!
So bold, fun, sassy & super comfortable.

It's linen so it wrinkles...I took it on a trip and it didn't travel well folded in the bag. I'm a low maintenance kind of person so this didn't work for me. It's very high waisted as well, but loved the idea.
It's beautiful and comfortable, eye-catching but easy to wear. Loved the way it moved!

I liked this for day time fun. Love the color, just felt the wrap could have been more secure - even though you could tighten it, the ties would ride up and down your lower back. I wore a black cami with it and had lovely compliments. Note you can see through the skirt if you tuck in a top. Sexy and sweet though.
This piece was a beautiful deep red/orange in person! It was super easy to dress up/down on vacation and I got tons of compliments.
I could find the right top to pair this with but thought a dark bodysuit would be great. I wore it as a swim cover up at the beach. Its a wrap skirt so fits all sizes. Adjustable and comfy.

links_Review_Title: Tall girls size up or rent the tall version
links_Review_Text: These pants were a bit short on me, even for wearing with flats or sneakers. They were a snug, too , so I might just try going up a size.

links_Review_Title: One of my favorite items from RTR!
links_Review_Text: The fabric was stunning! The print was amazing! I wish I had a reason to wear these more! They were a bit snug in the waist but not to the point of being uncomfortable. I'm not sure if sizing up would have fit so I decided to stick with what I had. Didn't disappoint!
But they made my legs look so long (when really they are not)! They were a bit long even with heels
I love these pants. So cute so comfy I even flew in them. They fit perfectly.

I saw these at my local Neiman store and added them to my hearts. These are shorter than the pants I tried on in store, but the length still works ok. Very high waisted. I would say most people will need to go up a size in these. I wore the pants spanx underneath for coverage.
I ordered the two and immediately broke the button. Super uncomfortable. Pick the bigger size if you're in between. Wish I couldve worn.
Nice fit - I have a middle-aged apple figure and the 14 worked. Perfect length for flats on me. Pretty print. Not wild about the synthetic fabric.

links_Review_Title: Runs on the smaller side but great movement and print
links_Review_Text: I am usually between a 2 and 4 and was busting out of the 2 at the waist on this one. I would rent again in a size four/if you are on the edge, size up. I'm 5'7ish and this was not skimming the floor at any point with flats on, so I personally wouldn't wear with heels. If I rented in the proper size (4) I think it would have been a great length, and I might have even been able to wear a little heel.

Loved wearing these paired with white. Very fitted with a bit of stretch, the pants hugged my midsection and rear then flare out with flare to combine professional and feminine to wear with confidence. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Unlined, no pockets, SUPER high rise
links_Review_Text: The only thing that saved these pants was that I had an old dance Leo to wear under them. They're unlined and have no pockets so there's nothing to hold you in. They have like a 13" rise but like a 32" inseam. Idk who these are made for... I wore them to work and they were fine but not great. Very whatever.

links_Review_Title: These are cute but get a size up!
links_Review_Text: Love the pattern, love the wide legs, just wish I would have sized up one.

I wore these pants to two sets of day-to-evening events: the first was a casual networking event, and the second was a birthday party. These pants got a lot of compliments, and they're easy to dress up or down, depending on the look you'd like. My criticism, however, is that the high waist is a SUPER-high waist; it sat way above my belly button. The pants are also quite long, so you'll need a decent-sized heel if you're anywhere under 5'6". (For reference, I'm 5'4".)
Cute, easy to wear, comfortable. Easy to pair with solid colored tops. Liked the colors.
Didn't even wear. They were unlined and felt like you might see through them if the sun caught them right. Super disappointing
Love the print of these pants but the rise of this crotch made it camel toe city. Right back in the bag it goes.
Super high waist- I'm religiously a 6 and thought the 8 was good but definitely not giving me any extra space. Length was good for flats, would have been awkward in heels.
Liked the high waisted fit, pants were light weight. Great to wear on a hot day
The fit is spot-on and the colors are wonderful. These pants are made of crepe and flow beautifully. I might eventually buy these!
These pants are so flattering and you will definitely get compliments. I wore a white top tucked in with white low heels and felt so confident. I can't wait to wear this again!
Unwearable due to being completely sheer.
Too small
Too short for someone who is 6'
Love these flowy pants and the pattern. Wore with a simple white tank. They are very long so had to wear with platform sandals which made my legs look super long.
The fit was odd and uncomfortable for these pants. Extraordinarily high waisted and the length was shorter than expected. Not the best look.
If petite, need high heels due to length/or hem if you purchase
These pants have no lining and very see-through materiel. I can't wear them for work or even weekend play. Disappointed the notes didn't include this information!
pants are high-waisted and very narrow up top. I could not wear.
The print is super pretty, sites high and tight on hips, wore Spanx underneath and felt great. Very lightweight and flowy. Right length for 5'9" with flats, could not wear heels.
Fits like a dream, doesn't wrinkle easily.... I love these pants.
Very small in waste/ hips,

links_Review_Title: The detailing on this dress was beautiful and it stood out at the casino night that I was at.
links_Review_Text: This dress was absolutely beautiful in person. The beading is amazing and looks fantastic. My only qualm is that it definitely runs small. It was also difficult to wear a bra with it because it was relatively tight. I had to buy stickies for the actual event. I would definitely rent this dress again.

I'm a size 14 in jeans and the XL was just too tight. I was pulling at it all night, very uncomfortable and ended up changing out of it halfway through the night. Beautiful dress but in reality, it wasn't for me.

links_Review_Title: I absolutely love this dress! I received so many compliments. It looked amazing on.
links_Review_Text: It was perfect! It fit like a glove. It looked exactly like the picture.

I rented this for a special date night to see Moulin Rouge on Broadway in Feb. it was perfect! I felt sexy and still stayed warm despite the cold temperatures! The dress does run small so if in doubt, go up a size.
Runs small. Ordered XS and Small for back up. I wore the Small and it still felt like it just fit. Beautiful dress and lots of comments and compliments on it!!

I rented this for my husband's surprise 30th (the "end of his roaring 20s") birthday party, and I could not love this dress more! It is a stunner-not only was perfectly on point with the Great Gatsby theme to the celebration, but also it is just a beautiful dress in its own right--comfortable and classy, with a hint of sexy with that killer back! I have every intention of renting this dress again when the appropriate festive opportunity presents itself!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a Vegas themed Gala!!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. You need to wear a sticky bra/no bra, as it scoops low in the back! Got tons of compliments and the pattern is very forgiving if you are self-conscious about your mid section! Love it!
I wore this for my company party and it was the perfect dress for the evening. It fit nicely, was super comfortable, and I got compliments all night. If it wasn't so memorable, I'd rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Love! Didn't want to give it back
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! I'm almost 5'8" and Drew's was short but didn't love all night. Was a little big on arms and on top but I tend to run small on top. Usually a size 8 or 10 in dresses

links_Review_Title: I wore this to an Egyptian-themed gala and felt like a goddess!
links_Review_Text: The dress was a tad short for me, but I absolutely loved it. Was a perfect design for the theme, and had lots of stretch so felt comfortable. I styled it with a nude heel, but I liked how it looked with black hose, as well. Got great comments on it all night and felt beautiful!

links_Review_Title: Rock n roll dress for the grammy's
links_Review_Text: Wore this to the Grammys. Fit great and wasn't too short (didn't have to pull it down at all) Got a lot of compliments. I did wear one of those sticky bra thing but probably didn't need too.

Rented this fun dress for a roaring 20's gala and it was a big hit! Very sparkly and nice thick material holds you in. It was pretty tight for a large (I'm a solid size 10) and it's pretty short and I had to tug down on it most of the night but it was very flattering and fun! I had to pin my bra in the back so I suggest a low bra or none at all. I'd rent again.
Rented this for a sorority date party! It was very tight but still flattering. I got a lot of complements
I wore size medium. This dress was perfect for my friends birthday in -15 degree weather. Dress is thick and didn't have to wear a bra which was great with the backless dress. I'm 5'6 and 150 lbs

This dress is perfect! I'm 5' 10" so it's hard finding a dress that fits me without showing my lady parts. The way the dress is made, I didn't even have to wear a bra! Which was perfect because of the back. I received so many compliments on this dress, it's a must!

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress to a Holiday party 20s themes & LOVED it! Received so many compliments on it.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly. Amazing detail and absolutely stunning. No complaints about this dress at all. It’s a gem!

I wore this dress for my work Holiday party and it was a huge hit! It was a pretty formal event and this dress was perfect. It definitely fit TTS & like a glove. Very comfortable, thick & warm. You couldn't even feel the sequins which was a major plus. I was nervous it would be too tight but it was absolutely perfect! I am now obsessed with RTR. #formal #partydress

This dress fit a bit snug but was pretty comfortable. Did not ride up at al which was nice. The back came up enough that I could still wear shape wear under it. It's also lined enough that you don't have to wear a bra too which is also nice.

Perfect look for a NYE wedding! The sequin detail on this dress is beautiful quality. This dress has an open back, so I used a backless sticky bra. I wear a size 2/4 in dresses & found the small to be very tight, esp in the arms which is strange for me - so be aware there is no stretch to the dress because of the beading. I found the medium to be more comfortable. It is short but not too short if your tall like me 5'8". The dress does ride up when dancing or walking but not really an issue.

i took a risk and rented this for NYE even though there was only one size available. thankfully, it fit like a glove! i'm relatively small-chested and wide-hipped, and i almost never wear anything this form fitting, so i wasn't sure if this dress would fit well on both top and bottom, but it was perfect. it definitely could have accommodated more volume on top, but even without wearing a bra it wasn't baggy around my chest. the sleeves have elastic at the bottom to help keep them in place and the dress is well lined so there was no itching on the inside from all the sequins on the outside. i definitely recommend this dress for any time you want a little extra sparkle.
Beautiful dress, thick material. I would say if you are in between a medium and large just size down. Just had extra material and felt like a medium would have been more form fitting
Arrived early and got perfectly. I got so many compliments and was so comfortable in it all night!

It wasn’t flattering on me but my sister loved it. The fabric is really stretchy so it will fit different body types My sister is 5’7” and wears a size 8 in dresses and pants. Size medium shirts. The dress was the XL.
Great snug fit. Backless bra if you want to use one.

links_Review_Title: This dress was stunning, comfortable, and fit just right. Perfect for NYE party!
links_Review_Text: The dress was gorgeous, fit a little snug on me but I also gained a few lbs over the holidays with all the eating so I suspect it would have fit true to size had I stayed my normal weight (5'7", 128lbs). Either way, it being tight made it look even better. I loved it. It's short for sure, but I hoped it would be. I wore it for my NYE roaring 20's party and everyone loved it. Didn't have to wear a bra. It had a little bit of stretch to it, but not much. Overall, I absolutely loved it!!

I wore this for NYE and I absolutely love it! I want to own it but can't find it anywhere so I'll def rent again. So many compliments and my boyfriend was obsessed. It's so comfortable and hits al the right places! Love!!
This was perfect! Very stretchy and comfy for a 6 month baby bump!
Beautiful details on the dress and loved the long sleeves. The fit was perfect and the material was very comfortable and you could tell it was well made.

links_Review_Title: Got a ton of compliments on this dress. Was overall comfortable and fit as expected/ slightly small
links_Review_Text: Was perfect for a holiday glitzy party! Only complaint was that the sleeves kept coming off my shoulders exposing my bra straps. Fit was comfortable. Would recommend!
Can't say enough about this dress! Very comfortable, stretchy material, and photographed so well! I received so many compliments all night.
This dress is gorgeous! Wore it to my company Christmas party and got so many compliments. The fit was perfect for me, and it was really comfortable.
So many compliments on this all night. Perfect holiday party dress.
Easy to wear dress. A little short for my taste, but surprisingly super comfortable and you will definitely stand out!

I wore this dress to our company's holiday party and I got SOO many compliments. I'm a curvy size 10 and I rented the Large. The sleeves were a little snug but once I was in I didn't fuss with it all night. The body of the dress was also snug and nothing short of form fitting but the fabric had enough give to comfortably sit and walk. The low back was the perfect accent to the dress and also key to its comfort. I felt curvy, snatched and like a rockstar all night! Definitely recommend!!

links_Review_Title: I will never buy another dress again. RTR is the way to go. Love love love.
links_Review_Text: The dress was stunning. I received so many compliments. I'm 5'11" usually a medium but I wore a large. The only thing is I wish RTR has a tall shop.

I absolutely loved this dress! At first I was a little nervous about the fit - it is more form fitting than I expected (I'm a size 8, M and wore a Large in this) but I ended up loving it! It is completely full coverage so you can wear it without a bra and is stretchy so it fits like a glove - it was perfect for dancing, and the sleeves were warm enough for walking outside without freezing. The length is short but not mini. One of the more comfortable dresses I have worn for a full night out!

This was my birthday dress and it made me feel exceptional! It's very fitted in all of the right places ladies!! I would definitely recommend to anyone who loves glitz and glam!! It made my birthday one to remember!!
Wore this for a holiday party and felt like a million!!
This was my first time using RTR and didn't disappoint! The dress was perfect for a Christmas party I attended.
The dress was great, fit was a little snug for a XL but had good stretch. Not exactly gold but worked for the black & gold party I attended.

Love this pink color- it's perfect for spring. Keep in mind however the lace part of the bodice has no lining under it so a camisole may be necessary. I did find the shoulders of the dress a bit tight but overall thought the fit was ok . The fabric is breathable and comfortable to wear for a long day.

links_Review_Title: Love the design, fit and gorgeous color
links_Review_Text: The dress was fitted on the bust, giving a nice shape to it. I loved the embroidered mesh detail and pockets - the dress was effortlessly feminine and stylish. I wore it to a a casual business dinner as well as a family lunch. Looked nice with flats or heels. Lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Perfect amount of Sugar and Spice
links_Review_Text: I got this dress for my Aunt's surprise 70th Birthday party and I got so many compliments! The color and lace detail are so French and feminine but the length made it sexy. Definitely one of my faves.

links_Review_Title: I needed a dress to wear to Rosé Mansion in NYC and this was it!
links_Review_Text: I was worried how high the skirt would be since I have a long torso, but it was perfect! I did read reviews on how the floral bib part is sheer so I wore a nude tank top underneath. It looked fine in photos but close-up, you could see the outline of the tank top which bothered me. Other than that, I really liked the dress! I did get compliments on how well it matched the decor of the museum. Also, be aware that the material is like scuba fabric (or like neoprene). It was thicker and warmer than I thought it would be which is great for fall but it happened to be very warm in NYC that day.

Couldn't tell from the photo but the lace chest is totally see through so this is impossible to wear a bra under - boob tape might work, but even nipple coverups are visible, so if you like lots of cleavage and highbeams, go for it. Otherwise I would try to wear a nude camisole underneath it however I would need to go a size up for that. I am only a 34A and the material is stretchy but it was still snug in the chest.

It was a very cute and chic dress for a Mother's Day brunch. The color is super neutral and goes with lots of accessories , the cut might be an issue for smaller girls who have bigger breasts. I wear size 4 but I'm a DD cup so the fit around the chest is usually a concern. Overall I recommend this dress for any somewhat formal affair!!!!
I rented this and wore it to work. Like other reviews, the insert is very sheer so I wore a cami underneath. I loved this dress and received many compliments!

This dress was amazing! I did not wear a bra and did not have issues with the panel in the middle being sheer or too revealing. The fabric has some stretch and is a good weight for early spring. The fit was great on my hourglass figure. Best surprise was finding out the dress had pockets!!!!!!! Highly considering purchasing this dress!
Snug up top and around waist / bottom portion of skirt too much material. It was "ok" could have worked for my work event (with some sort of nipple coverage), but I have time so aiming higher.

When I got this dress, I didn't think I'd like it... I wore it anyway and realize just how cute it really is! The color can be tough to pull off. And the breast detail is completely sheer, but a nude camisole fixes that!
I LOVED this dress, it's girly and sexy at the same time. It's true to size and has some stretch.
This is so cute! It is a little tight on the top, but I could make it work. Lots of compliments.
Beautiful detail on this dress. Front is sheer so I work a cami underneath and it was perfect!

links_Review_Title: This dress was super cute and fun!!!
links_Review_Text: Would love to own this one!!

links_Review_Title: I rented this for work but the front was completely see through. Could not wear at all!
links_Review_Text: Con - innapropriate for most events.
Loved this dress for "candid" Work photos for our law firm! Ended up keeping it for a bit to wear it again before returning! If I could afford it, I would buy this 100%. Love love love!!!

The lace material is see-through so you'll need to wear an undershirt unless you don't mind your bra showing. The dress runs large so size down. The dress has pockets and was comfortable. It's more of a tan/pink color.
As others have noted, the panel on the front is sheer, so I did end up wearing a nude cami underneath. I wore this to a conference and it was comfortable and looked put-together. Would rent again.
This dress was a perfect fit! love the lace detail. Wore it to an outside wedding and paired it with boots, got so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: More beige than pic - washes me out
links_Review_Text: Fit is perfect and style and shape is super cute. Color very light beige and washed me out so bad I couldn't wear it. Lace is see through as other reviews mention. Too bad because dress is so cute, perfect fit. I usually wear size 2

links_Review_Title: Flirty Dress for a Work Event, But Tight Arms
links_Review_Text: The dress is a little tight in the chest and arms. That made it a bit tough to get off. Its got a fairly forgiving middle, which is great for a new mom. I wore this to work and got a good amount of complements. I wouldn't wear this in formal work environment because of this shear front.

Rented this dress for work and it was great. I loved the long sleeves to protect me from the blasting AC in the office. Length hit me right above the knees. Only thing is the front mesh area is see through so if you wear a bra that is not nude you will be able to see it. Otherwise, super cute and fun.

links_Review_Title: Perfect look. classy and beautiful without being the center of attention!
links_Review_Text: Sleeves were short on me but it didn't look like the dress didn't fit. For me, i am flat chested and wasn't bothered by the mesh in the middle. It was very unnoticeable that it was see-through. Perfect for a bridal shower. Very classy and not too short!

links_Review_Title: Very tight in the chest - sheer lace on the front!
links_Review_Text: Make sure you wear a flesh colored cami under this! I ordered my usual size - I don't think of myself as being particularly busty but the chest on this dress was *extraordinarily* tight. It fit fine everywhere else though. Very cute dress - although the fabric seems a bit cheap.

I wore this for Easter lunch and it was perfect. As some people mentioned, the shoulders and arms are a little tight but I was able to adjust my undergarments to make it comfortable. If you are bigger than a C cup, this is not the dress for you. I love the fact that the lace was a little see-through, making it a bit less buttoned up but still modest. The color was very wearable.

links_Review_Title: Runs small and the front is mesh - so you need to wear something under the dress
links_Review_Text: Really cute, but probably not for work
Love this dress. So flattering, I felt so pretty in it. May buy it!

The dress fit me perfectly. I was surprised, but happy to see it had pockets. The lace detail is beautiful. However, as others have mentioned, it is sheer. I was comfortable with that, so I wore a white camisole under it. The lace hit too close my neckline and has no stretch, so although I loved the look of this dress, I didn't find it comfortable. I hate anything touching close to my neck though.
So many compliments. Loved everything about this dress!
Not for me

links_Review_Title: With a nude cami underneath, super cute.
links_Review_Text: The lace part is completely open so once I put a cami under it was totally fine for work. Very comfortable but the color kinda washed me out a little. (I have fair skin, light eyes and blonde hair.) Might look better if you have a little bit of a tan or darker hair to contrast with the color.

links_Review_Title: I didn't wear it as it felt snug
links_Review_Text: Was tight in the chest.
Adorable dress!! Can be worn anytime of the year! Great versatile piece!
Had to wear a cami over bra, but fantastic!
This was a very high quality piece. The mesh is see through, but a skin toned tank top works perfectly underneath.
Runs large but still sexy and classic

links_Review_Title: Too tight I'm busy and arms
links_Review_Text: This just fit in such an unflattering way. Super tight busy and arms. And I'm a 34a!
Looked great with booties and a jean jacket
Dress is both sexy and charming. Great material for fall & winter. Absolutely loved, worth buying!!

links_Review_Title: This was not weareable because of how low cut the front is.
links_Review_Text: Otherwise cute cut.
Big big fan. I do makes a beautiful dress. Lovely neck detailing and pockets. Would rent again.
Minus one star for the top of the dress being slightly see through and the pockets - they made it lay a little weird on my hips

Rent this dress immediately - such an easy style for an effortless, polished look. Runs true to size but is long - I don't recommend for the shorter gals. Even with the open back, this is bra friendly. Highly recommend.
Was a bit large so the fit wasn't entirely ideal but the dress was comfortable and the open back with the tie was a necessary detail (otherwise it would be Little House on the Prairie).

The sleeves were a nice length if you have long arms. Definitely too long for petite women. I was able to wear a bra even with the cut out in the back. Very cute with a leather jacket and boots. Would rent again!
I got wrong size
It fit true to size. It did make my hips look a little wide since the pockets kind of stuck out a little. Overall fun dress felt fancy and cute wearing this to work.
Perfect fit, flattering length and the most delicate cami straps.
Such a beautiful dress, color and everything. Not my favorite, but only because it didn't do much for my boobs. Little tight on the butt area but fine everywhere else.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit very snug around the stomach and chest but moves well enough to dance in. I found the straps to be too long so keep safety pins on hand!

links_Review_Title: The vibrant and beautiful colors made me feel fantastic in my dress!
links_Review_Text: This fit perfect except it was a bit tight by my shoulder area, so I did end up needing some assistance with the zipper. Otherwise the dress material was comfortable and fit like a glove.

links_Review_Title: This dress was really nice for a beach wedding.
links_Review_Text: I loved the print and it was perfect for a guest wedding dress on the beach. I did feel that it was alittle too tight. I did better standing up than sitting down! I am busty and do have a booty so it would of worked out better if the material had some stretch to it. This dress may be better for someone who is pretty thin. I also did not wear a bra. I did get a TON of compliments on this dress tho ;)

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this dress
links_Review_Text: This dress was a hit at a summer wedding. the floral design and colors really stood out. This brand tends to run small, I'm normally an 8 but wore the 10. Overall, worth the rent.

Beautiful print and nice shape, but this dress managed to put emphasis on my mid section even with spanx on. My panza + the cinching + the color... just did not work. Sleeves were super long, had I worn it I would've tucked them in. Ended up going with the "Rowan" by Reformation.
Loved this whimsical dress! The colors and details were beautiful. The material has no give though so if it's fits right it's pretty snug. Overall, comfortable to wear and dance in all night long

Loved the colors of this dress! I'm 5'2"/154lbs/34ddd. The 10 fit perfect. I did not wear a bra, it was double lined in chest so it worked fine. As others commented, the straps are way too long! I added a couple stitches to pull them tighter and that worked. I loved the look and fit of this dress. Wish I owned it!

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Very pretty and comfortable
links_Review_Text: Wore to an outdoor wedding. It was very comfortable. I was able to dance and run around with my 3year old without any issues. Received many compliments

links_Review_Title: People Kept Telling Me to Buy This Dress
links_Review_Text: Love love love this dress! It was flattering, comfortable, and so pretty. I danced all night long and never had any problems! This was also an out of town suitcase and had to be folded and put in a carry on and there weren't any wrinkles! 10/10
Gorgeous dress for a Newport, RI wedding in early September. The fit was great, and I received a ton of compliments all night. Such a comfortable dress too! Would definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Bright, beautiful print and flattering cut
links_Review_Text: I rented this for my bridal shower and LOVED IT! The colors are even brighter and more beautiful in person and I found the cut with the square top, draping and slit to be super flattering. I have wide hips and a small chest, so it was a little tight in the hips and loose in the chest but still totally wearable. If you're between sizes and have curvy hips, I recommend sizing up.

Such a gorgeous pattern and colors.. very flattering with the muted long ruffle but yet high slit. So many complements!! This dress was super comfortable other than if you are large in the bust, it may construct you. Straps are thin as well so it may leave marks on your shoulders if you are big busted as well. I highly recommend it though.

links_Review_Title: How great I felt in the dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress is perfect for a summer wedding!

links_Review_Title: I love renting dresses for special occasions.
links_Review_Text: Dress fit perfectly. I always order a size up just in case but my normal size 12 fit great.

This dress was stunning! I wore it for an August wedding and it was about 95 degrees outside. The dress was lightweight, and stood out amongst all the other wedding guests. I received compliments on this dress all evening. The only con was that that the straps were a little big, if I didn't hold my shoulders back, they would slide off. I also had a little of extra room in the waist and could have probably worn the 8R.

The colors of this dress are so beautiful, it was perfect for a summer wedding! I got compliments all night long and it was so comfortable to dance in. The ruffle was super flattering and the slit gave it a sexy and flowy touch!
Loved this dress! If you have a bigger bum or legs you may want to consider sizing up!

links_Review_Title: Love the colors and scrunch and flow of the dress
links_Review_Text: Got so many compliments in this dress. The cut was great and fit in all the right places. Only complaint would be the straps were a bit long.
A con is that the straps are pretty long and fall down if you get a little too groovy on the dance floor. Overall the dress was perfect for a summer wedding and the colors are so vibrant and fun

I can typically fit a dress size of 2-6. I was worried about the midsection fitting due to the reviews that said the waist accentuated a chubby midsection as i have more of my weight as love handles. However, the dress fit very well, it wasn't too big or too tight. The color was bright, although it was very hard for my boyfriend to find complementary suit and tie. We decided to add some red and complement the dress that way. The only real downfall to this dress was the unadjustable straps that frequently fell off my shoulder. Otherwise, it was quite comfortable for dancing, walking and really anything else. Being only 5'2" the longer length was fine with my height.
True to size and very comfortable for summer outdoor wedding.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Wedding for my Beautiful friend
links_Review_Text: I love this dress- it was actually my back up dress, and I am so glad I got it. I wish I owned it. It's comfortable, unique and beautiful. The blue and yellow look so great together. The yellow is more of a mustard and really stands out next to the blue. It was also perfect for the occasion, an outdoor wedding at sunset. I did have to pin the straps, I am very short and short waisted. I am pictured with my friend who also got a dress from RtR. I highly recommend this dress!
One of my favorite rentals so far! A sliming fit that was so comfortable to move in and the colors were fabulous! True to size and a great length.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a summer wedding! Lightweight material, classy but flattering
links_Review_Text: LOVED this dress & got so many compliments all night long! The material is lightweight and super comfortable, even for a 100 degree outside wedding. I sized up from my usual size, which is a good idea for anyone who doesn't want the dress to be too tight fitting or revealing. One thing that other reviewers noted too- the straps are very long and not adjustable, so this might be something to keep in mind if you're in the shorter side.

This dress runs just a little bit small, but the cut is BEAUTIFUL and it's super comfortable. I usually wear an 8 but decided to size up to the 10 because I have a bigger bust and wanted to be comfortable and covered. I wore it to a friend's wedding and it felt appropriate but still sexy (the ruffle and slit make this dress). It's honestly perfect for a summer outdoor event that's slightly dressy and I'm already thinking about renting it again.

I loved this dress! So vibrant and fun. It does run small, so I needed to size up. The chest area is a little big, but a well-padded bra helps that. The straps aren't adjustable and fell off my shoulders most of the night.

links_Review_Title: The dress fit true to size
links_Review_Text: I'm 5.4 around 135 lb, I'm usually between a 4 and 6. The 4 was a little snug so I went with the 6 and it fit great. The straps were a little loose but I wore a strapless bra which helped. I received many compliments, the color and style was perfect for a summer wedding.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and flattering fit for a summer wedding
links_Review_Text: LOVED this dress for a summer wedding I attended. Light enough to not be too hot outside, but the fabric is thick enough to be sturdy and form-fitting/not squeezing. The spaghetti straps were a little long but I also have a smaller chest. Length was perfect, slit was perfect. Would definitely recommend.
Loved it! 4 & 6 fit the same but the 6 straps were too long. The slit was higher than expected. Easy to move in! Fun dress.
Loved it! Straps didn't stay up super well so I ended up tucking them in and wearing it strapless

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for a summer wedding.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress and received many compliments on it! It fit true to size. The top cut is a bit low so going braless did not work but a strapless bra worked great underneath. I would recommend this dress to anyone going to an outdoor summer event/wedding!

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: The dress overall fit great and was true to size. The straps were a little too long for me, and would fall down occasionally throughout the night, but I got a lot of compliments and would definitely recommend!

This dress was such a fun print and color I knew it would be perfect for a summer wedding in San Diego. It was super comfortable and I got lots of compliments. I wore the 2 to have some breathing room but I usually wear a 0. It worked out great for extra gnocchi. Loved the fabric. Would wear again!
