Loved the dress and the design. I felt as though the straps slid off my shoulders quite often, but other than that, the dress was true to size.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments! A beautiful option for a summer wedding.
links_Review_Text: The straps are a bit long, but it is supposed to be a low hanging fit. For someone with a longer chest bone, like me, it took a little to get used to! This is not the typical neckline I would wear. The 8R fit well, and I'm normally a 6R or 8R so size up! Can do with many different shoes and accessories.

I've never felt this confident in a dress before. This fit me so perfectly that I'm considering purchasing the dress to own. It suited my body so well and I was shocked as to how much positive feedback it got. I will for sure rent this again in the near future.

links_Review_Title: Fit nicely, wonderful fabric, danced all night!
links_Review_Text: Zip with hook&eye (hate when dresses don’t have that), the ruffle across the body was beautiful and flattering, loved the colors, everything about this dress was AMAZING. Highly reccomend!
I have a smaller upper body and larger lower body, but at 150 and a 34c it fit beautifully! Not much stretch in fabric. And straps were a little long. Everything else was perfect

LBD but with unique texture, movement and flirt. Wore this with a little belt and received so many compliments. The sleeves are elastic on the wrists which make reaching across tables easy. Really cute dress!

It definitely runs true to size! I usually wear an XL but ordered the XXL since it was all that was available and it was a little loose in the top but other than that it was perfect for my friends wedding!! I got sooo many compliments! I would definitely rent again!

I rented this dress for a friend's birthday party. While the dress fit me well, I believe it runs small as I had to size up (XL versus my usual M or L). It's definitely on the shorter side, but worked well with black tights and booties. I reviewed lots of compliments and would definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: I love never wearing the same thing twice.
links_Review_Text: The long sleeves make wearing a mini dress more acceptable in many situations because it really classes it up. Very versatile, nice fabric and comfortable! Rent this.
So flattering and cute!
Super feminine and sexy, yet very understated. The detail and fit were fantastic

This dress is sheer, and the half slip lining is also sheer. Um?! The whole thing ran small and awkward ... too much room in the bust no room everywhere else... very short... unwearable for work but also anything else.
It was such a cute dress and really comfortable for homecoming. It was a little short, but I'm 5'8" so that's might why. overall a good rent!!
The dress seems to run true to size but I should have ordered a smaller size, it was bigger in my waist and arms area. The dress is really cute and perfect for a wedding and is super flattering.

This dress fits like a dream. It's so comfortable and easy to wear yet has a cool sex appeal. The puffy sleeves tighten and gather at the wrist then flare again. There's so much attention to detail in the fitted drop waist with flouncy pleating. I sized to XL for my bust and it extremely Necessary. Since sizing up it didn't fit snug in waist/hips but I threw on a nude belt to pull it in. Seriously such a fun dress. Highly recommend. XL fits like a size 10 #Event #LBD #Detail #LongSleeveMini

I wore this dress to a trip to San Diego- the long sleeves were perfect for a slightly chilly evening! The dress runs short (I'm 5'4"), so definitely keep in to consideration but it fit nicely since I'm so busty and have a good figure!

links_Review_Title: It was a nice black dress
links_Review_Text: Glossy dress that is a classy look.
I was really sad this didn't fit. It was so cute and would have been perfect for my work event, although it was really short. It definitely runs small.
the sleeves are a bit long for my taste.
Loved the flare on the skirt of this dress. Even though my husband told me it wasn't, it felt a bit sheer to me so I wore black dance shorts underneath.
I got a few compliments but I could have used a size small. It was pretty big on me.
Runs large - size prediction recommended I order a medium so i went with it. (Normally a size 4) Would not recommend for petite girls.

links_Review_Title: Fun, pretty dress for cocktail party
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. I’m 5”6’ and 130 pounds The medium was a little big but still looked good. The extra small fit but was too short so I couldn’t wear it . The small wasn’t available but it would have been perfect .

This dress was so fun and flirty while still being work appropriate. This dress is actually made with a linen material so it's super breathable while looking expensive. I got so many compliments! Definitely will be renting this item again!
Very comfortable versatile fabric

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress! Had the best night of my life in this dress!
links_Review_Text: Perfect!
It's very sheer through the bottom half. Definitely wear shorts underneath!

links_Review_Title: Too short with transparency in the skirt, couldn't wear it.
links_Review_Text: Too short with transparency in the skirt so I couldn't wear it

I usually wear a large, but seeing the reviews saw that this dress ran small, so ordered the XL. I am short, but this dress was so short that it did not even fully cover my bottom, even if I stood still and there was no breeze!

Ordered for work when I wanted to be comfortable and not be constricted to pants or pencil skirt but unfortunately even though it fit well around arms and torso it was too short to risk wearing to the office. If I bent over my butt came out and even standing straight up you could see too much upper thigh. It could still be a cute dress for a date or some other occasion it's just too hot to wear long sleeves yet so I didn't end up wearing this before returning.
This dress is so cute for work. My office is freezing so I love that this is long sleeves. It's super light for summer, and really comfortable. Will be renting this again for sure!

links_Review_Title: Great dress but watch out for the bust button!!
links_Review_Text: Lovely, comfortable, easy dress. I wore this dress twice - at a ladies luncheon & a work event in HI. The only draw back is the button that keeps the front of the dress closed and your bust covered regularly popped open. Awkward!
The elasticized waist fit tight, and then the fabric above and below the elastic kind of poofed out. Not cute for my hourglass shape. Perhaps better for someone without a defined waist?

links_Review_Title: Rented as wedding coordinator for rehearsal dinner, mostly fit but a bit large in the bust.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! It was flowy, forgiving, and fit well. The only part that ran large was the bust area. I didn't need to wear a cami but tried to ensure nothing was exposed during the evening. I didn't feel uncomfortable, though. I wore this as a wedding coordinator at our church for the rehearsal and it worked so well for the event.
Sorry the only photo I have is from a social media photoshoot! This dress is comfortable and so elegant for work! I transitioned it to a cocktail event after and it was perfect.

I am an 8 in dresses and I had to wear the Large. It was tight in the hips on the Med. I am a 34DD and the large top fit good big if I moved a certain way the snap opened. So something to think about if you are large chested.

Small fit perfectly with the elastic waist - I'm usually a 4/6. There's a snap button on the chest which was fine for me, but could probably be risky if you're bigger on top. Wore it to a bridal shower and then again to work! Very comfortable.
So much better In person, silky feel fabric , but not wrinkles!!! Fits great! Can be dress up or down, photo is end of the long work day... so not that great

This is a versatile dress. It feels more fancy than your usual work attire. The dress runs a touch small, but the gathered waist gives you some breathing room. The snap at the bust kept coming undone and revealed quite a bit. The only weird part are the ties that go to the back. I'm just not sure why they're there.

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately, I never got to wear this dress.
links_Review_Text: Unfortunately, I never got to wear this dress. When I received it, it SMELLED HORRIBLY like B.O! Either it was shipped without being cleaned, OR the person who had it last smelled so badly that it did not come out after being cleaned.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful material, but too much dress for my petite frame
links_Review_Text: A very comfortable dress and I loved the waistline, but it was overall too loose for my petite frame.
Lots of comments. Waist is accentuated. Loved & will wear again.
Great material. Lightweight, yet not too lightweight. Really comfy to wear to an outside party on a hot day. Loved the flow and fit of the dress.
Really cute, feminine, good for petites. Felt really pretty in this. Paired it with a leather jacket for fall date night.
Fits true to size. Love it

links_Review_Title: easy to wear and be fabulous
links_Review_Text: loved the fit, loved the color - easy to wear, will def rent again
I did not wear this but for someone tall with a narrow waist and straight hips it would be gorgeous. It was not flattering on me.

links_Review_Title: Super cute dress - can be worn dressed up or down.
links_Review_Text: Great dress!

links_Review_Title: Easy date dress. My husband liked it!
links_Review_Text: like others have mentioned. it is nicer in person. the material is nice and the cut is very flattering

links_Review_Title: One of my all-time favorite dresses
links_Review_Text: This dress is perfect. So comfortable, flattering, feminine! I've worn it to work with a leather bomber jacket and on a date with heels. I plan to wear it for a rehearsal dinner, too. LOVE this dress!!

links_Review_Title: Flattering, great for all heights, comfortable
links_Review_Text: Pretty blue pattern, asymmetrical hem works for petite or taller ladies, smocked waist was my least favorite part but it wasn't super noticeable on and makes for a comfortable fit. Received multiple compliments!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Flattering, high quality, received compliments. Would rent again.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! Very flattering at the waist, and has a snap on the neckline to keep a little mystery.
True to size and very flattering on. Will rent again.

The silk makes the dress fantastic for hot days. The dress is stretchy around the waist and flowy around the stomach. It's incredibly flattering and comfortable. I wore it multiple days and am tempted to keep it.

I wore this dress to a wine dinner. It has fall-friendly colors but is a summer weight, which works out well in Houston where we are still in the 90's everyday. The elastic waist makes it very comfortable. The style is flattering and would be good to dance in.

links_Review_Title: Great to dress up or down
links_Review_Text: I got this dress to wear to work, but also ended up giving it an extra wear for a friend's birthday party. It was super cute, has a nice shape to it, and complemented my figure well. My only complaint is minor: if I bent over I was showing the whole world my cleavage which is always dicey. But I received tons of compliments on it and it was the perfect summer dress for both work and play. Definitely recommend!

links_Review_Title: LOVE it! So many compliments and it doesn't wrinkle easily.
links_Review_Text: Rented this for one of the last summery days of September and I got so many compliments on it. It's much more beautiful in person than in the photo.

I normally like Parker but this isn't one of the better ones. The fabric and print are lovely. I could not keep the snap at the bust from showing (I really don't like snaps). The thick elastic at the waist was a little weird too.
This dress is perfect, it's lovely, feminine and also comfortable! Good for work in a casual setting or hanging out. Easy to put a jean jacket over it for a night out.

links_Review_Title: Would have been perfect if the snap worked!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so flattering and fun, but the snap to close it at the neckline would not hold. Bend over to pick something up? Exposed. Cough? Exposed. Brush my hair? Exposed. It didn't feel tight in the chest, but it still could not contain me. Unfortunately, pinning didn't help, and I didn't end up wearing it. Think this would be much better for those with smaller breasts.
Stretch waistband with pretty tie to cover it up. Not too long for us shorter girls with flats. Will rent again.

This dress is a lovely color and the cut is figure flattering. Only drawback is tight at the chest. There is a tiny ineffectual snap to keep you in check and I found my boobs defeated that snap rather handily so had to pin. A little awkward but overall a nice look. Recommend.
If you have any chest at all, the snap doesn't hold and the dress pops open. Had to safety pin while at work.

links_Review_Title: Loved the pattern and color, but the fit just wasnt quite right
links_Review_Text: Firstly, this pattern and the coloring were simply great. But I think this dress was just a little too tight for it to be flattering on me, especially in the chest. I had hoped it would be an eye hook but it was a snap and I just couldnt keep it closed. Wearing the tank top for me, added just another layer which seemed to make this dress look bulky on me.
Comfortable and stylish
It fit fine, just didn't like how low the neckline was, and didn't like the feel of the elastic waist.
Runs super small - At least 2 sizes.
Fit perfectly for work. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: amazing fabric, felt like a million bucks
links_Review_Text: Loved the fabric and the ruffles, it all felt so great, and the skirt that goes to one side was so pretty. I would definitely rent this again and maybe size down to a M.

pictures don't do this dress justice. the pattern, ruffles, slight asymmetrical hem, fabric, make this dress amazing. i'm typically a 2 and the xs fit perfectly thanks to the stretch at the waist. hit around mid calf. highly highly highly recommend. great for travel, too
True to size. Felt great in this dress! Worn it twice.
I liked the color of this top and it fit me ok everywhere except shoulders. The sleeves kept falling down off my shoulders.
Tried it on and it fit well but not really my style so didn't end up wearing it!
Don't fear the yellow, it's sunflower and perfect for fall
Really pretty shirt!! Unique cut and very flattering on the neckline. I love love the color. Can be dressed up or down!

Top is a similar to a crop style. I wore it with high waisted jeans. It didn't ride up bc the middle section is fitted. Sleeves would fall down from time to time. Overall a good fit and a cute top. I went with my regular size.
Fun daytime top to add brightness to any outfit. Traveled in suitcase so I had to iron but overall fun choice
The top was a bit more mustardy looking in person than online but still very cute and fit well.
Bright and fun! True to size.
This was a cute, comfortable, and perfect for vacation. The only downside was the shoulder slipped a little bit. Nothing some dress tape wouldn't fix, though.

links_Review_Title: Cute top but awkward to wear
links_Review_Text: This is a weird large! I am more on the petite side, and probably in small territory lately, but this shirt would've still been more like a medium on someone who normally wears a large. And the color.... I'm sure it looks absolutely gorgeous on those with a bit more melanin than I, but not a good look for myself. I did love the corset silhouette though.
This was so comfy and soooo cute at the same time! I would say if you have a larger chest this might be a little tight. I had a hard time sending this back because I loved it so much :)

links_Review_Title: Love the color and fit of this top!
links_Review_Text: Runs true to size!

The yellow is cheerful and the design is feminine and fun. I wore this with a white skirt and wedges and also with some white jeans. I really liked the top a lot, but the sleeves did keep falling off my shoulders when I was sitting down. I have a short torso, so that is probably why. I think this would be a great piece to add to the wardrobe because it can be worn with just about anything and it gives a cheerful pop of color.

I didn't know yellow was my color until this top. I received so many compliments on it, I never want to send it back! The structure of the bust didn't fit me perfectly but I made it work. Would like lay better on someone with a smaller bust, but not very noticable.
Very cute top, perfect for a date night or dinner with your friends! Pretty and different color and the material is nice
Very flattering on every bodytype
Cutest color, not too obnoxious but fun and bright. Comfortable, great length & very flattering. Lots of compliments

Much prettier in the picture. Didn't really love the color or the fit. One shoulder elastic seemed to already be stretched even though it had tags on it when I received as though it were brand new. I had to pin that shoulder to keep from slipping down. Packed light for a vacation and didn't really have any other options, otherwise wouldn't have worn.

I wore this top w/ black jeans to a dinner w/ girlfriends ( didn't get a photo in it) received tons of compliments on the beautiful color of yellow. Only complaint would be that the right side sleeve kept slipping down off my shoulder. Otherwise it was a great rental.
fit was a bit tight in the chest area.
This top was so comfortable with the light weight material and such a unique color. The only issue I had was the sleeves kept falling down but other than that I really loved it.
One of the best tops I've rented. Ever. I'm a 32B, waist 25 and rented a small. I don't think my waist could have comfortably taken a smaller size. Paired it with high waisted jeans. Love!

I paired this with a Boden pencil skirt for thanksgiving. It is dating, cool, sexy, and flattering. I can think of nothing wrong with this top. The medium was snug around my size 4 rib cage so would definitely recommend sizing up. I don't have much of a chest so this area was baggy for me, but I think anyone with a D or bigger might need to size up even further.

It's like a neoprene material so it was pretty thick and absolutely perfect. The sleeve is so hot this season and this one is a head turner for sure. The only reason I didn't keep it was because the zipper kept cutting into my side. Comfortable everywhere else though and never worried about the sleeve slipping!

This is one of those items I wasn't sure was gonna work but lemme tell you...so worth it. It's the perfect combo of edgy and dramatic without being overbearing. Keep in mind it's a crop top so make sure you rock it with something high waisted if you don't want your whole stomach out. I'm normally a medium (with no boobs) but the L was perfect. Glad I sized up.

links_Review_Title: Great structured sleeve and sexy leopard spots
links_Review_Text: I have DDD Breasts and was squeezing in the large, but it fit! I'm normally a 6/8/10 in tops.

links_Review_Title: Cute top but IMO doesn't photo well
links_Review_Text: Definitely size up if you have a big chest! I'm a 34G and got the XL. It fit nicely. Doesn't photo well IMO but was definitely cute and I rec'd compliments. I was told I look like a RICH BITCH wearing it lmao.
I'm usually an L and had to get an XL for a D cup

links_Review_Title: Never c had the chance to wear. I will re-rent
I used it on four different occasions. Works well for a party or even a fun dinner.
links_Review_Text: Fit very well and looked elegant

This fit very true to size- I'm between a s/m, 4/6 and the medium fit like a glove. Compliments all night (but maybe because it was my birthday, but who cares, I loved it). The material of the top is soft and sturdy, so the puff doesn't "deflate" at any point. I have a long torso, so it definitely showed my belly button, paired with high waisted slacks, it was an all around perfect outfit. I highly recommend!
perfect fit measurements 5'5" 118 lbs 32.5 24.5 35.5

Absolutely pretty Black dress. This is not not first choice but the best available one for my event. Maybe because I had my heart set on my first option already that's why I only have 3 stars. The dress is elegant and fit true to size.
It's true to fit, but since it stretches I felt very comfortable. It was little long for me even when I wore heels.

links_Review_Title: An easy way to eliminate hours of shopping in traditional retail stores for one event!
links_Review_Text: This dress can be worn so many ways-- I tucked the sleeve inside because it was more flattering.

links_Review_Title: I felt like a queen in this dress!
links_Review_Text: The 8L fit great and maybe the 10L was a little more forgiving around the midsection, it didn't want to stay up as well. The great fabric and liner allowed me to feel comfortable in a smaller size. This dress was absolutely amazing!

This dress was lovely. It has stretchy material...very hard to wrinkle, so easy to travel with. I wore it to a ball to benefit the Philadelphia Orchestra, and it was perfect for the affair. It was not flashy or wild, but it fit right in. I got a lot of compliments, both there and afterwards (from photos posted on social media). I was mostly comfortable...it is a column dress, so walking a city block takes a bit haha. It is a form-fitting dress, so just be aware that Spanx or high-waisted control-top nylons may help. Length was perfect for me at 5'5" and in 3.5" heels. Overall, I loved it and would rent again!

links_Review_Title: This dress made me feel super sexy yet elegant!
links_Review_Text: This dress was great! I received a lot of compliments! I think the dress fit true to size and like a glove. I did not need to wear a bra with the dress. The dress was quality material with a long dress liner under it. Would recommend!
I wore this for a work gala and received many compliments. It’s soft and not too tight so very comfortable, it doesn’t fall down even if it’s strapless as the arm band sustains it.

I felt like royalty in this dress! I would rent this again, I should have kept it. It felt great and it looked great. The fabric is quality and thick so it can be a little forgiving. I didn't have to wear spanx. It's a gown so small slow steps are required. The dress wouldn't allow me to walk any other way. The art setup was weird. I somehow got it just right at the store but at home, I could not figure it out so I put it on best I knew how. Despite that, it's still an amazing black gown!

links_Review_Title: Very big in the bust, lots of useless straps, rest of dress fits like a glove
links_Review_Text: I was really disappointed this dress didn't work out. I still gave it four stars because the overall fit of the dress is lovely. It fit like a glove...until the bust/shoulder area. Maybe I'm just not built for off-the-shoulder looks like this, but I seriously would have needed breasts twice the size of what I have to keep that dress up. ,The shoulders would not stay up, and when I leaned over, the girls almost fell out. Even more confusing is all of the straps Black Halo added for hanging the dress up. They weren't useful for keeping the dress on, but yet they didn't tuck away when you put the dress on, either.
Great dress!
What I loved about this dress is that I could eat ALL the bread because it has nice stretch to it.

This was a beautiful dress. I'm 5'11" and ordered the 8L. I felt like it could've been a smidge longer for me, but it was a beautiful, simple, and elegant dress for the gala that I attended. I did receive compliments on how the dress fit on me and the shoulder design made me look even more sophisticated. I'm glad the material was almost like it seemed waterproof as well, easy to wipe things off of it and keep going with the occasion.
This is a beautiful gown. You will feel Like a million bucks when wearing it..

links_Review_Title: You can never go wrong with a classic black dress !
links_Review_Text: This dress fit perfectly. I usually wear a size 6, but with the stretchy material and the right body shaper (lets keep it real) , I was able to fit into the size 4.
perfect fit
Beautiful dress, very thick material . Fit amazing.

This dress runs small - especially in the arms, very awkward fit at the top. I ordered my regular size and a size larger for a backup size......It arrived early, but I was out of town for work and didn't get back until the day before my event and ended up having to rush to buy something else to wear. Very stressful, seeing as this was my stepson's wedding. I wish I wouldn't have been working and could have returned it or picked another dress. Saddest day.....risk you take, I suppose. I will think twice before renting for a big event again.

I had a backup size of the 12R that I would have worn but there was a quality issue with the top material stitching. The 10R was way too tight so I was a little uncomfortable during the night, but it is a very elegant gown. I would definitely get a backup size bigger than your normal size. It is not very forgiving, but I will say the sleeve fit fine and I have bigger arms so I was pleased with that!
Liked the dress. Just too fancy for the event I was attending. A little confusing to get into but I got the hang of the sleeves after 3 tries lol

links_Review_Title: The dress is beautiful but not practical.
links_Review_Text: I have a curvy shape and the dress fit fine, I am smaller up top which may be why I didn’t love the dress. The straps or arms of the dress constantly needed to be adjusted all evening. I received many compliments but didn’t love the dress. It’s perfect if you plan to sit still all evening otherwise prepare to be adjusting with every move. It took a 2nd person to help me figure out the upper half of the dress. I didn’t love it but it served its purpose for the evening.

links_Review_Title: Classic black dress with a twist
links_Review_Text: The neckline on this dress is beautiful and really adds a touch of elegance to it. The dress is slim fitting, but I didn't feel uncomfortable in it. It is a heavier fabric, so it keep me warm (actually a little to hot!) I got tons of compliments all night. My only gripe is one of the arm holes was just a bit to tight for me. I got the most compliments on this dress than any other RTR dress I've had!
The tall is perfect for 5’9”
Great fit, very comfy and stood out. The con is that one of the straps kept popping out
It is comfortable and fits well. I have a long thin body and this was a great dress.
Form-fitting so I was sure to wear spanks underneath.
The neckline is strange and the arm hole is small. The dress was baggy in other places. The fabric seemed cheap and I couldn't wear this to my event

I got this for a party. It was a size too big because that's what was available. I ended up wearing another dress but it was a hard decision! This one was elegant and made me feel stunning. I'd get it again if I had a black tie affair to go to!
I received many compliments on the fit. It was very comfortable and fun to wear. Amazing fit!
Perfect dress fit like a glove. I would buy this dress! So many y compliments, I wore to Hollywood theme party and it was perfect.
I wore this dress to a black tie event. It was forgiving in all the right areas and flattered my figure well. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: I received numerous comments on how much people loved the dress. Would rent again!
links_Review_Text: This beauty fits like a glove and hugs all the right curves. I felt gorgeous in the dress and wish I could purchase it. I wore to a formal military ball and could sit, stand, and dance without any problems.

links_Review_Title: Flattering dress but not for large chests
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'6" and a 32G. This dress was very flattering, and at first seemed to fit well. However, over the course of wearing it, the dress would shift, and the side with the smaller sleeve gaped and showed my bra. I couldn't get it to lay correctly. Shame because the ruching and fabric are really flattering. The fabric is also more of a heavy satiny jersey (but still looks formal) rather than a scuba material.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress, not so amazing sleeves
links_Review_Text: The fit is great; however, the sleeves run a bit too small and were somewhat constricting. Other than that, it's a beautiful dress.

The sleeve on the dress is very small and does not flex at all. I could not get the dress up past my elbow. If you have larger arms, myself I'm a frequent gym goer/cross fitter/weightlifter. I am 5'5/165lbs

links_Review_Title: Soooo cute and flirty but able to wear to work. Non stop compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fits nice and snug on the waste and super flowy. I love it bc I can wear my high boots with it! Works for winter and fall :-)

I love love loved this skirt!!!!! It is parachute type material with a swishy sound and does not breath well. Also you have to wear it high on your waist. It is so beautiful though! I considered buying it and keeping it forever!

This was an unexpected winner. I wasn't sure about it when it first arrived because the material is very slippery - put me in mind of a shower curtain. The sizing was true to size and the 10 was actually just a little bit loose on me. Be warned that the uneven hem comes down quite far, and if you're short like I am, the ends will almost the touch the floor, especially if you're wearing flats. But it was beautiful! Got tons of compliments.
loved this skirt! so classy, fit well, material was different than i expected though

The first time I tried it on I thought the fabric was oddly swishy (think parachute material), and I almost returned it immediately. Glad I kept and wore for a special family dinner - everyone couldn't stop talking about how I should buy it! Not an every day piece but great for something a little special!
Has the texture of a windbreaker but was so amazing and I received so many compliments

links_Review_Title: So tempted to buy this one and keep forever!
links_Review_Text: Worn for Easter Sunday and would wear it again and again! It is so stunning and there is so much room for different styling to create an entirely different look each time.
Wore this for my daughters baptism with an ivory bodysuit. I got so many compliments and the dress just falls so beautifully! Really versatile too! I just loved it and want to wear it again and again
Wore it with a jean top for date night. Has a shimmer which shines when the sun hits it. Elegant, yet can be worn casual or dressed up with heels. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: A perfect neutral skirt with a bit of flare
links_Review_Text: Beautiful skirt with gorgeous, flowy movement
A little more satiny than I ecpected but looked and felt amazing
This skirt is a weird material that felt thick and plasticky like a windbreaker. too hot to wear in summer
The material was like a canvas. You walk in it makes noise. Super cute shape but the waist was kind of uncomfortable and tight and no waist line. Not my favorite
Great skirt. Super cute, kind of formal. Not great for short girls because it looks a little long. It was too small unfortunately:/

links_Review_Title: Just love the flow of this skirt!!!
links_Review_Text: Initially rented this for work but this is too gorgeous and I love it so much!!!
Beautiful skirt

links_Review_Title: Fabric too dressy for casual daytime.
links_Review_Text: Loved this in the picture but felt like a parachute in real life.
I was so excited for this skirt but was very surprised by the material (like aripstop nylon) and shiny finish. Just wasn't flattering on me sadly, didn't wear.

links_Review_Title: This is a great skirt. I work it with a light brown t-shirt & added a belt. It was fun, fit well.
links_Review_Text: I don't have any cons for this skirt. It is my style and I was comfortable wearing it. I'm planning no wearing it a second time.

links_Review_Title: LOVED IT. But hard to find a matching top
links_Review_Text: Its pretty high on the waist so you either need to find a top that is thin enough that you can tuck in or something pretty cropped. It is also pretty sheer so if you do tuck something in you most likely will see it. But its so flattering and cute that you almost just have to find something to go with it so it doesnt go to waste!
Loved this. was so chic wore with a white bodysuit from Asos. It was def TTS. Love this brand and will rent more from them!!
I wore this to my husbands holiday party and it fit great! The top was slightly big due to my pear shape but a padded bra helped. I got compliments all night! Great dress!

Wore this dress to an end-of-November wedding and loved it! Style Stalker never fails me. This dress was classy but still a little sexy. Easy to dance in, too! Only downfall was the slit in the front that wasn't exactly muscular-leg friendly. Overall, really happy with this one.
This dress was such a HIT for my sorority semi-formal! It was comfortable, looks classy AND edgy, and fit the occasion. Would highly recommend.
The top was a little loose and the sleeves were baggier and shorter than I expected, but overall it was a nice spin on a little black dress. I got lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Fit very well through busy and arms. A little loose at hips. I'm 5'2 113 lbs.

links_Review_Text: I wore this to Atlantic City to see Sebastian Maniscalco, so many compliments. Defiantly recommend

This dress was perfect. A bit short but Vegas for work is difficult to dress for. The chest area covered great so it was sexy without being too revealing. It was stretchy and comfortable as well so I was never uncomfortable. I loved this dress and hope I have another occasion to rent again! Perfect for larger boobs and curvier girls who like a little extra stretch.

I felt a little self-conscious with the length - It has a sexy slit that sometimes felt a little too high. I'm 5'3" so just know it's short even for Petite people. Super comfortable in the Medium. The small pulled a little tightly in my chest and tush areas.
Awesome dress. Conservative yet sexy. The zipper stuck out in the butt area.

links_Review_Title: Stylish and sexy for dinner in NYC
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove! Easy to walk and sit down in, the slit is a little high on the leg but it's super sexy and a head turner for sure.

I received so many complements about this dress. I think the photo speaks for itself. I felt beautiful, sexy, covered up, and a little exposed at the same time. The skirt is short, but sexy. The mesh and long sleeves made me feel covered up even though the skirt was tiny. It felt comfortable all night, even after I ate a huge dinner. It is true to size. I think it's probably better for ladies with a larger chest. I am a small D, or very large C cup.
Loved this dress! I was able to wear this without a bra and the inner cami covered me perfectly. The cut outs were sexy and my partner loved this dress! Perfect for a date night!
Sleeves could've been longer, but overall good dress
TTS and so comfortable!! This was my first RTR dress and I would definitely rent it again!

I absolutely loved this dress. I rented two RTR dresses and ended up going with the other one for the wedding I was attending, so I wore this one out to a fancy dinner and drinks situation. I got a ton of compliments and felt very sexy. It's incredibly flattering, and if you don't like your tummy showing, it wasn't clingy in that area at all. The length and slit in the skirt were exactly what I like, and the detailing on the chest is flirty without being too revealing (if you are a more modest person). I loved how it made me feel! I'm giving it four stars because I had a little bit of an issue with the nude fabric on the top slipping around and sometimes would show the very top of my bra if I wasn't paying attention, but honestly it wasn't a big deal. I would ABSOLUTELY rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable but stylish. Great for cold weather.
links_Review_Text: The dress is true to size, but also very short. I'm usually about a size 4, so I ordered both the small and medium. The small fit me, but was shorter and tighter than I was comfortable with for a wedding. I wore the medium instead and it worked out great with tights and black ankle boots. Perfect for a winter wedding!
This dress was form fitting and super sexy!! I received complements all night.

links_Review_Title: Sexy and pretty all at once
links_Review_Text: The material is light and cool. I loved the long sleeves, it really balanced out the 'leggy-ness' of the dress. I wore a M but probably could have worn a S. It worked out in the end, didn't have to skimp on the french fries. I loved how easy it was to put on. No weird zippers or straps. I felt comfortable and could move/dance easily.

I rented this for a Christmas party. It was lovely but SO tight and short!! Be prepared to show off ALL your stuff. Overall I liked it but it is way short; would have been better with a few more inches.

The fabric has a lot of stretch so I think this dress could fit a lot of body types. For reference, I'm 5'7", 125 pounds, and pretty small chested, and the extra small fit great. Unlike some of the other reviews of people with a similar build, I found there was no extra room up top. The arm length was a little too short, but I just pulled up the sleeves. Would definitely recommend this dress.

This dress was so comfy and it was absolutely gorgeous! I got so many compliments all night! I have a bigger booty so it was a little short, but nothing too crazy! It is very stretchy so the medium fit perfectly! Definitely recommend renting this dress for a formal event!
I loved this one! I got both the small and xs and both fit great but I wore the small since it was a little bit longer. I loved the fit and the look and was completely comfortable the whole night.
Very cute and overall great dress but was a bit tight.. I usually wear medium and it was still tight. Also, the slit kept sliding up. But overall I would rent again

From the moment I put this dress on, I felt amazing. My husband said it's his favorite dress I've ever worn. The fabric is so comfy and stretchy! Sexy and comfortable, I would rent this again in a heartbeat.

links_Review_Title: Classic LBD with a sexy appeal!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress! It is the perfect LBD with a sexy appeal. I rented this dress for a friends birthday night out and have got her now hooked on RTR. Definitely would rent again!
The dress fits very well and is very flattering. It is a bit short but didn't ride up or anything. Wore it to a Broadway show and it was perfect!
Perfect little dress for our anniversary dinner date before a Christmas party. The only flaw was the top was a little lose on me. Otherwise it fit like a glove!

I loved this dress and got a ton of compliments. It was little shorter than I was expecting. The small would have been better for length but it was baggy in other areas so I went with the XS. Would love to wear this gain.
The fit of this dress was awesome! Made me feel sexy, while still being covered up. The material has some give to it. It was perfect for a work holiday party!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and comfortable dress, great fit!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a work Christmas party and it got many complements. The tank top inside is a little bit low, so it does show a little cleavage. But overall the dress was a great fit, comfortable- as the material was a little stretchy. Really glad I chose this dress!
The dress was great however.. the upper chest area was a little big. The sleeves were a little loose too and on the shorter side.

It was a perfect fit, down to the sleeve length. I have nothing but positive things to say about this dress, but if you don't want to show as much cleavage I used and nude bandeau and it looked like it was part of the dress :)

I loved this dress, I wish I could have purchased it. I am 5'4", 135lb and wore a size small which fit perfectly. I went with a nude strapless bra - pretty much any nude color bra works with this dress since it blends in with the fabric beneath the black mesh.
The slit up the leg was pretty high, but I'm also 5'9". Got so many compliments through out the night. I'm a 36B cup, and the dress complimented my cleavage very well!

links_Review_Title: Comfortable for dinner and a show.
links_Review_Text: Pros: comfortable material, stretchy! Cons: tan neckline was lower than I expected for personal comfort, but I opted to add a black tank underneath. I can comfortably wear a size 8 Jean and while the medium dress fit I opted to wear the large size for more comfort.

links_Review_Title: Wonderful Dress, Loved the Fit and Look
links_Review_Text: Was able to fit into the XS with no problem. The S would have fit as well but the sleeves felt stretched out and not as sleek as the XS.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments on this dress and very comfortable.
links_Review_Text: True to size, comfortable and perfect for a wedding.
Cute dress, people liked this but I think it made me look a little bigger. The dress suits well it just I usually prefer a more tailored fit.

links_Review_Title: This dress was definitely a statement at the brunchy themed wedding!
links_Review_Text: I loved the fit of the dress! It hugs all the right places! The sleeves were a tad long but nothing terrible. The material itself on the sleeves and skirt are a little thicker, so be weary of warmer, outside events with this. I also suggest wearing a nude bra because the lining on the inside doesn't stay in place. Overall, I'm very pleased with RTR and this dress. I will be using it again!
Tight at the strap that goes around otherwise comfortable very short I'm 5"4
This brand can do no wrong in my eyes. The SLIP, too, omg the slip. It's perfect I was tempted to hold onto it! So sexy. More on @thanksitsrtr

This was good but not great - the fit is forgiving and the material is super nice but it wasn't wow for me. This is an easy throw on that is chic without trying too hard - would rent again, maybe In a smaller size.

I am usually a size 16 so I rented the 16 with 18 as my just in case backup size. The 18 was way too big and quite frumpy. I wore the 16 but did use the size 18 slip which covered just a little more. The tie at the top was awkward so I just left it untied and tucked the ends into the dress. When I got dressed the dress was the right length but throughout the night the elastic kept creeping up and I spent a good part of the night adjusting the dress. This is why it gets 4 stars instead of 5. It was a beautiful dress.
True to my size, too short for formal event but just right for a social or date!

links_Review_Title: My 13 year old daughter gave me three snaps!
links_Review_Text: As the other reviews mentioned, it is short and I'm not especially tall. Went with the larger size just for the length. Lots of compliments! If you're willing to take the risk, I recommend the dress- fun and comfy!

links_Review_Title: Super cute for work, but pretty short.
links_Review_Text: Loved that it actually fit perfectly at the waist. Not tight through the chest. Flirty cute. But a little short.

I love this dress. There is a lot of stretch. I would say it's true to size. I would have fit in a size 10 but this was the size available. I don't think it would have made much of a difference due to the elastic waist. I highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: WAY TOO SHORT IF OVER 5 feet!
links_Review_Text: I mean this dress is so cute but literally the shortest thing in the world. If you're over 5 feet, beware!!
This dress was beautiful, but I don't think it was my style. Too many ruffles for my liking.
This definitely fit me more like a tunic than a dress. A cute, flattering, feminine piece. Loved the polka dots and the swingy layers on the bottom, which gave it lots of movement.

i have been renting off and on for a year now, and this is the only item I have returned because it didn't smell fresh. I don't know if it missed dry-cleaning or the body odor was imbedded, but I returned it. thank you for understanding and offering an immediate exchange for another item. I do greatly appreciate the really great service that your company provides. I do recommend it to others.
like it
This is EXTREMELY SHORT ! Didn't work for me because I am 5'7
Wish I could've bought. Wore 4 times to several different occasions. Super versatile, not restrictive, hides a little belly with waistband:)

I have worn the dress in a different color this time I tried sizing up hoping to get more length. The bigger size was just as short and fit a lot worse so I could not wear it. The red version is much cuter!
Completely see through and the under-camisole was torn and also completely transparent. This isn't meant to be worn without your undergarments showing through.

links_Review_Title: It was super short on my but I'm really tall
links_Review_Text: Great fit and quality over all. I'm 6' tall and it was short and I liked it with flat shoes. Im usually a US size 2 and the 4 was fine so I'd say it sizes small.

links_Review_Title: Wanted to love it, but annoyingly short
links_Review_Text: The slip that comes with this dress is very sheer and you could still see my bra through the dress and slip, so I had to swap it out for one of my own. I really like the style, but every time I moved my arms the elastic waistband rode up. Since this is already a short dress, I spent the whole day fussing with it and trying to keep my butt covered.

links_Review_Title: Not flattering on my body type so didn't wear
links_Review_Text: It's a cute dress but just felt a bit too girly and juvenile. It also runs a bit large in my opinion so I didn't wear it

links_Review_Title: the dress made the event more fun
links_Review_Text: top was fit very well. the ruffles were perfect a little short

links_Review_Title: Love the dress, fit well and very comfortable for the wedding.
links_Review_Text: I ordered two dresses just in case, only wore one - there was a 6pm hard stop to return the other but if you receive the dresses while you're at work and you don't get home until 8pm - not fair and overall too pricey just for one dress I wore
It was cute. However from the pics you could not really tell it was see through. Also it was a little shorter than I expected. But it work out with some black tights underneath. It looked good.
Cute flirty feel. Dress is short very comfortable

The dress is very cute but it runs short. I am super tall so I'm used to wearing short dresses, but this fit me like a maternity teddy from the petite section of Macy's. A shame because it was comfortable and would have been flattering in the right proportions.

Fit perfectly - extremely comfortable (I usually change the second I get home from work but in this dress I kept it on until I was ready for bed). It comes with a separate slip underneath. It was overall a great dress

links_Review_Title: Adorable, versatile dress that made me feel confident and happy to wear. :)
links_Review_Text: Very cute, fun, flattering, and versatile dress. Great day-to-night option. Worked well for my body type / size, which is not always easy given the combo of a generally small frame and bigger chest. Got lots of compliments! Would totally buy this if it were in my price range. :)
True to size, but very short. Probably not the best for tall girls. Elastic waist is comfortable
So cute, flowy, bouncy. Total re rent

Super sexy dress. It is short but just short enough to make it sexy, I'm 5'4". Can be dressed up or down. Super flattering and slimming fit. I can go between a size 6 and 8 in dresses; wore an 8 in this and the extra room made it perfect.

links_Review_Title: Great dress that's not too casual or too fancy
links_Review_Text: I ordered size 14 because 12 wasn't available. The dress came with a slip to help with the "sheerness" of the dress. Even with the slip, the dress was pretty see through. I loved the dress, but I agree with other reviewers that it was a lot shorter than I thought it was going to be.

This dress is impossibly short. I am quite tall, 5'10" but this dress didn't even come close to covering my behind. It's cute though, and comes with a black slip. I'm disappointed it didn't work for me.

links_Review_Title: This was an outfit that was much shorter than I had thought it would have been
links_Review_Text: It was much shorter than I thought and I added leggings to it. The fabric wasn't as soft or smooth in texture but it held up great and traveled well.

Way too short to wear as a dress (especially for a plus sized girl). Would need to order a smaller size to pull off as a shirt. Came with a weird slip that was like a shirt as well. All very sheer. Didn't end up wearing, returned immediately.

I rented the size 16 because the 14 was not available. It was definitely loose on me but fits true to size. The dress is short. I wore it with opaque tights for work but should be ok to wear as is if you are going out at night or to a party. Very very cute skirt that bounces and moves as you walk. Got so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Valentines with my hubby in Vegas!! Loved the way it fit and he did too!!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly, would rent it again!

I loved this dress for a NYE wedding. I found it ran a bit large- it fit in the waist but the blousy top was a bit big and wanted to fall forward off of my shoulders and it was sort of long on my short stature (5' 3''). But overall, the fabric was thick, soft, and fabulous, the low back and high slit in the back added a bit of drama and I felt really fabulous in it. FYI the low back is too low for a strapless bra and the top provides no support, but low back corset bra worked great!
Low back but didn't need to wear bra bc thick velvet. Gorgeous fit. Lots of compliments.

The dress was perfect the zipper is a little hard to zip not crazy because of the material and stitching of the dress but the dress is true to size, I would've maybe tried a 4 R because I do like my dresses tighter but the arms were true to size. The velvet material was amazing the dress super comfortable and breathable.
This stately dress was perfect for officiating a wedding ceremony, but it ran large and I didn't have time to rent a smaller size. But i still rocked it. : )

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but wouldn't stay up on my shoulders. Great look if you are motionless.
links_Review_Text: The 6R fit great except for the shoulders.

links_Review_Title: Velvet and dressier than it looks at first glance
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress, but i definitely didn't realize it was velvet and more of a cocktail dress til it arrived. Too dressy for work for sure. Was going to wear to a PM work event but this is definitely cocktail attire. It's gorgeous and was a good fit. Not a great dress for a pear shape. I’m smaller up top so need things fitted there to look smaller and balanced. This top is loose and blousy. Would work great if you are more voluptuous up top.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress! Perfect for festive parties.
links_Review_Text: Nice sexy fit. Very flattering and comfortable to wear!

links_Review_Title: I got SO many compliments on this dress. Everyone kept touching the soft material.
links_Review_Text: Pros- everything. This dress fit me like a glove. I've never received SO many compliments than I did the night I wore this. The velvet material is so soft and fun to touch. We were in Tahoe in Nov, so very cold and this dress worked perfectly for that. Cons- ZERO

This is a beautiful dress, I think fits TTS. One note, its completely backless which I found difficult to see from photos. Blousy fit on top, fitted on bottom-it almost fits like two pieces. Black velour makes it more elegant. Wore to a more casual fall wedding and felt slightly overdressed-maybe more appropriate come winter.
A bright cheery dress. It's an easy wear. It does wrinkle a bit but still easy to wear.
The hubs said from the minute he saw me in this he wanted to get me out of it. Beautiful color. Beautiful fit. Love it.

I rented this dress in a 16 and 14 - went with the 14. The 16 was way too loose and was hanging off my body. The 14 was very body hugging, and while it was a little too snug for my liking normally, it was definitely more flattering than the 16. The color is exactly as you see in the picture - bright and fresh. Wore spanx & a strapless bra, but probably didn't need to because the dress really accentuates your best curves. Received lots of compliments at my work holiday party! Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Comfy and a great pop of color

links_Review_Text: The dress is a beautiful coral color, and the fabric is great quality but this just didn't fit. I probably should've gone down in size, but it was already too short in the waist and hips for my longer torso. Also, the way the dress was pressed/steamed was not great. The bottom didn't hang nicely and was bumpy and misshapen. I had to return.

I wore this to my brothers engagement party and received so many compliments throughout the day for the color and the fit. Christian siriano really knows how to make a gorgeous form fitting dress that's flattering for folks with larger chests and curves everywhere! I wish I could wear this dress all the time - I felt like a princess all day and danced all night long!
Sexy fit, but not too sexy. Flattering. Popping color.
Comfortable to wear for hours but total show stopper

I ordered a 16 and 14 in this dress. I was in between both of these so I went with the 16. It was extremely comfortable, fit a little big but it was show stopping! The front slit wasn't too high and really added to the dress.
Incredible fit, really flattering and I got compliments all night long.
This dress fits like a glove (in the best way possible) and really is a show stopper. I received compliments all night long!! I would wear this again a million times.

I first ordered the grass green slip dress in my normal size. It fit like a glove and the girls were sitting nicely and well supported by the green dress. This dress in coral is the same style but has slight differences. First it runs large. Second the straps are adjustable but it's hard to do so. So next time I order I will make sure to go one size down.

This dress was amazing for a summer wedding. The color was vibrant & fun. Usually I wear a 4 but ordered a 2 and still think I had room to size down to a 0 if I wanted a tighter fit. The silhouette was flattering and comfortable to dance in.

links_Review_Title: Great spaghetti strap option for large breasts
links_Review_Text: I rented this in both the green (size 8) and coral pink (size 6) for a gala event. The 8 was too big and the 6 was great the day I tried it on. I guess I gained a couple lbs once I wore it a few days later. It was quite snug. Pros: •great for large breasts (I am 34E) with the ability to wear a strapless bra •liked the length for my height (5'9") •easy to wear spanx with which is a must for me in form fitting clothing Cons: •felt tight and uncomfortable as the night went on Definitely worth trying! I think it would have perfect if I was about 3-5 lbs lighter.
Wore this as a maid-of-honor dress in a wedding. Received so many compliments on the color and fit. Really pops and manages to fit a larger bust with a slimmer silhouette.

We went to Ross Mathews Bubbly Brunch to kick off Pride in NYC. I chose this dress bc the designer represents a community very near and dear to me. The fit was great and so comfortable. Ross Mathews approved. #proudally
Beautiful dress and Perfect for summer wedding! It was maybe a tiny bit larger than a standard size 4, but I loved the fit. It was so comfortable and flattering'

links_Review_Title: This dress fit me in all the right spots
links_Review_Text: Perfect material. Most stunning color. I have large hips and bigger rear and it hugged me in all the right places. I wore to our couples shower.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Fit my curves comfortably.
links_Review_Text: Great for those blessed with a bigger t and a area.
Wore with another rented item. Loved the bright pink color! I absolutely love every Christian Serriano dress I've rented!!
Wow this dress was amazing. Really easy fit and such a pretty color. I got so many compliments and hope I have another event I can rent it again for!

This dress is a pure statement dress. The color is stunning for spring/summer and the fit, like all Christian Siriano gowns, is perfection. Definitely need a pair of spanx underneath to smooth out the lumps.
Fit perfectly from the waist up. Wide in the hips (which sat very low on my 5'1 frame)

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress- fit like a glove!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit true to size. It did gape a bit in the chest but was manageable. I loved the slit as it offset the length of the dress. Would definitely rent again.

Classy and sassy! I actually was able to blazer this and wear to a work meeting before heading out to my birthday dinner, sans blazer. Although, now that it feels like fall I'll prob have to wait until spring to rock this cutie again.
Perfect fit amazing dress.

links_Review_Title: A beautiful early-fall wedding on the Boston bay.
links_Review_Text: I love this dress! I felt curvy, even though I'm far from it. The dress is form fitting, but has a great stretch to it that makes it forgiving (especially in the midsection for this mom of two). I did wear shapewear to help smooth things underneath, but would have been comfortable without it. I felt like a million bucks and received a lot of compliments on the dress. I would definitely rent this one again!

The dress was very cute & trendy but it runs pretty large. I'm a 32-25-36 and the 0R was too big (HOW? that's never happened to me before). Size down & you have a winner! I'm sad I didn't get to wear it.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely obsessed with this dress. Fit super well on my 6' body. Great for tall ladies!
links_Review_Text: Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Love the color and simplicity of this dress!
links_Review_Text: This was my first RTR order. Just a hint, order up a size. I normally take a size 12, but this dress seemed to run a little small, the 14 was much better.
I typically wear an 8 in designer and this was way too big to wear.

links_Review_Title: Elegant lines,beautiful fit, classy. Gorgeous color, more vibrant than shown. Totally recommend
links_Review_Text: True to size, perfect length (5'10) , adjustable straps, fully lined, hugs curves beautifully without being clingy. Word of caution when seated slit can ride up well past mid thigh
I wanted to love this dress so much because of the color and style but the fit was off. It was big in my hips and the adjustable straps did not let the dress go low enough on my chest.
It fit great. Easy to wear. Great cut and fabric. Would definitely rent again!

I ordered this dress for a cruise in Southeast Asia, was just about to pack it when my daughter said she needed a dress for her 30th birthday party. So not only did the dress look great on me, it looked fabulous on her! It's not often that a 30 year old and a 61 year old can look great in the same dress! This dress is made of beautiful fabric that is substantial and fully lined, and the slit in the front makes it sexy without revealing anything. And the color really pops. Highly recommend!!

links_Review_Title: Cute but I definitely lost weight
links_Review_Text: Couldn't wear it because I've sized down without meaning to hahah but it's beautiful & I plan on renting again in a smaller size.

links_Review_Title: Special event shared with my daughter
links_Review_Text: Perfect, true to size.

links_Review_Title: I ordered this dress to wear to a fireside chat but it was huge.
links_Review_Text: The length is great especially if you're tall, it may be a bit awkward for shorter ladies. Love the color, the slit is a bit on the high side. I made the mistake of reading too many reviews and ordered a dress two sizes too big.
Fit color and fabric are all perfection. The quality is amazing.
Great fit, absolutely stunning dress - very comfortable and easy to dance in.

links_Review_Title: Classy dress for a winter formal
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a winter Snowball-themed formal. It is a thicker material than it appears in picture and worked well for December. It hit below my fingerprints which is quite an accomplishment for a 5'10" gal. I received compliments on it all night. Also I didn't have to wear a bra!

Gorgeous dress but lace is yellowed perhaps due to chemical cleaners. It is true to size but for larger breast wear a size up. Pictures make the dress look white, but if you are going to a day time affair that is somewhat fancy, beware of colour.

I wore this dress for a night out during my bachelorette party and loved it. The details on this dress are so intricate and provide a very romantic aesthetic. I am between a size 6 and an 8 typically - this fit perfectly as an 8 and I would not have wanted to go down in size at all. The length is flirty. It also photographs really well.

I wore this for my rehearsal dinner and absolutely loved it. I felt the combination of textures made it seasonally appropriate for fall time, despite being short in length. It ran slightly small, but I still found it to be very flattering even when a bit snug. I got a ton of compliments!

This is an Australian Brand, so when I ordered the 6, it was actually an AUS 6/US 2 which makes sense why I couldn't even zip it. Even if I could zip it, I didn't care for this dress. I felt that it looked young looking and could have been cute on a toddler or as a flower girl dress.
Would size up as it is very tight; a little scratchy so keep that in mind, but I did get a lot of compliments :)
I do like this dress but it definitely widens me with the ruffles. I am busty so I have to be carful with ruffles near my chest. This dress is better suited for someone shorter than me.

links_Review_Title: It was a hit! Everyone loved it!
links_Review_Text: It fit perfect! The only thing I wished it wasn't as short...it was a bit uncomfortable when I sat. Other than that it was great and perfect for the all white event that I attended.

I got more compliments on this dress than any dress I've ever worn! People loved it! RTR may have even gotten some new customers because of it. The dress fit beautifully. I'm tall so I'm often nervous when it come to short dresses, but it was sexy yet classy. Because I'm tall, the ruffles did not overwhelm me and worked well with my larger frame. I wore a strapless bra and had no problems with the dress!
Loved the lace and ruffles, received so many compliments

links_Review_Title: Cute dress, be careful if you're tall!
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'10 and this was borderline too short. Super cute, intricate details and got a lot of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Bridal Shower Perfection, but size up!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this dress and received so many compliments! I wore this to my bridal shower in mid-April. Incredibly comfortable. I didn't even need to wear a bra. I am 5'8" and about 150#. Kind of athletic build. I typically wear a size six but did have to wear the 8 in this dress.

I wore this dress for my bridal shower and it was PERFECT! I got so many compliments and it fit comfortably. I originally ordered a 4 and 6, then changed to the 6 and 8 before it shipped. And I'm glad I did!! I couldn't zip the 6 all the way up but the 8 fit great. If you have a bigger chest, definitely size up!
Runs small but such a beautiful fit! I received so many compliments in this.
Dress was wonderful. I ordered 4 and 6, even 6 was a little bit small on breast, it fitted well. I wore it at my wedding and everybody loved it.

This dress was amazing. So so so comfortable. The details are even more stunning in person. I thought it was super flattering and different. I'm usually a 2 and wore the 2 and was fine, if you're in between sizes I would go up in size. Definitely recommend renting. Strapless bra needed.

I tried renting this for my rehearsal dinner but the sleeves were super unflattering. I even tried pinning them up so it was more of a sleeveless dress but it just didn't work. It may be better on someone who isn't as broad but for me it just wasn't flattering. The fit was fine and very comfortable
Comfortable dress. Chest a bit snug but as with anything else when a DD. Fits well to body without showing every imperfection.
I sized up because of reviews, and it fit comfortably. The lace and the sheer fabrics with intricate details make this dress so fun and feminine. Cute!

Fits like a glove...a lot going on with this dress and I'm not normally into lots of lace and ruffles but it's all so subtle that the cut and tailoring make me so comfortable to try something different for me. Can't wait to wear it for my upcoming event!

links_Review_Title: This is a beautiful dress! I am still receiving compliments!
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'8" and 136lbs. I normally fit into size 4 or 6 dresses. This was a perfect fit for size 6. Very flattering and comfortable.

I was going to wear this for a bridal event because it is absolutely gorgeous in person, but unfortunately it does not photograph as well as it looks and I was looking for something that would! I will definitely rent this for a different occasion!

I selected one of the bridal packages that included this dress as my dress to change into after cake cutting and for my wedding after party. The size 6 fit like a dream! (Also rented that necklace too!) I am about 5'10"/160lbs, muscular build (mostly in my legs), and wore flat TOMS shoes. I am glad my bridal package includes a trial because while most of my other dresses fit in a size 4, as some others have said this one is sized a bit smaller (I actually looked up the brand's size chart on their website and found that helpful when choosing sizes). It's great I could wear a regular strapless bra, and I recommend using Spanx type spandex shorts underneath since the fabric, being white and form fitting, isn't extremely forgiving. I got so many compliments!!

This was sent as a replacement when my backup size for a different dress was unavailable. Unfortunately, that other dress ran large so I got a smaller size for my backup (I normally ask for a larger backup size). Because of that, this dress was too small. It was very pretty in person, but it was too small to wear out. I did wear it for a photo at home. I would rent again in a larger size. The fabric is very nice and looks fancy in person.
I wore it for my rehersal dinner & everyone loved it. Pictures dont show the detail on the dress.

This dress was surprisingly comfortable given the detail involved and type of fabric. I wore it on a date on vacation but would be great for all types of events. It was flattering which was particularly important to me as I had my third baby a few months ago and I'm not my usual size and shape and clothes have generally been looking off. I sized up so it wouldn't be too fitting. I'm sure I'll rent this again.

I loved wearing this dress for one of my bridal showers and received so many compliments on it. It's more modest without sacrificing being young and modern! I'm generally a true 6, and I thought the 6 worked perfectly; it's a little more slim through the waist than I was originally expecting but it still worked! Cons are that I didn't feel like I could wear a regular bra with it, as you could see the straps through the sheer part of the top; I ended up wearing a NuBra which I think worked well because the dress was so fitted in the bodice. Overall I loved wearing this dress and would rent again!

This dress is so beautiful! How perfect this would be for a bride-to-be for an engagement party, rehearsal dinner, bridal shower, etc. The lace detailing is so beautiful I am in love with the details. It fit true to size and there was a little bit of stretch to the fabric. Definitely size up for backup because the top is so fitted. You will need to wear nude toned undergarments under this white dress and a strapless bra since the top by the shoulders is sheer. Pair with dainty white or nude heels and you're set!

The dress is not as fancy as the picture appears. This is really a casual bohemian style dress and I didn't end up wearing it for my bridal shower because of that reason. I needed something more dressy. It was a wasted rental, but I want others to know so they don't make the same mistake!

links_Review_Title: For a "white attire" themed wine event in Narbonne France.
links_Review_Text: Very unique and makes you stand out. Couldn't wear a bra so there was some itching/chafing. The color was more off-white than white. It worked well for what I needed it for, but couldn't wait to get back to the hotel and change!

links_Review_Title: Felt like a queen at homecoming!
links_Review_Text: I share this account with my mom, so my specs are: Height: 5'2" Weight: 105 Size: 0/2 Body Type: Petite I searched everywhere for the perfect dress and bought several online to try and was disappointed. I found this one and instantly fell in love! It arrived a day late, so I was praying it would fit and there would be no problems. My prayers were answered. It fit nicely and I got so many compliments.
I absolutely loved this dress but the rib cage area was too small for me. Everything else fit lovely. Would definitely rent a size up.
I rented this for my bridal tea and it was absolutely perfect. Every detail was amazing, I am in love!
Unfortunately it did not fit. I guided myself by what others my size wore and it didn't work out this time. It is very pretty, will get it again with a larger size.
High quality dress with feminine details. Very cute!

This dress is darling and very feminine, but I think a little on the smaller side. My busy area was pretty tight, but everything else fit. Ended up wearing my back up dress ordered because of the cleavage I had in this dress. The cap sleeves were not super flattering on me either.

links_Review_Title: Looked too much like a baptism dress.
links_Review_Text: I wanted to try something new with this but it turned out looking very churchy (which wasn't what I was looking for on graduation day). I think it would have been really cute as an off the shoulder without the mesh.
Fits to a tee!

links_Review_Title: The material is not as nice as it seems in the photo
links_Review_Text: Was disappointed when I got this delivered and saw the material was cheap!
A bit more grumpy than I like, but well made and the white, square buttons are adorable. Conservative, would be great for an office job. Needed more fresh accessories!

links_Review_Title: Elegant but need a safety pin or belt
links_Review_Text: So elegant for work, made me feel a bit more mature and powerful. Needed to pin the waist part to add a bit of sillouette

Love the beautiful print of this dress. Could be worn year round. There is a metallic gold thread that runs through the fabric. I thought it ran a little big and that it looks better when belted at the waist. Wore with calf height boots!

I was ready to jump into Fall with this chic maxi! It was a little dressier than I originally realized (metallic gold thread running through) but I dressed it down with booties and casual jewelry to make it more everyday. The fabric feels amazingly smooth and luxe, and unlike other Saloni dresses that run small on me - this was perfect in a 2.
This dress is flowy and flattering. light weight fabric, comes with a slip. Works for fuller bust, would be bump friendly.

links_Review_Title: Comfy but a little sexy too
links_Review_Text: This dress is incredibly comfortable and travels well as it does not wrinkle . I paired it with a leopard belt for some added flare but the metallic thread really does dress it up. Pretty detail with the buttons. Trying to rent it again but it's never available!

Wore this to work and got lots of compliments. Liked the way the dress moved, and the high quality material, but did not love the fit. Even belted it still struggled to give me a waist. Arms were also a little tight, though there was room in the waist
Rented this as a going out dress in Dubai/Abu Dhabi and it was perfect. Would make a gorgeous dress for the holidays with the gold
I have loved the other dresses by this label but this dress was see-through and not great looking in person.

links_Review_Title: Wore for many different events and could go dressy or casual
links_Review_Text: This dress is very versatile. I wore it to a couple formalism dinners and business meetings. It does have gold threads trough it, do can go formal. For more professional affairs, I used a leather belt and more casual shoe. It was comfortable and I got lots of complements

Wore this to breaking the fast dinner and it was perfect. Gorgeous material, the shape just flows, and the semi-sheer fabric (comes with underlying slip) kept it from feeling heavy or matronly/modest. Does run *slightly* big, could have gotten away with sizing down one. Would be great for rehearsal dinner or any other fancy dinner in the city. Will def rent again!
I ended up wearing to a nice dinner and to work 2 times. Was comfy and cute! Loved this look

Rented with my unlimited. Based on other reviews I went up a size to a 2 and glad I did. Waist is very small and the 0 would not have worked. As it is , the buttons did not like completely flat on the 2 - it's one of those dresses that has to hit at exactly the right place everywhere and I am a bit short waisted. Still enjoyed wearing - lightweight and comfortable. I did not find the gold in the pattern to be overwhelming. Note this was supposed to come with a slip and didn't - I just used a nude slip that i have and it worked fine. Black would also have worked.
This dress was super cool. I was afraid it would be too dressy for work, but it's just fun! Fit is great and it's not too long either.

links_Review_Title: Pretty, elegant dress wore it to a conference
links_Review_Text: The material on this dress is really lovely, very light and airy. There are solid satin stripes interspersed with the slightly sheer floral pattern. It has cute square white buttons and buttons all the way down the front. It comes with a little black slip to wear under, which you need. I felt it needed a belt, which mine didn't come with, so wore with a narrow black belt and black heels. Very comfortable, easy to pack, highly recommend
I feel like a princess in this dress. It is flowy and delicate in the best way.

links_Review_Title: Fun movement, more formal in person
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a dinner party at 5 months pregnant. I sized up from my usual 10 and I'm glad I did. The waist is fitted with no stretch and I needed the larger size to avoid gaping between buttons while sitting. The separate slip has adjustable straps, which was a plus. Overall it came across much more formal than I anticipated, but it worked just fine.
The mauve color was really pretty, and it was comfy for a summer day. It was snug on the chest so I wouldn't recommend for anyone larger than a 32DD.
Originally rented to wear for engagement pictures and decided to wear to a bridal fitting. It's name is perfect and the dress is very dreamy and romantic.
I loved this dress and got tons of compliments! Wore it for my professional photos with my son. Photographs really well too :)

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for my baby shower!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful! Hard to iron. A steamer might work better.
I got so many compliments on this dress. It fit true to size!

The dress wrinkles easily and the zipper on the side was stuck and only pulled up half way. It looks a bit frumpy once on unless you're tall and slim. I only ended up wearing it for some photos but never actually out in public.

The linen material was so breathable and comfortable. I loved the puffy sleeves. The corset section is just clips in the front, if you’re big breasted you should probably size up. I am not, so I went with an extra small. I loved the length and it was great when dancing.

Wore this on a double date night. My husband thinks this is the best rental I've done in the over a year I've had RTR! Love the color on my skin tone. Hugs the hourglass shape in all the right places. It's flowery and flirty for summer. Off the shoulder detail that is sexy but chic. I would buy this look for sure

Instagram: ava_luxurious Super adorable dress and got tons of compliments! I loved that the straps were adjustable and didn't come loose. The only eyelet closures also are secure and don't come undone. I usually have gapping/opening issues in the bust area when there are buttons/closures, but that didn't happen in this. I personally thought it looked better with a belt because it looked too loose otherwise. If you're going for a flowy look then you don't need one.
Very comfortable fit and the strap can be easily adjusted. I love the asymmetric length! But if you have small chest, like me..., The front buckles can come undone sometimes, so be careful.
Fits well at the top, was concerned about the length and it touching the floor but it was perfect with flats and a bit of a heel. Got lots of compliments!

Felt like Juliette! This fit great through the bust and flowed nicely. I had to tie the top straps pretty tight because of my slopey shoulders but for the most part got them to stay up. Medium weight dress.

links_Review_Title: Straps are difficult to get right
links_Review_Text: When I tried it on I thought, "Maybe it'll look better when I steam it a bit." It looked better but it was still loose on me. I felt like my boobs were too small for this dress. The straps were extremely difficult to tie just right and they kept falling off my shoulders. The arm sleeves bits felt really tight on both openings. Otherwise, it's really pretty and I still wore it a couple times.

If your goal is to look like a romantic woodland fairy who's only full-size for 24 hours to attend a wedding, then this is the dress for you. I loved everything about how whimsical and girly it was. Would totally wear again.
Fit perfectly. Beautiful color. Wrinkled easily. Took a risk with renting knowing this wasn't my style but I had to give it a try. I didn't wear it but, liked it. Definitely suggest for others!
Loved - so sexy

Super cute and comfy, a little tighter on the chest because I have a larger bust. I did not wear a bra underneath which worked well. The fabric does wrinkle easily so bring a steamer if you're traveling

links_Review_Title: Got this as my free backup style, ended up liking it better than the main one I ordered
links_Review_Text: The long floaty skirt and straps/sleeves give it an interesting romantic look :)

It is exactly as pictured. I am a 32dd and the chest fit perfect. Any tighter and it may have not fit. I wore a bandeau that was padded as a bra. Wore it to a bridal shower and got so many compliments. Would rent again.

This dress was the perfect choice for a garden wedding in North Carolina. The color is beautiful and the linen was perfectly light without being see through, abrasive or too casual. I am a 34D, size 8 and wore the Medium. I didn't have a reliable strapless bra on hand, so I double knotted the tie-straps and prayed the front closure would hold. It did, but wish I had the extra insurance of a bra (the dress is not lined). Would recommend!
