I absolutely loved this dress! The color was gorgeous in person. I definitely recommend wearing spanx or literally two because the material is unforgiving.
Rented this dress for my daughters school fundraiser. Received so many complements all night.

links_Review_Title: The fit and color were show-stopping!
links_Review_Text: I have a small chest so it was just a little lose around the top but still fit well. I rented the 8R and 6L and ended up wearing the 6L. It fit beautifully on my hips and waist. I received no stop compliments all night!

The color was awesome for a formal spring fling. The fit is very true to size, though the material shows a lot in the stomach area. The top was surprisingly secure and accommodating. It was a bit too long for me, but that's to be expected at 5'3.5. Overall, I was happy!

I thought the 6 fit like a true 6. I have broad shoulders and back, so ordered the 8 as well, but once my husband zipped this up (how do they expect our arms to bend like that behind us?!?) we knew this fit well. One pair of Spanx though! Anyway, color always stands out in a veritable sea of black, so received many compliments. My personal style had me mix it with large size hot pink earrings and clutch, no other jewelry was needed with that pretty neckline.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous color, perfect fit. True to size. Received many compliments
links_Review_Text: True to size / perfect fit. The color and style is gorgeous; very sophisticated and elegant.

links_Review_Title: The RTR experience is great! So many wonderful options and the return process is a breeze!
links_Review_Text: Fit was true to size, although it's long! I'm 5'3 and with 3-4" heels, it still dragged. The fabric was stretchy and super comfortable, however, shape wear is a must. The color was a stand out. Lots of compliments and you can have a lot of fun with accessories.

This is a fabulous dress! In between a 4 & 6 and chose the 6 after trying in both. I will say there was a 5 inch length difference between the 4R and 6R! Had to use fabric tape to 'hem' as it was crazy long.
Simple but classy. Material is pretty forgiving is you want to use spanx.
Perhaps my favorite rental yet! Great fit, fun color, love the added bow element...endless comments!

The color turned out to be more bright Tiffany blue than the photo showed but it fit perfectly. The only annoying part was that the straps to hang it on the hanger need to be taped down or they pop out. It fit like a glove, lots of compliments.
Dress was lovely - nice color, comfortable , true to size and wore well

This dress is very fitted but with the right shape wear it was fine on my post-baby body. I got a lot of compliments too, and it was fun to wear something besides the usual black. The detail up top is nice, and I was glad not to have to figure out pasties or some crazy boob situation. With a regular strapless bra and spanx, it was great!

So I rented this to wear at a wedding and ultimately decided not to wear it. I knew it may not work for me since the color is not one which is the best with my skin tone and it is an unforgiving style. I chose not to wear the dress because of how tight it is in the hips BUT I can see this dress working well for someone else with a straight figure. I would also note that the dress is a bit on the longer side and high heels would have been necessary (I'm 5'2").

This dress is amazing! I got so many compliments on it all night. True to size. It is TIGHT all the way through your butt so you can really see every curve (for better or worse). I have an athletic build with thick, muscular thighs/butt and I was initially worried it would feel restricting but I was able to dance and move easily. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: The dress was perfectly formal for the gala. Loved the fun aqua color, numerous compliments.
links_Review_Text: Slightly tight in the bust. I wanted to order a 2 but it was not available. Took my chances with the 0 and it worked out just fine, probably fit better in the hips.
Great fit and lots of stretch. Got so many compliments on the color

links_Review_Title: Good for big busts, bad for big stomachs
links_Review_Text: This is probably the only tube top dress that I could pull off (36G). Need REALLY good spanx for this dress because you can see the entirety of your stomach. Love the color and it was very comfortable but my backup looked better so I didn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress and received so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Everything fit in the right place. Make sure to get a king if you plan to wear heels and are 5'6" or taller.

links_Review_Title: Really stood out because of the beautiful color!
links_Review_Text: Fabric is very flattering -- it feels like a thick neoprene but it's not heavy. Just makes you look smaller! Fabulous dress
This dress felt elegant and classy. It was a little long and heavy, but fit well and was easy to dance in with the slit in the back!
Great color. Soft flexible fabric. Comfortable to wear. I am petite (5’2) and it was still an inch or too long with 4 inch heels. Would rent again in future and maybe try different shoes.

Rented this for a black tie wedding- the beautiful color really made it stand out. I am 5'4" and the dress perfectly hit the ground with 4/5" heels. While the bottom portion of the dress fit very well, the top bodice was a bit larger than I would have wanted. Keep in mind that because of the light fabric color, everything in your stomach area will show through the dress.

The fabric is very stretchy and comfortable, I had no issues dancing or moving. If you have a smaller chest, I would recommend a good strapless push up bra, there were times when I had to pull up the dress as it would slide down.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Dress for a Summer Black Tie wedding
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a black tie wedding this summer and loved it! I received lots of compliments on the color. I rented the 0R and the 2R and decided to go with the 2, since it was a bit more roomy in the hips/butt. I am 5-7 and wore 3 inch heels and it was about half an inch too short (as shown in pic), but no one really noticed

Loved this dress, classic silhouette but the color really made it pop. Got so many compliments on it. It was a little big in the waist, but the piping on the inside gave it enough structure that it wasn't noticeable.

links_Review_Title: The ceremony was perfect and colorful!
links_Review_Text: The fit was Perfect, the Material is heavier but snug in the right places. I would absolutely rent this again!

links_Review_Title: Felt like I was attending the oscars in this dress; it has a classic Hollywood vibe.
links_Review_Text: True to size, I’m in between a 8-10. Georgous drap to dress, very flattering. I still used a body shaped underneath for smooth lines.
Prom! Was a little long but gorgeous color and nice fit for a strapless dress

This dress was gorgeous and I got so many compliments. The color is perfect for the spring/summer. Also, I'm very tall and wore 3 inch heels and the long length was plenty long. I will say if you are self conscious about your stomach, the fabric isn't very forgiving. However, I wore some Spanx and felt great! Definitely recommend

Loved this dress - it was very comfortable and I got tons of compliments (on the color especially). I was afraid it would be too long but with a 3 inch heel it was perfect (I'm 5'4"). I could have used some Spanx as the dress was not very forgiving!
Pros: scuba-like fabric, easy to walk/move in, and great color! Cons: wore a spanx underneath because fabric easy marks on your body But overall happy with the rental :)

THIS. GOWN. It was so much better than I expected. I was so worried about what the material would be since there were no reviews with photos. The color was gorgeous and the fit was perfect. It was comfortable and I could wear a strapless bra with no problem. Had too many compliments to count.
The fit was amazing!! It was very stretchy but thick enough to smooth everything. The top has elastic to help it stay up. I'm 5'8 and would definitely recommend buying the long.

links_Review_Title: I was the only woman in the entire room wearing this color and received compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: True to size. Forgiving fabric although Spanx or a shaper is a must due to the light color... it shows imperfections. High slit in back aids in walking. Length is average to long. I’m 5’5” and wore 3 in heels with no problem. Absolutely beautiful dress!
The long is way too long. The color was fine but a little bright for me

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress that fit me like a glove!
links_Review_Text: Other than being a little too long, it fit me perfectly. I ordered a 13 and a 14. I normally wear a size 10 jeans and the 12R was just the right size! The fabric was also forgiving so although it was a perfect fit, it didn't fee too tight.
Scuba-like material! I like things a little tight, so the 2R was perfect. The color is true to the picture.

The color is just fabulous. You'll receive compliments from everyone! I tried the 6R and 8 R, and liked the tighter fit of the 6R, as it seemed to pull the dress features to the right places. This dress is long. Even with a platform heel, I had to keep it pulled up as high as it would go and was still kicking it a bit when a walked. The neckline is very flattering and is high enough to accommodate a bra. I would buy this in a heartbeat, even though it's that memorable. I just loved every detail!

links_Review_Title: This dress was so stunning and perfect for this event!! the 2 tall fit me perfectly.
links_Review_Text: It has a lot of stretch so it fit me really well. I would recommend wearing spanks though.

links_Review_Title: Coronavirus can't keep this blazer down
links_Review_Text: COVID-19 and working at home is really preventing from me being able to rock all my RTR looks. While I rent this for a night out at a casino, this was the perfect way to show up to a quarantine house party instead. Comfy outfit plus sequins - new way to rock athleisure.

links_Review_Title: Love this. Used it to film a scene
links_Review_Text: Great fit. Just the perfect suit

This blazer is a dream. I wore it to work and felt like Beyoncé all day -- mostly because this reminds me of the blazer she wore to sing "Love on Top" at an MTV awards show years ago. I got more compliments than I can count on my fingers and would wear this every day (if it were social acceptable, of course). I got a size up to accommodate my bust and it fit like a glove. This wasn't a problem for me, but something to be aware of when you ordering this piece.

Obsessed with this blazer, the fit is so flattering and it makes the perfect statement. The sequins are clear, so the plaid pattern of the blazer comes through and the sequins only shine when the light hits them right. The sequins aren't very scratchy and the lining is very comfortable. Recommend!
I got so many compliments! Wore with a silk black tank and black skinny jeans. Was sparkling all night :)
The blazer was super cute. You could dress it up or down. Beautiful fabric.

links_Review_Title: Fab & fun without being too much
links_Review_Text: I originally rented this through unlimited to wear on NYE, but didn't end up wearing it. I wore it instead to a party at a bar and stood out- but in a good way! It is sparkly but not super in your face sparkly. And the blazer gave me a good shape even unbuttoned

Fit true to size. High quality fabric - sequins stay put. I wore the pants and jacket together (for a work holiday party I was hosting) but would be great as separates too. Tons of compliments. Super fun!! Love!
Rented this for a work conference where being noticeable helped draw people in to our booth. I loved the fit too. Look how great it looks in natural light!

I loved the sparkly stand out look of this jacket. I got compliments all day long and lots of likes on social media. The square cut blazer is not the most flattering fit for my body type but paired with a body con sheath, it all came together. I need to buy this but I might just rent it again when I think I need to feel like a million bucks again.

links_Review_Title: Just not tapered enough or maybe too big?
links_Review_Text: I wanted to love this so bad but it just didn't fit in a way that read well on camera. I'm on the petite side but an athletic build, so while it fit in the shoulders it swallowed me everywhere else. Never got to wear it and sent it back.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a work dinner in Las Vegas. So.Many.Compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit was true to size

So this jacket is so great! pretty enough to wear on a date but subtle enough to wear at a networking event . Got zillions of compliments and in my mind a perfect rental because of its uniqueness . Rent immediately! You won't regret!
True to size. Nice weight. Loved it
Rented for a trip to Vegas with a girlfriend. Perfect fit, very high quality, and lovely tailoring. Really a winner.

This blazer runs large. I can rarely wear smaller than a 12 in a blazer (large chest) but I would order this in a 10 next time for a closer and more slimming fit. The sequins are great- add a very cool shimmer without being trashy. The buttons fell off while wearing it- while literally sitting with my family opening Christmas gifts. If yours arrives missing buttons check the pockets! That's where I put them haha. I bet RTR won't look to mend it.
Runs slightly small and is a fun play on a traditional suit (sequin).

links_Review_Title: Loved this! Will definitely rent again! Got so many compliments and it fit perfectly
links_Review_Text: Was not itchy at all bc the inside of the jacket is satin. It fit perfectly and I got so many compliments at work. Would have bought, but it was a little out of my price range. Will definitely rent again

links_Review_Title: This jacket was a great accent with a little black dress. I received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly

Sadly I didn't get to wear it because my shipment got in late the evening of my event but I tried it on and it is spectacular. The fit is so great. The sequins are just enough, not too much. It is comfortable, has some stretch to it. I would definitely rent this again.
Great

Really stunning and received a billion compliments. Very unique and flattering. I think I could have gone to a 0 but the shoulders might have been tight. I kind of like a little room with my blazers- but wouldn't call this oversize by any means. Looks like the picture. Just rent it.
Loved this blazer! Got lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Everyone complimented me and told me to buy it
links_Review_Text: Everyone complimented me and told me to buy it

I'm 5'10'' and it's a bit short on the arms for me. Bunching them up or rolling them is not as easy as I expected because of the sequins but it looked good. I wanted a larger look so I rented size 8 instead next. Lovely fabric. Lots of compliments.

Omg. This blazer!!! Such a fab take on a classic. I was so excited to wear this and it did not disappoint. As a petite gal, I was nervous it would be too big, but found it was totally fine on my smaller frame. WISH I had taken a photo to share, but will definitely be renting this blazer again! Sequins seemed to be holding up extremely well but did notice that one of the buttons was coming loose.
The fabric is something else - the plaid is the pattern underneath, with a clear sequin overlay on top. Haven't seen anything quite like it before. Very fresh!
This is made for someone very tall, with long arms, and no bust. I am petite with big boobs and it made me look like a kid playing dress-up in her mom's 80s blazer. Very disappointing.
This is the perfect dress for a not so formal wedding! Everyone loved the style, color and cut of the dress and it hugs your curves perfectly!

I wore this dress to a friend's wedding. Overall, it looks great, but the fit is challenging. I ordered and 8 and a 10, and wore the 10 because the 8 was too snug in the hips/thighs. However, the 10 fit in the hips, but was large in the top. I was surprised because I do not have a particularly small chest, so I usually don't have that problem. I definitely needed double stick tape, and even then the top doesn't have enough structure, so the points on the bust fall down all night. I also had a problem with the lining shifting. Everytime I stood up, I had to excuse myself to the ladies room to fix the lining because the dress would bunch and twist. Overall, the dress is beautiful, flattering (especially in the mid-section), and looks great. But the fit, especially when moving around, made it very difficult to wear.

links_Review_Title: This was a fabulous dress! I received many compliments throughout the night.
links_Review_Text: It fit perfectly in all the right places !

links_Review_Title: Hugs your curves in all the right places
links_Review_Text: OBSESSED. This dress was amazing and super flattering. Warning it doesn't have much give - so if you're well endowed on the bottom half of your body consider sizing up.

links_Review_Title: Flattering and different flare to a LBD.
links_Review_Text: Only con is it wrinkles really easily and quickly.

links_Review_Title: Hide areas I wanted to hide and emphasized those I wanted to show off
links_Review_Text: Cute and sassy - this dress showed off my chest and made me feel sexy but not too sexy. Only issue I had was the boning inside - it definitely dug into my rib cage after a while of sitting down.

links_Review_Title: Unique dress and tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress and so many compliments all night! Only complaint was that the top was a little too big. I wanted to wear the size 6, but the top kept falling down and didn't sit snug. I decided to wear the 4, which was a little shorter but solved the top issue.
Little big in the chest but so fun!
Pros: super soft material, fit true to size, unique Cons: none! Loved the dress!!

links_Review_Title: I was very comfortable in this dress and had full room to dance because it was just the right length
links_Review_Text: The green is a little less green and more teal in person, but the length is great for any occasion or age range. I also loved the unique neckline. Very comfortable and very flattering!

links_Review_Title: This dress was absolutely stunning! The emerald green was so beautiful in person!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a holiday party I was invited to. I ordered the size 0 and size 2, and ended up wearing the 0. The 2 may have been more comfortable to sit in, but I needed the 0 because I'm very petite on the top. Wouldn't recommend for dancing, but there wasn't much dancing at the event I was at. I didn't feel like I had to pull it up a lot either, and the straps stayed tucked in well. Ultimately I received so many compliments from my date and others at the party. Very happy with this dress!
The dress fit absolutely perfect.

I wish I had a better photo of me in this dress! It's not as low cut as this photo suggests (I was leaning forward a little with my bad posture). It was so gorgeous on! It ran true to size. The only problem I had was the black hanging straps kept creeping up.
Great dress. Sash across stomach and fabric quality mean it's very flattering. Only issue is that the points at the front have a tendency to curl outwards so needed occasional adjustment.
I love the construction of this dress! I'm usually 0/2, I order the 0 and it was SNUG! kinda hard to walk. But beautiful!

I was skeptical about this dress because of the length but it was incredible! The colors and color blocking were perfect for me and the side was very flattering. My midsection isn't my fav part so it perfectly concealed it without looking frumpy or matronly. Only concern is the chest might need some fashion tape. Absolutely stunning and I felt incredible!
Wore this to a wedding and felt pretty good in it but had to use double sided tape on the top to really enjoy the dance floor

links_Review_Title: Unique and flattering dress with a gorgeous pop of color!
links_Review_Text: Loved this rental!! It came new with tags. Fit true to size for the most part-- it was a little big on top but I am very small chested, it would work better on someone with a C cup or larger I think. Would totally rent this again in the future!

I wore this for a wedding. I usually wear a 4 or 6 and the 4 fit perfectly. I'm 5'11 and the dress was the perfect short length. The neckline makes your boobs looks great but the green side isn't as stiff as the black so it kept drooping a little. Overall great dress!

links_Review_Title: It wasn't--I couldn't wear the dress
links_Review_Text: I sized up and it still did not fit

The dress fits like a glove, love the neckline! Very flattering shape and style, hugs all the right places and the fabric in the middle conceals your midsection. I just wish there was a slit on the back because it was very difficult to move in it. Another great rental!

Definitely not for someone with a smaller bust, I had to put fillers in and it still was big! I'm a 32B and was pulling it up all night. Other than that, beautiful and fun. The green is perfect for the holidays!

I'm usually a size 2, and this one ran a little big - it was loose overall, and the top definitely would require tape to stay up. The bodice doesn't have wire or anything, so the cups will just flop down otherwise. Could be cute in the right size and with tape though!
Dress to big in the chest area and I have double d's _ would rent a size smaller next time.
I liked the design of the dress, but the top fits strangely. I am busty enough to fill the dress (34DD), but the fabric is soft and there is a lack of structure.

links_Review_Title: I didn’t wear this item because it was too loose in the chest.
links_Review_Text: The chest was too loose; there are those pointed flaps that end up falling or sticking out if your chest is too small for it. The color of the satin is beautiful though.

links_Review_Title: Classy Cocktail Dress for Fall Wedding
links_Review_Text: I was nervous to rent this with so few reviews but still decided to go for it (&unfortunately didn't get ANY pictures). I was definitely between sizes for this dress; the 0 fit better up top, but was snug around my athletic thighs/butt, so I opted to wear the 2 to be able to sit/eat/dance more comfortably. it was a little big up top, but not unwearable. The color blocking detail was very flattering to the waist line& I got a lot of compliments! Would be a great dress for a Christmas party!

links_Review_Title: I did not end up wearing this but a very cute dress.
links_Review_Text: Runs small in rib cage and width in hips and bigger in the top.

This dress was one of my favorite rentals from RTR. It fit like a glove, was the perfect cocktail dress length (I'm 5'10") and made me feel glamorous the whole night. Wish I could afford to buy this one!
I took this on a trip for a destination wedding as my first pick, but after 2 weeks of travel eating and drinking, I couldn't fit it anymore lol. But it was a great dress and color

links_Review_Title: This dress is amazing. So sorry it didn't fit. Too tight. Will try next size.
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress - beautiful colors but runs just a tad small in breast area (I am a DDD). Will order next size but I fear that may be too big.

I have rented several Missoni items from RTR and the size 4 was always perfect. Another review said this was tight in the hips so I sized up-that was a good decision. It did stretch out a little as the day went on but still glad I had the larger size.
I ended up not wearing it out because i wore another RTR. But this was SO comfy! A very 60's shape.

links_Review_Title: Fun print. But not for girls with hips!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for work, even though it's sparkly and short. Even though it didn't fit/flatter me, I was really excited about the idea of the dress and wore it anyway. I tried to tone it down with black opaque tights. The dress is cut generously up top, but it is very straight through the hips. I think it looked okay from the front but I was very self-conscious about how it clung to my butt from the side

links_Review_Title: The mixed pattern of the dress!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a co-workers going away party after work. It was comfortable and yet made a statement. 14 and true to size. Wore it with leggings and tall boots. Perfect winter work outfit.
TTS and comfortable to wear. Can be dress up or down.

Fabric is very comfortable and soft. There's a metallic shimmer to several of the stripes, and most noticeable in the red. Hits about 3 inches above the knee on me (5'5"). Shows my bra on the sides, but probably wouldn't with someone less busty. Will wear it Christmas Day for hosting a house party with black tights & boots. Looks good with a leather or knit short blazer. Classy, elegant, and fun.
I liked this a lot more than I expected- shoulders were a little annoying at points/not sure easy to move in. Also kind of hard to find what exactly to pair with it
Summer perfection for a cooler evening. The top fits beautifully and is so flattering. It's floral and girly but the boat neck make it sexy. Perfect pick for a date night on an outdoor patio!
Fits true to size, does not run small. Will rent again soon!

Very pretty and flattering. I'm sort of between a S and M and got the small, which made this fit a little small, but the great thing is that the sleeves look good pulled up or down. It was hard to zip myself, so keep that in mind. The top of the boning dug into my chest in front, so wearing it for more than a few hours would be hard. Can be worn easily though without a bra since it's boned, which is great since it is off the shoulders.

Great fit. Comfortable. On trend with the sleeves. A little short on a person with a longer torso, but perfect with high waisted jeans! You could easily do many types of shoes, even a classic white sneaker!
Short top and great for high waist. Beautiful cut and fit.

This blouse is so pretty and something I wouldn't of tried because I don't feel talented enough to wear off the shoulders fashion. It turns out, that well made clothes make a difference when it comes to these types of choices. Initially, the small looked too small on the hanger, but it fit perfectly. I wore a strapless bra but there is substantial support in the blouse and the material is heavy. The cropped fit went well with the high waisted RTR lavender jeans. I had fun with this outfit.

links_Review_Title: Lunch date with my bestie and her babe
links_Review_Text: A little tight on my upper arms, but loose on the top of my shoulders where it is designed to rest; some adjusting while wearing due to wire on bodice and around breasts; short on my torso so I wore a plum tank under; favorite part are the bellowed sleeves.
I wore to a concert it was super cute and fun

links_Review_Title: Amazing brand and feels so good!
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit for me! I'm 5'7 so if you're any taller you may need to have a high waisted bottom on hand as well!
Went out for dinner and received so many compliments on my top and purse ( I know, I know... My purse didn't match...).

Amazing quality of fabric and a beautiful print. The boat neck is super flattering and the fit was perfect and slimming in the waist. The shirt was a bit shorter than I expected but would pair well with high waisted jeans or skirt. Absolutely loved this top!!
Super cute top. However the boneing is poking out of the fabric and it's irritating. Next time leave out the boneing.

links_Review_Title: Very cute and flattering but not at all comfortable. The boning kept poking me. Would not rent again
links_Review_Text: Nice fabric. Beautiful print. Uncomfortable

links_Review_Title: Great off the shoulder well constructed blouse. A little tight around the rib cage so I ordered up.
links_Review_Text: A little tight around the rib cage so I ordered up. Fit my upper arms but could be tight on others ...very fitted around the upper arm area
comfortable and very flattering
I wore this for a party I hosted. Wore it with skinny jeans and I loved the look. It makes your neck look long somehow.
I'm usually a medium and there was only a large available which is great because it fit perfectly! Not too short but sometimes my mid would show if I moved. Beautiful I loved it

links_Review_Title: More casual looking and slightly large in the waist.
links_Review_Text: It was super cute in the pictures but on me, the waist was too big and the shoulders seemed to constantly shift.

Beautiful and feminine, the cut of the torso and shoulder is unique, not quite off the shoulder and similar to boatneck, it shows off collarbone which to me is sexy and sophisticated. Very fitted in rib and stomach area so if you need a bit of room size up, otherwise gives a very contoured effect. Sleeves are to die for with fitted upper arms and "balloon" like elbow to wrist which looks beautiful. Will rent a 3rd yes a 3rd time :)
Lovely pretty blouse!
It has wires down the front which helps with the overall look but not comfortable.
Cute but if you have any type of hips it's not gonna work
It's a beautiful pattern and fabric. Unfortunately, the XS was about two sizes too small for me. If you have medium to large breasts order up.

links_Review_Title: Pretty color but big in chest
links_Review_Text: The colors and make of this top are perfect but the structured part of the top is large if you are flat chested!

Great shirt...and received a lot of compliments. I rented this for vacation and the boat-neck fit is SO flattering on any body shape. I was a little hesitant at first, but the shirt is made perfectly. The only concern is that the shirt zips all the way up the back, so if you have broad shoulders you may need to size up.
Boning to keep the neck line and waist structured. All the way down zipper in the back for pizzaz. Fun top for everyday

links_Review_Title: Great top but has seen better days.
links_Review_Text: Top fit nicely, flattering fit and true to size. I have broad shoulders and sometimes these tops don't fit well but the M was perfect. Unfortunately this top definitely showed signs of wear. This particular garment should probably be cycled out.

links_Review_Title: Adorable fits perfect but slightly cropped so best with a higher waist pant!
links_Review_Text: Super cute, looks just like picture.
loved this shirt, might need another person to help you zip it up!

Pro is that it is a very cute crop top, it looks longer in photos (I am not tall, this just runs short). Sleeves are super fun and the purple flowers pop! Just be aware your midsection will show (unless paired with something high waisted)

This top would be awesome, if it fit me. I am a 34D, 5'9" and this top is a little tight and short. It is much more fitted than I thought it would be, but I did not read reviews, which is my mistake. Maybe someone mentioned it there. I felt like I was wearing a crop top because the bottom did not quite reach the top of the pants. However, if you are a little shorter, this might be perfect for you. I loved the structure of it and the design. I'm sad because I think it is a really cool top. If this top fit, I would have rated it 5 stars.

links_Review_Title: This is such a beautiful shirt!
links_Review_Text: Fits great true to size, very flattering

links_Review_Title: This does not fit at all like shown - at least not on me.
links_Review_Text: Not the fabric or look I had in mind from the photo. And unlike in this photo, mine showed most of my stomach though it fit on arms and chest. Not at all flattering on me. Did not wear it.

links_Review_Title: I could not wear it. Too small.
links_Review_Text: I could not wear it. Too small in chest and too short in torso. I also have a short torso.

It's comical how small this top is. I read another review that you need someone else to help you in it, and I agree, there's no way I would have gotten into it without my husband so I had to return it. Honestly, I think I needed an XL (and I'm normally a S/M) , it was just nowhere near closing but again, I didn't attempt to zip it because I couldn't do it myself. It's also cropped, which I didn't realize. Wish I could have worn it because I liked the pattern!

links_Review_Title: Not great for my large chest
links_Review_Text: I've been weightlifting and this top did not fit my broad shoulders or larger chest. I wish I could have worn, because it was a great top!
Good luck getting in to this top alone, it zips up the back. Short torso and form fitting but wonderful once it is on.
I would have loved to wear this, but my shoulders were too narrow, so the top didn't sit right (or sat at all) on my shoulders. It's fitted in the waist, fyi.

links_Review_Title: Cute top but a little small
links_Review_Text: This shirt was more cropped than I thought it would be from the photos. It came to about half an inch below my belly button so it left my lower stomach exposed. I wore it with high waisted jeans to cover it up. Overall it was cute, a little movement-restricting because of the size, but looked great on.

The mobility and comfort made this one of the greatest outfits I've ever worn to a wedding! It's a very groovy design and I got a lot of compliments on it and I felt so confident in it all night. I was nervous the front would come unlatched but even on the dance floor it was very secure. The hardest part is going to the bathroom, for obvious reasons. The jumpsuit definitely fits the model differently but I still liked the way it fit me, too. This is the first item I've used RTR and I was so impressed with the ease of delivery and returns. I love that they gave me a backup size for free (although I didn't need it). I highly recommend this piece to anyone looking for something fun and unique!

I rented this jumpsuit for a work party and loved wearing it! I ended up wearing the XS, although the small would have worked fine too. Definitely have sticky boobs or petals on hand if you plan to wear this for an event, since it is somewhat backless.

links_Review_Title: FUN ROMPER WITH A SEXY V
links_Review_Text: I loved this romper and really regret returning it. I wore to an outdoor winter wedding. the color and velvet material make it on trend but also very unique. serious regrets about not buying this. it does have a clip if you do not want to wear the deep V, but with a little fashion tape i was able to wear it open all night and have no concerns for a janet jackson moment (note i am a small B cup). rent this!
Fit great and was so comfortable! Would recommend for any party!
Love this price because it's unique! Love that it's velvet! Felt amazing in it.

I’m 5’3” and this jumpsuit definitely needed heels! You also can’t wear a bra with it so be prepared for that. I got so many compliments on it though! It’s fun and different and perfect for a wedding!
Fabric is beautiful and it feels good to wear it but the legs are very wide which make it look like a dress. The buttom on the front kept opening so it was a bit annoying but it is beautiful outfit

links_Review_Title: AMAZING! My favorite rental so far!
links_Review_Text: It was a perfect fit, true to size. I wore for my bachelorette party - it was so comfortable and I was able to dance all night long! I can’t wait to rent again!

This was a hit! Worn to my company holiday party with many other beautiful and stylish women. With this outfit, it felt like I fit right in! Easy to move in and definitely easy to eat a meal; very forgiving. On the thicker side, so kept me warm, but not hot. No bra is always a win! Fit pretty well but was a tad baggy in areas. Would recommend!
I loved this jumpsuit! I might wear it one more time before I return it. It was really trendy and I got tons of compliments by strangers at my husband's work holiday party!

This jumper is amazing. The color, the fit, the style! I loved everything about it and I didn't want to send it back! For reference, I'm 5'4" and weigh around 145lbs. Even with my long legs, this jumper didn't "ride up" like rompers usually do on me.

I rented this for a wedding and dressed it up with accessories. It was awesome- I felt like my outfit was completely different than everyone else's and I was DEFINITELY the most comfortable gal in the room.

links_Review_Title: Great jumpsuit! Color is beautiful and very comfy
links_Review_Text: loved it!!! I wore this to my company's holiday party and got compliments on it all night. It's longer than I thought it would be. I'm 5'5" and it went right above my ankles. You could still see my ankles and heels which was nice. My bust size is 36b, but I'd think if you have a bigger bust this outfit would show a lot of cleavage.

The color is really rich and beautiful in person. I would've usually rented a medium and large, but went with medium and small after reading other reviews. I'm so glad I did as I ended up wearing the small. It was a bit snug in the waist but it worked. The medium was too big/too revealing in the chest. (I'm small busted.) It was a tad short in the torso but the stretch and the drape of the fabric were very forgiving. All that said, I felt really confident in this!

links_Review_Title: Fun design in an interesting color
links_Review_Text: Really enjoyed this rental! It was low cut, so you will need the appropriate bra or stickies (smaller sizes can go without if that is your preference). The only reason I am withholding the fifth star is because the clasp at the bust kept undoing itself and I had to fiddle with it several times that evening.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and so fun for fall wedding
links_Review_Text: This might be my favorite rental to date. This is not something I'd buy, but I'm so glad I got to wear it to one of my best friend's wedding! The color (pleasantly) surprised me compared to pictures - it was darker and more brown than gold. I thought the color complimented my skin tone well, and I was worried I was too pale to pull off the gold color I expected. The material is perfectly flowing, and it kept me warm enough during a fall wedding. The cut is very flattering. No bra needed.
Fit great. Super comfortable. It looks WAY better in person than pictures. Perfect for fall wedding. Not heavy, but not light.
The fit was amazing! I got so many compliments on this jumpsuit. The color was a bit darker than in the photo on the model, but I was still really happy with it!

I wore this for my early-September bridal shower. The copper color was so beautiful and the material was so comfortable. So many people asked where I got it! I left the clasp open for a more plunging neckline :)

links_Review_Title: Perfect jumpsuit for a winter wedding!
links_Review_Text: When I first tried on this jumpsuit I was a little skeptical but it totally grew on me! By the end of the night I was in love with this jumpsuit! Super comfortable and flattering. Perfect for dancing in! The VERY low front was something kind of different and fun for me since I really do not have much up top hah. (Their was a clasp if needed). This jumpsuit was so different, with the velvet material and rust color. Really enjoyed it!!
It was so comfortable and easy to get on and off for a jumpsuit. I got some nice compliments but it did make me look a little wider in the lower body. The material was super soft and luxury.
Fit really nicely. A little loose in the chest but not enough to need tape.
The flowy, yet breathable velvet fabric made this surprisingly suitable for a summer wedding. And the flattering, disco vibes were a huge hit!

Rented this for party. The fit was a little large for me. I could have done an XS. I really liked the flow, wish it had pockets. There is a little hook in the front to control the plunge in the neckline. It was very sturdy around the bust.

links_Review_Title: Super comfortable and perfect for formal occasions
links_Review_Text: Loved this look and got so many compliments! Ran just slightly big- I love the wide leg look but these were a little too wide than expected where it looked like a dress. Length was great- coming from someone whose short (5'2") and has to be careful with ordering jumpsuits online, the shorter leg length was perfect to work with. Great look for a formal gala instead of wearing a gown!

I had SO many people ask me where I got this jumpsuit. I have a larger chest and am fairly tall so jumpsuits can sometimes fit weird, but this was well worth the risk. The back is gorgeous and I didn't need to wear a bra! The elastic band didn't look cheap and fit really well. Was comfortable to wear for 5+ hours and I didn't want to take it off! Would rent again.

I loved this dress; it's casual and simple, but standout at the same time. The fabric is comfortable and forgiving, but does run smaller overall than you'd infer from the sizes. I'm a size 6-8 around my waist and I couldn't button the medium. The large fit great around the waist and wasn't too big on my boobs (36B/C). I couldn't wear with a bra, but again the fabric is very forgiving because of the tight pleating. My only issue is that if you have a long torso like I do, expect to be wedged up. It was annoying/distracting and borderline painful. But, beauty is pain and I'm still considering getting the dress for another wedding because it looked so good.

links_Review_Title: I felt so comfortable and elegant in this number! Knew the color and material would standout.
links_Review_Text: Fits as expected, I am 5'3, 125 lbs 34b and wore an extra small. There is a clasp to keep the top snug, but I wore double sided tape at one point to create that sexy plunge look. It is a heavy piece because the material is so weighty, yet the cut and flow make it breezy and acceptable for fall-late spring. I wore this to the James Beard awards in Chicago during early May and felt great going from day time ~70 degrees to night upper 40s. Lots of compliments because it is so different! Highly recommend and kind of want to buy it...

This was perfect for a chilly spring day. It was cold and rainy so the velvet worked, but it's short sleeved so perfect for spring. I wore with the hook closed because I was with family but it would be very revealing without the hook (and maybe sexier and could go into an evening look).. It photographs more brown than it appears in person - it has pinkish tones. Very comfortable. I did not wear a bra. Am a 36b. It's open in the back. Very comfortable!
I'm 5"2 and it was long on me but I like it better as pants! I got so many compliments. The v-neck cut is low but I pinned it up with some safety pins. It was comfortable, faltering and classy.
Fit really well! I'm 5'4", and it was the perfect length. More brown than it looks on the site, but it was still a nice color. Got lots of compliments, and the velvet texture is wonderful.

links_Review_Title: Perfect jumpsuit for an outdoor event!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved the color and feel of this jumpsuit. Was a little concerned it would be too heavy or hot for a late spring in Alabama, but it was perfect. I originally ordered a medium, but it swallowed me up. I'm glad I sized down and got the small as well. The only issue I had was the clasp at the bosom. It came undone a few times, but for the most I had no other complaints.
I wore it to a 20s themed party and people were obsessed. They thought it was something I owned that happened to go well with it and kept getting asked where I got it. It's so cute, highly recommend

I was a little nervous to rent this because it was so out of my comfort zone and could really go either way (super cute or super hideous) but it exceeded all of my expectations the second I tried it on. The fit is right on, it doesn't flare weird to make your hips look oversized, and the v neck isn't too deep. It flows beautifully, is incredibly comfortable, and even if you are someone who prefers to wear a bra (me) you can actually get away with not. Definite rental if you're still deciding.

links_Review_Title: It was a perfect outfit for a disco themed fundraiser. Super comfy and flattering.
links_Review_Text: I ordered the medium and the large and ended up going with the large. It hit right at the wide part of my rib cage and I needed another half inch of space on the Medium zipper. Because I’m short the length hit right at my ankles but that was fine- it looked good and the cropped length on the model would have made me look shorter anyway. I would definitely recommend this jumpsuit.

This was my second time renting this jumpsuit because I love it so much. Somehow it's both retro and modern. The velvet is so soft! The color so rich! It's a high quality garment you could wear to a costume party, company party, or even a wedding. It's also super comfortable. Only possible con is having to sit on the toilet naked and then having to retie the back, but #jumpsuitlifeforever.

links_Review_Title: A great night out dancing in the city
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous fabric and a perfect blend of playful/sexy/comfortable. I'm long wasted and many jumpsuits don't work for me. This one was just a hair short through torso but the drape of the fabric made it work. Loved this outfit!
Such a flattering piece. I received so many compliments! It's very comfortable, and I was able to dance the night away with everything staying in place. I would definitely rent this again!

links_Review_Title: Amazing jumpsuit for an early spring wedding!
links_Review_Text: Felt confident and comfortable in this jumpsuit at a friend's wedding and got so many compliments, including from someone who came up to me out of nowhere to ask where I got this from! I wore the chest part unclasped so it was more low cut than I'm used to, but I'm glad I did, since it made it look a bit more stylish and formal. The only downside to wearing it low cut is that the chest clasp can't be hidden so it looks like you forgot to clasp it when you're up close. But in pictures, you can't tell. I definitely recommend this amazing jumpsuit for any occasion! I'm normally a size 4 or size small and the size SR was perfect.
Wore it for a disco glam party. Very cute! I got tons of complements. Waist is pretty small but still fit fine.
Loved this top! Tons of compliments and super comfortable and flattering! Unique in a timeless way!

I had been eyeing this top in a local shop. It's a great rental item and ran true to size. The fabric was nice quality too. I wore a 2-inch heel. The sash did not hit the floor, but it wasn't far from it. At dinner it became my napkin (just kidding) --it did get mixed up with it at times. I had to keep the sash on my lap during dinner to keep it off the floor. This top is probably better for a cocktail party that you are standing most of the night. Overall a fun rental!

links_Review_Title: Choice between length and bust fit
links_Review_Text: I loved the look of this shirt and felt elegant to have a train all day. But the size 10 was a better fit length wise - it was just too tight on the bust so I had to size up. The 12 was much looser in the waist and the train was much longer so even with heels I was almost walking on it. Big difference between sizes!
TTS. Loved the long fabric at the front. Classic top with a twist.
Form fitting, thicker material that looks nice in person and photos. So many compliments. I would wear it again and again!

links_Review_Title: Casual but dramatic! You will stand out in the crowd!
links_Review_Text: Perfect in every way possible. Looks brand new!

I could not have been happier with this top! My favorite RtR piece! Unique design. Borderline a bit much for work but I received tons of compliments; would be appropriate for evening wear. Def wear heels if you're under 5'8"! Quality fabric. Doesn't wrinkle easily.
This top is amazing and looks so much better on. I'm typically a 4 in this brand and the 6 fit perfectly. It's tight but not too tight. So many compliments!!

Great vacay dress! Great for hot weather too! The humidity was ridiculous but this dress was light and airy and didn't stick to me. I had to wear a slip because it was pretty sheer. That was the only negative. See more of my rentals on insta @itsminefornow

Rented this dress for a winter vacation in the Carribean and it was perfect! So lightweight and easy to wear (and pack) but also very flattering! I usually wear a medium, but based on other reviews, I sized down and ordered the small and it fit perfectly!

LOVE everything about this dress, it's so soft that is like wearing a slip. Perfect for hot weather. Super versatile, put on some sandals and you can wear to the market, add hills and nice accesories and you can wear it out to dinner or to brunch w/family or friends... don't want to return!!!

Butter soft and boho while ethereal and classy. Seriously doesn't get much better than this. Was absolutely perfect for a day of wine tasting on a warm August day. Got compliments all day long and would highly consider buying if I ever find this on sale.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous material but a bit baggy
links_Review_Text: The bottom of this dress is just gorgeous and the material so soft and light. My only issue is that the bunched waist made me look larger than I am so I didn't wear it. I'm normally a small but going to size down to an extra small and try again.

One of my favorite rentals to date. Floaty and lightweight, the color is amazingly saturated and the cutouts are beautiful. In addition to being beautiful, it's amazingly comfortable -- I felt like I was wearing pajamas all day! Wish I could keep it...
Great dress- totally fine length even with flats on 5"0.
Wore on a cruise, lots of compliments

Size down one or two sizes! I tried this in the gold previously and it was way too big in my usual size. This time, I sized down two sizes and it fit perfectly! Gorgeous dress! Perfect for vacation or the holidays. Lightweight fabric. Flows beautifully.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for my first trip in a hot air balloon over the Table Lands in Australia. ❤️
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect and flattering. I will definitely rent again. Zero complaints!!

links_Review_Title: Arrived soiled so didn't get to wear it!
links_Review_Text: Pretty & floaty

This style didn't work on my body shape (I'm long waisted, so really defined waists don't typically work on me), but I had my sister try it on and she looked great in it! The color is great. The material is great. I do recommend it.

I wore this dress in New Orleans on a hot day and it was an absolute dream! I loved this dress so much. I did not want to give it back. I considered buying but it was too expensive and winter was around the corner so it felt frivolous. This dress is a great color, the material flows and cooling. I want to rent this again...if not buy it!
Color is gorgeous. Fit is flattering for most figures.

links_Review_Title: Great color, cute style, comfy fit. Perfect for a “beach chic” dress code.
links_Review_Text: Blousy fit is forgiving. Loved that I didn’t need a special bra (just cross crossed my straps.)
Got a lot of compliments, fits great!

links_Review_Title: The color and style are gorgeous
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress- it is light weight and perfect for a date night!

links_Review_Title: Great dress! It was light and fun to wear!
links_Review_Text: This was a great dress! The color was beautiful, it was light, and you could dress it up or down. The skirt is a thin so ended up wearing a mini skirt under it and it worked great!
Absolutely beautiful dress. Love the color for summer. Very lightweight and breezy. Just beware that it is thin material and pretty see through.

I fluctuate between 150-160 and I'm short (5'1'') so finding the right length on dresses is a struggle. This dress was amazing and I was complimented by strangers too. It feels like satin and super flowy even in TX heat. It's also a tiny bit see through but only when standing up exactly in the light ... not enough to wear a slip although I did were modest underwear. And then finally for girls with big hips this one is a winner.
Fits great, flowy and cool for a hot day

Rented this for a party, but chose another RTR dress. Wore this to church the next day instead and received a ton of compliments. It's super lightweight and airy (perfect for Texas heat!). I am usually a solid 2 or small and wore this in an XS. It fit perfect, but I feel like I could have done the small as well since it's gathered at the waist.

I loved this. I was worried it would feel tight or itchy, but it felt fine. I felt really beautiful in it. I wore it on a date night, on vacation, and out running errands. It's different from anything else in my closet and I seriously considered buying it. If the price reduces a bit more I probably will. I was able to zip it and unzip it without any help. I'll definitely rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for my bachelorette! Small in the chest if you are bigger on top. I couldn't wear a bra.
links_Review_Text: Small in chest area and a little short. But perfect for my small frame.

I really like this but couldn't love it. As other reviews mentioned the bust line is restricting.. and I'm an A cup. Sleeves were long too but I was able to roll them up easily. Definitely a shirt made for a tall slender type.
Beware larger busted ladies. Even with sizing up, this was tight across the chest
Wore this top with jeans and white boots for a fun dinner out with friends. Great fit even with my large bust!

What I love most abt this top, is that nobody else in the room will be wearing anything like this! It's really cute. Unfortunately, this arrived with a stain, so I didn't wear it out. But I did wanna show it to those who are interested in seeing it on someone besides the model. Fits true to size. Good quality fabric.
This top is gorgeous and you can dress up or down. Wore it to a work function with jeans and booties. So cute!!!

links_Review_Title: So pretty but sleeves are very long
links_Review_Text: The top is so pretty. Doesn't have give so if in doubt I would size up. Also, if you are petite I would pass because the sleeves are so long. They don't look good too baggy/long.
Easy to wear and great with jeans on a Friday!

I am 5'11" and 145lbs with a 36d bra size. The large fit perfectly on my long torso and arms. It was pretty and I got several compliments at work and out and about. The only cons I have to say is that the floral appliqués on the shirt are bent (some of them anyway) and the shirt color almost looked old because it wasn't white anymore but almost as if it were washed with darker clothes.

I wore this several times to work, with jeans, and out to drinks. Based on other reviews I sized up to a medium and was glad I did. The band across the chest would have been uncomfortably tight in the small. This may not be the best shirt if you have a larger chest. The material and detailing make it much more special than your average white shirt.
Tight across the chest. Lace was pulled in several spots. Somewhat scratchy and uncomfortable. The other thing is that I was so cold in a breeze! But it was beautiful nonetheless.
I loved how high quality this top is. The lace is beautiful! It just runs pretty small. I am a 34B and I felt like the top was tight across the chest.

I wore this top at work. The lace is very nice and has interesting details around the collar bones and waist. The fit is loose around the torso, while somehow thight around the upper arms. I couldn't lift my arms past my shoulders without having to lift the sleeves to accommodate the movement. The top has a zipper in the back so the front looks very clean!
Beautiful detail, wore for work I tuked it into a pencil skirt, and it was a little bulky. Probably would be best not to tuck in.
Lovely top for work! I do not have a large bust, so the medium fit perfect. For bustier girls, consider sizing up!

This was a great top. Fabric is high quality, heavy lace, not flimsy at all. I wore it with black jeans and heels for Christmas dinner, but I think it could work during the summer too. The only thing I will note is that the band of lace running horizontally across the chest/back was a little snug. If you have a larger bust, you may want to size up because of that. I needed help zipping it all the way up despite having a smaller chest.
Looked cute but i couldnt really move in it. Didnt wear out of the house.

I loved the lace on this shirt. It was "sturdy" feeling and very elegant. I wish it had been a little longer but over all a very cute shirt. Glad I got the L instead of the M to accommodate my larger bra size. I don't think the M would have been as comfortable. I wore it work with grey pants and some wine colored block heels.
It's beautiful! Wore it with jeans and heels on Friday night. Wore it with Draper James sailor pants to work. Versatile and gorgeous!
Lots of material but beautiful

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous details on this Victorian style shirt!
links_Review_Text: Rented this as part of my Unlimited subscription. Not something I would normally wear but was fun to rotate into my wardrobe. The shirt arrived in perfect condition with tags still on. Wore with cropped, high-waisted, light wash jeans and a heeled mule.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful top. Tight in the chest.
links_Review_Text: Fashionable top. Gorgeous detail. Simply too tight on my 36B bosom.
Lace is beautiful and the body fits alright, but the sleeves are disproportionately big. Could not wear it :(
Stunning top, very detailed, unique
Wanted to really like this and was so disappointed in it. Definitely size up! I couldn't zip it and I'm a small/normal build of a person

links_Review_Title: If you have larger than a B cup, size up!
links_Review_Text: I wear a size 32 D and am a size small in all clothing and it was was too tight on my boobs
OK, I have no shoulders, no boobs. And I could not get it on. Yes, I unbuttoned etc. I'm as flat and scrawny as they come. On the TOP half anyway. Ladies, I am baffled. It's really cute.
The blouse was so beautiful, I couldn't wait to wear it. However, it was so tight on my chest that I couldn't get it completely zipped up. I would say size up if you are a C cup or above.

I liked this top in the picture and it other pictures from reviews, but when I got it, it looked dingy and not as cute. It also runs small in the chest and while I knew this based on other reviews, it was still too tight even though I went up a size. I ended up returning it and renting something else
fit well

links_Review_Title: cute on the hanger, not so great on
links_Review_Text: Shirt looks great on the hanger but found it to be boxy with zero stretch and the fabric seemed very thick. was not flattering once on. Sent this one right back.

links_Review_Title: Romantic look with lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: So so pretty - loads of compliments. Though, if you live alone this might not be for you - I could not zip it on my own without help.

links_Review_Title: Cute, everyday top. But difficult to move in.
links_Review_Text: Fit was true to size, the see-through areas were fine for work. Though I found it a bit difficult to move in.
Loved it

Like the reviews say it is true to size. I am small framed and a B bust an it was pulling at the chest. Heavy material made it a no go for a hot day or outdoor event but was a perfect top to even wear with slacks at the office. Overall I really liked it.

links_Review_Title: Feels a little like wearing your grandmothers doilie...
links_Review_Text: This was not my favorite. It is a weird looking ruffley lace that felt like I was wearing my grandmas's table cloth. It is also almost impossible to zip on your own.
Very cute and good fit. Looks very classy and expensive. A little see through so I had to wear an undershirt for work but doesn't really bother me.

links_Review_Title: Fun feminine top, tight on the bust.
links_Review_Text: I loved the look of this top and it was great for work! I would say it was a bit tight in the bust, so beware if that may be an issue for you.

links_Review_Title: Super cute top, runs a little small
links_Review_Text: This top fits a little small. I normally wear a medium and the large was just right. With a strapless bra, it worked out just fine. While the top quarter is very sheer, there is so much fabric and everything from chest down is well lined that I felt fine at work with this top. Would definitely rent it again. The details and lace felt very luxe.

links_Review_Title: LOVED! Received many compliments from strangers all night! Wore to a formal 1920s themed NYE Party.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly for the most part! Armholes were a bit on the tighter side though. I was worried between that and the sequins, it was going to irritate my underarms all night but I hardly felt anything. Length was perfect for my height when paired with 3" heels.

This was a VERY comfortable dress. I am all about comfort, but my daughter wanted me in sequins for her wedding so I had to be brave. I had hoped for a regular bra, but I wore a backless bra because it hangs pretty low in the back. The dress fit like a glove and I received more compliments than any other dress I have ever worn. I felt beautiful and comfortable. And isn't that what it's all about?
Fits true to size, but still seemed a bit long for a petite. I received so many compliments and felt COMFORTABLE!

links_Review_Title: I was event manager for a fundraising gala and our colors were gold & black. This was perfect!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit like a glove, yet it was comfortable (I had to wear it from 3 PM until past midnight) and stunning. I looked and felt like a million dollars. Everyone complimented me and said they could always spot me everywhere I went all night with the sequins, yet it was a perfect fit for the theme and occasion. Couldn't be happier! I'm 5'2" and the 8P was perfect for me with average heels.

I wore this dress to a 20s themed gala and it was a hit. I was comfortable all night, there was very minimal irritation from the sequins while dancing, and best of all I received tons of compliments. I felt like a million bucks. It isn’t very long, so if you plan to wear tall heels, order a long. I’m 5’4, 152lbs, 34DD, and wore a 10R.
The dress was beautiful and I got so many compliments with it. Fit nicely, was lightweight for all the sequins. The draped back was my favorite.

Went on easily...no zippers!!! Very comfortable fit. Covers my recent baby belly pretty well. May be a bit short for tall people as I'm not that tall and it fit with three inch heels where it was about two inches from the ground. Able to wear a normal bra (I had to wear a nursing bra and it worked). Sexy back that swoops down, but not too much!

This dress was so gorgeous! My husband loved it and we were definitely best dressed at the wedding. It was borderline too short but I’m pretty tall so I don’t blame the dress. Definitely couldn’t wear heels though. It was stretchy and fit well in my body but I almost wished I had sized up so it was longer. Overall great dress and I would rent again!

This dress was perfect for a formal affair. Glamorous but comfortable. I ordered the regular length even though I'm usually petite as I'm 5'3" or so. Didn't end up using the hem tape and I thought the length was about right for me with a 3" heel. Loved the back- good thing I worked out
This dress fit great but didn't end up wearing it. Beautiful color and so much sparkle.

This dress was unforgettable. The material had some stretch and it was very form fitting. It was easy to move around in. I love that it was something unique instead of the usual solid color ball gown!
I made a impact as I walk to the wedding reception. So perfect. #queen #rtr #wedding #cartagena
It was great! The back showed off my tattoo
So many compliments on this dress and the petite fit me perfectly!

I always have a hard time finding the right size because my shoulders are broad, but I'm also 4'11". The dress was very form fitting and incredibly comfortable to wear. I paired it with heels that were 5 inches tall so it had good length off the ground.

The dress is fabulous and received a ton of compliments. I ordered the 2P and 4P, they felt exactly the same to me. I'm 5'2" and 118lbs. It does cling to every imperfection, so I wore some spanx and it looked great!

I felt so beautiful in this dress! I wore this to a black tie optional wedding. I am about 5"7" and wore the 4R. Definitely should have ordered the 4L. I snuck by with wearing flat shoes, but wish I could have added a little heel. It fit so comfortably and the sequins were not bothersome. Would absolutely recommend.

I can see why this dress has so many great reviews! It's just stretchy enough and heavy enough to fit like a glove and skim over the body - so flattering. The back drape is really elegant, and the dress itself is gorgeous. This was comfortable and easy to dance in. The 2P was a perfect fit - I was able to wear it with 2-2.5" heels (I'm 5'2"). Had to wear with a stick-on bra, which is not an issue for me. I got so many compliments on this dress! Someone was wearing it another color too!

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress! Compliments for days afterward!
links_Review_Text: I have a pear shape and was worried about the fit around my hips but it was perfect. I wore an adhesive bra for support. I cannot tell you how many compliments I received. I felt glamorous in this dress! And for days afterward people were talking about it and asking where I got it. Rent this dress!
Black tie event in London. Perfect fit loved it and lots of compliments. Almost bought it!
Rented this for an Academy Awards after party. It was so comfortable and elegant. Wear with a low back bra or Spanx.

links_Review_Title: The best dress and be prepared for many compliments. It shines so pretty and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect. It was a little big in the shoulder region but it was a flattering fit I'm 5' 1" and this size didn't sweep the floor with me.
So. Many. Compliments. Great fit. Perfect length for my 5’4” self. Comfortable and elegant!

I rented this dress for a black tie wedding. The front is simple and conservative but the sparkle and open back more than make up for it. This dress looked super elegant and it was very comfortable. It doesn't show in the picture but there is a slight tail to the dress. I am 5'3", 120lbs, and 34B. I usually wear a size 4 but the 2R was perfect. I wore it with a backless bra and spanx. The only modification I did was pinning the back of the dress to the spanx so it wouldn't show. Highly recommend

I'm 5'4", 105lbs. I wore the OP and it fit like a charm- perfect length and size all around. My strapless bra wanted to show in the back, but I had my husband tuck in a bit of the drape to cover it, and it looked great- no one could tell. This was such a fun dress to wear- I highly recommend it!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a James Bond 007 themed Party!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit great and ran true to size. I am rather tall and was still able to wear heels with this dress! I would highly recommend this dress!

This dress is AMAZING. I will definitely rent again. I felt so glamorous. The dress contoured my body while also being forgiving. The back of the dress is beautiful! Easy to dance in and the material is not at all itchy. Wish I owned this one!

This dress was a showstopper! The back was so beautiful and classic. I got compliments throughout the night and was so comfortable wearing it. I did wear one of those sticky bras that clips across the front for some support, but it would not be necessary.

links_Review_Title: Effortless, gorgeous simplicity and a perfect fit made me comfortable all night long.
links_Review_Text: Rented for a Mardi Gras ball. I read all the reviews before selecting. Wanted the 4L but it wasn't available so I went with the 4R which was floor length in the back with my 4" heels but short in front. A little misting with a spray bottle while I had it on, helped make it hang better. The way the back hangs is just beautiful. I went with a stick on bra from VS. The dress was not super tight and hung loosely. It was elegant and appropriate for my age and crowd. It stayed put and comfortable all night. I hated to take it off.

Magnificent dress!! Hubby loved it! The rose gold dress is lightweight with plenty of stretch with enough cling to be flattering. The elegant and classic style of the gown is enhanced by the gorgeous open back. It was easy to find matching rose gold colored shoes and earrings in stores this season--a definite plus! Lots of compliments and the dress really stood out in the sea of other ball gowns that evening. I had carefully studied previous reviews because I wanted to be comfortable throughout a long night with dinner and dancing. There is no restrictive girdle sewn into the dress like other styles (thankfully), so be sure to have a body shaper. I had a backup size in the gorgeous light blue, which was also beautiful. I also tried the longsleeve version, but the weight of the sleeves plus the open back made it hard to keep the front in position. This dress was the perfect choice. I regret only that I had to return it!! :) NOTE: I wore 4" heels, but my dress was still a little too long. I had to hold it up a little bit while walking and dancing.
Rented for special event on Hilton Head Island. Comfortable dress with giving fabric. I wear a size 2 or 4. Went with 2 on this, perfect length and shape.

links_Review_Title: I received compliments all night! Stunning dress!
links_Review_Text: The sequins definitely show every bit of your stomach, but I bought some spanx and that made a big difference! Very flattering dress.
I ordered the 0R and the 2L. The 0R was a little too tight and WAY too short on me. The 2L was the perfect length and fit. I am 5'6". This dress is so beautiful! I loved wearing it.

links_Review_Title: You'll feel like a movie star!!
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a red carpet event. Many compliments! Incredibly comfortable! I'm 5'4"--I ordered the R instead of the P and I'm glad I did. I regularly wear a 6 or 8 depending on the brand-I ordered both sizes. The dress is form fitting so I felt more comfortable in the 8R. The 6R seemed much shorter than the 8R. I did wear shape wear & a backless bra. The 8R was a perfect length with 3 inch heels. It arrived on time and it was incredibly easy to return. I will use Rent the Runway again!

This is a true champagne pink gown covered in sparkly sequins. It is made out of a slightly stretchy fabric and I might have been able to go down a size and still fit into it, depending on how form fitting I wanted it to be. The side zipper on the L of the dress tends to ripple at the hip (in both 14 & 16 sizes). Spanx or other undergarments are a must! Sequins will snag any hairdo – make sure you have help getting dress on and off. I loved this dress, I felt beautiful and it was very comfortable. Note: Fur stole was purchased on Etsy.
I wore this dress to a gatsby gala and felt so glamorous!! I was pregnant at the time and even accommodated a small bump. I would definitely rent this again.
This dress was beautiful on. I would recommend the "long" if you are wearing heels. Loved it and would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Easy-Peasy. It gets the job done.
links_Review_Text: I was on the hunt for a last minute Gatsby NYE Dress. This dress is very much what you see is what you get. No hidden quirks about it. If you're uncomfortable accessorizing, this is the perfect dress for you bc you don't have to add anything at all for it to be a great "complete" look. It was stretchy enough to fit snugly but not uncomfortably. The sequins were beautiful... it's made of quality material so the sequins do not look cheap/trashy. Only thing that might be a downfall is the length. I ordered the 6L, I'm 5'8 and the dress barely swept the floor while I was in flats. If you're set on wearing heels, this might not be the dress for you. Otherwise, I highly recommend!
Super easy to wear, fit like a glove, a shoe stopper and people still talk about how gorgeous I looked! 10 stars!

This dress fits snug to your body but is comfortable, forgiving and breathable. I wore it to a New Year's Eve black tie party and felt like a shiny golden star. The scooped back really makes a statement. My husband loved it and I got several compliments from other partygoers!
Not stretchy but is comfortable.
This dress fits well but the straps are so stretched out and not adjustable that I had to safety pin them so that it wasn't constantly falling down... disappointing given how cute this piece is.
Looked super cute and sexy, loved this dress and will rent again

links_Review_Title: SO many compliments on this amazing dress. Perfect for weddings!!!
links_Review_Text: This dress was gorgeous and absolutely perfect for a wedding. Only issue was the straps ran a little big and the dress needed to be steamed/ironed before wearing. Overall very comfortable and super flattering.

links_Review_Title: Did not wear. Don't rent if you're small on top, curvy on bottom
links_Review_Text: Fun dress but it's tough if you're at all disproportionate. I have a small bust and size 6 hips so had to go medium but the medium was way to big on top to the point that the sleeves wouldn't stay up if I wore it.
Loved the length, the style was really flattering. Got lots of compliments! I usually wear a small so felt this was true to size. Pretty print!

links_Review_Title: Lots of pinning but worth it!
links_Review_Text: The straps of this dress were made for someone much taller than me. But if you have a little patience and some strong pins, you can rent this dress and feel great! Haha

Stunning fit, form fitting and flattering yet I was still comfortable enough to dance like a madwoman! I got a lot of compliments on this dress, the ruffled neckline was really stunning. I have trouble finding things that feel flattering with my body that's a bit on the curvier side but this made me feel like a queen!
Beautiful dress! A little tight in the ribs, I would have went up a sized if I had time to exchange before the wedding I attended.
Great dress and I got lots of compliments. The straps were a little loose and are not adjustable so I did have a wardrobe malfunction. Luckily I had a strapless bra on so no one saw anything.
Straps abnormally long but easy and worth it to pin for a night. So comfy and fun to wear

links_Review_Title: Fun dress for a summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: The straps were pretty long so I had to pin them to be able to wear the dress. But it was extremely flattering and really comfortable! Was able to wear all night and dance!
Great fit

links_Review_Title: Stay away if you have tiny shoulders
links_Review_Text: I loved the dress and it was cute but the straps were falling off my shoulders and would have had to be sewn to make the dress work. Not the best for tiny boobs like me either.

The only con for me has nothing to do with the dress, Im short and curvy, I usually have to take in the sleeves. I did that and it was perfect. The dress is tight in all the right places, I didn't have to iron it and I traveled with it. The cleavage is there but not too abrasive. I loved this dress, and everyone was giving me compliments. If you're curvy and not sure about it, trust me, it will fit you perfectly!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! I wore it to the Belmont Stakes and it was perfect for the occasion.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit well. I'm an hourglass shape, 5'5", 145lbs and the SR well (although a tad bit snug). The only two downsides were the straps and how open the front was. The straps were extremely long and kept falling down the whole time. The cut of the dress is also very low, so you can't be afraid to show your boobs in this dress.

I received a lot of compliments on the dress, beautiful print. Fabric was comfortable and didn't wrinkle. I normally wear small and that fit well, XS a little too tight in the torso and hip. Straps were another issue...they were abnormally huge!! No idea who has shoulders that would fit. The only reason I made this dress work is that I pinned the straps back (carefully!) If I didn't do this, the straps would have fallen all night. Plus the cut in the Che's was really low, that needed a lift too. I pinned back about 2 inches per strap. Could have done a little more but didn't want to mess around too much. Was still pretty low cut but pinning back helped lift a bit. Overall good dress with that adjustment

The fit was overall big. I had my extra as a size up due to other reviews. Might have worn a small if I had it. It's cotton material, so therefore doesn't stretch. The ruffles on the bodice aren't on elastic straps, so I ended up pinning the straps to fit my shoulders/frame and also pinned the bodice to my strapless bra. A little high maintenance, but would recommend for a fun party/fiesta!! Lots of compliments.
The straps were loose and you can't tighten them

This dress hugged my every curve and even made it look like I had a butt! So amazing. But the chest area. Woah. It left nothing to the imagination. And there was no way to tighten the top to cover them up a bit. Oh well throw on a jacket and flaunt what yo mamma gave you!

links_Review_Title: It's really meant for taller people. it's not that it was too large just too long in the V
links_Review_Text: V neckline went almost to my navel

This was a cute dress -- wore for a cocktail party. The sleeves do slide down as others have pointed out. But it was just a reminder to keep good posture for the whole night. It would have been hard to dance in this though. The detail is hard to see in the picture, but it's a really pretty dress.
The fit was awesome everywhere however there isn't any give. If I would have sized up it would have fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Generally enjoyed wearing this although it fit a little loose!
links_Review_Text: I liked the cut of this a lot but I think with a little bit of a different fabric it would have hugged the curves a little better. As other reviewers mentioned, the shoulder pieces were definitely too long so I had to pin them back. I liked the striped pieces across the bodice. Prob the wrong print for a fall-ish wedding shower but hey it was 90 degrees in NC and I like dressing cheery and bright.
its co cute and light weight, wore to a bridal shower got sooo many compliments. only thing the straps were wayyy to long had to pin them.
Fit on the small side. Didnt wear

For some reason, I sized this dress up and I should not have. Instead of a nice tailored fit, it was loose. It still looked nice, but not did not show off the curves. I'd recommend sticking with your usual size.

It was super pretty and flattering. The dress was a little tight in the rib cage area when sitting down, so if you have a super long event to attend, make sure you wear it around your house a little to see if it bothers you. I wore it for a full day/night event and it worked for me!

links_Review_Title: Not as great as the picture looks
links_Review_Text: I ordered a medium and a large as my backup. I tend to wear a medium/large and am a size 6/8 straight build. The medium fit better but with room still, and as everyone else has said, the straps are just way to long and not easy to make work. I ended up not wearing it for this reason. The pattern was also darker in person in my opinion.

links_Review_Title: This dress was very colorful and fun for a summer wedding.
