links_Review_Text: I loved the playfulness of the dress, and spent the extra time stitching up the shoulder ruffle and using body tape so I was really comfortable in the dress!

links_Review_Title: This dress was so fun and flattering to wear!
links_Review_Text: The dress was so flattering and I got tons of compliments. The straps were a bit long and I had to use a safety pin to shorten them, but otherwise it was perfect.
It didn’t fit right and too tight

links_Review_Title: Super girly & flattering for small waist
links_Review_Text: I went out of my comfort zone to order this girly dress. The fit is flattering waist up but I expected the bottom to be fit like a pencil skirt. It was more loose which made walking easy. The black also stood out more than in the pics.

links_Review_Title: Wedding. I did not end up wearing.
links_Review_Text: Past reviews mention how the straps are too long but I wanted to try anyway. The dress does not sit right because of this. Either your chest is fully revealed so your straps hang correctly or you pull it up and the straps hang off your shoulders. I don't recommend.
It is SO low cut. I even pulled it up and pinned about two inches and still way too low cut. Such a bummer :/
LOVED IT! Perfect fit.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress in the photo, but it didn't fit me.
links_Review_Text: The fabric is lovely and the dress is very pretty and summery, but the ruched fabric around the waist and hips was too tight for me. I think the larger size would have been a better choice for me.

links_Review_Title: Pop of color for a spring wedding!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! Very flattering and curve hugging in all the right places. The sleeves were a bit loose so I wore the dress off the shoulder. Would absolutely rent this dress again!

This dress is super cute for a spring event, but I was disappointed in how small it ran! Clearly not cut with plus ladies in mind, I got a 3X and couldn't zip the garment up the entire way due to my bust - I typically wear a 14/16, 40D. I likely won't exchange for a larger size, but do think smaller ladies would love this piece!

While my gala got canceled and I actually didn't get to wear it outside of my messy bedroom :(, I'm really pleased with this dress. It was flattering from all angles and the slit was super sexy without being too much. If you're taller than 5'6" I would order the long version or size up; I probably would have gone with kitten heels so it was the appropriate length. Color was a rich, royal purple and yay for being able to wear a normal bra!

links_Review_Title: Elegant and comfortable dress for a winter formal
links_Review_Text: Beautiful rich blue color and medium weight fabrics with a nice drape - not so think as to be heavy or hot. Overall the dress was super comfortable - easy to wear with a regular bra and while the front slit is high, it was ok even on my tall frame and nicely covered by the sewn-on sash by the gather, even when sitting down. The 44L was too big in the easy and bust so I wore the 46R backup. It was still roomy enough I probably could’ve sized down to a 44, and I definitely needed a L - even on the 44L the sleeves were only *just* long enough. But I just pushed the ones on the R up to look like 3/4 sleeves and it was fine. I got several compliments and would definitely wear it again.

links_Review_Title: I received so many complements wearing this. And it was really comfortable too!
links_Review_Text: I have a difficult time finding good fits because I have a large busy, but a small/medium build. This dress was perfect for my body type!

My husbands jaw hit the floor!! This was an amazing dress. Felt wonderful. The size I wore was a tad big but it was very comfortable. The slit wasn't as prominent but that was due to the dress being a bit big. I got compliments all night!!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for my 18 weeks twin bump!
links_Review_Text: It had plenty of stretch to make room for my 18 week twin bump and show it off at the same time. High enough neckline where I could wear a regular bra (which was great since I only have one that fits my growing bust). Currently in a 34DD and weigh 155lbs. The color is a royal, but I think it leans more toward the purple side than the blue. Even next to other purple dresses, it still looked purple. The slit fell mid-thigh on me, and was slightly ripped, but not noticeably. Only a couple of complaints - There was a novel-sized stack of tags on the left hip - I really can't believe it hadn't been removed yet. Other complaint is that if I had wanted to wear heels, I would have needed to order a long. I'm not sure in what world 5'5" constitutes a long, but I feel sorry for the women who are actually tall and want to wear heels!

Lots of compliments; I felt very confident; overall fit was just right; length was perfect with regular heels. I'm a bit heavier than usual right now, so being able to cover my arms and back was nice but in a dress that also felt sexy. Could wear my normal bra; very comfortable dress; nice to have the option to pull up the long sleeves into 3/4 sleeves. Purple velvet is gorgeous, especially for a gala in Feb. My first experience with RTR - highly recommend as well as this beautiful dress.

links_Review_Title: This dress was gorgeous and very comfortable to wear to a gala for hours! Many compliments!!
links_Review_Text: I loved that the rouching in the mid section hid my belly. Wearing Spanx underneath, you could not see any of the seams and it had a very smoothing look! The slit was not too high to wear to around co-workers but just enough to still be sexy. I recevied numerous compliments throughout the night on the dress. Some people called the color "blue" but I do think it's a true purple. I weigh 155 and 5'3. Bust 36C/D. Great fit!!!

I am 5'9" and usually wear an 8 and the 42 L for great, could have been a tiny longer but it worked and was perfect for the event. I was super comfortable and the slit gave it a little sexiness in an otherwise conservative dress!

links_Review_Title: This is perfect for a black tie wedding in the winter!
links_Review_Text: The detail around the stomach hides flaws perfectly. It is very warm, which means it's a little too warm on the dance floor. But overall it was very comfortable and felt flattering.
This dress was absolutely stunning. Love the fit, the style, the high slit and the neckline. Perfect for a party or wedding!
A beautiful gown for a winter wedding. Fits true to size. Easy to zip up and easy to dance in. The color is gorgeous, a deep royal purple. Would rent again.

This dress fit perfectly and was exactly what I wanted. I wore this for a formal post holiday party in the middle of a WI winter. I'm always cold so the long sleeves and velvet material was not only so comfortable, but it kept me warm. The color was so beautiful and depending on the lighting it looked more blue than purple which I also noticed in other customer photos. I felt glamorous and received countless compliments throughout the entire evening. I highly recommend renting this dress!

I have rented three dresses from RTR. This was by far my favorite. No one else had on anything like it and I got a lot of compliments. I was able to wear a strapless bra with no issue. The color is beautiful and it's very comfortable. Highly recommend for a formal winter event.

This dress was warm, very comfortable for dinner and the ballet, the bow at the waist hid a little extra weight I am still carrying from the holidays, and it is a beautiful, deep shade of purple (this photo was taken at night and the dress is much more beautiful in person).
Beautiful dress. Warm, rich and vibrant. Form fitting without hugging every curve.

This dress was perfection. Warm for a January event, elegant but a little sexy, extremely comfortable, and you can wear a regular bra. The color is a bluish purple, a very beautiful jewel tone. I was hesitant at first but it was a total winner.
Received many compliments throughout the evening, this was also super comfortable and warm! Fits true to size and you can wear a regular bra which is an added bonus.

This dress is perfect for a winter event! It runs small (I rented the 36R and 38R and wore the 38R as it fit better overall). I have a small chest but the neckline was flattering and not to low. I did wear a bra but I supposed it’s not necessary. The slit on the dress came up higher than I thought and was apparent when walking or sitting but it wasn’t indecent in my opinion. Overall the fit and feel is very flattering (especially with the cinched waist!) The dress is plain so it’s easy to accessorize. I received lots of compliments and it was a great dress for a winter formal event!

My husband was told, "He married up" when I was seen in this dress. The slit gives the dress a bit of sexy without being too scandalous. Material stretched and molded to my body in a flattering way. Very comfortable. Get the Long if wearing 3" heals. It was perfect

I usually wear a 6 but the 4 for the best bc it has some stretch and I wanted a fitted look. I went to. A Chicago wedding in January so I wanted warm and I was so warm and comfortable. If you want to dance your heart out you'll probably be too hot but for me it was perfect and classy. Just enough boob and leg, my husband thought I was very sexy. Looks black in most pics bc they had low light, so this is brightened a lot to show the true color. So pretty!

links_Review_Title: Comfortable, warm, and flattering for hourglass shape.
links_Review_Text: Runs small. I had to size up. Warm and comfortable. One thing I disliked was how the slip would slip out in the slit of the dress. Overall it was a good dress.

I rented this dress for a formal wedding 2 days after Christmas 2019! It was exactly what I was looking for. The purple velvet was a fun change from green, black and red velvets usually found at this time of year. I'm tall (5'11") and was looking for a festive long dress that would camouflage a few extra holiday pounds! This dress delivered in both style and comfort. I received many compliments, and was able to go without any additional shapewear underneath! Length was perfect!
This dress was everything!! So flattering and the color is beautiful. Highly recommend.

I received so many compliments on the style, color, & quality of this dress! I loved being able to share that I rented this beautiful dress. I originally was hung up about the dress being more of a purple than a royal blue & not being sure how it would be for a holiday party, but I'm so glad I rented it anyway because it was perfect!
I was pregnant and this dress fit great. It was not too tight on my bump. It is long so I definitely recommend wearing heels. Super comfortable though.
This dress was so comfortable!!! It fit perfectly in the chest but I do have a small chest so not sure if it would work for those that are bustier. Loved this dress!
Beautiful dress a perfect fit.

I am 5'4" and 129lbs. This dress fit like a glove. I felt glamorous and comfortable. Perfect for a formal wedding or holiday black tie. I rented it for our family pictures and am so happy with how it looked.

Rented this dress for a black tie holiday reception, and I love how the dark purple stood out from all the other black, green and red dresses. This dress is incredibly comfortable, figure flattering, and the ruching in front flattered my belly, my most self-conscious spot. The slit was not too high and the neck was not too low. It was so perfect!! I am a solid 14, but the 12 fit me beautifully.

links_Review_Title: Understated yet elegant - Simple but a little sexy - Comfortable and still formal!
links_Review_Text: This dress was true to size and very very comfortable. It showed a tiny bit of cleavage but not too much for a professional event. You definitely show some leg when walking because of the slit but it wasn't too high. The color was beautiful for fall/winter and you can easily wear statement pieces of jewelry because overall this dress doesn't have a lot of "wow"-ing detail. I'm 5'6" and wore the R but, with heels, might have been okay with the L (see pic).

links_Review_Title: Beautiful eggplant velvet kept me warm during an outdoor November wedding
links_Review_Text: The fabric was gorgeous and on the thicker and warmer side which is what I wanted. The lining was sometimes twisted and difficult to hide with the long slit but the chest was perfectly cut and the sleeves were perfect length. I felt seriously posh in the dress. The pic I had makes it look more navy but it's a true eggplant color! I love this dress. Length was great - 5'4" and fit at floor length with about 2 inch heel
This dress was EVERYTHING ! The color is so vibrant and the fabric is lux and comfortable at the same time.
Comfortable, light weight and classy! The color is beautiful and I received compliments all night long.
Fit beautifully, unlike any other dress at the gala. True to size, nice slit in the front

links_Review_Title: Show stopping! Felt fabulous in this curve flattering fall formal dress
links_Review_Text: A crowd (and boyfriend) pleaser! The purple color is gorgeous in person. Fit is super flattering; the gathered material hit at the right spot if you also have a high waist. Showed a good amount of leg but didn't flap open as can sometimes happen, was the perfect amount of reveal for me. Didn't need spanx, felt very held in. At 5'9" with 3 inch heels, the length was great. Also it was a cold 35 degrees out and i felt nice and warm in this one. Five stars!

This gown is so beautiful! It was my back up gown but the minute I put it on I felt so glamorous, like a movie star! I usually wear a size 10 but went with the 12...the fit was amazing! I would highly recommend this gown!!

GORGEOUS!!! Beautiful show stopping dress! I received SOOOOOO MANY compliments! Felt like the most beautiful woman at the gala. Runs true to size. Perfect v-neck cut. Not too low; appropriate for any occasion. Beautiful color and excellent quality. A tad bit long, I'm 5'3. Will rent again soon! I LOVED IT!

links_Review_Title: I received tons of compliments! It's a very flattering style for most women.
links_Review_Text: Even though it's a velvet dress it wasn't hot or heavy. Very comfortable to wear. I loved the dress!

links_Review_Title: Felt beautiful. The dress fits like a glove. Nice slit for added va-voom.
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size.
Fit amazing in all the right places. Wore the longer option for the size of heel. Warm and great for a winter event!! Got many compliments!!
Great material, flirty & flattering fit!
Had to go up to a size 4... the 2 was way too tight. straps were a little loose but made it work

Oh my god, I wore this dress so many times! It's so cute and can be dressed up or down with heels or sneakers!!! So so so fun. So comfortable. It's def on the short side so I had to be creative when bending over ;)

I am loving sundresses during this heat wave and this Black Halo floral is one of my favs. It is flirty, but still conservative enough to wear running errands during the day. I usually wear a 0, but went up one size and glad I did. The 2 fit me perfectly. I loved the mid-thigh length. (5'2" 107 lbs)

I love the fit of this dress, and the pattern is so great for summer. Can't wait to wear it to a party I have this weekend. I have a small bust but broad shoulders and small hips. This fit like a glove and the length is short but not inappropriate. Such a winner!

Cute dress from Black Halo - which to me can run a bit small - but this fit well. It was a bit short on my 5'8" frame, but for a night out downtown, it was still appropriate. The fabric was in-between a denim and cotton and did not wrinkle. I love it and thought it was a really fun dress!

I wore this as a back up for my bachelorette party when I didn't like the original dress I rented. I got SO many compliments on it. Admittedly it was a bit tight as the dress does not have much give. And it was definitely short-- which is saying a lot because I'm only 5'3". However, for a bachelorette party both of those things were a non issue and it got rave reviews from my friends. If you're willing to go short, I'd definitely recommend it.

Wore this for night out at my bachelorette party! It felt really fun and different but is small. I am typically an 8 but I got a 10 and still wore spanx + was pulling it down all night. The straps are too long so I used safety pins in the back. Still a cute dress but be comfortable with the length and ready to adjust the straps!

This dress ran really small and I almost didn't wear it. I squeezed into the size six, but really was restricted by the fitted band around the waist. I am between a 4 and a 6, so thought I was sizing up based on other reviews, so consider a full size bigger (but I suspect the straps would have fallen down because they were a bit loose also). It got better over the night, definitely loosened some but it just wasn't super comfortable. It was so fun and girly though! Cute ruffle detail and a great print. Awesome for my summer birthday.

links_Review_Title: Super cute! Got a lot of compliments and felt confident in the dress.
links_Review_Text: The dress was pretty true to size except it was kind of hard to zip up the back. But that just might've been my wider framed back. Also if you have a naturally long torso like me, it may be kind of short but I didn't mind that. Overall it made my figure look very nice and accentuated the waist and bust well. Note that the material is not stretchy. Pretty dress for spring/summer occasions.

links_Review_Title: Loved it so much I bought it
links_Review_Text: I felt great in this dress! But it does run a full size too small, and the straps are too long. So I ordered up and pinned the straps until I can get them tailored. The bust area felt kind of large too. If you are talk this might be too short but at 5'2 this was an acceptable length on me.

links_Review_Title: Perfect combination of comfort, femininity, and versatility
links_Review_Text: I had been waiting for this dress for weeks. I am usually a 2 in Black Halo, but took my chances when this beauty popped up in a 4. Stunning fit- length was great, showed enough cleavage to be feminine, but still cute for daily wear. I wore this dress during the day with white minimalist sneakers and a denim jacket and at an outdoor restaurant with nude heels. The dress has a little stretch, but not much- highly recommend sizing up. Loved this dress so much I bought it!
Straps were a little big but other than that I absolutely LOVED this dress!! Short length, material had the perfect amount of stretch & the bodice was super cute!!
This seem to run a little small but it worked out well. It was comfortable and received many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful & flattering dress - it was fun and perfect for a daytime spring sorority formal!
links_Review_Text: This dress honestly fit perfect - I would say that it runs a little small - my usual size was sold out so I sized up, and it was fitted, but not tight. I didn't wear a bra with it and that was perfect and breathable. I can't say enough about this dress I really loved it. The straps were a little long since I was wearing a size bigger and I'm not that tall - but it was managable I just had to occasionally pull them back up if they slipped. The material is nice, solid, not flimsy, but you're still able to dance and move around. All in all, I'm still obsessed with this lol.
Runs on the smaller side - normally wear a 4 or 6 and the 6 was just right. Got a bunch of compliments as the dress was both classic and unique. Wish I could have kept it!!!!!

links_Review_Title: Vibrant dress for a Miami bachelorette
links_Review_Text: Wore this dress for a bachelorette in Miami. The floral style was perfect for the Miami vibes. I ordered 2 sizes up, and the dress was still pretty tight. The straps are a little nightmare-ish as they constantly fall down but some sturdy safety pins did the trick!

links_Review_Title: Cute but way too short to pull off!
links_Review_Text: I knew it was going to be short from the reviews but I tried anyway. I'm usually a small/ 4-6 and the 6 was tight and way too short for my 5'8" (135 lb) frame. I think the 8 would have been too big in the straps. So cute but better for petite girls.
Wore this for my bachelorette part in the Bahamas. I'm typically a 2 so it runs small, but I LOVED it and it fit like a glove!
Loved the fit

This is the prefect summer day dress- from the beautiful print, to the light but not too think fabric, to the super cute ruffle- absolute perfection! While I'm between 0-2 and a solid XS in general, I tend to be a 2 in BH. This dress hugged all the right places and was super flattering. LOVED!!!

This dress is adorable !! I went to my bday in Hawaii and it's an amazing dress for day and night / casual and party ! Runs small and the best option for me would be size 4 but I would be able to enjoy ! :) I would like to buy this dress !!
I loved the waist of this dress it darted in at the perfect place and the ruffled hem detail is really flattering too.
LOVED this dress. It fit like a glove and I didnt have to wear a bra with it. Yeah it's a bit short but it's what makes it cute! Can dress it up or down.

The fit of this dress is super flattering! The floral print is fun and feminine, but also bold with the colors. I want to buy this dress as it made me feel super confident and fun. Received a lot of compliments and highly recommend. Perfect for a summer day / night!
Very cute and flattering, but short. Also, pretty tight in my stomach so no room for much eating or drinking.
Loved everything about this dress!

I'm usually between a 12 and 14 - ordered the 12. This dress fit but I had to wear shapewear to cover my tummy. It was pretty short, so be prepared. The straps fell down on me a lot too, but I did get quite a few compliments.
This dress was great, hugged my curves right, but was shorter than expected and the material had zero give to it

links_Review_Title: Cute summer dress but runs small!
links_Review_Text: Great flirty print but I can barely zip up around the waist. Fabric has very little stretch. Length is short on my5'2 frame. Super cute and kept for 2 weeks. I would recommend!

I love this floral print trendy dress by Black Halo! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing true to size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works best for A - C cups sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress, so you should wear a strapless bra or no bra since the straps are very thin on this dress. At 5'3, the length hit mid-thigh on me. Super cute!
Cute dress but way too short. The fabric is stretchy but the waistband has no give. I'm normally between sizes- should've gone with the size 6.
Would be short on tall girls. 2 would be better (my regular size) but wasnt available. 0 was tight. Print is gorg in person!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress for a bridal shower!
links_Review_Text: I was going to a Mexican themed bridal shower and wanted to wear something floral. It looked super cute my only issue was the straps were a little long for me. Other than that i loved it!
Fav dress I've rented. Huge sucker for all things black halo. Size up more than you think you should. I am usually a 2 and wore the 6. Endless compliments, perfect for a destination wedding in cabo!
Such a cute dress but was too tight when zipped. Sizing up might be good as it is also quite short
Usually a 4 but after reading comments of dress running small decided to size up to 6. BEST DECISION!! received many compliments--great for night out. Pretty short so would not recommend w/platforms.
I didn't wear it... it was too small for me through the hips and was very short. Would be cute on a more athletic frame!

links_Review_Title: Love the pattern, but the dress runs really small and is uncomfortably short.
links_Review_Text: Definitely go up a size or two, and only wear to an event where short dresses are appropriate. I wore this on the beach for the birthday.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a rehearsal dinner Loved it
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect. Fits larger bust nicely. Material is great and heavy enough material not to worry about a bra
Rented this for an outdoor bbq and felt so cute! Def very cropped so need true high waisted bottoms to avoid showing stomach
Fun and flirty
Such a cute summer crop! Love the bow details on the shoulders and the adorable pattern design. Wore this for a day party at a friends and received so many compliments!

Super cute top. The color stitching makes this otherwise plain black top really great. Definitely need high waisted bottoms unless you want to show your skin. It was a little tight across my chest, but made it work. I would rent a 4 next time.
Great fit, don't need a bra, tighter around chest, mini crop

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments at a concert!
links_Review_Text: There is no stretch in the top and I have a DD chest so I went a size up and it fit great with a strapless bra. The straps can be tied to also help the fit. It is cropped but looked great with high waisted shorts. The ruffle is very flattering!
Fit is true to size, definitely runs cropped but I'm almost 5'10 and wore with high waisted jeans with no issues

I wore this to a festival (it ended up raining). I got tons of compliments and it was super comfortable. The straps are adjustable, and I wore it braless which is a huge plus for me. I will definitely rent again, or purchase!
Definitely very tight. Being a 32D it was a little hard to breathe but I made the best of it. It's nice having the tie should straps so you adjust accordingly.

Shirt is a bit cropped so you may need to wear high waisted bottoms. Was very comfy just looked so cute with my yellow shorts! Fit was true to size. I loved this top and do not want to return it!! So many compliments.
Wore this for a bachelorette party. Goes great with highwaisted jeans!

This top was perfect for having afternoon beers with friends. I usually order a size 0/xs, but opted for a 2 because I don't like tops to be too cropped. This was definitely the right call for this shirt. I have a small bust, but was able go braless because the top was just tight enough across. The straps can be tied to your desired tightness. I also wore this out with high waisted, wide legged jeans and it worked perfectly. Highly recommend for a fun, summery look!

The cutest top!! Loved the detail and colors -- so fun! It runs slightly small so I would recommend going one size up for backup. It would work best for A to C cups because it’s fitted at the bust. The fabric has no stretch but there is comfortable room throughout the midsection. It was cropped on me because I have a long torso but you can adjust the length with the straps.You can wear a strapless bra or Nubra but I didn’t wear any bra because the bust was so fitted. I loved the detail of the tie straps. Really added to the top. Would definitely rent again!!
Cute shirt, but make sure to wear a bra or something underneath because it blows up in the wind. Fun crop top for a summer day!
This top is the perfect statement piece for an outfit!! I got so many compliments on it. It's well made and can be worn dressy or casual.
I loved the details of this too. It's a little on the shorter side, but I also have a really long torso. Fits the chest well, I wore a strapless but really didn't need a ra at all.
Fun top. It is cropped so I recommend pair with something high waist. It fit snug around my breast so do not recommend if you usually have trouble with tops being tight around your breasts.

This shirt was fun for a night of going out on while on my Caribbean vacation. Knowing my body shape (athletic build/big chest), I had taken a risk renting it, and at first wasn't in love with it, because it was very cropped as shown in the picture, and it didn't cinch in below my boobs (34DD). The fabric doesn't have much stretch anywhere (no stretchy fabric in the back). I thought it be super cute on someone with less chest, but my friends and boyfriend all really liked the way it looked on me. It was fun and breezy for a night at the beach bars. Fun top, but rent it with the correct expectations! Felt true to size, and I wouldn't recommend sizing down if you have a large chest.

Fun + comfortable. I wore it without a bra but I would be careful if you do the same on a windy day! The top has a tendency to want to fly up with the wind and I found myself holding it down quite a bit. Rented as part of my Unlimited subscription and think I'll hang on to it for my Miami trip next week :)
Super cute. Definitely a crop top
Really pretty! Great top for fall. The ties can be a little tricky
Loved this top! So cute can wear anytime. I wore it to work, on the weekend, out at night. The fabric does not stretch so it was a little tight.

links_Review_Title: The shirt is super cute overall, great quality & easy to dress up or down!
links_Review_Text: It does run small though, I am a 34C and the size 4 was extremely tight on my chest. It is also a more cropped shirt but it looked great with high waisted jeans.

There isn't any stretch or give to the fabric and there aren't any side zippers. Couldn't even get the shirt over my shoulders to actually try it on. And if I had I likely would have been stuck inside of it.

links_Review_Title: Super cute top but too small
links_Review_Text: I can't wait to get this is a larger size, it's super cute but if you are busty size up.
A little small in the chest area so maybe size up. Was perfect for Coachella themed party
cute top but not flattering on larger chested women. 32D and the bust was super tight. also very short. even with my highest wasted jeans you could see my stomach

I love the details on this top so much! The ties really add a sweet touch, plus it's adjustable. I'm a massage therapist, so broad shoulders are a slight insecurity of mine, however the width of the strap plus the tie really helps soften my shoulders. This top was a bit snug, though, and I felt like my chest was squished down all day. Overall, it's a win!

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my vacation in Tulum
links_Review_Text: The top is beautiful. Highly recommend! Note that the bust area does not stretch.
bust didn't have much stretch, but a really cute, cropped shirt

links_Review_Title: I wore this top to dinner with a pair of highwaisted jeans for dinner in Mexico
links_Review_Text: The fit is very very very tight. If you are anything above an A-cup size up or look for something else.

Length wise this was actually fine as I have a short torso. I sized up based on reviews but still felt so uncomfortable in this top. The top of the bust is really tight and the shirt kept riding up to the point where it was in my armpits. I had to keep adjusting. Def would not rent again.
Short

links_Review_Title: So small in chest did not fit
links_Review_Text: No stretch did not fit my chest . I was so sad

links_Review_Title: I loved this top to walk around Geneva in!
links_Review_Text: Was the perfect length with high waisted shorts. Was very cute and I loved the details of this top.

links_Review_Title: Almost got trapped in the top!
links_Review_Text: Was cute on, but the chest is VERY tight and I almost got trapped in it! Didn't feel it was worth wearing it again and risking getting trapped again. Would not recommend for anyone with a bigger back/chest.
A bit short though

links_Review_Title: It was such a cute too but ran small in the bust
links_Review_Text: Small in the bust so it was hard to take on and off
Very cute top and I got lots of compliments. I worn with flared black jeans and colorful earrings. Very trendy.
Cute, but very short
Fantastic dress! Very lightweight and not too tight. Great for vacation or a summer event! #beachy #bright #beautiful

Obsessed with this dress. Hugged in all the right places but didn't feel like a bodycon dress. I'm pretty curvy and this accentuated that nicely. It's classy and flirty and feminine. Wore it to my birthday dinner!

super fun and youthful dress. a tad long on my short frame (i'm 5'2") and a little tight around the legs when you walk-- but super cute! stiff fabric with not much give so get your exact size, but comfy!
Fit like a glove but still comfortable. Compliments galore! Hemline is really unique.
I loved this dress. It was comfortable and easy to dance in. Perfect for a summer wedding. The fabric does not have stretch, but it runs true to size.
Comfortable and cute - didn't even need to wear a bra - can be dressed up or down very forgiving because of the ruched detail on the side! Adjustable straps
I didn't wear this. Tried it on without a bra and it was just snug in the rib cage/ breast area so I'm returning without wearing. I don't think it comes 1 size up so sadly I'll miss this one.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for vacation, night out, or wedding (curvy& busty friendly!)
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress and didn't stop getting compliments... the side ruching detail makes the dress forgiving and very flattering. It fit like a glove in all the right ways. I also thought the asymmetric hem detail gave the dress an elevated shape. I'm pretty busty (36DD) and was nervous that I would have an issue but it fit just right. The adjustable straps helped but I don't know if it would be friendly for an larger cup sizes. Will certainly rent or even buy!

links_Review_Title: It was an easy to wear, effortless dress. I wore it on date night, on a warm evening in Austin

links_Review_Text: Extremely light weight and the ruching around the stomach area is perfect for when you keep hitting the dessert table and bar throughout the night. Beautiful color with hints of a light/blue purple as well.
The dress hugs your curves in all the right places. Only complaint is the bottom isn't stretchy so it's a bit difficult to sit or walk up stairs!

I loveee this dress. Perfect with heels or just a classic white sneaker. This made me feel like Mark Ruffalo was about to make me swoon in the iconic early aughts film 13 going on 30. The straps did need to be tightened for me and did loosen on their own but it was an easy enough fix. Super comfortable and cute, will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and light weight perfect for vacation
links_Review_Text: Amazing dress, hugs the body perfectly without discomfort, very light and airy. Worn in Spain.
Lots of compliments, super soft fabric, love the fit, beautiful color, my hubby love this dress on me ;-)

Obsessed with this number! I recently rented a few of the East Order dresses and loved them all but this one takes the cake! The ruching is so flattering and the color is amazing! Pairs so well with sandals and cute heels. I wore it twice while in Carmel and got tons of compliments!
Got so many compliments on this for my birthday! Was fun and flirty, but still breathable in the hot Texas heat. Would totally rent again- very true to size.
A little snug
Love this dress. Fit true to size and hugged my curves. I would rent it again.
Very comfortable with adjustable straps. Received compliments all night. Great for a hot summer wedding, very lightweight material.
Fits like a glove and the fabric is super light

links_Review_Title: Wore for Valentine's day, such a perfect fit!
links_Review_Text: loved loved loved, no complaints.

links_Review_Title: Rouched in all the right places!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit like a glove (but a really comfortable glove)! Not too tight, not too loose. Straps are adjustable which was great for my postpartum breasts. The rouching perfectly hides any extra tummy pooch and the asymmetrical bottom is fun and flirty! Perfect for my Valentine's Day date! Zips up the back. Also not much elasticity in the dress. If stuck between sizes, I'd go up.

Loved this dress. The shape is pretty and the draping wraps in a nice way especially if you have curves. Looks super flattering. The bust area was a little small but it was manageable with a good strapless bra. They straps were so thin that they felt like dental floss, which might annoy some people.

Fun dress and super comfortable, was perfect on the bust, a little big in the waist bust. ( I am a 36DD) so I'd you are smaller on top , I would get one size down. Still worked and was very flattering!
I felt very pretty in this dress. It is lightweight and fits nicely. It is lined which is a plus. The straps are adjustable. I would rent this again.
It was a very pretty dress! Definitely accentuates the body shape, the only con is that the straps are very thin and loosen up easily so it kept slipping off my shoulders

links_Review_Title: Did not look anything like the model
links_Review_Text: Too loose and too long. The color is pretty. The material is not as nice as some of the other dresses I have ordered from RTR. I would not recommend for someone my height.
A little bit of a weird fit in the boobs. Pretty draping but does make hips look a little wide. Exactly as pictured. Beautiful fabric and pattern

Looooved this dress. Does run a bit small - I'm generally a Medium but felt better in the Large (still form fitting even at that). The straps are delicate and adjustable which is lovely. Hit below my knee (I'm 5'9") and fit nicely around my booty. Wish it had fit more snuggly around my waist as I have an hourglass figure but it was still gorgeous.
Very comfortable and could be dressed up or down depending on the occasion.
Very flattering. Only problem was the strap broke during my event which was very upsetting. Be careful with them!

links_Review_Title: Not the best not the worst!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a wedding shower. Not the best for curvy girls, i'm normally a size small but was way too tight on my thighs. Went with the medium fit my things but was loose on my stomach. Straps were very uncomfortable. It looked good but wouldn't rent again!

links_Review_Title: Love the color, Perfect for vacation.
links_Review_Text: Got tons of compliments. The color and print are stunning. There was a little room in the chest and stomach area, but still was flattering.

links_Review_Title: Would've been great but bust was too big
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress , just a tad big
This was a great dress but I thought was a bit too casual for a wedding. I didn't end up wearing but would definitely rent again for a bridal/baby shower or other more casual event
Dress fits great, but order a size down. The design is very flattering.
Loved the color. XSR was a little too small for me but I imagine on a true XS this would be super cute. Wished I could have worn it.
Material is very thin
Runs true to size and is very flattering- colors are super summery. Love it!
Fit like a glove! Love this dress
This top was so easy to wear just a little tape. It was sexy and fun! I am on the small side so no issues skipping the bra.

I absolutely felt good and confident wearing this top. It fit perfect on my small frame which so hard to find. I just wore pasties. Step length was perfect. I would've bought it but it wrinkles after a while. So I'll just rent it again.
I felt amazing in this top. It was a little shorter than I expected but was still fun to wear.
True to size. Sexy twist on a classic. The back is very open, you cannot wear a bra with this tank.

links_Review_Title: The back of this top plunged down to the waist and I love it.
links_Review_Text: Revealing while remaining classy. The front is a simple black spaghetti strap tank. Nothing special in front but when you turn around the back plunged down to the waist with cris cross straps that make this top special. The fabric has no stretch. Flowy and airy; it's perfect for hot summer nights. Forget wearing a bra. Get some pedals to hide the nips. I've rented this top 3 times and I'm almost ready to just buy it since I love it so much.
Loved it. Wore it multiple times because it was so comfortable and looked so cute bra less
Loved the back of this. It's a cute Friday night classic. Tall girls beware, it's on the shorter side - you need high waisted jeans/bottom or stomach will show
very cute top, fun low back. Can tuck into high waisted jeans or a skirt
Great top! Open back so cannot wear a bra with it.

links_Review_Title: Cute top, runs small if you have broad shoulders.
links_Review_Text: I usually wear size 8 or medium but for this shirt I should of went 10 or large. Very cute though. Might re-rent in the right size.

links_Review_Title: Love it so much I bought it.
links_Review_Text: Easily the perfect cami tank. Classic. I need in all colors.
The top is really comfortable and flattering. This is one I'm going to wear over and over!
This top fit so oddly. Super disappointing
I really liked this dress but you need the belt that comes with it or another belt. Without the belt it's a bit shapeless. The pattern is so lovely and colors are great
Beautiful dress, great for beach vacation. Runs a bit large, could've sized down to XS or used a belt to give it more shape.
Comfortable, easy to wear, has pockets. Great length. Dress is lined. Colours are fabulous. Fits true to size. I loved it. As did everyone else around me! A Great Dress.
Fit true to size. Replaced the tie belt with one of my own

I wore this to a summer party and it was fine, but really not my favorite. I didn't love the pattern or the wide ruffle. It might be pretty on someone else, but I took a risk on the one shoulder style and it wasn't for me. It definitely needed the belt. Very comfortable, well made, and big pockets. Good length, and I'm tall.

I LOVED wearing this dress. It def needs a belt, I opted for my own instead of the matching fabric belt included. I received lots of compliments at the summer outdoor wedding we attended. Added bonus, the one shoulder made nursing my 11 month old so easy!!
Comfortable and great fit

wore for a birthday dinner - received so many compliments. The dress was too big on me, especially in the chest / arm area. the one shoulder kept slipping off. fit good through the waist, but i'd suggest sizing down so that it doesn't gape in the chest area - I kept worrying my strapless bra was showing on the side.

Rented this for a daytime party and it was great. Very lightweight and loved the one shoulder. The styling was a bit more slim in the waist / thighs than I wanted so I used the belt to blouson and pull up a bit. Still very cute and would wear again.
Baggy so I belted it. Looked great on vacation, perfect summer dress.
Easy to wear with a strapless bra and was comfortable all day

links_Review_Title: Cute but not for every body type
links_Review_Text: Was a little longer than expected, didn’t do anything to flatter my figure. I have a longer torso and shorter legs. Cute on others though!
It was very comfortable to wear and felt very feminine and classy. The con was that it seemed a little more casual in person that I expected.

This dress fit very well. It is a looser fit, with a belt to give form to your waist. The material itself doesn't have much give, but the sizing was right on (and note the looser fit above). The design is more coral reef as opposed to the paisley I was expecting. I ended up not wearing it because it was for a September wedding at an apple orchard, and the coral/beachy look wasn't quite what I was going for. I will absolutely rent again for a beach vacation though!

I wore this dress on a brewery tour & was so thankful! The dress flowed & was comfortable to wear while walking for several hours. One quick note-The dress is very generous in the midsection, so I wore a belt to give myself a waist.

links_Review_Title: Got tons of compliments. Perfect for a summer dance at the club
links_Review_Text: Fit great. Is loose but the belt made it work

Dare I say my favorite rental to date. I wore it on a trip to visit my college roommate so grocery store, dinner, shopping. So many strangers complimenting me. I'm heavy on the bottom but small for perfect. Wish I could afford to keep and wear all the time!

links_Review_Title: I sent it back as soon as I opened the box.
links_Review_Text: I never tried this item on. The print was not what I expected at all. It wasn't pretty at all.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable dress for hot summer night.
links_Review_Text: This dress was super light and comfortable for an outdoor party. It ran true to size.
Couldn't get it over my hips.
Love the one shoulder look, however it needed a belt as I looked bigger then I am. It has pockets, so big win!
Bizarre fit. Pockets at rib cage area. It was laughably bad and I never got past trying it on.
not very flattering, didn't wear

links_Review_Title: Pretty, but more casual than anticipated
links_Review_Text: I did not end up wearing because it was more casual than I expected. My usual size, a small, fit well, but the tiered stitching on the skirt was not ideal for my wider hips (too much fabric).

This dress was very beautiful. It is very well made, classy and vintage at the same time. I'm currently 3 months post partum so I'm still not used to my new dimensions. I'm breastfeeding and everything fit well except for my chest area. It flattened my boobs and made it slightly uncomfortable. The top of the dress/neckline was oddly slightly looser. Ironic as it was snug on my chest. This was my 2nd choice if my other option didn't fit, I would have dealt with the sports bra affect.

I got so many compliments on this gown. If you are petite the chest may be a little lower than you'd like. I had to use an adhesive bra to make sure it didn't peek through the top of the bodice. There's no stretch to this dress so I recommend sizing up just so you can have a little breathing room. This dress was so beautifully detailed and flattering. I would wear it again!
Stunning and unique. Compliments all night long.

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress -- the intricacy makes it look incredibly special, and I got several compliments!
links_Review_Text: For me, it FIT right, but was longer than I'd like -- with medium-height heels on, the hem cleared the ground, but just barely (and e.g. walking outside, I felt like I had to pick it up a little). Otherwise really nice dress, though, and fit well!

This dress is beautiful and I received so many compliments at the Gatsby party I wore it to. Caution for those who are shorter, it may be worth it to order a short. I'm 5'4" and can generally wear regulars with heels, but even with heels this dress was 3-4 inches too long. I would 100% rent again, just in a short!

links_Review_Title: Roaring 20's ala an evening at Downton Style
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a NYE roaring 20's themed party. I went in full on Downton Abbey evening attire. This dress was perfect! It for great and was absolutely gorgeous. I won best dressed. It fit perfectly!

This is a Beautiful dress with a lot of embroidery details. It fit great, but was shorter than I like. I am 5'8 & wore flat shoes under the dress. Plenty of room in the bust, waist, & lace arms. The dress was Perfect for a Romantic Dinner on the Napa Wine Train!
Wore it for a red carpet event. Fit perfectly. Many compliments.

This is a stunning dress that I'd rate a five except I feel where the waist line hits that it made me look larger than I am, and was not very flattering on my large bust size. I did not wear a bra, so perhaps it would've been better with one. I sized up based on other reviews and decided on the long length which was perfect with my 4 inch heels. I paired this with a strappy sparkly silver heel, silver jeweled earrings and a bright red lip.
I wore this as mother of the groom. I receive so many compliments. The quality of the dress was amazing.

This was my first experience with rent the runway! The dress was absolutely gorgeous for the gala I went to. I'm 5'6, 140lbs and 34B cup size. I wore sticky boobs rather than a bra. I could have sized up in the dress to a 6R..it was tight around my ribs but very comfortable otherwise. If you're planning on dancing the night away, it's very hard to raise your arms-the shoulder area was a bit tight for me. Other than that, the dress was fabulous and I'll surely be ordering from RTR very soon!!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress long enough for tall girls
links_Review_Text: Fitted top and waist with a very flowy skirt. Such a flattering dress. I'm 5'10 and the long fit perfectly with 2 inch block heels.

This dress was beautiful but felt a little matronly on me. Ended up wearing my backup dress. I would say this dress was true to size and the 6 regular fit great. Im 5'5" and the regular was a perfect length with heels.
I wore this in a photoshoot in Paris. It was really comfortable and so much fun to wear.

I rented this dress for a black tie optional wedding and it did not disappoint. It fit me perfectly. I got so many compliments l! I ended up getting a 16L, which was way too long for me, but I made it work with 3 inch heels. No regrets about this beautiful dress!

links_Review_Title: Rented this for a black-tie wedding.
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress. Very comfortable and got tons of compliments all night. Length was perfect with 3.5 inch heels.
This dress was beautiful, I actually ordered as a back up and ended up using the other dress. But if I had another event would have definitely used .
I have a large chest which makes it hard to find fun dresses. This dress was the perfect mix and wasn't too tight on my chest.
A nice fit and beautiful fabric
Loved this dress and I received a ton of compliments from other wedding guests. Fit true to size on the long side for me 5'6".
Loved everything about this gown! Worn for a music recital which included some Ophelia songs (it seemed to fit the mood. There were a couple loose strings on the hem, though no one noticed.
Fit was perfect. My body type fits well in 0R for all Marchesa dresses. The length was long, but it felt more flowy than cumbersome. Complimented lots!

links_Review_Title: Received tons of compliments and felt beautiful in the dress!
links_Review_Text: Fit is perfectly true to size, very comfortable to wear!

Wore this dress to a formal gala and it was perfect! The dress is so beautiful and got tons of compliments. The designs are very intricate and look great, plus the mesh at the top makes this pretty and not too revealing. It was nice to have something that stands out from many other black dresses in a room. Dress fits true to size and was super easy to wear. It's very light weight, and the length was perfect with 3-inch heels so I didn't worry about tripping. Would definitely rent this again!

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress the entire night! Random strangers came up to me!
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit. If anything, on the larger size because I sometimes wear a 6, but I ended up in the 4R. I wore flats but would probably want a 4L if I had worn heels. It was very comfortable and flattering in the best ways. I was a tiny bit self conscious that you could see my strapless bra through the Polka dot mesh. But I love this dress and would highly recommend it!

This dress was comfortable. Do not plan on wearing a bra as it will ruin the look. The dress fits well enough to hold in the girls. It was lightweight and feminine but just a bit snug in the waist. I would rent this dress again!

links_Review_Title: Wore this for a photoshoot & also a play w/my hubby! I felt very elegant & got lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so beautiful and elegant. The sheer top made it feel classy modest at first glance but sexy at closer look. As someone with a large bust, this dress was great because it didn't make me feel uncomfortably exposed like some other v-neck dresses do, but was beautiful and flattering on my figure. The regular length wasn't available to rent, so I rented the long, and it was definitely too long... Ha! No surprise. So I would say the sizing estimates are pretty dang accurate.

Loved this dress! Fit really well and was super flattering and super comfortable. It was a little low cut for my taste so I wore a black bandeau under it and it looked great. Has a cute back. Got lots of compliments and matched my handsome boyfriend super well :)

I didn't want to return this dress!!!! Got compliments on it all night long and more importantly it made me feel beautiful! Im a size 8, and I got the size 8L because 8r wasn't in stock, and it was definitely too long but I just had to lift it when I walked. Other then that, it fit like a glove. I'm big chested and it is definitely comes very low (I kept checking to make sure no one was getting a show), but the support of the dress made me feel secure and comfortable and there were no mishaps! Wish I could keep it!!! Rent this dress!!!
Beautiful, comfortable, and flattering. The neckline is dreamy.

links_Review_Title: The perfect dress!!!!!!! I'm between sizes and usually go w a 2, sized up to a 4 and fit was great!
links_Review_Text: Hugged in all the right places. Hung beautifully off the waist. So pleased!

links_Review_Title: Absolutely beautiful and more lightweight than it looks!
links_Review_Text: Super comfortable, beautiful gown. It's more lightweight than I had envisioned in the picture, which I loved. The polka dot mesh still keeps it somewhat "sexy" yet has a slight ball gown feel. Lots of compliments!
Fit like a glove. Covered all my fatty areas (tummy, arms, armpit fat) while still looking classy and sexy. Didn't even have to bust out my spanx! Length was perfect with 3" heels!

This dress made me feel beautiful. The material was lovely, it was thick enough to not show any bumps or imperfections. It was very comfortable, and easy to wear. I ordered the 8L, and it was almost too long. I'm 5'9" and wore 3" heels. I'm pear shaped and the hip area fit fine, but the chest was too big (I'm 36B). I normally wear a 10 in pants, so the dress ran big overall. I would totally wear this again! Might try the 6L next time to see if the top fits better.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress that fit like a glove
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a formal occasion, and it showed SO beautifully on stage. Fit super well, even for someone with with a bigger chest and larger arms. I wish I owned this one!

links_Review_Title: This dress came and fit perfectly I did not even need to open the spare.
links_Review_Text: I got complements all night! It was a beautiful dress, well made.

So I didn't actually wear it to a gala bc another RTR dress won, but it's gorgeous. I'm tall and athletic - the height is good for flats (not heels) and shoulders were not too narrow. Beautiful intricate design, classy sums it up.

links_Review_Title: This dress was gorgeous, I got so many compliments! It is much cuter in person than in photos!
links_Review_Text: I was living my Jane Austen fantasy in this dress! 5'8", I wore the long size in 3 inch heels and it just barely touched the floor. No bra required! Overall I was super happy with this dress, and highly recommend it!

Loved this dress. Very lightweight. I received many compliments. The waist is not very forgiving but it still fit well. The Customer's service was great exchanged my dress from a long to regular no problem.
Loved the small details of this dress, got so many compliments! Perfect for a winter formal event.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress! The colors are so vibrant and the pattern of the lace is beautiful!
links_Review_Text: It was a bit tight at the knees and tricky to zip up and down due to the lace. The sleeves did limit my range of motion. Not the best dress for getting to crazy on the dance floor.

Love this dress! Just as gorgeous in person as it is online. I received so many compliments! It's pretty snug, making it somewhat difficult to dance and use the bathroom. But so worth it! Honestly would rent it again.

Loved this dress! Fit pretty true to size (I teeter between 2 and 4 but opted for the 4 since I had a baby not too long ago and my hips definitely got wider) because of the shape and length your range of motion is a little bit limited while dancing...but it can be done! A flattering shape, I received tons of compliments and it felt fun and refreshing for a February wedding in freezing cold upstate NY! 5'7" 140 lbs

I wore this to a bridal high tea/brunch and it was perfect. I'm a 34D, usually a 6 but wore the 8 for more comfort. Dress was true mermaid and a 6 would have been impossible to pull up to use the restroom. I got several compliments, dress was comfortable and would highly recommend.

This dress was great for a wedding welcome party! I loved how it photographed so much that I wish I would have saved it for the actual wedding. The only bad thing about it, though, was that the it was VERY fitted in my lower legs which made getting in and out of cars and dancing hard. However, I'm usually a 6, so that might have been my fault since I wore the 4 (only size available).

Such a pretty and detailed dress. It hugged my curves and made me feel sexy even with the modest neckline and length. I normay wear a size 14 but had to wear a 16 to feel comfortable. I would definitely recommend this dress for any event!
Fits as described in other reviews. Very pleased with this dress, I got many compliments.

Wow. This dress was amazing and my favorite rental ever. It was unlike anything I had rented before(I usually choose basic dresses) but the cut, fit & details made me feel like a celebrity! It is form fitting but I felt fine walking in it all night. I'm 5'2 and 120ish lbs and the size 2 fit perfect. I would definitely rent this again!

I wore this dress to a dinner at a meeting and had so many compliments. The colors are lovely and the dress is very comfortable. It's a big snug at the bottom so not sure I'd want to wear it where there would be dancing.

links_Review_Title: Can be springy, but was beautiful for 11/1 outdoor wedding!
links_Review_Text: I am between a size 8 or 10, 160 pounds but had been feeling a little heavier at the time of this rental, the 10 zipped comfortably but kind of flattened my chest...still loved it!! Such a beautiful dress, I love how the lining is attached at the bottom so no riding up! I am also one of the lucky ones who could pull the dress up to use the restroom so I was pretty comfortable overall. The length is great for a wedding, I am 5'4" and it hit below the knee, highly recommend!
So many compliments. Definitely size up though! I usually wear a 12 but the 14 fit nicely.

links_Review_Title: I went for the fun one! GO BOLD!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to my college roommate's wedding and I was 100% the most colorful person there... but this dress was so flattering to my figure and I received countless compliments. If you're on the fence PICK THIS ONE!! Everyone else will be wearing their subtle dresses and you WILL a stand out! Side note: I usually wear a 14 but I couldn't sit in it so I sized up to 16... perfect fit
This dress hugs your curves in all the right places. Compliments were flowing all night long. Contrary to other reviews, I had no issues slipping the dress up to use the bathroom.
I rented this for a daytime benefit auction that had 500 well dressed women and a fashion show and it was perfect!!

Absolutely rent! This is a gem. Yes leg movement was slightly restricted, but I definitely managed to dance the night away at my friend's wedding. The number of compliments that I received definitely make this an option to rent again in the future!

This style was new for me; the dress fit comfortably but its shape/snugness did limit my range of movement. The lace detail around the zipper can make it difficult to zip/remove on your own, but overall it was a fun option to try out and a beautiful dress for an evening wedding party!

I am 6 months postpartum and needed a dress as my pre-baby wardrobe doesn't quite fit. This dress made me feel very comfortable with my accentuated baby curves, even though I've always had curves. I was optimistic and ordered a 10 and a 8 and wore the 10. It was a little tight and the shimmy up for potty breaks was a struggle but manageable. I got A LOT of compliments! I love the flare at the bottom and the length was exactly what I was looking for.

links_Review_Title: Really nice lace dress but definitely size up.
links_Review_Text: I got this as my backup dress and sized up based on the comments. In one size up it fit perfect! But even then it’s a very form hugging dress so there’s slightly limited mobility for walking/sitting/dancing. Just slightly though! I ended up using this dress for theater tickets we had the same week of the wedding that this was the backup for, so I did get to try it out in public and it was perfectly fine. Not as formal as what I went with for a fancy black tie wedding but would have been great for any other wedding or event. I paired it with hot pink shoes and tangerine lipstick, life is too short for beige heels.

Was worried it would overwhelm a petite frame with the length and print, but this dress is gorgeous! So classy and comfortable - just note a little tighter at bottom so stairs can be tricky. Wish I could rent again!

I'm usually a 6 and it fit but was a little snug and wouldn't be good for dancing. So I went with the 8 for more wiggle room. Definitely wasn't as form fitting as I wanted it to be with the 8 but still a great fit!

This fit perfectly, and was structured yet not too confining. Not much wiggle room, but the flare at the bottom makes it super cute. I loved this dress, and it drew MANY compliments. The colors are vibrant, and it's just such a beautiful fabric and fit. Definitely veers from boring.

links_Review_Title: The Hues, Fit & Texture of this Dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress is one of my favorite rentals to date! Once I zipped the dress up, and looked into the mirror, I felt like I was dressed to attend a royal wedding/tea party. The dress fit true to size. I wore a regular bra with straps, as I had a turquoise one to coordinate. Compliments from strangers, the hues are beautifully vibrant, You won't want to return this rental. Wonderful pick RTR!

Chose this dress as my backup dress. When the order came in & the original dress didn't work, I opted for this dress. (Runs TTS) This was the most stunning dress! It's a little heavier than expected but I was able to dance & felt comfortable the entire night. Not only that, I got TONS of compliments on this dress. Don't be scared to try something different! This dress won't disappoint!!

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress but some sacrifice needed...read on....
links_Review_Text: Alright so this dress is BEAUTIFUL! I wore it to a friends wedding and I felt great! Here's where it can be do or die for someone with extra booty and thighs...I could NOT raise the dress up to use the ladies room - I had to take the WHOLE dress off. I would keep this in mind if you're going to an event where the bathrooms may be tight or whatever your situation is. I didn't mind cuz I loved the dress that much. I'm usually a 6/8 but had to wear the 10 since it was a bit easier to zip around the booty and sitting down was more comfortable. Also knowing I would need to use the bathroom, I didn't want a horrifying situation where I was struggling to zip it up again and it broke or I just couldn't. I did wear the dress and drive for 2hrs as an FYI so it's not overall so tight where you can't breathe. Given I wore the 10, the top of the dress was loose but it wasn't obvious because of the gorgeous lace and patterns. Bae said I should buy the dress but I don't think it's worth the hassle detailed above. Renting is one thing. Hence why I love RTR! Okay I'm done! Hopefully this helps someone! :)
I tried both the 14 and 16R and the 16 felt better. I added a belt to break up the pattern too. I LOVED this dress and felt gorgeous all night. Doesn't look it but it's also easy to dance in.

This dress felt great on, and I got endless complements the whole night. Definitely fit like a glove (as in it's sug like other reviewers mentioned) but it hugs you in all the right places. Seriously considered keeping this one and so happy I rented it!

links_Review_Title: Felt great in it and got lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress is so pretty! It is super tight though, the lining has virtually no stretch, so if you plan on eating, I would size up! The dress hit about mid calf on me (I'm 5'4"), which I think looked pretty flattering. Overall I was really happy with it.

I chose this dress as a backup for a dress that became unavailable prior to my event, and I ended up loving this dress EVEN MORE than my original pick! The colors are vibrant, it was form fitting and fit well in all the right places! I usually wear a size 4, and this size 4 fit perfectly. The fabric is on the thicker side, but I wore it to an August wedding and I was comfortable and it doesn't show sweat, which is always a plus!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a wedding! Doesn’t show sweat and isn’t too tight but is form fitting
links_Review_Text: Very flattering. It’s pretty hot material with the lace but is very comfortable. Easy to move in and true to size. The 2 fit but was uncomfortably tight in my bust area, so I went with the 4.
Beautiful!!! Fits tight in all the right places giving beautiful curves yet being comfortable to wear.

links_Review_Title: It's been 5 months postpartum, great drrss
links_Review_Text: Received so many compliments, amazing fit, hug the right places

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a summer wedding !
links_Review_Text: This dress was SPECTACULAR. It was gorgeous, and well fitted. I received many compliments wearing this. The colors pop so vibrantly in person. I wore them with heels the match the blue in the dress. The dress, as people have said, doesn't give much stretch (going to the bathroom was a bit of a process but I was also wearing spanx and we know those are difficult to handle ) but for dancing I just hiked it up a little and was completely fine. I am normally an 8 or a 10 and the ten fit stupendously. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

links_Review_Title: The colors in this dress are amazing and actually the biggest compliment I got all night.
links_Review_Text: The others are right, the dress it very fitting but at first. Throughout the night it was much easier to move around in the dress-maybe the alcohol helped not too sure LOL but to say the least using the restroom was not a problem at all without any help from someone pulling up or down the dress. If you are ordering I def suggest your true size and backup a size up. I’m a true 16 so not having anything bigger was nerve wracking but it fit perfectly. ALSO for us women who have bigger arms and some extra love in the butt, this dress has enough room in the arms and it hugs all your curves the right way! I started the night with my hair up and took it down halfway through the night. Honestly you can style it anyway, I also had some pretty pink flower earrings that paired nicely and wore nude pencil heels.

Wore this to a special charity event outdoor on lawn, afternoon into evening. Bright, cheery, lots of compliments. Rented as back up. Glad I did! I usually wear a size 4. This was a perfect fit... like a glove but could still breath. I had rented a different style Vone dress before, size 6, which fit right so was unsure about the 4 in this one but glad I chose the right size. A 6 in this style would not have fit me well or have been flattering. Reviews are accurate - harder to move around in this dress but since I was mainly standing on lawn and seated at a dinner, it was a perfect choice.

links_Review_Title: Classy Dress for Late Spring Wedding
links_Review_Text: I went into the RTR studio fully expecting to rent another dress and stumbled on this gem. I am usually a size six but found that the smaller sizes higged my figure and accentuated my backside. The detailing made it elegant while the teal accents offered some unique color pops. I would seriously consider purchasing this dress. I paired it with teal shoes and fascinator and got lots of compliments. For a simpler look, a nude sandal would also work because it is a lot of material especially for more petite women. Absolutely loved the way this dress made me feel - pretty and dainty. Not the easiest dress to dance in, particularly in the smaller size but absolutely stunning.

This dress is a little out of my comfort zone (bold colors/ was form fitting) but was pleasantly flattering. I truly have not felt more glamorous in a wedding guest dress. Dancing was a little difficult but I would not have chosen another dress. Was a big hit and received many compliments!
This is my favorite dress ever rented at RTR! So flattering and beautiful.

links_Review_Title: I received a lot of compliments while wearing this dress. It looked great with a fascinator!
links_Review_Text: Fit: The dress was a little snug on the hips, which made it uncomfortable to sit properly. Pros: The detailing of the dress was intricate and beautiful, however it also led to on of cons of the dress. Cons: The detailing made it difficult to zip up and down, it would get caught in the zipper a little. There was no stretch to the dress at all.

This was the best dress I could have rented! I stood out wonderfully (conservatively) in this dress amongst a sea of navy and darker colors for a wedding. I'm 5'9" and the dress hit me below the knee but not quite mid calf. In my opinion it was the perfect length. Sleeves are a good size as sometimes my arms don't fit in short sleeved dresses. The shape of the dress hugged every curve without being too tight to not be able to sit comfortable dance. I LOVED this dress.

links_Review_Title: Dress was wonderful and wish I owned it. Got many compliments..
links_Review_Text: I am between sizes of an 8 and 10. The 10 worked out perfect I am thicker in the bottom half and have wide shoulders.
This dress was perfect for a beach wedding. I usually wear a size 4 but sized up to a 6 as the 4 was a little right in the waist area! Loved this and would definitely rent again!!

links_Review_Title: Was very comfortable to wear and got many compliments

links_Review_Text: Def couldn't breathe or eat dessert at the end of the night, and I have a small torso. But felt cute!
This dress fit so well, and was extremely flattering. So many complements on it!

I usually love Nicholas but the fit on this dress just didn't work on me. Maybe my torso is too long? It was hard to zip over the ribcage even though I have a pretty narrow ribcage, and it made my butt look weird and lumpy. Bummer since the color is great.

The dress was beautiful but it's definitely for someone who is very small in the rib cage area. Does not stretch, while in most items I am a 2 in this one I would probably be a size 6 just by the way it didn't zip. Again beautiful and will probably rent but in a larger size. I have a straight body shape like an athlete and am wider up top. This would fit perfect for someone who is naturally petite in the upper area.

I ordered a size up based on the one review posted, but I found it actually is true to size and wished I ordered my usual size. This fabric is stunning! The cut and style are very 90's IMO which is very in right now. This is a perfect party dress, or you can wear flats and enjoy a picnic date like I did. My husband of 24 years thought I was wearing a sexy nightie and said I was a bold babe for wearing it on our date...I assured him it was a $700 designer dress and he said it looks like it's worth every penny!!!
Loved wearing this dress! The front is low cut and fabric does not stretch so definitely designed for smaller chest/waist.
I sized up after seeing reviews but even the larger size was still too small to zip up the dress! Gorgeous color but I recommend sizing up at least 1 maybe 2 sizes

links_Review_Title: Loved the color and print but fit was off
links_Review_Text: I loved the color and style, but the fit just wasn't right for my body type- much too small in the bust and dragged the floor. Hopefully works better for a taller slimmer frame!
This dress is amazing! Smouldering intense color, silky feel & flow to the high quality fabric, crazy flattering fit/cut. No mercy!
Sexy low cut dress that shows off legs too.
Great summer dress. Better with a bigger chest. It was a little bit too lose on me. Lose fabric, very flattering. The color is bright orange and silver/grey.

Dress is a very flattering fit and was perfect for my last minute needs (grabbed in store, only size avail). The color was gorgeous and really stood out. HOWEVER, for a $700 dress the material is very flimsy. The strap was fringing and looked like it could break at any minute. I also noticed a small hole in the second layer of fabric. Glad it was just a rental and not a dress I actually purchased.
I had this on and loved it, until I realized it is completely see through in day light. It has a lining but the liming is also see through (and not long enough).

This dress is SOO pretty. The color is gorgeous and it's so flattering on any body type. The fabric around the ribs was a little tight- I am usually a true xs but I was really ready to take this off by the end of the night. Got so many compliments though- beautiful dress!
This is a flirty sexy dress, unfortunately it was big on me, I would say the chest are is pretty generous, I will try to order again in a smaller size
Did not wear. Did not fit well and was too short on one side. Was not flattering on me but that may be due to my long torso.

links_Review_Title: Such a gorgeous dress. Really flattering and sexy.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! It's silky and really flattering for a curvier body.
Flattering dress. Great color.

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately a little large on me.
links_Review_Text: Unfortunately this dress ran a little large on me otherwise it would have been a very flattering dress. I would certainly look to order this in a size smaller next time.
runs small - I am usually a 0 or 2 and wore a 4 in this.
Runs tiny on top Accentuates curves

This is my second time renting from this designer and based on my experience, the pieces run very small. I am normally a size 4, I should've sized up to an 8. This is a waist fitted dress with no stretch at all. If you have hips, definitely consider sizing up.
Beautiful but runs small
To tight in ribs, i would need 6, but nit sure if it would be to large then at chest, it's probably nice for tropical vacation
The fit was very strange for my petite 5"2 frame and 34DDD BUT I believe it would look great on someone tall, slim and not as busty.

The dress is cute, def a fall/winter look. The fabric is flannel-like. The side cinch is adjustable, since the fabric has no stretch I recommend cinching high because it's hard to walk normal stride length if the hemline is lowered. Also, it is low low cut.

This dress was pretty small on top and true to size on the bottom. If you have a larger chest I don't recommend it. I'm only a c-cup and even I couldn't wear a bra with this. I ended up putting the small shirt under it to hold my boobs in. It smooshed my chest down, thankfully the pattern hid that fact.

This dress runs mostly tts but I would say it sways to a little big. The bust was very roomy and the straps were a touch long so I wore the black t-shirt under it and everything stayed pg! Worn as shown 1 time then a second time with a white t, sneakers and a white down jacket. My only complaint with the dress was the hemline, I walk quickly and take long steps and the hemline pulled against my legs. I had to lift the long side of the dress to keep it from happening, not a big deal...

Loved this Monse! One of my favorite brands on RTR. The drawstring hem is super cute and it's comfortable. Not a lot of coverage for the cleavage, so I wore a black T-shirt under it. Styled with a Rebecca Minkoff jacket, Marc Jacobs snapshot and Sam Edelman boots. I would rent again, highly recommend.

Very oversized and adjustable-- you can make it shorter, which was so fun! After an hour, it stretched out even more and I felt the very-low-cut top showing, we, too much. Size down and probably best for a bigger bust than mine!
I'm in love with this dress. So comfy and makes a huge statement for flannel. I will definitely rent this again.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous country girl dress you can wear with a bralette and cowgirl boots
links_Review_Text: The pros include the softness of the fabric and relaxing fit. The con is how the straps hang off the shoulder--too long.

links_Review_Title: Super small and not easy to move in
links_Review_Text: My boobs were squished into this dress and as I walked the skirt would move awkwardly or feel restrictive. The fabric is soft and cozy, but all this skin on top is not going to work in a cold climate.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! I would have purchased it but way too expensive!
links_Review_Text: I paired it with a long sleeve tee and some black combat boots for an edgy look!

This dress is so fun and different. It's sexy, playful, cool and unique! It's definitely pretty lowcut and revealing in the bosom area. There's a cinch on the side to gather the dress and make it shorter or longer. Side zip helped to get in and out of it. I found the colors and pattern so cool and edgy. It's a dress with some attitude! Loved it
Lived wearing it and felt really beautiful in it!

I rented this because it looked like there was extra room in the top area. The body portion fit perfectly, but the girls didn't have a chance. I will definitely rent this again and order a larger size. I'm curious to see if the body portion will still look as good if the dress is large enough to fit my bust.

Seriously cute and flattering dress. I'm usually a 12 and I got the 14 just in case but it was too big. (I wore it anyway.) Even being big everywhere, the chest is small and very low cut so i had to wear a shirt underneath it. Still really cute.

links_Review_Title: Funky flannel for a winter cocktail party
links_Review_Text: I could see dressing this down and wearing with combat boots and a leather jacket or dressing it up with black booties or stilettos. The top was loose on me. The side is adjustable, can go super thigh high or knee length depending on your event. And it's FLANNEL! So comfy.
Ran a bit big around the bust. Material is thicker than expected feels like a good fall dress not summer
I wore this cute dress with a plain white t-shirt underneath and white sneakers. It was a fun look for lunch but it would look great with boots if I was going out.
Fit me perfectly in the chest, but was a little baggy in the hips... though I think it's meant to be that way. Perfect for a 90's rock concert.

links_Review_Title: Great fabric, great cut, very very small.
links_Review_Text: I liked this dress, but it does run small. I am usually a 4 or a 6, never an 8. The 8 fit in this dress. Zipper is a bit sticky. Very soft, almost flannel-like fabric. Straps kept falling down. That was irritating. Overall a nice dress, but not a great dress.
This was the perfect dress for a vacation to the Pacific Northwest. I wore a black denim jacket and combat booties to round out the look. Would rent again :)

links_Review_Title: Wore to lunch for a day date. Comfy dress for fall. 90's flashbacks. Fun look!
links_Review_Text: Made all my 90's dreams come true.

links_Review_Title: Super cute fall / winter going out dress
