links_Review_Text: Super cute if you have small boobs. I couldn't wear because I looked like a porn star but would have if I could. Fits true to size or size down if you are in between

I loved this dress. It is very punk rock meets REI, which sounds like a poor match but it totally works. Biggest note: it's lined flannel!!! I didn't realize this and rented for a late summer outdoor party (85+ degrees) it was a bit warm for that. Also note it is very low cut up front and fit is generous (not stretchy). You can dress up or down depending on shoes; I did flip flops for a casual kid party look and then wedges to go out with adults.
Very classic and stylish dress! If between sizes I would go down. Also the bottom is very heavy but totally worth it.

links_Review_Title: All the compliments and how beautiful I felt wearing the dress.
links_Review_Text: Perfect winter evening dress! Fit perfectly and everyone complimented me on how beautiful I looked and that the dress was stunning. I agree.
I accidentally ordered a size too big but still worked great!

Beautiful dress and I got lots of compliments- BUT, it was hot. Florida wedding in June combined with heavy sequins and little give in the skirt was warm for a bit. I also should have ordered the Long, as I didn't love the ankle length. Overall, happy with the dress.

This dress is so beautiful and so unique. I had so many people stop me throughout the event to tell me how much they loved it. I will say that it does run very small so you will for sure need to size up and I definitely wore Spanx… haha! totally worth it though!
I rented for a black tie wedding. Fit was great and the length was perfect. Was comfortable to wear and got many compliments. Great quality as well!

When I pulled this out of the bag, my husband seemed skeptical, but when I walked out in it he had to pick his jaw up off the floor! This dress is a dream, easy to wear a normal bra with (if you're well endowed like me) and dance in, super elegant. I am not a selfie taker, but I was feeling this dress so much I snapped a selfie. Loved it, highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: This was for a formal gala "black tie optional" event, and this dress was the perfect style.
links_Review_Text: As noted by other reviewers, the velvet belt in the middle is more unforgiving than the rest of the dress. I am usually an 8 or 10, but for this dress I wish I would have sized up to a 12 to have a little more breathing room throughout the evening. Overall, the dress is beautiful and I received so many compliments on its beauty and uniqueness - it was a great style for the event as "black tie optional."
I felt comfortable, special and unique in this dress. It was so comfortable and had the right amount of glam for a fall black tie wedding.

links_Review_Title: This dress was beautiful and perfect for my event
links_Review_Text: The dress fit true to size and was comfortable! I loved the gold sequin and lace details. I definitely would recommend this for your next formal event.

The skirt was incredible. Beautifully crafted and with a little stretch so you didn't feel like walking in a corset. The lace top was very sexy and romantic. I sized up because the 10 was actually damaged (sequins missing, bow untied) and just slightly too tight in my hips so it looked like a mermaid dress. The 12 was slightly bigger in the lace top because of it, but the skirt fit like a glove. Just size up one size bigger than your normal. I never ever get a sheath or slip dress (usually a-line) but this was a show stopper!

This dress traveled well for an out of state wedding. The first was perfect. Easy to wear and easy to dance in. Very flattering. Would have been too tight if my chest was bigger but it zipped up perfectly! Photographed well!

Dress was super comfortable and beautiful! Several compliments received. I'm 5'5 and the length worked great for me. Zipper was hard to work. I'm usually a 6 and ended up wearing the 8 due to the top area. Would recommend.

I rented this for a New Year's Eve party with a tiki theme. It fit the theme perfectly and was a real showstopper. The ankle length of 56" worked perfectly on my 5'2" frame. The size 4 was a bit snug, but it's lined and structured so no bulges. About the only thing I didn't like was the underarm fit showing that horrible fat bulge. I wore a little cover up shift all night because of it. Also - the zipper over the felt band is tough. Still - very fun rental.

links_Review_Title: Glamour dress for any special occasion.
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress. Received so many compliments. Loved the mixed fabrics! Show stopper dress.

links_Review_Title: I received tons of compliments. The dress is beautiful. Perfect for black tie wedding
links_Review_Text: The dress fit true to size. No stretch. The hem kept falling and I had to pull it up so it didn't show. I'm 5' 3" and wore 3 inch heels. However, overall it was a good rental.

This dress was beautiful. i ordered it from Marchesa direct just to try on so i knew what to expect when my RTR dress came. The dress from Marchesa it fit like a glove. unfortunately when the RTR dress came it wasn't in the best condition. There was sequin missing on my upper thigh and a tear on the lace under my arm. The butt was all stretched in the seams like someone was squeezing into a size they shouldn't be. I had to put a pin in the back for the night - not what i wanted to do.

links_Review_Title: Rented for black tie wedding in Napa. It was pretty. Received several compliments
links_Review_Text: This dress traveled well. It did not wrinkle

links_Review_Title: This dress was absolutely stunning. It was comfortable and effortlessly beautiful.
links_Review_Text: It fit perfectly. I am a 34 DD, and wear a size 4 pants currently. I wear a size 6 in dresses and this fit perfectly. I am just under 5'6" and wore a 3 1/2- 4in heel. I was able to move comfortably throughout the night and truly danced the night away. I wore minimal jewelry because honestly the dress can stand alone.

I wore this for a black tie wedding and it was perfect. Fit true to size (I'm 5'3", small chested with wide hips), was remarkably comfortable and easy to move in. I had no trouble chasing around and picking up my young kids or dancing. The sequins really sparkle on the dance floor! I'd rent it again in a heartbeat. The only slight negative is the lining of the skirt kept peeking out below the hemline, so I ended up pinning up the lining. Otherwise, no complaints and lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: The original size was unavailable but my backup size ended up being the perfect fit!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so perfect for the wedding - which was African styled. The skirt is not very flexible and so if you are getting into a SUV or car that sits high, it is a bit challenging. But other than that I loved it and would rent again.

What a beautiful dress. I received so many compliments throughout the night. It fit like a glove. This dress does not have any give. It's very structured and heavier because of the sequins but was not so heavy that it weighed me down throughout the night. Perfect for a wedding or holiday party!

I wore this for my cousin's wedding. I only got the 4R ( I am usually a 2). The top was not as fitting in the 4, and I had to use some clothing tape. The rest of the dress fit beautifully. I got so many complements on the dress. Great for wedding!

links_Review_Title: I chaired and spoke at a gala for 300 donors. This dress was perfect! SO many compliments!!
links_Review_Text: I thought the fit was true to size. I didn't have to wear spanx or a bra and I felt comfortable the entire time. I'm barely 5'1, so the dress was longer than it was supposed to be, but I expected that. The waist line and the fabric were very flattering and slimming. I had endless compliments and women asking me where I got it from. And no-one had on anything like it. I would definitely rent this again and recommend it!!
This fits nice. Beware if you want to wear a wrap. Sequins catch on everything. Looks great in photos.
I wore this dress to a Gala. I wore a kitten heel and the dress was at my ankle (5'4"). It was a lovely mix of feeling great but without showing all the goods!

I wore this dress for a Singapore style black-tie fundraiser/gala. I am on the petite side, so the dress was a little big on my, but fit the theme and I received compliments all night. Would definitely recommend!
Perfect dress for the submarine ball! No bra needed and fit true to size. Loads of compliments and I highly recommend!
Loved this rental! I may actually rent again for another event! So comfortable and a show stopper for sure! *you totally can wear a normal bra with this dress!*

I'm 5'2", 150lbs 34D. The dress was not too long as I feared (could have worn flats) and fit me beautifully! I always wear spanx for extra confidence, but the 8R fit without trouble. I rented the 10R as backup. I felt like the gold top of The Oscars statue! Just a stunning dress!!!

Love the dress! Fit was great and the sequins were a show stopper. Lace detail also a major plus. However the lining was longer than the skirt and I had to pin it up in the front and back. Also be aware there is no stretch anywhere in the dress.

I rented this dress for our make up company's annual conference. I was receiving recognition for my foster care work on stage in front of 2,000 of the most beautiful women and I felt like a super model. I am 5'10" and I wish this dress were an inch or two shorter. It has no stretch in the bottom so sitting was questionable. Over all I felt gorg and that's all that matters!

I rented this for an Arab black tie wedding and was not disappointed. It was sexy but not revealing and just incredibly elegant. I'm 5'2" and 105 lbs and the 0R was a good fit. It was a bit long, but with heels it was fine. I felt gorgeous in this dress and was overwhelmed with compliments. It was a bit challenging to walk down the city streets in, as your range of motion is limited with the skirt, but I just took my time. Dancing was a little challenging too, but I managed. I'm in love with this one!!
Details on the dress were more elegant than I expected. Minimal accessories needed. Garment and quality speaks for itself. Would buy if I could afford it!

links_Review_Title: A fundraising gala that I am the president of the organization
links_Review_Text: Fit me perfectly! I am 5'3" and it was the perfect length for me. I have hips/thighs & a booty, so I was worried at first it would be tight, but it fit my body type perfectly and comfortably as well. I danced all night long in it as well easily because of the slit in the back. It was also great when I was on stage to give my speech as the bottom half of the dress just sparkles beautifully. I would totally rent again if I had another gala to attend.

links_Review_Title: Dress arrived early, packaged so nicely in the RTR suit bags, in GREAT condition!
links_Review_Text: I am a true 16R, this dress fit like a GLOVE!! I felt and looked amazing!! I was even able to sit comfortably and wrangle my toddler in this gown. I got so many compliments :)

I rented this beautiful dress for my birthday party at an old Hollywood hangout and asked my friends to dress up for the Silver Screen as well. It probably was a little much what with the gold sequins but I didn't care. It was my birthday. It was comfortable to wear. But standing up from a seated position took some doing because the dress doesn't have much give. Also the zipper was a bit sticky and was difficult to zip up all the way. Just had to keep trying. In any case, highly recommend this dress when you want to shine.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress that provides coverage but still sexy.
links_Review_Text: I'm a size 12 normally but I chose to wear the 10 which was a bit snug. The length was perfect and I'm 62 inches. The material however was very scratchy on both the top and bottom. The zipper was really difficult once you got up to the velvet detail too. You can definitely wear a bra with this dress, theres no boning or cups in the dress. Overall, I'd wear it again. I got a ton of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Stunning details, classy but modern. Recommend finding a hunk in a sequin jacket to accessorize!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to my graduation from residency. Unofficial theme was "Sequins Extravagaaannnza!" Dress was perfect for the event and I felt like a million bucks wearing it. My partner was a total champ and wore a SUH-WEET jacket to match (Amazon.com). RTR comes through EVERY TIME!
Great crop top with high quality denim material. The top is semi stretchy and easy for any cup size to wear. Not too short--matches well with any bottoms.

I wore the top to travel to LA. Felt comfortable! Had a hard time finding the right pants in my wardrobe as the top is very cropped and I didn't want to show my belly (too old for that!) - works well with high waisted wide pants (navy or white)

links_Review_Title: Got tons of compliments. Perfect for warm days!
links_Review_Text: No stretch at all, so size up. Very flattering and great fit on a larger bust. Everyone was complimenting me on my top!

links_Review_Title: Cute shirt but fitted and cropped so not super flattering on my body type
links_Review_Text: This shirt was very cute. I usually feel comfortable wearing looser fitting drop tops with high waisted jeans but when I wore this shirt that way, I felt like my love handles squeezed out. Hence why I only posted a selfie. Otherwise, very pretty. Only other issue was that the ruffle part kept getting bent over and I'd have to pull it and smooth it out.

links_Review_Title: Small but fun print & thick fabric
links_Review_Text: This was a very small medium. I do have a large rib cage and a decent size chest (c), but usually am a small. I could just barely squeeze into this medium. I had to wear some high waisted pants to hide the bit of tummy (uploaded a photo so you can kind of see what I mean). If you have a tiny waist I think it would be incredibly flattering. I did like that the fabric was thick enough that I did not have to wear a bra (couldn't really if I wanted to). 4 stars for the fun print and quality fabric, but removed one star for just how tight and in some areas, unflattering it was.
Such a fun summer crop top! I wore this to governors ball and it was easy to dance around in.

For a Hawaiian themed party, I couldn't pass this up. As others have reviewed, it had no stretch in the chest and even though I'm fairly flat, I've got a wide ribcage and I'm glad I went with the S. This fit perfectly but had no room to spare. I've got a long torso too, so the longer straps felt perfect. It's a little hard to zip alone but honestly, this top was worth it. I got nonstop compliments on it and all I want to do now is find more excuses to rent this again.
Wore this crop for a festive casual cinco de Mayo wedding look! Super comfy, no bra needed! I typically wear a size 6/8 top and the large fits perfectly.
This top is so cute. Perfect with so many bottom choices. I wore it with the matching skirt as well but wanted to be more casual so pairs it with jeans capris.

links_Review_Title: Fun and festive. Wish straps were slightly shorter
links_Review_Text: Super playful top. I wore it with the matching skirt during the day and then threw on jeans at night. I felt like I was sometimes pulling it up because the straps were slightly long. Overall I really liked it though.
Fits true to size, but note that there's no stretch. The ruffle straps and neckline are so flattering. Great bright summer pattern

links_Review_Title: Runs small, didn't end up wearing
links_Review_Text: I'm usually a small in tops and this M was REALLY tight. I could zip it but didn't feel comfortable in it so didn't end up wearing! my waist is 26.5 in
Pro: This is a nice top with vibrant colors. Cons: This top will work better with women who aren't flat chested
WAAAY Small. I am 34 DDD with small rib cage. Couldn't get this top to close. Never got to wear on my Sobe getaway. So sad!

This crop top is beautiful and such fun colors. I planned on wearing it with a red midi button up skirt, but unfortunately, the top was too small. I normally wear an XS or S, and on the advice of other RTR ladies, I ordered up to a medium, and still lacked an inch. I would advise to order a backup size or order up two sizes. I am very small chested, so anyone with boobs will need to be very narrow in body.
I ordered a large because it was the only size available I am a 34DD it fit in the chest but was loose around my stomach. Materiel is thick, needs to be ironed.
Straps were a little loose and kept falling. If you have a short torso like me, you lose a little bit of the crop-top effect. Otherwise, fit is true to size and color is exactly as it appears online.
This was too small. I couldn't zip it even without a bra.
Tiny!
The fit is as expected. Material is thicker so you can get away without a bra. Zips up the back so it's a little hard to get on and zipped.
Gorgeous shirt, runs a bit small
Super cute, nice fabric, awesome vibrant colors. Just too dang small. Not for women with boobs who actually need support. This garment looks like a bra, but it does not hold anything up like a bra.

links_Review_Title: So small it's almost for a child
links_Review_Text: This top requires two people to get on (it has to fully unzip and due to crop you can't reach it without someone helping you. Once on it has zero give in the fabric and is so tight it's unreal. Size up one size at least but then again, there are built out cups without any give or stretch so it would also be assuming you'd have larger boobs with a larvae rib cage.
I wear an XS in everything and I could not zip this top up (even without a bra). It is also very cropped (it was 2 inches above my belly button. Otherwise, very cute.

Not usually one for shimmer but these were fun for a night out. Wore with black crop top, long black blazer and black strapped heels and loved the look. These run large and leave plenty of room for tucking in a shirt or sizing down.
I rented these to wear for New Year's Eve but only snapped a picture of them the second time I wore them to work. Can be dressed up. Or down. A really cute piece but runs baggy.

I rented these to have something a little more casual to wear to a holiday get together. They're metallic, but not over the top. I found I was able to dress them down with a cream sweater and dress them up with a black bodysuit. I ended up keeping them to wear on vacation and kept repeating them and got multiple compliments and looks.
These shorts were so fun! I paired them with black tights, a black turtle neck and black booties for a polished yet fun look for a night out! Perfect for the holidays!
Runs big - long inseam and super high rise! Looks great with tights and heels.

This is one of my favorite items I have ever rented. They are very fun and totally spiced up a usually dull look. I did roll up the shorts a bit, because the length was a little awkward on my legs - but that was an easy fix and I got a lot of compliments on them!

I rented these shorts for a weekend trip to Vegas. They were perfect! I loved them so much. They were so comfortable- elastic waist and pockets! As you can see from the picture, they were a little longer on me because I am short (5'4") but that was fine with me. I didn't want to return them!

links_Review_Title: Loved the shorts. So comfy and fun.
links_Review_Text: I wore a smaller size than normal.

links_Review_Title: NYE CLICHES TORN DOWN WITH THESE SHORTS!!
links_Review_Text: I am a curvy bottom, shorts and pants are always a gamble. These slid on with room to spare. I'm typically a 14 and they were loose. Everyone lost their GD minds over my shorts. They were so unexpected yet completely in season and festive. I will continue to rent these when I want to do a fun twist. I honestly think they look better with fishnets than bare legs. These saved my New Years!!!
These were at favorite piece for the holiday season! I wore them for so many occasions, and received compliments each time.
These are squishy and nice!
These shorts are super cute and although they fit me, they were not flattering at all.
These fit me so well-really comfy around the waist because of the elastic, and long enough in the legs. I for so many compliments all night long!
Also SUPER comfortable!
These run huge at the waist. If they were tighter at the waist it would work as a high waisted short but as is, they are shapeless. The fabric is thick so they just make you look even bigger.
The color is beautiful, and the fit is comfortable, but flattering.
These run very bIg! They seems to just bulk as well.'
I wore these dressed up for a night out with a crop top and heels and dressed down to the office with a simple white tee and flats. Fit is comfortable and still cute and it has pockets!

links_Review_Title: I rented this for a weekend outfit but did not wear.
links_Review_Text: I typically wear a 10/12 and these were parachute pants on me. They were super wide and too long. I would recommend sizing down.
Run very large, but love the shorts...hope to rent smaller size in the future.
The shorts were comfortable but they just didn't work well on me. Maybe I needed a smaller size.

I loved the color and material and I really REALLY wanted to wear these with black tights and a turtleneck, but the waist on these were really long.... even with pulling them up just below my bust. I am on the short side (5'3) so it may work for tall ladies.

I expected these shorts to be blousy and they were appropriately blousy, but they were weirdly long on me and ultimately not flattering. I am only 5'6" and I normally wear a size 10 in pants - so maybe these would be better on someone who is taller? Fabric is fun, just fit is a bit weird.
Wore this for a friendsgiving dinner. I wish I went a size down, runs large.

links_Review_Title: These shimmery bronze shorts are a total head-Turner. They were super fun to wear!
links_Review_Text: All over loose fit with a very forgiving stretchy waist.

I got so many compliments on this dress! It was form fitting and so sexy! I noticed that the size 8R was actually the UK size. The dress was a US size 4. If you need more room to walk / dance just unzip they bottom a little bit more.

Wow- this is some va va voom dress! If you have curves, this will slay the room. Beautifully made dress with impeccable tailoring, but you have to be confident to wear this attention-getter. I wasn't able to wear a bra with it (32F), so it was a lot of boobs. My husband loved this dress- perfect for a big night out Valentine's Day dinner. Truly a knock out dress.
I'm normally a size 8 but sized way up based on fit of other Victoria Beckham pieces- and it was huge! Recommend NOT sizing up as usually required for VB

Rented this for a baby shower and fell in love. Sized down after reading reviews and straps were still too long but I pinned one & it worked perfectly. I received so many compliments & wanted to keep it!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric but the dress top has a weird fit
links_Review_Text: The top is a bit large and you have to wear a strapless bra (or bra less). The off the shoulder sleeve is too tight and the black strap is too big (and Unadjustable). Without a sweater the top would have been very low cut! I wore with a sweater on one occasion and with a shirt in warmer weather. The bottom half was very fun and I loved the feel of the fabric and they way it moved when I walked. It does have a slit up the middle so be careful when sitting.

links_Review_Title: Wore it for my bridal shower
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! It was definitely very comfy. I worried that the ruffles would overwhelm my petite frame but it ended up looking great. Only issue with the dress was that one strap was too long and I had to pin it to keep it up.

The fit throughout was just right- not too tight or loose anywhere , but the neckline on me was lowcut (but not so much that I was falling out--still very tasteful). The length also was a little long for my body so it hit lower on my legs than the model's legs. In person it didn't seem too long but looking back at pictures it did look a little long for my body. Overall though very pretty and the one black strap balances it out giving it a little edge. The base color of the dress is actually a light pink which was a nice surprise! I felt great all night in this dress.
Dress runs a little large. I'm a 36C/D and the dress was loose, but not in a uncomfortable way. It didn't give the body much shape, but it was still very flattering.

I absolutely love this dress! I rented it for a wedding rehearsal dinner and I was so excited to wear it. I love that it's super feminine but still modern. The fabric is even lovelier in person, and the ruffled detail down the front is great for hiding flaws. It showed just the right amount of cleavage for someone with a larger bust (I'm a 34D) and I loved the length for my tall height (I'm 5'9"). It fit my hourglass figure snugly and I found myself adjusting the dress a lot, but it was worth it. My only complaint is that the black strap isn't adjustable and it was a tiiiny bit long. Overall a stunning dress of amazing quality!

Rented for a work social, but wore for wine tasting. Was great for a day at the vineyards with friends, but too much cleavage for the work event. Fit true to size, was comfortable all day, and walked well. Highly recommend!

I absolutely love this style! It was the perfect look for my dinner date and then a night out dancing with him! It runs true to size and great for any cup size. It has comfortable room throughout the midsection and hips- which made my night even better!
Asymmetrical top stunning! Shoulder strap was fun. Beautiful material.

I rebted this dress with unlimited and wore to a birthday dinner party. I LOVED THIS DRESS will definitely rent again. Pros: fabric was heavier than appears and had a slight give, was a beautiful silk print that was interesting but still neutral. Cut was perfect if a hair generous, it hangs beautifully on the body. I cant imagine a body type this dress would not work on! Cons: rand a tad large as noted but nothing a safety pin at the strap couldnt fix. I wore this twice. The first time was with neutral powder lace up pumps and a vintage black silk handbag. The second time i atyled it with neon yellow rockstud pumps and a neon yellow clutch.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress that I ended up wearing to a beachy wedding.
links_Review_Text: The dress is better in person! The fit is perfect but that's what you get when wearing designer. I thought the ruffles would be too much since I have an very athletic/smaller frame with large bust but it actually looked great! Highly recommend and will likely rent again!
Obsessed with this dress, can't wait to rent it again. Rented for weekend brunch by the beach. Got lots of compliments. Hit me like a midi dress.

links_Review_Title: Flattering, but ruffle strap needs altered.
links_Review_Text: Ruffle strap is too long and not adjustable. If small chested, dress will be impossible to manage.

links_Review_Title: I didn't wear but loved the style, very edgy look, will rent again
links_Review_Text: Nice quality dress,
the top fit a bit loose, but I managed to pin the staps, and it fit perfectly. The fabric hung well and was very flattering.
The strap was kind of weird, you had to tuck it in / secure it. It wasn't that most " user friendly" of a dress but still gorgeous!
Can't adjust the straps.
I love this dress. I am 5 foot and very, very busty...thus, I have problems with sizing. I am going to try again in a smaller size. :)

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my engagement shoot with a white leather jacket over
links_Review_Text: Fit was a little loose and I had to pin up the straps because they were too long. It was fine since I was shooting in it for 45 mins.

Can be dressed up or down (I wore it with a leather jacket and white tennis shoes during the day and switched to heels at night. Definitely a little longer and looser on me and a little more low cut but love the different sleeves and cut otherwise!

The dress was gorgeous and the body fit well, but the straps were way too long on me, causing it to gap in weird places and fall too low to wear a bra (which would have been one of the perks of this style with its wide straps)
Didn't wear due to stain on midsection.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress! So fun and flirty and flattering.
links_Review_Text: I would size down if you want it to be a bit more form fitting. This dress was unbelievably flattering, but I opted to wear it with a belt to cinch the waist a bit.
The dress was beautiful, but it was too large. There was a lot of skin exposed in the chest area, and the shoulder strap was too long.
Not for the petite. Chest is too big. Length doesn't correspond (waist not by waist). Straps too long. Beautiful material. Wish I could have worn.

Really pretty dress, but wayyyyy too big (I'm normally between a 0 and a 2, and this was a 0 and swimming on me). I ended up pinning it at the waist to cinch it in a bit, but it still dropped on my chest.

I was really looking forward to this dress but it fit awkwardly in the chest. May not work for those of us with shorter torsos, fit perfectly everywhere but the shoulder strap (hung super low and showed a lot of coverage).
Great dress, perfect for a summer dinner at a nice restaurant. Fit true to size and found the cut very flattering. I am 5"8 and it hit my just below my knees, a great length with some strappy shoes.
The dress just wasn't flattering.

Glad I sized down as I'm usually a 4 but the 2 was perfect. I wore this to a trade show for work & received many compliments. One woman stopped to tell me that she saw many men watch me as I walked through the room. The fabric is soft & flows beautifully when walking. If you're even thinking about it, you should RENT THIS DRESS! You won't regret it.

links_Review_Title: Wedding in Paris, but didn't end up wearing.
links_Review_Text: Dress was about a size too large, so I didn't end up wearing. Would have been cute if smaller!
So pretty and simple
Runs large Print is more pink than cream

Pretty dress but the top is very low-cut and every time I tried to wear it, it wasn't work appropriate or seemed too dressy with all the ruffles. For the right event, it could be great, but it just didn't excite me enough.

This was a little too big on me. I generally wear a 0 so maybe it's ok but a size 2 in a dress usually works fine too. It was wearable but I kept having to adjust it back. The straps would easily fall off my shoulders. The body had plenty of room. Was not overly flattering because of the size but my husband still liked it.

links_Review_Title: This fit me very well, was just to frilly for me.
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove, just as it looks in the photo. Just not quite my style so I sent it back. I am pretty flat chested, and the top was a little big, but not unmanageable.
Gorgeous but the straps were too long so I couldn't wear it.

Gorgeous material, well made and unique design. Too big around the waist and the strap kept falling down. The v neck is extremely low and I had to constantly keep checking to make sure nothing was showing, Beautiful but not for me.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress, but fit is off
links_Review_Text: This dress is pretty --the fabric is flowy, and flattering. However, as others have mentioned, the fit for the top part of the dress is way off. The non adjustable strap is SO long! If I owned this, I would have to get it tailored, but since I don't, there was no way to wear it.
Sort of wide and long for a size 2

links_Review_Title: So glad I got this jumpsuit.
links_Review_Text: The quality is exquisite. The fabric. The fit. Rent this.

links_Review_Title: Elegant and edgy - the most perfect jumpsuit!
links_Review_Text: I have rented this jumpsuit several times now and it's one of my favorite pieces from RTR. I have worn it to a lot of events and it never disappoints. The cut is perfect and it feels and looks expensive and a one-of-a-kind piece. It's elegant in front and edgy in the back. I am between a 2 and a 4 and the 4 fits me as it has been tailored to me. At 5'3" I have always rented the regular size as I am afraid the petite may be smaller and this length works with heels. This is a must rent!

links_Review_Title: Unique and fun, but didn't wear :(
links_Review_Text: Love this jumpsuit and I've wanted to rent it for months! Finally available so I thought maybe I could pull off a regular length. Im a size 8-10 but in jumpsuits I usually size up because I have a long torso and long legs. I'm 5'7" and I always wear 3-4" heels. I rented the 14R (it's euro sized) and sadly it was too short. With the wide "trouser-like" legs I feel like it needed heels and I don't like flats. I didn't end up wearing it because of the short length but I loved everything else about it, especially the back! I mean that's what makes this jumpsuit! Also I have a large bust but in no way I felt I would "fall out" or be exposed. I will definitely rent again if I can get the long length! I ended up wearing my backup dress and was super pleased. Thanks RTR!
Loved this jumpsuit! It was sexy yet not revealing. Received tons of compliments. However, better for girls with more narrow hips. Tight around the hip area for girls with a booty

Love, love, love! I kept this for over a month wore it 4 different occasions. With different accessories it looks like a new outfit each time. I would love to own this piece because it's so versatile.

links_Review_Title: Me at the premiere of "Ask for Jane," a film on which I was the cinematographer.
links_Review_Text: It was perfect! I loved the draped back, it was much easier to get in and out of than I anticipated, you just need to make sure the zipper that zips up the collar doesn't show!
Love this jumpsuit. It was difficult at first how to figure out how it goes and how to zip it on lol but super flattering. I loved it. Sexy. Different.

Loved how this fit and how I felt in it. The only drawback was when I had to go to the bathroom. I knew it would be going into it...it is a jumpsuit! But more so because the top part is also a zipper....I managed unzipping halfway, getting my head out and bringing the suit down so I can go. TMI? Ha...
This jumpsuit is incredible!!!! Definitely a statement piece...loved it!

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this jumpsuit. It was classy in the front and sexy in the back.
links_Review_Text: I wore this jumpsuit to an awards banquet for work and it was so perfect. It was comfortable, professional and sexy all at the same time. I received many compliments throughout the evening. Wish I would have purchased it.
Fits amazingly. Rented before. Needs sticky bra
Tons of compliments all night. Super comfy. The pockets were amazing. Heavy fabric kept me warm. Excellent quality. Felt amazing all night!

I wore a 4, not a 6. I was nervous because I thought I ordered a 2. Regardless- the 4 fit almost perfect. I used a few safety pins in the back to help prevent side boob action. It was out of my box and EVERY BIT WORTH IT. You have to go braless. Be prepared for a nightlong of compliments. I would love for this to be a permanent piece in my closet.

links_Review_Title: Perfect alternative option for an upscale cocktail event
links_Review_Text: Absolutely stunning. You cannot wear a bra under any circumstances. I'm normally a 10 in dresses 10/12 in pants. I ordered the 14 on this and it was still a little snug. The fabric does have stretch, but I recommend ordering up on size.

Love love love this jumpsuit. Would buy if I could. Amazing balance of classy wth sexy. My hubby couldn't stop commenting. Felt so amazing in it. Would rent again in a heart beat. The waist is a little tight as some have noted but overall very comfortable. And does help do you have someone to help with neck zipper.
This was definitely my favorite rental. I was worried about not wearing a bra, but I used the Hollywood breast lift tape and a sticky bra. Everything stayed put. I was very happy with this outfit!

links_Review_Title: Wedding in botanical gardens with reception at Andy Warhol Museum. Just edgy enough.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly although could use a little more lenth.

I had been looking for an occasion to rent this jumpsuit and was excited to finally have one. Wore this to a formal casino night and it did not disappoint. It was better than I had hoped and my favorite rental ever. The material is nice and thick, it's really well made. It can be a little tight around the hips and butt if you are hourglass (which I am). I am on the small side of size 4 and it fit perfect. I recommend the long if you are over 5'7" and plan to wear heels. The length for me with 4" heels was perfect and I'm 5'9". People actually thought it was tailored for me and I thought about not returning it ;-) I will absolutely rent this again.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous, edgy, classic. Received so many compliments. Will rent again!
links_Review_Text: True to size, a nice pair of heels (preferably Louboutins) and you have a "wow" factor outfit. Yes, a little trick in the ladies room.

It fits like a U.K. Size. I wear 4-6 in US and 10 in UK. It was flattering to the back AND front. Easy to wear. A bit awkward neck zipper location, but pretty easy (for a jumpsuit) to get in and out of.
This jumpsuit was it! Formal in the front and party in the back! So tastefully done. Sexy and classy. Fits true to size

links_Review_Title: Loved the surprise back on this jumpsuit.
links_Review_Text: The fabric at the top can get uncomfortable but overall a good fit. I would have adored this outfit if I could have gotten it in tall but was unavailable; the length was an issue.

Just stunning! It fit perfectly, except for being a little long (I'm 5'3" and was wearing 4" heels), but not so long that I was tripping/stepping on it. I felt tall and elegant... and like I was getting away with wearing my pajamas around town, because this thing is so comfortable! I didn't wear a bra, but I did use those tape "bring it up" things to make sure the girls weren't hanging too low, but even that wasn't really necessary. I wore this to the theatre , and I had no problem getting in and out of it in the bathroom at intermission either - it's got a little zipper at the neck and one at the back waist. It's gorgeous and different - just go for it!
The fit was perfect

I LOVED this rental! I wish I could purchase! Super comfortable & flattering! I felt like a million bucks in it & received many compliments. Word of warning...go to the bathroom with plenty of time to spare ;)! It took me a minute to figure that out!

Amazing jumpsuit. Super comfortable and great quality fabric. I had no issues with any side boob or feeling like I would be exposed. I wore the Long size (I'm about 5'7") which was a great length and will definitely try and rent this again!

After reading the reviews I went ahead and ordered a bigger size and it fit perfectly. I wore it for an interview to a Mrs. Pageant. Definitely a head turner and show stopper. Paired it with fuchsia lips and shoes.

Amazing. I want to buy this..nice simple elegant and comfortable. Compliments all around. Even got asked where to buy it. Probably could've gone down a size. But the length cut and overall fit was great. Didn't feel overexposed and will definitely rent this one again

links_Review_Title: Classy and sophisticated yet sexy and fun!
links_Review_Text: I felt amazing in this outfit. The fit was perfect. I got so many compliments. Only problem is I wish I owned it!

links_Review_Title: It made a statement without screaming "look at me"
links_Review_Text: Loved this jumper! It fit like a glove and was so comfortable all night. I received multiple compliments on this outfit! I'm glad I ordered the free 2nd size because the size I thought I was (10R) was too big so the 8R was perfect. I have an athletic build and normally wear size 6.

links_Review_Title: Amazing jumpsuit. So flattering and comfortable. Got compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: Fits a bit large and the length is really long! Even with 4 inch heels, it was too long (I'm 5'3"). I had to tape up the hem to wear this.

links_Review_Title: Chic and Comfy, With a Little Edge
links_Review_Text: #thisishowyoujumpsuit I wore this to my company holiday party and felt so chic and comfortable all night. Fit great - I normally wear a 4 (125lbs @ 5'3") and the 8R was perfect. I'm shorter, so the length worked out fine - If you're taller, try to get the Tall/Long size or go up one - you won't be wearing those skyscraper pumps with the Regular! I paired this with spiky gold and diamond studs, black t-strap heels, and a sparkly dark-gem bracelet. I got compliments the entire night (mostly from women going "where'd you get that!?") and I was so comfortable! No need for a bra or spanx, the fabric is heavy and drapes nicely in the front. It is also wrinkle-resistant, so I didn't need to steam it pre-party and was smooth all night, even after sitting for dinner. Will rent again!

links_Review_Title: The look on my mans face when he saw me in this outfit was priceless. I felt like a million bucks!
links_Review_Text: I wasn't paying attention when I rented this outfit and chose a size 6, which is what I typically wear in US sizes. So I was a bit nervous that it wasn't going to fit! I'm 5'5 135 lbs and very heavy in the booty and hips. The outfit was stunning, classy, timeless, elegant with a little bit of sexy-ness with the back! Well, it was pretty fitted around the hips but not unbearable and by the end of the night it had stretched out a bit. If I was to rent this again I MAY size up. I received so many compliments on NYE and am very happy with my decision!

links_Review_Title: I wore this for a holiday dinner and felt great!!
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit ran a little big on me in the bust area. However it was a gorgeous outfit and I will def. rent again!
I thought the 10 would be too big, But it fit perfectly. Usually jumpsuits give you a flat bottom. But this jumpsuit really hugged my curves and I got so many compliments.
Loved this! So many compliments! Would rent again!

This is an amazing piece. The material is very stretchy and hugging. It's so flattering, and I received a million compliments. I have a pretty curvy body type and it's absolute perfection for that. You can't wear a bra which was no problem for me but the back is the best part and you wouldn't want a bra ruining it.
Everything about this is perfect! You can't wear a bra, but unless your girls are down to your knees, you can pull it off! I will be renting this AGAIN & AGAIN & AGAIN!

links_Review_Title: This jumpsuit was so comfy, sexy and head-turner!
links_Review_Text: Last minute I wasn't able to get the 8, so I ended up wearing the 10. It looked great, but I usually wear a 4 (8UK), and so this was a bit loose. Nevertheless, it was the perfect length with black heels and the open back is the balance of elegance and style.

links_Review_Title: Unforgettable look! I got so many compliments, even from celebrities! I felt so sexy and comfy. Win!
links_Review_Text: Great draping over my body. Closure is unique, but I was able to get in and out of it in the bathroom - only once did I need help getting it closed. Boobies stayed tucked - no runaway side boob as I feared. Self-adhesive bra highly recommended. An all around winning look!

links_Review_Title: Perfect vacation dress for my wedding parade in Mexico!
links_Review_Text: Dress ran very small, size up for sure. Very flattering, received tons of compliments!
Was skeptical of sizing up but it was the right choice, I'm usually xs, 0 are big on me and the 2 fit perfectly! Loved this dress, will definitely want to rent again!

links_Review_Title: Tight fit but worth the effort
links_Review_Text: Like a lot of the other reviews say this dress is super tight on the chest. I couldn't even wear a bra and I have a pretty small chest. It was also super low cut so I ended up wearing a jean jacket over it.
Such a cute dress but definitely size up. I'm usually a 0 or 2 but needed a 4 because the bodice is very tight. I made the 2 work but it was hard to zipper! Overall recommend though
This dress runs a little small. I'm typically a 0 in a dress and this fit snug. It does have boning throughout the whole bodice. A bra is not needed.

links_Review_Title: Such a beautiful dress but it does run very small. Size up.
links_Review_Text: #datenight runs small

links_Review_Title: Tight in the rib cage and long straps
links_Review_Text: This was a super cute dress but was not without issues. If you have any boobs, you are likely not able to wear it. It was tight in my rib cage and I was able to just wear a sticky bra to cover up my A-cups. I can't imagine anyone with over a B-cup would stay in this dress. The straps are not adjustable and are very long. I wore a jean jacket over it which hid the fact that the straps fell off my shoulders a lot. It's a back-zip dress. I had some marks from how tight it was around my ribs. I didn't mind, since it acted a bit like a corset. The length is pretty long. Probably mid-calf on me and I'm 5'11". Might be closer to a maxi for some shorter gals. The embroidery details were really cute though.

links_Review_Title: Adorable, but uncomfortable after a few hours
links_Review_Text: Wore this once. Perfect fit -- very flattering. You wouldn't know from looking at it, but it has stays on the sides that help give the dress structure and keep it looking nice even if you're sitting down. I wore it to a garden party. After a few hours, the stays made me really uncomfortable. If I was a smidge thinner, I might not have had that problem, tho, so ymmv!

I wore this for brunch at a luxury resort and felt great in it. I am usually a 0-2 and rented a 4R... not sure why but it must have been based on other reviews. I should not have sized up. Beautiful dress!
Cute, straps ran a little long
Beautiful material but this dress runs really small. It's made for women with smaller bust and bum area. I'm 53 and ordered a size 8 and it didn't even fit at all. This is a no
Couldn't even zip it up! Way too small. Size up.
All the other reviews talked about how small the boob area is but I'm 125lbs and 34DD, ordered an 8 and it fit perfectly!

links_Review_Title: This dress is beautiful and extremely well made!
links_Review_Text: This dress runs SMALL. I am consistently a size 4, but occasionally size down to a 2. I needed a 6 in this dress because the boning is very tight in the chest area. This 6 fit like a snug 4.

links_Review_Title: not this dress bc I couldn't wear it
links_Review_Text: I'm a true size 4 up top. Sometimes a 2. I ordered the 4 and could not zip it up.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful for a nice dinner in the mountains
links_Review_Text: Bodice fits snugly and flattering in the chest area. No need to wear a bra or pasties!

links_Review_Title: Dress is super cute and classy.
links_Review_Text: The straps are a bit long, so they tend to fall off your arms. I am usually in-between a size 2-4, and this 4 fit a bit snug. Would recommend going a size up. Also, wouldn't work well for someone with bigger boobs.
The bodice was very tight, too small to zip at the top. Very pretty

This dress is beautiful. The embroidery sets the dress off. However, the straps were way too loose (a problem I have never had). Also, there was no way to contain my 34G chest. I think if I had sized up. The strap issue would have been worse and the waist would have been too loose.
Loved this dress! Has a structured bodice and sweetheart neckline, which makes it fit so perfectly.
Way too small. Small doesn't begin to explain how small

links_Review_Title: Loved thIs dress but the straps are very big
links_Review_Text: Love

links_Review_Title: It fit really well all over. Loved having my photo in it with my children.
links_Review_Text: It is a lovely dress and the material is great. It is a perfect summer dress.
I so wanted to wear this dress as the boning and details are gorgeous, but a las my 36DD bust could not be contained. I was literally spilling out of the top of the dress, so I couldn't wear it.
I was not able to wear this beautiful dress, it runs small in the bust. It is gorgeous, well made and could be flattering. I will try it in a larger size.
Way too small! Had to send right back

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but I couldn't wear it
links_Review_Text: I thought this dress was so beautiful. Broke my heart but there was no way I could wear it. It fits tight but that is the shape and style I was looking for. It's the bust. I'm a DD and I would be surprised if a C cup at the largest would fit this dress. It's so tiny but the straps are long. It is so pretty I considered sizing up but I don't think it would ever work on a large bust. I envy those who can wear it.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress but WAY too small
links_Review_Text: This dress is absolutely stunning, and the details are just so romantic and feminine. I really wanted to wear it for my upcoming beach trip, but there was no chance of it closing. I don't even know if the 6 would have done it for me, and I am a true size 4. The straps were also too long, so I worry that sizing up would only make that issue worse.

Pros the quality of the lace is amazing. Boning in the stomach area is lovely Cons Straps are soooooo long. As a short girl have a couple tricks to shorten them but they needed inches off. The chest area is tight a size four zipped (size 6 or maybe 8 would have been more comfortable in the chest with the wires). but I didn't realize they have semi circles seams and if ur larger in the chest they looked like a strange optical illusion and not in a good way.

links_Review_Title: This dress is not for anyone over a b-cup. little to no room for bust. straps run very long.
links_Review_Text: Ordered to wear Mothers Day and the fit in the bust and straps was terrible. Bodice and length were okay- I am 5'6, D-cup = did not work
Looked great under a blazer or leather jacket!

links_Review_Title: Super cute! I'm 32DD and it fit great!
links_Review_Text: super comfy and soft on the inside allowing for the sparkly on the outside
Tough and chic is a fun look. I got this for an elementary school fundraising event. Top was FINE, nothing special. I found my underarm getting irritated from sequins about 1.5 hours into wearing.
Cute too, nice quality, runs small
I wore this for NYE. I read other reviews and someone said they wore a sheer mock neck under this top. I stole this idea and loved it!
This top was a little too low cut for me. But it is cute!

I rented this for NYE but ended up wearing something else, so I wore it for New Year's Day brunch. It was a little scratchy on the back near the zipper but not bad. I got a 10 and 12 and wore the 12 because the 10 was a bit too tight on the chest, plus a little short on me. Cute way to dress up jeans!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, but not for large chest
links_Review_Text: This top is so pretty, but it doesn't work great for those with a large chest (there is a seam that goes through the middle of the boobs if you're bigger than a B cup)
Fit was great. No stretch. A little itchy as always with sequins. Wore with a strapless bra. The leopard print is not obvious. I would keep it, but don't have that many occasions to wear sequins.

links_Review_Title: Cute top for a night out
links_Review_Text: This top fit well and would be cute for a night out. I just chose to wear something else. The cut and shape is flattering. I thought it was odd that straps are not adjustable. This was fine for me, and top fit perfectly,!but I have a short torso and a bigger chest. If you have a long torso or smaller chest there is no way to adjust fit, so might not be a good fit.
The fit was great! I wore it with a mesh layering top underneath - I got so many compliments!

Gorgeous dress. Stunning color, rich fabric, flattering cut. Fit TTS (I'm 5'7", 130lbs, usual size 4/6). Arm holes are a bit low but wasn't an issue for me with a sticky bra. Does wrinkle a bit and show some water spots if you aren't careful but was easy to move in all night on the dance floor and looked no worse for the wear. Zipper stuck a bit. Felt glamorous and got compliments all night!

links_Review_Title: Incredible dress in every way except for zipper
links_Review_Text: Stunning color and flattering cut (the knot at the waist does wonders). One of the nicest dresses I've ever worn & the fabric was luxurious. Only reason it's 4 stars is it arrived to me a little bit damaged at the zipper and the dress itself was twisted and took a while to figure out how to get on. Was terrifying: the zipper was not working moments before I had to leave for the event. If you're not super pressed for time I highly recommend trying to order it! Could have been the one I received.
First experience with RTR. The dress fit perfectly. I'm 5'8 about 140 lbs and medium fit well. Never had so many compliments. I'll definitely rent again

links_Review_Title: Perfect mix of elegant & sexy. Love the high neck & hidden leg slit.
links_Review_Text: Fit was very snug alongside rib cage but fit like a glove once on and very comfortable silky fabric.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color, but too large on top
links_Review_Text: This dress is just beautiful but the top was too big for me. Even tightening the bow on the shoulder didn't work as it would come lose and show too much.

Perhaps one of my new favorite designers! This dress was like liquid on my skin. The draping impeccable. The color stunning. The fit superb. This dress seriously made me feel like a goddess. It was incredible. Can't wait to rent more from this designer.
Color was even more beautiful in person, fit true to size, material was thicker than it looks so it's flattering

Please ignore the wrinkles...Went to a wedding overseas and the bride asked if the dress was purchased at an Italian boutique! Felt glamorous and comfortable all night. The arm holes are large, as others reviewed, but you can untie the shoulder bow and retie it tighter, which helped immensely!

This is such a beautiful dress! Prepare to be complimented a billion times. Color is amazing- photographs really well! Fit was very flattering. My dress was missing a button at the top but no one noticed.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color! Received so many compliments
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress and seriously got so many compliments. It does wrinkle easily, but I didn't really mind.

links_Review_Title: Loved wearing this fancy dress dressed down with sneakers for work!!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit true to size and fit perfect! It has one zipper along the side and one in the neck area. The color is even more beautiful IRL! I dressed it down with sneakers but would absolutely wear dressed up as well!
This dress is so beautiful! the armholes are a bit low, but it didn't bother me too much. Dance floor approved~

This dress was a mega hit! I rented it for a cocktail party and every single woman told me how much they loved it. It was just the right amount of sexy and classy. The fabric is divine and the cut is incredibly flattering. The color is stunning and the cut is so unique! I loved every minute I had it on and wish I could keep it forever!!! PS: 1. the fabric does not stretch so make sure to order the right size. 2. There's some side boob action going on. Beware if you're not comfortable with that. 3. I used pasties since I have a small chest but if you need more support, you'll want to have a sticky bra or similar that doesn't wrap around the sides because it'll show.

The dress fit true to size. I was able to put it over my head, although it has a side zip. Right shoulder opens and buttons closed. Very flattering silhouette- tulip open bottom. "Adore Me" solutions bra worked great as the dress has large arm holes. I absolutely loved the way it looked. Rich rose/purple color.

links_Review_Title: Not great for pear or hourglass shapes
links_Review_Text: I'm a 6/8 and I ordered a Medium. The top was plenty big but the skirt was skimpy. Didn't wear.

links_Review_Title: I wore this the Rosé Mansion press event
links_Review_Text: Loooove this dress so much! I felt super glam in it and received so many compliments.

This dress is beautiful! But it does wrinkle quite easily, if you don't mind that and you are on the fence about renting it or not do it! It's so light and even with the neck being a tad tight it never got uncomfortable. Great for a black tie optional wedding. Got a ton of compliments on the dress and it truly made me feel pretty in pink! Fits true to size! Would rent again
Love this & would rent again! Had ton of compliments! Gapped in arm opening.
Fits true to size. If bordering between sizes, size down. It did get really wrinkly after sitting for 20 mins so that was upsetting. But overall great for black tie event.
This dress fit me perfectly and I got so many compliments on it. Truly one of the classiest dresses I've ever seen. Felt so great in it

This was slinky colorful option that I wore to ABBA night event - had a great 70s vibe and felt great to dance in. Had ordered the M which I cd not zip up... so tried bigger - the large gapped a bit at the sides but otherwise fit well. Definitely needs smoothing undergarments as every crease and seam shoes through the fabric. Felt lovely though like satin sheets.
I wore pasties instead of a bra, loved the dress!

links_Review_Title: Received so many compliments all day long! You won't regret renting this dress.
links_Review_Text: Normally wear a small in dresses or medium if they are known to run small. Wore the small in this dress and it fit perfectly.
The dress runs so large all the chest tape couldn't keep it in place. It's beautifully made, but will be swapping for a smaller size.

Got so many compliments on this dress and the color is gorgeous. Arm holes are a little large as mentioned in a couple other reviews, but overall the fit was perfect. Loved wearing this dress. Will definitely order again.
Loved this dress. I hated returning it. It was honestly one of the best RTR items. The color, the fit was exceptional. I received a ton of compliments

links_Review_Title: This is a gorgeous cut, color, and shape.
links_Review_Text: The dress is pretty and flattering. The fabric was too heavy for an outdoor party during a heatwave. The dress was more formal than I needed for my event.

I loved this dress so much, I didn't want to take it off at the end of the evening. The color leans a little more purple-fuchsia in person and the silky fabric has a nice weight to it. There are snaps on one shoulder which made it easy to slip on without messing up hair/makeup. I can't say enough good things!

I wanted this dress to work. It's a beautiful color, wonderful neckline and ruching in the middle. Unfortunately this dress is made for smaller people. The length was perfect and the neckline was high and adjustable with the side tie but there is NO room in the torso/bust. I'm a busty gal and there was NO way the side zipper would close. Sad! Beautiful dress though, silky fabric and fantastic color.

links_Review_Title: Runs super small - not great for those with hips/booty
links_Review_Text: Really wanted this to work but couldn't get it on.

Endless compliments in this gorgeous dress. I wear between a 6&8, the medium was perfect. If the skirt area was lined, I would own this dress. But I hate having to fuss with shape wear ect, and panty lines are never classy. It was perfect for a morning upscale derby style car event and perfect for a wine dinner. This dress would look fabulous almost anywhere.
Such a gorgeous dress! The fabric is so soft and shiny, the color so vibrant, but I could zip it in the chest area. I suggest if you have any cuppage, you should order up a size.

links_Review_Title: I did not wear this dress. Runs really small on the waist.
links_Review_Text: Small on the waist.
I love this brand and this dress is no exception, luxurious fabric and really pretty magenta color. Drapes nicely too.
This dress was so great. The color is beautiful, fabric is a nice hefty silk, it felt like a dream!

links_Review_Title: Excellent dress, beautiful material, and received compliments all night. Love this dress!!!!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful color with quality material. Fit perfectly!!
Loved the concept - drapery, romantic, elegant - but the execution is poor. It runs a bit small. And the fabric doesn't feel great. This was a miss.
The fabric is like sitting on a cloud. Loved the fit and overall design. Statement dress
This was an odd fit.. Overall I needed a smaller size, but only the medium actually zipped and fit my hips. Ended up not wearing.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Fabric - Tight in the Neck
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a wedding - the fabric is thick enough to hide any imperfections - however the neck was high and tight - not ideal for a warm weather wedding

links_Review_Title: Get it just so you can say you wore a $700 llama shirt
links_Review_Text: Ok, how many times in your life are you going to be able to say you wore a $700 llama tank? Exactly. Super cute, comfy unless you don't like choker style neck lines...if you don't , pass on this bc it is a bit snug around the neck. Received a ton of compliments and it was certainly a conversation starter. Wish i had rented this for vacation. If you are on this site to rent things you'd never buy, alpaca this one in your cart. (Sorry. I'm sorry.)
A $700 tank top? Well this top is great. Very cute. It's double layers of silk but not too heavy. I wore in Maui and loved it.

Got this top for every day wear and I adore it. Would totally want to own this but I can't afford the price tag. It was extremely light and comfortable. I loved the colorful pattern and the unique trim details. The halter cut was extremely flattering for my shoulders and the trapeze style was very comfortable. Wore it with black leggings, boots, and threw on a denim jacket, when weather was cooler, for a trendy and modern look.

links_Review_Title: Quality. Strange fit in the waist.
links_Review_Text: Fun! Loved the print and the detail around the neckline. Because the hem at the bottom is tighter and there's a lot of "room" in the middle of the shirt- it caused a kind of balloon effect in the middle. Also, I'm wider at the hips so the hem sat on top of them rather than over them like a tunic would... also contributing to the bubble. If you've got a booty and want this to lay flat, perhaps size up.
So cute. Maybe a little tight in the neck but worked for me. I don't want to give this back. In fact I have had it for a month and worn it 4 times.
Second time to rent this top--I adore it! Great pattern with interesting details and it really flatters the shoulders. Appropriate in many settings depending on how you style it.
Great print, lined so I was able to go braless, the fringe is a nice touch!
Cute top. Out of the box print- wore a strapless bra with it. Wore once with shorts- a high rise pair is recommended as it may be slightly short on people with long torsos, and again with jeans!
Fit well and got lots of compliments. Wore it for wine tasting on my birthday. Fun daytime top! Fit TTS!

This pattern is so cute and it's even brighter in person, I loved it. However the fit was awful. It gaps from the neck to the armpit. I even asked my husband who is not into clothes and he told me not to wear it because it "looked funny." Neck is pretty tight as other reviews said, but I didn't find it uncomfortable. Such a shame about the fit, but I couldn't wear this top out.

links_Review_Title: Cute, but doesn't have a great fit
links_Review_Text: This was cute but left an odd space on my chest. Neckline didn't sit down, but the print is great. Added a cardigan for work. Would rent again

I couldn't decide whether to say this shirt runs small or runs large; the neckline was tiny but the top was huge! I was choking but also trying to tuck in all the extra fabric over the chest. Super weird fit, which is too bad, because the design is real cute.

This actually fit really well, and it was super cute. The fabric is incredible and really soft, the shirt is super comfortable. The only problem was that when you raise your arms in a certain way fabric a bunch up around your best but that usually happens with shirts that are cut like this. Definitely recommend renting it!

links_Review_Title: Such a fantastic top!! I absolutely love it!!
links_Review_Text: so comfortable, fits great, I could probably go down a size but it doesn't look too baggy...

I wore this top when I went to New Mexico to visit a friend. It was very comfortable and definitely stood out. I received compliments all day. I rented the 4 and the 6, but I ended up wearing the 6 since it had a little extra room in the chest area. I would definitely wear again!

links_Review_Title: Fun shirt- wore to my nephew's birthday party
links_Review_Text: I'm busty, and the shirt was a little snug through the chest. I'm also tall, and the shirt ran short: not quite "short" but not "normal length either". The neck is also tight, but this might have been accentuated by my bust pulling the shirt, in turn causing it to tug on my neck. I liked the shirt a lot. If you're tall and busty, order up a size. It really is a great, fun top with a fun cut and print!
I love llamas so this top was made for me! I should have sized down one or two sizes because it was big under the arms and in the body. The fringe on the bottom is so fun!

Been waiting for on Unlimited. Adorable but had to pin up lining prob b/c lamas shrunk from dry cleaning. Also a bit stretched out at top / arm holes or a bit odd fit. Looked best on me w/ a Nubra or no bra. Any substantial bust really made the large arm holes gape out. Overall really love the print (so does my 3yr old) and I made it work and love it!

I love the llama print on this cute top. I wore it for a very full Saturday, including a BBQ, a soccer game, walking through the farmer's market, boating, dinner, and drinks. The quality was a lot nicer than what I expected; it's a fancy material with a satin liner underneath. Per other reviewers, the neck is very tight- I have a very thin neck and it was a little tight for me. It's very a-line so it doesn't give you a waist; it made me look a bit thicker, but I forgave it that because I just loved the print so much. The white of the background was a lot brighter than I expected. I would recommend it for a casual day of activities and I think it can be dressed a little bit up for night time and a little bit down for daytime.
Bright and flattering. I wore a white bandeau bra that did show but just looked like a tank I think. Neck fringe was a bit difficult to get to lay right but finally got it!
Really cute print and comfortable. The neckline folds over though so may want to press before wear

Wore this to a Women Empowerment event to raise funds for a Domestic Violence Protection group. It was fun and bright and I stayed nice and cool on the rooftop bar! The armholes run a bit low and I probably could have sized down one, but if you just shift your strapless bra down a bit, no harm, no foul. :)

This shirt is super cute! High quality, thick fabric with adorable tassel trim. The colors are vibrant and the pattern is unique and fun. The reason I gave it 4 stars was the cut of the sleeves are a little odd- you need to wear a strapless bra and possibly will have some gapping. I styled it with dark skinny jeans and a pink cardigan for work.

The colors are so fun and different, and the fit is super flattering! It's thick enough that it isn't see thru, but not to thick. I planned to wear without a bra, but the arm holes are a little large (too much side boob)! Would rent this again!
Flowy isn't typically my style but it was really fun to wear.
I loveeeed this top. Wore it for cinco de mayo. Beautiful fabric. The neck is tight FYI. Got lots of compliments. Would rent this any day!

links_Review_Title: Llama top with the cutest details
links_Review_Text: LOVE this shirt! Super cute fit with fringe details. Got tons of compliments and wish I could keep it forever!!

links_Review_Title: Funky lil Llama top- wish I could buy it
links_Review_Text: LOVE it. Went to be like I'm gonna own this beauty and got sticker shock. Probably why I like it so much. Probably gonna hang onto it for a month. It's great!!!!

After trying on for the first time...super cute pattern with flattering cut. Fabric is thicker and silkier than I expected. Not fitted around waist, so plenty of room to breathe. Bra of any sort will be seen due to low-cut arm holes (they cut down to slight v-shape), keyhole in back and thin-cut neck. Cute bralette (or no bra for the blessed) may work best. All said, I'm excited to wear it out!

links_Review_Title: Really cute. Lots of compliments. A bit tight across the chest.
links_Review_Text: I really really liked this top. It was a bit tight across the chest for me. I wore it anyway and got lots of compliments.

Loved this top! Wore with bright green shorts and it was awesome! Did not wear a bra. Smaller size may have covered more under arm. Neck was tight - would undo on occasion ( car, desk, etc) to take a break
Love the colors and style, but the fit is weird. The neck is super tight but too wide through the chest. Runs short too.
The pattern is cute, the shirt was very boxy and I couldn't get the fringe around the neck to lay properly so I was not able to wear this.

links_Review_Title: Really fun print, but very tight in the neck area.
links_Review_Text: I really wanted to love this shirt. I am a 34DDD and I got the 38. I was concerned it would be too tight in the chest area, but it fit fine. However, the neck halter was so tiny I felt like something was chocking me. I REALLY wanted to keep it because the print is so cute and fun, but had to return it without wearing it.
Loved this top but ran a little tight across the chest. Overall it was super cute and fun!

links_Review_Title: High end high quality....fun design with fringe around neckline. Lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly. Not too long. It looked great with skinny jeans.
Very cute print but it fit very weirdly. It was very tight in the neck, had large arm holes so my bra showed and was too short. I didn't end up wearing it
Loved the colors and textures on neckline and hem. Didn't love having to wear a bandeau because the arm holes were disproportionately large.
Tight in the bust, but low cut and loose under the armpits. Nice material and cute pattern, but not the right fit for me.
Fit fine...looked good...nothing super special though
Though a lil bit not flattering if you have a lil bit of a muffin top. The dress was comfortable and fun.

links_Review_Title: One of my all time favorite rentals
links_Review_Text: Everything about this dress is feminine and chic with just the right edge of sexy with how it hugs certain curves. The pattern work on the dress is impeccable and feels like pure art

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments and felt like a dream in this unique dress!!
links_Review_Text: First of all, this is one of the more comfortable RTR dresses I've rented! The fabric is so easy to move in and has a little stretch so if you're like me with wider hips, it helped the fit! I received endless compliments on it all night long! The blue color is so vibrant and the pattern reminds me of authentic vintage China dishware but like in a really good way?? If that makes sense.. :) it is seriously such a beautiful dress. I did have to use some fashion tape for the neckline to not be so low, but other than that, it was a perfect dress!
Unique and just a little bit sexy. Wore this to a winery during the day
Loved this dress, my fav piece from this summer

links_Review_Title: Even more beautiful in real life
links_Review_Text: Pictures don't do it justice this dress was absolutely stunning! I typically wear a 2 and wore a 2R. The only thing is if you are pear shaped (like me) it might be worth it to size up since the slip was a little tight. However, there was some stretch to the fabric and I was comfortable dancing the whole night.
I wish that this dress would have fit me, however, the bust area was way too small for my D cups. I let my friend borrow it instead and it fit her A cups fabulously! She looked awesome!

links_Review_Title: I wasn't sure about this dress but SO glad I got it!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress for an afternoon summer wedding. It was beautiful and comfortable to dance in all evening. (Disclaimer: I tied it wrong in this photo) Shoutout to RTR staff for helping me out last minute when the first two dress options I ordered didn't fit. They were super helpful and accommodating!! I was unsure about this dress because there were lots of mixed reviews. I will say it seems to look pretty different on different body types. I'm wearing this dress in a size 10. Im 5'5" and curvy. Even though I was unsure what to think based on such different reviews, I had a feeling this would work with my body type and I went ahead and ordered it and I'm so happy I did. It flowed beautifully, I got tons of compliments, the color is gorgeous and it comes to life with some jewelry and heels to dress it up.
Loved this dress! Light and perfect for summer daytime. Pretty low cut in front but sexy

links_Review_Title: very cute, but SUPER LOW CUT
links_Review_Text: love this - very breezy and easy to wear, but it is SUPER LOW CUT. I had to safety pin it, and tie it in the front instead of looping it around back so that my girls stayed in, but it was CUTE!
Wore on vaca in PR for a date night. Light and airy feel and perfect for a date. Loved this one. Very low cut, but fine for someone lien me with a small/no chest ;)
Great for everyday! The print was beautiful. Wore multiple times

links_Review_Title: Perfect, beautiful and complemented all night!
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this dress. It's boho and beautiful and very comfortable, even to sit and eat in. I found it to run true to size, and while it is very low cut, it's definitely flattering. It felt like a fairytale princess and both women and men stopped to tell me how much they liked it. I will definitely rent again.

This dress fits like a dream and the gold accents are beautiful. I ended up not wearing this because it didn't feel quite right for the wedding I was going to. It's pretty low cut, so if you have a larger chest it could be revealing. I'm already trying to get something on my calendar to wear this dress to soon!

I felt like Liz Fraser in a heavenly garden, it moves beautifully while dancing. The multiple hanging ties add to the feel and look gorgeous. The shape is def 80s, and makes your shoulders look big. However, I spent the entire night adjusting everything: the lining riding up, the waist riding up, the boobs falling out & the sleeves riding up. I am an extreme-ish pear shape and hoped the waist tie would balance out the top looseness; it didn't. The waist tie is very high, empire waist height, so the waist felt very large and baggy. The top works best with fashion tape and a stick on bra. The bottom part was super weird, the lining was stretchy but the top layer was not. For reference, my measurements are 39-31-47 This dress would probably fit better on somebody with smaller hips, and small breasts, and average to skinny arms.

Dress was well made gorgeous blue and white print. Fabric is lightweight. It is a bit low cut in the front. I included this photo wearing my usual bra, so you can see cut of dress. Will either need to go braless, tape the twins, or use a plunge bra. Be warned that the other cut outside in the front show off the bottom part of the bra (if you look carefully, you can see underwire section of bra I tried dress on with). Hopefully this helps w undergarment selection. I ended up not wearing it...not because I felt it was unattractive or a lost cause, but bc I was feeling particularly lazy to have to find necessary bra at bottom of my lingerie drawer.
Glam
Loved this dress! Wore it for a rehearsal dinner and got so many compliments. It does go very low so you can't wear a bra.

Such a pretty dress. I have AA bra cup size, and it wasn't enough to fill the top. Photo is with padded bra to show the dress better. I have 39" hips, and just fits my curves. If i can figure out a way to cover the cleavage area a bit, I'll wear it outside of my home.
This one is my fault I didnt notice the grommet detailing. The dress itself was lovely but the grommet detailing was not my style
Strange fit, confusing how to lace up

links_Review_Title: Felt flimsy and fit strange in the top
links_Review_Text: The fabric of this dress didn't feel quality and it was unflattering. The V is really deep, too revealing for most places.

links_Review_Title: This dress is a beautiful summer dress. Great for hot weather. Can go from day to night
links_Review_Text: it was a bit big in the chest area. it does have a big V, so a lot of chest is exposed. the dress is sheer, but brings a slip underneath

I'm normally between a size 2 and 4 and this size 2 was really small. Couldn't zip it up at all and returned without wearing. I love the print but the heavy grommets and ties around the arms and chest were too much. Would not recommend.

links_Review_Title: The dress fit funny. tight in the wrong places
links_Review_Text: terrible fit
Fit well! I'm small chested so it dipped a little low but didn't have any issues!
It's beautiful but some almost nipple slips made it hard to wear
Such a pretty dress but top didn't fit. The fit is very weird in the top. Loose and no coverage.

links_Review_Title: the bold blue color was fabulous. Got countless compliments!!!
links_Review_Text: light fabric nice and breezy. VERY LOW CUT!!!
Larger size than I normally wear, room in chest adjustable with belt. Great dress!

links_Review_Title: Looks expensive in photo but fabric, and construction are very cheap. Lining on skirt is short.
links_Review_Text: Looks full and expensive in photos, but dress is flimsy and unflattering.
Fit was a bit off for me. didn't like the big metal grommets either.

links_Review_Title: I didnt wear. Shoulders are puffy in person.
links_Review_Text: I tried this on and it looked off on me. I am an athletic build and I feel like this dress made me look masculine. The shoulders wouldnt lay down like in the models picture. They were very puffy.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but not for those with cleavage
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous and there's a lot going on... it looks like the price tag which is why we rent, right? The issue is its identity. This dress can't decide if it's going on a date or going to a more formal affair. It has the length and detail for a nice affair, but it's so low cut that you'd think twice about wearing it around family imo. It's nice for a date, but a little long unless you're still in the early stages of teasing someone. All in all, I couldn't wear it to Easter brunch with the in-laws but had a nice afternoon date with hubs, and felt great wearing it when I could.

links_Review_Title: Bit to daring for day time wear.
links_Review_Text: Fit was weird in hips given the way it fit chest. Between the plunging neckline; mermaid style at hips felt overwhelming.

links_Review_Title: I didn’t end up wearing the dress.
