links_Review_Text: The sleeves were a little much on my smaller frame. Also dips a little lower than I felt comfortable with.
Pretty awkward fit throughout.

links_Review_Title: Loved it. I am 5’7.5” and the white slip underneath was definitely super short.
links_Review_Text: Careful if you are taller the slip is short. Definitely open chest I couldn’t ware a bra. Very cute.
Top runs small and is very low cut. Couldn't wear for this reason

links_Review_Title: Need more material in bust area
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress for someone that does not have any boobies. I am size 8, but not in chest:(
Nice fabric. I really like the cut out design. It does run a little small, so would recommend ordering up if you have wide shoulders. Will rent again!
Got a few compliments. Stretchy material. Thin. The hole isn't revealing at all so I wore to work.
The fabric was soft and was perfect for a night out!
Comfy
It was so pretty

links_Review_Title: I love this shirt, it is very sexy.
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable fit and looks very nice on the body.
I work in a very conservative office and the hole in the shirt was too distracting. Otherwise it was very soft and comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Incredible all around for a casual day at classes!
links_Review_Text: I'm typically a size M in tops, but RTR suggested a size S when I went to rent. There were no Mediums left, so I decided to take a chance on the S. It fit like a glove! I absolutely love how soft and cozy it feels, and it is also surprisingly warm. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: LOVE, so so soft and doesnt make you look chubby while wearing a turtle neck
links_Review_Text: Sleeves were a little long but I am a tall girl so it was perfect, might need to roll them if you are on the shorter side
Keyhole was a nice detail. Runs small.

links_Review_Title: Basic with a bit of pizzaz.
links_Review_Text: Nice look under a suit jacket.
Obsessed! Perfect with boots
This dress has a colorful geometric print and is flirty, feminine, and fun. The neckline is flattering. The dress is comfortable. Keep in mind it's short.

links_Review_Title: Nice dress. A bit tight in the waist/ stomach area but flattering overall
links_Review_Text: A bit short and not sure if the under layer should be peeking out or bad sew job. Either way cute dress
Love Tanya Taylor. I've had a great run with RTR and Tanya Taylor recently. It was a little revealing at the top for work.

This dress was incredibly comfortable but elegant and sexy! Perfect for an evening out with the hubby to celebrate our anniversary! The fabric had a little shine, gorgeous blue and orange print with a sheerness in the sleeve. I felt beautiful wearing this and would love to own it! Very flattering cut for a bigger girl who doesn't have a lot of curves.
The fit of this dress was supreme. It may be a bit short if you're over 5'7" but there's a slight angle to the bottom hem and it really makes the dress look unique. I felt pretty all day in this!

I'm typically in between a 2 and a 4, but the 2 fit well and was even quite big in the waist and hips. Overall, I loved the dress— super comfortable, perfect length and fit to wear to work, and the pattern and colors are beautiful

links_Review_Title: Meant for a fancy brunch but ended up wearing it to a casual dinner because it was less dressy.
links_Review_Text: Cute dress but at 5'4 it hit about 2 inches below the knee so be aware it is longer than the photo shows. Also for reference, I am a size 12/ 14 and 16 was all that was available so it was about 3 inches too wide everywhere but I covered that with a jacket.
Beautiful fabric and colors! Rent this one!
I wore this to work. Coincidentally a photographer was in taking photos of our remodeled office and asked me to pose. Then I went wine tasting and got a ton of compliments.
Comfy

Loved this dress, it was so simple but quite flatter and fun. Very comfortable and light. Covered all the right places and was an appropriate length. Loved it but way to expensive to purchase (which made wearing it all the more fun)
Wore to work with stockings, as was a little short for work, but it was completely appropriate with stockings! Loved the color, perfect for spring or summer

Wore this to work and then to meet a friend for dinner and a show! Got a lot of compliments on color, fit, and fabric. The neckline was really flattering. It was a little snug in the bust but totally wearable. So fun for early spring.
Just a little awkward over the stomach area but would order again
Size 2, a little loose. 5'7" 36yrs old
Great for a week night dinner event.

links_Review_Title: Looks like pajamas - runs big and not flattering for short torso
links_Review_Text: The detailing of the fabric is unique, but the large fit made it look like pajamas, not a dress. There is a zipper on the side, but I honestly didn't know it because it just slid right over my head. I have a short torso, and this did not fit right in that category either. I am sending back without wearing due to the sizing issues.

links_Review_Title: The colors are what makes this dress.
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size. Simple style, but feels great, and moves very well. I added a statement necklace for more pizazz...

links_Review_Title: Nice dress but not my favorite Tanya Taylor
links_Review_Text: This dress fit pretty well (little big in the chest) and the print was unique. It did wrinkle a lot as you can see in the photo, and I'd only been wearing it 4 hours at that point. It was a little thin for fall but worked with tights.
This dress was light, colorful, comfortable and great for work. I had to rent in a size up, it was a little bit and true size would have been perfect. Flattering anyway!

Love the colors, length, and the idea of the fit bit runs a little big so I didn't wear it. Could have made it work if I had to with a belt but would have still been too big in the arms. Would love this again in a smaller size.
The perfect dress for the office. Nice coverage on top of the shoulders. The length was cute and flirty. Awesome colors !!!

Very flattering for larger bust size on petite frame. I got tons of compliments! I wish I owned it! Also a very nice material. I wore it to thanksgiving dinner but could definitely have worn to a wedding. Will rent again!
If the belly weren't so tight, I'd love this dress!

This ran big but nothing a thin belt couldn't help with. I would size down in the future. The colors are a fun transition to fall with bright orange flowers with the bold blue background. I would rent again, just a bit smaller next time!
Cute and flattering-beautiful fabric. Good transitional dress.

Good fit, great color! The zipper was a bit worn so it popped open in the middle while I was out. It wasn't tight, so I think it was just worn out! Tanya Taylor has amazing clothing. I highly recommend all her clothing!
the dress did not look nice on me
Loved the colors but there was no give in the waist or zipper so it was very hard to get on.
Dress fits perfectly is great for work and happy hour.

I ordered this in a 12. I normally wear a 10. the 12 was so tight and short. I sent it back and ordered a 14 and a 16. I wasn't taking a chance. The 14 was huge and I never put on the 16... There was a big diff. between the 12 and 14.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful colors but quality could be better
links_Review_Text: This dress has beautiful colors and I loved the sleeves. I ended up wearing it under a white blazer for work, and while it was cute overall, the hem line kept riding up on the right side above the lining. I wasn't particularly comfortable and wouldn't rent it again.
Dress runs big. I got my size and a size smaller, and ended up wearing my size - though the smaller size was a little more flattering.
material was to heavy- needed petite
I loved the color of this dress but it ran large! I would easily size down one size, if not two.

links_Review_Title: I ordered a size up but shouldn't have. I'll try this one again.
links_Review_Text: Cute color.
After reading the reviews I thought a size 12 would be perfect. Many of the reviews said the dress runs big and was good for a large bust. I disagree, I couldn't get it over my girls.
A little short for me

links_Review_Title: Cute dress, puff sleeves can get a little annoying
links_Review_Text: Cute dress, a little low cut

The Color on this is so great, which is why I rented it in the first place. The cut is weird, but I like it with a jacket or cardigan. Low cut, even a size bigger than I usually wear it's still a bit big. This is great for renting but would never buy it. The thing in the back is also weird. But overall, a fun top in a great color, for vacation or going out.
I ended up wearing this but with a cardigan over it because it was large under the arms and fell past my bra line in the back. The tail was kinda odd too.
Very long in the back. Beautiful vibrant color. Pretty loose fit.
Obsessed with this top! It's so flattering and I love the back detail. I've rented it in white and would rent in other colors if they offer it!

links_Review_Title: Cute in person but does not photograph well
links_Review_Text: I rented this top for a girls trip to Nashville. The back was really cute and the other girls I was with loved it. Unfortunately it doesn't photograph well and made me look 15-20lbs heavier.

This top is gorgeous!! The fabric and the color are perfect for summer weather...great quality!! Better looking than the pictures. HOWEVER!!! The size 0 definitely fits an S (not XS) but I wore it and loved it.

This top was so much fun to wear. I took it on vacation with me to New Orleans. The front is so cute, but the back is what makes it unique. I loved wearing this and got a lot of compliments on it. My only issue was the straps were a bit too long on me (a common personal problem). I remedied this by wearing a black cami underneath the tank. Love! May purchase or rent again.
Great pop of color. Very comfortable and wore it without a bra.
Had family photos taken and i loved the details on this top. The only complaint is that if wrinkles easily and runs a tiny bit big. Overall very flattering and i got a lot of compliments!
Loved the color of this top!! The straps were a little snug of a fit and the length was a little short. I would rent this top again but in a larger size.
This top is a beautiful color and well-made. I rented it for Christmas Day, and have no complaints.

links_Review_Title: The most beautiful shade of GREEN!
links_Review_Text: I have a hard time finding clothes this color. A green this shade reminds of nature and spring and all happy things! I'm so glad I ordered this blouse. I loved wearing it so much I wore it to a date and to work the next day. I live in New England so the disparity in the amount of clothes in the two pictures give you an idea of how crazy the weather is up here! For sizing, tt runs large in my opinion. I'm glad it did since I was able to layer it and make it work appropriate. Size down if you don't have a lot of bussom. Otherwise, stay true to your size.
Super cute top with interesting detail in the back. Vibrant color looks great!

links_Review_Title: This is such a beautiful color
links_Review_Text: You can wear without a bra. Straps a little long

links_Review_Title: Great color and fit. Loved how it looked. Can dress it up or down.
links_Review_Text: Low cut in the back so did not work with a standard bra. Wore with nipple covers only. Could have been related to my short size.
Got many compliments on the vibrant colored top!
You'll definitely need to wear either no bra or a stick on bra with this top. The back is a lot lower cut that expected but I loved it! I would rent this top again.
Pretty large overall. Nice color. Great with white jeans.
This top is so easy to wear, it goes with everything, the emerald color is intense and it's so comfortable, I got a lot of compliments. I will rent it again!

links_Review_Title: Cute top weird handkerchief bottom tho
links_Review_Text: Ute too but back of top is like a tail
Loved the color and the fit. Wanted to wear for St Patrick's day but the weather wasn't cooperating and was a chilly day

links_Review_Title: great color. well made piece that looks high quality. definitely recommend!
links_Review_Text: fit true to size. i'm usually a 6/8 and i went with the 6. if anything was a little big.
Beautiful color and shirt, way too big. Couldn't wear and had to send back. Might rent again in smaller size.

links_Review_Title: Pretty color, the back is what makes it special
links_Review_Text: The color is really pretty in person, just as pictured. The back is really where all the drama is and it does look stunning in person, however it's kind of boring from the front. I found the ruffle just long enough to not have to wear a bra, which was nice. The sides are cut pretty low so any bra I tried showed anyway. It ran true to size.
Fit well & cool color. Has a fun back that I got many compliments on

links_Review_Title: very cute and flirty. perfect for a party where you don't want too much bling.
links_Review_Text: good fit if you like things loose. i see comments it ran big, but i like things like this loose, so it worked for me. Back is very pretty. I paired it with a similar pant for a comfortable party look.

The drape in the back of this tank is what makes it so cute and fun. It's super easy to wear and can be dressed up or down. I wore it with ripped jeans and heels for happy hour. The only negative was the straps fell down frequently. It didn't expose anything, it was just more annoying than anything.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful shirt lots of compliments on color
links_Review_Text: Very pretty gets really loose as time comes on but it's very pretty

Beautiful and well-made top. The fabric is thick but not heavy, so you can wear it on a warmer day without overheating. The straps are quite long so you can't wear a normal bra (it'll show in the back). The color is a gorgeous vibrant green. I'm still trying to decide if I want to keep it and just get the straps shortened a bit!

Loved the design of this top! Would absolutely rent again! I am a petite frame, so the straps were too long on me, but nothing a safety pin couldn't fix. Will definitely be renting in the other colors available also!

I wore this with black skinny jeans and flats to stroll through downtown New Orleans then threw on a pair of pumps for a night out dancing. The straps are long making the back low so I wore one of those stick on bras.
I am quite petite, usually wear a size 0 or 2, I rented this in a 0, and it ran large. This is a stylish top.
The back made it look like I had a tail and the straps were very long.

The color is absolutely *gorgeous* and I appreciated the quality of the top. It runs VERY large, so definitely size down unless you've got a big tummy or big breasts. The back of the top has a dramatic ruffle that drops lower and adds some extra flair.
Beautiful shirt! Runs slightly large... the straps kept falling off my shoulders. But, loved the look!
Tiny bit big, made for non-petite frame, great color

links_Review_Title: Great color. Wore it on the weekend.
links_Review_Text: The back drops down low to where I couldn't where a strapless bra. Got around it so it still looked great.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful top but didn't work for me
links_Review_Text: The top is beautiful in person, and I love the back detail but unfortunately it didn't work for me. The straps were incredibly long, and the top of the back hit well below my bra. I tried safety pins and fabric tape (I think some other reviews mentioned this) but it gave it an awkward look. I wanted to love this but ended up not wearing it. I think if I had a larger bust I wouldn't have had the same problem.
I paired this with white jeans for a backyard barbecue and received a lot of compliments on the color. The straps were a little loose, but manageable.

links_Review_Title: I still love this top, but couldn't wear it!
links_Review_Text: For the right body type, I love the color and the look. Technically it runs true to size but the straps were so long I couldn't even wear it. And I didn't want to mess with straps falling down all the time. It's beautiful, nice fabric, but I do feel like I am a pretty standard size 6 and I've never had this problem when straps on other things. I am short waisted tho, so maybe short waisted women should pass on this one,

links_Review_Title: Wore to a rehearsal dinner. super comfortable and flattering. Loved it!
links_Review_Text: true to size

Got many compliments! I'm busty at 38DD and wore no bra. Was flattering around my midsection. Was tough doing the clasps in the back but could manage on my own and pull up if I didn't have help. Overall would recommend!
I feel like anyone would look good in this jumpsuit. It was a little baggy shaped for my taste but was perfect for a fancy rehearsal dinner!
Loved this jumpsuit! Perfect for a formal event/wedding. Super comfortable and great for dancing. Girls with smaller boobs can get away without wearing a bra. 10/10 recommend
Perfect for the Newport, RI wedding. Was elegant but comfortable and VERY flattering. Got plenty of compliments. No issues with dancing and top falling down.
Great jumpsuit. Super nice quality, so it's a little heavy. Not super impressive but perfect for a night out- hangs lows but I'm also a 34 DD

I am 5'9" and I definitely should have gotten a tall. The 2r was not only too short, but I could not zip it all the way in the back which I was really surprised by because I read all the reviews. I wish i would have gone with a 4L because i think this would have been really cute and flattering
Will rent again.
I felt so glamorous and fun in this jumpsuit for a charity gala. Not super bathroom friendly but doable. I am long wasted so jumpsuits can be tricky; this fit perfectly. Will rent again!

I may never wear a dress again after wearing this jumpsuit! I rented this for a rooftop wedding and got more compliments than I could have imagined. It was so comfortable, I had to wear the 12 because the 10 was a bit snug, but I think jumpsuits look better when they're not too tight. I'm 5'4" and with 3" heels the length was perfect. The hooks in the back were surprisingly easy to hook up myself so going to the restroom wasn't as difficult as anticipated. Would rent over and over again!
I rented this for a rehearsal dinner. It fit very well. It was a bit humid and hot outside so it didn't make it a little warm with the liner but totally worth it.
It was comfortable and fit well. I ordered a 10R and it was just short enough that I didn't need heels. We went on a dinner cruise and I wanted to wear sandals.

links_Review_Title: Great fit, very flattering, compliments all night.
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit was the perfect outfit for my reunion--it fit perfectly, was very flattering, and was even comfortable! Good support for a strapless top and open back, I felt secure all night long. I received compliments all night.

I’m 5’9 so I ordered the long. It was a bit longer than I expected, so I wore 4-5 inch wedges. I also have a longer torso, so sometimes jumpsuits don’t fit correctly. This one was perfect! I would highly recommend renting it!
So well made and fully lined. Very comfortable and simple but flattering and elegant too. Perfect for an awards banquet. So many compliments and loved how I felt in this outfit!

Got this as a replacement because the dress I chose was damaged/unavailable at last minute. I liked this a lot but it was way to hot out and did not end up wearing. The size 6L was smaller in size and length than the 4R.

links_Review_Title: Classy & Comfortable- an overall great choice!
links_Review_Text: Pros: This outfit was exactly what I was looking for. It was both classy and comfortable. I felt it was very flattering as well. Received lots of compliments. I went with the smaller size because when it comes to strapless attire I like a snug fit up top. The length was nice as well and I was able to wear 3-inch heels. Cons: Underwear lines were annoying so I suggest seamless undies. In the middle of my event one of the back straps hooks (2), literally just came out of the stitching. Thank goodness there were safety pins on hand. The straps were not stretched too tightly. My guess is the romper had been worn several times.
34D, 28" waist, 39" hip, 5' 6.5" & 148lbs. This is a great jumpsuit! Easy to get on and off by yourself, super classy, stays up so there's no need to constantly pull the jumpsuit back up. LOVE!

I absolutely loved this jumpsuit! Wore it to an evening wedding at a country club. It fits true to size. I'm 5'2 so it was a little long even with heels. Because of the open back, I would suggest either wearing sticky boobs or no bra. The top fits well for me and I did not feel like I had to keep pulling it up even though it was strapless. Would suggest pairing it with fun, chinky earrings. I would 100% rent again!
I wore this jumpsuit for a night out on my birthday! So incredibly flattering and was so much fun to wear!

links_Review_Title: Great for dancing and slimming a full wedding belly. Like all jumpsuits annoying for bathroom runs.
links_Review_Text: I don't typically love strapless styles, but I found this jumpsuit to fit snuggly across the chest. It is slimming and well made. I found the fabric to be a little heavy (meaning, I was warm...but that could have been from the dancing. I wore fashion tape (and brought extra strips to the wedding, which I recommend) to make sure the jumpsuit stayed put all night, which it did. Overall, loved this style and would wear it again.

This was very flattering and comfortable. I was worried about the bra situation but ended up not having to wear one due to the fabric and flounce in the front. Just an FYI, if you're having cocktails flowing, make sure you have a restroom buddy to help with the back.

Overall, I loved this jumpsuit! The fit is super flattering and the back is so fun! (It lacks pockets, though!) It was comfy while sitting for dinner and didn't wrinkle a ton while seated. I was definitely between sizes, but went with the bigger one for sitting purposes. A bra wasn't necessary, but I did wear a sticky one because the top was a little loose. So many compliments at the event! I would definitely rent it again!
Loved this jumpsuit! I wore the 8L because I am 5'10 with a long torso, and it was perfect. Would definitely rent again. I paired it with a sequin blazer and 3 inch heels.
A bit long for 2L (I'm 5'7).
Perfect fit! Loved this romper
Super comfy. Didn't need a bra with it. A little large in the tummy/waist area. Wide legs made it fun.

links_Review_Title: The only romper I've ever fit in
links_Review_Text: The Long Was the only thing they had in stock, but I just put on a pair of heels and it was fine. The waist to chest was long enough I was able to fit comfortably

links_Review_Title: First time renter and beyond satisfied with it!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this jumpsuit! Super nervous about how it would look because jumpsuits normally look horrible on me. Being short was nervous the length would be too long even with heels but it was perfect. Got so many compliments on it! Very flattering!
Was not my original RTR but was a stylist choice! Very happy with it! It was long enough with 3in heels, I'm 5'9.5. Wish it would've had pockets otherwise it was great!

links_Review_Title: So in love with this jumpsuit!
links_Review_Text: I loved this jumpsuit. Fit perfectly which is rare with me on RTR because I'm small chested. I didn't wear a bra with it. The length of pants is sort of long but I was able to change into flats during reception and still feel comfortable and not trip over the bottom. I also rode in a car for 3 hours in it and had no wrinkles or tightness while sitting. Such a great purchase

This is my 5th rental from rtr and 3rd jumpsuit rental.. once again, RTR did not disappoint! Loved this jumpsuit as it was comfortable, fun and got compliments while wearing it! The cons are that I found the strapless a bit too low of a strapless and it was very tricky to get it back on/zipped and two straps reattached after going to the bathroom ! All in all a great rental though and you will feel fabulous in this jumpsuit ! (RTR my fav jumpsuit was the strapless halston heritage wide leg.. please bring it back!)
This is the best black jump suit EVER. Super flattering, great fit. So fun to wear as a wedding guest!
I love this jumpsuit it just runs a little short if you're long waisted like me. Also the regular length was good for flats.

links_Review_Title: Loved this outfit! I felt glamorous yet comfy! Would definitely recommend for a night out.
links_Review_Text: Fit great and baby bump friendly! Clasps and hems a little loose, needs a seamstress touch up. Length was perfect - I'm 5'11" so I got the Long and wore a 2" heel.

links_Review_Title: Great outfit to switch up the day to day outfits at convention.
links_Review_Text: It fits great. A little long, but I'm short, so everything is long. A pair of high heeled wedges solved the problem. It's fitted enough at the bust to stay up without sliding down all day. I actually rented this when I was a size 12, but it was very snug so I hung it in my closet and used it as a motivator to spur my weight loss. Then I started on a prescription weight loss medication that kick-started everything for me, and I lost weight so quickly, I had to return the size 12 jumpsuit for a size 6. I loved it both times, but especially love it now.

links_Review_Title: It was a great material and liked the openish back! Great for a formal or cocktail attire event!
links_Review_Text: It ran very long. I am 5'2.5" and it was still an inch too long w/ 4"heels. The back is great until you need to go to the restroom - bring a friend. Overall I liked it but I do wish the had a petite size available.

10L fit great! I'm 5'10" and 34D, fit was perfect. This outfit was perfect for this wedding. The long was long enough for me to wear heals! The connecting straps were a little loose, needed someone to put it back together before a real wardrobe malfunction. Comfortable and easy to wear. Lots and lots of compliments! Will rent again!

6 months postpartum I went up one size to a 6R and it was perfect! I had to tape up the hem just a little for the shoes I had on. Got lots of compliments! The only downfall was that it is impossible to get in and out of without some help.

I wore this for a Lundigras brunch. The wide leg gave a very flow look. My only complaint is depending how you stand, you can't always tell it's a jumpsuit but instead looks like a dress which is a more formal look than what I was going for.

links_Review_Title: Perfect color, perfect fit! Great for traveling!!
links_Review_Text: I can't say enough about this outfit! The color is perfect I did not have to wear a bra and it still looked beautiful with the open back in the flowey pleated trouser legs. I had so many compliments it was hard for us to even get where we were going LOL I do sort of wish that I would've purchased this but I will definitely be renting again as part of my unlimited package!!
It is a little long since I'm only 5"4. But with heals it fit amazingly.

Wore this on my honeymoon. Drapes so well. Absolutely loved the vibrant fuschia color! Had so many compliments from strangers. This instantly elevated your look. Legs are long so be prepared with heels. I'm a little over 5'4", so I had to wear 3.5 inch just so that it clears the ground a tiny bit. Be careful going up and down stairs and escalators in heels with the pants. Very lightweight, super comfy. There were multiple times when I almost stepped on the pants. Wanted to keep it!!

links_Review_Title: Amazing pants that look like a dress
links_Review_Text: This is soo pretty. I felt elegant and comfortable in this rental. I would rent this again! I received lots of compliments that night. Only con... the pants are not that long. I have a hard time looking for shoes that would look right with this. I almost had to wear flats.
I I really enjoyed the length of this jumpsuit. Everything fit very well and it was a hit on the resort.
This jumpsuit was really flattering. I'm 5'6" and this was the perfect length. The only drawbacks are that it zips in the back which is annoying but manageable and it's definitely pink not red.

Fits true to size. Flowy material that looked spectacular when I walked. Maybe made me look a bit hippy, but elegant enough to make up for it I think. I was able to wear a normal bra with this (the convertible kind that hooks together in the back), which was a plus. And the length was just right in 3-inch heels (I'm nearly 5' 7" without heels)

links_Review_Title: Jumpsuit for the win! Don't bother to try anything else! You won't be disappointed!
links_Review_Text: I rented this Halston jump suit to attend this year's Black Girls Rock taping and it was one of my favorite rentals. It was perfect for the occasion. I also rented earrings and a clutch to complete my look. The event was an award show but it wasn't a ball or a gala but definitely had the feel that you needed to be more than just casual to attend. Many of the attendees wore stylish cocktail attire or unique evening attire. The vibrant pink color of this jumpsuit was excellent for summer. The jumpsuit looks more like a gown with the wide pant leg and could be worn to any formal event as an alternative to a dress. It was extremely comfortable as well. I wore the size 6R and it was true to size. At 5'3, I wore closed toed kitten heel that had it sweeping the floor. I never felt like it was too long or that I would trip. But be mindful that if you are concerned about hiding your belly, it doesn't necessarily do that. I do also feel that this jumpsuit would better suit ladies who are a little taller and slimmer because of where the midsection falls but I really couldn't complain. I received many compliments and with the hot summer weather it was tolerable to wear waiting in line outside to go in for the event. This jumpsuit also has an element of class and sophistication that blows some dresses out of the water. Do yourself a favor and rent this right away! Thank you RTR for this awesome jumpsuit!

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable easy to zip on my own. Made me feel like a million bucks!
links_Review_Text: True to size

links_Review_Title: Attention grabber. Tons of compliments from strangers
links_Review_Text: Make note: This is pink. I thought it was red from the app. It is a gorgeous jumper and very comfortable. The material in the legs can flare out and make your bottom appear heavier than it is. But, overall, I loved this. Cool and comfortable and sassy. Strangers gave me compliments and it definitely grabs attention. Can't wait to wear it on vacation too.

links_Review_Title: Very cool but just not long enough.
links_Review_Text: Rented these with the hope to wear them with heels but they were floor length without shoes. (I'm 5'10") Made my legs look shorter/wider and I didn't love that look. This is an almost red but actually pink color. Very bold and you will absolutely stand out. Recommend to ladies with smaller hips or shorter ladies. I rented the 6R, but if this came in a 6L I would definitely rent! Everything else about it was amazing!
True to size and nice material but the legs are really big and flowy. I thought this would be more of a statement piece
I rented this for a formal affair but it was freezing the night of the event and I couldn't get myself to wear this! It would be perfect for a spring/summer event. Funky formal attire...loved it!
Absolutely love this jumpsuit! Fits so perfects and makes you look slim. It looks red but it's actually hot pink!

This jumpsuit was a backup i received after another jumpsuit ran waaay too small. I actually really liked it, the color was this fabulous bright red, and it was super soft and comfortable. the legs ran a little long (which is always a danger to ruin clothes in snowy new england), but the outfit draped in a really flattering way. it looked like i was wearing a stunning evening gown. My biggest issue, and part of why i didn't wear it, was that because of the high neck, trying to zip and unzip was a 3-step process! I was afraid i was going to be stuck in the bathroom! That said, if i had a date night in the summer, i would totally rent this again!

links_Review_Title: We had family in town for holidays
links_Review_Text: Was small in waist

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear as way TOO LONG
links_Review_Text: Beautiful vibrant color that pops, but I wouldn't have been able to "hem" it with sticky tape in order to wear. Would have worn if it had been shorter in the legs.

links_Review_Title: Pretty color - more pink than red.
links_Review_Text: Unfortunately, the piece I received looked like he had seen better days. The pants part no longer had pleats. It needs to either be retired or reshaped.
Loved everything about the outfit. I'd rent it again.

Pros - fun color, my husband thought I looked great in the jumpsuit Cons - I felt it made me look larger than I am. You need a friend to go to the restroom with you to help with the zipper. Despite it being large on me the zipper gets stuck at the belted waist. I think it runs large. I'm small chested with a long torso and a more generous buttocks and it was large on me everywhere. Not sure if the smaller size would have looked better. I am 5'6 and the pant length was good with a 2 1/2 inch heels
Unfortunately way too long for me but this was so cool. It's an unexpected pop of color with an amazing shape and a great cut. The pleats are deceptively simple.

I wore this to a good friends wedding and it was a hit. So many complements. The color and uniqueness of the silhouette were perfect. The size was good but maybe a tad tight due to the length of my torso. I think a size 10 would have been too long though. As it was I had to be careful where I stepped so I didn't step on the pant legs.
Beautiful color, runs long for petite girls

links_Review_Title: Stand out jumpsuit for a semi-form wedding
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit is an excellent color and is formal enough for a semi-formal wedding. It was comfortable to wear, making for an excellent wedding outfit. I wore 2.5 inch heels and it was about 1/4 inch too long - not so bad I couldn't wear it for the night but I had to be careful while walking. Overall - it was great.

Gorgeous and perfect fit through waist but you have to be very tall to wear this. Even with four inch heels this had another 6" of fabric. Couldn't tape to hem because of accordion folding. Really pretty.

links_Review_Title: Not great. I sized down based on reviews and it ended up just barely fitting.
links_Review_Text: Actually true to size fitting for me. A 4 would have been perfect, but the 2 was too short in the body aches was right around my hips. Also the tie is just decoration and it didn't hit me right. Returning

I probably would have worn the small if I was not such an athletic build up top. Both fit, but the small felt too small on my shoulders so the medium was perfect. Truly loved this rental. The fabric was amazing.
Dress fit great and was a little more exciting than a plain black dress. It did have a little bit of a funky smell but I aired it out before wearing it. Highly considered buying it!

This unique LBD was perfect for work for me. It's definitely short but not inappropriate on me at 5'4". I got tons of compliments from people because it was such a unique and flattering shape. I'm pretty big in the busy but had no issues with it zipping or with the sleeves! Would definitely rent again!

I got a large, and I am glad I did it fit great. If I would've gotten the medium it would've fit but been very short and and a little less comfortable. I wore it to an event and got many complements. Everyone should rent this piece!

I love this dress! The print and hem make it more than just a LBD. I'm quite short, so the length wasn't an issue (especially with tights), but it could be an uncomfortable length at work for a taller person!
Great material, a little short, but loved this rental!
This dress runs very small which worked well for me. I usually wear a xxs and this fit really well, I also liked how short it was.

I tried RTR update for the first time and got this as a going out dress. It runs a little large - I would normally order a medium, it was suggested I order a large and the large fit perfectly. I was in love with this dress from the moment I tried it on, and my fiancé loved it so much he told me to immediately go online and see if I could buy it... so I did :) 20/10 would recommend to anyone!
Love the style, print, fit, feel, everything about this. Flattering for all body types
Fit great! Loved the style. Won't disappoint!

I am typically a small, but got a medium as my second size based on other reviews. The small fit, but the medium was MUCH more comfortable. I got tons of compliments on the dress and I think I will probably rent it again in the future.
This dress worked great for a holiday party. It's a little on the short side. I wore tights with it, but that was more because of the weather. The print is adorable.
Loved the high waist hem and ruffle bottom. The touch of velvet in the leopard print was a sweet surprise.
Very short! Surprisingly form-fitting. Not very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: This ran very small for me. Got the medium as a backup and it was too snug.
links_Review_Text: too small
Very cute and fun for a night out. Can dress up or dress down. Does run a little small but material is stretchy.

links_Review_Title: Meant to be worn tight. If you don't like showing off the curves, I wouldn't recommend
links_Review_Text: Was super cute but after a long week of eating and drinking for sales kickoff, I was little self continues to wear because it shows off every curve you have. It was super cute and comfy and I got so many compliments. Also I'm 5'7 and it was a little short to wear for a work occasion. Has to be worn with tights if for work.

links_Review_Title: I did not end up wearing the dress, but the dress was cute.
links_Review_Text: The dress does run small as other reviewers said. However, being petite and short, I thought a shorter dress would fit perfectly being I am only 5’ tall. The dress felt too short and was pretty tight. I normally wear an small and the small was still too short and tight for me.

Wonderful dress for a night out. I received many compliments. I loved the feel of the fabric, and the subtle chic pattern. I'd definitely rent this again! The dress runs small. I usually wear a XS but was glad I ordered a S. Highly recommend ordering a size up from your usual.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress. Order a size up. Lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: This is the perfect LBD for any occasion. Great for a formal event (wore to a rehearsal dinner). I received compliments all night. I am thinking about buying this. I am normally a S but they recommended a M and it fit perfectly.
The dress was very cute! I would have been more comfortable if it were an inch or two longer, but still really enjoyed wearing it.

links_Review_Title: This dress looks expensive! The only downfall was that it felt really short!
links_Review_Text: This dress looks expensive! The detail and fabric were amazing. The only downfall was that it felt really short!
Definitely made me look a bit like a sausage but I still got compliments haha... cute for going out definitely wouldn't rent again....
Loved the velvet detail of the leopard spots! Dress is slightly fitted in the waist so size up for comfort!

links_Review_Title: Very cute and understated leopard, but was going for more of a WOW look. Didn't end up wearing.
links_Review_Text: Does run a bit short like others have mentioned. When deciding between a M and L, I went with the large for the length - but even then, just passes the fingertip test.

links_Review_Title: Runs super small (including length) I'm a size 4 and I could hardly fit in a M
links_Review_Text: Runs super small!
it was too small for me to wear and I often take extra small
Amazing Dress! But about two inches too short for a "dressy casual" wedding. Maybe good for a club, and if you don't raise your arms haha
I loved the dress. It made me to feel skinny. The dress is short and super cute. Also shows a bit of personality because of the print.

links_Review_Title: Precious dress, but didn't wear it.
links_Review_Text: Wish I could have worn this dress, but the zipper got stuck and we couldn't get it up.
A little short, but with stockings was totally fine. Also a little snug on the arms, but overall great fit.

links_Review_Title: I wore it to a fun work christmas party and it was great!
links_Review_Text: Fit is a little snug.
sjldkfjs

This dress is a little more snug than what I expected. The zipper on mine stuck a bit but it was a stretchy enough fabric that I was able to zip it most of the way and pull it over my head. Also, for someone busty the waistline will fall just above your natural waist which I did not love.
Im between a 6 & 8 and it was tight.
This dress runs tiny! I couldn't even zip the small and it was extremely short.
Really pretty - but didn't wind up wearing. Much too snug across the chest / upper arms.
Way to small in the chest and too short for work
Rented my normal and couldn't even zip it! Runs very small
Super cute. Was able to get it zipped just a little too short.

Loved loved loved! My only complaint would be my chest size is too small for this style. No matter what size you wear you do need to be able to fill it out and expect tightness underneath chest. Otherwise I still loved this and would wear again and can find ways to work with top part.

Love the colors and fit of this dress. It accentuated my waist and hips and fit like a glove on my body. Only complaint is the button to hold the top together was stretched out and didn't work well. Had to be careful not to have a nip slip. I'm 5'3 and it was perfect midi length. Probably not a fit for a huge bust but worked well on me.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for an outdoor "garden party / farm-to-table" dinner.
links_Review_Text: As other reviews stated, this dress is large on top. I am small busted (36B) and curvy and it was tight on my hips and loose on top. I needed a 10 on the bottom and 8 on top. I had to use safety pins to tighten the straps and also wear a push-up bra. Also - the slit in the dress does show quite a bit of leg when seated. I liked this! But didn't expect it.

This dress is gorgeous! I wanted something that would be breathable for an outdoor wedding since I get hot very easily and it was perfect. I am 3 months postpartum from my third child so I wanted something forgiving in some areas as well. I am so happy I ordered this dress! Compliments all night!

This dress was beautiful and the adjustable slit is a great option. It's a silky fabric. The only downsides were the loose straps, and the chest area is very loose, and also very thin so it was hard to find a backless bra that would work. Besides that, the pattern and slight ruching in the front help this dress to be flattering for all sorts of body types !

links_Review_Title: Pictures don't do this dress justice!
links_Review_Text: Rented for a Polynesian themed fundraiser. Ran TTS for me. I'm 5'6", 132lbs, triangle. It's so much prettier in person. There's a cute peek a boo opening in the back and little ruffle around the top. I think this dress looks great on a gal with curves. I didn't wear a bra, just "petals" for coverage. I did need fashion tape along the cleavage area.

This dress was such a hit. It looked amazing on and fit like a glove. I did need to use some Hollywood tape to stop the chest from flapping open, as I do not have the chest to fill this dress. I am 5'3'', 34 1/2 hips, 31 chest, 121 pounds.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful unique detail and fun patten
links_Review_Text: I loved the stitching and detail on this dress, and the front slit was sexy without being too revealing. The fabric is light and comfortable. However, I have a thick waist so it did not do much for my figure and the extra fabric around the bust actually made me look heavier.
Slit is sexy! Low cut. The top was big so had to pin it in back. Back is exposed. Hard to wear a bra
Great dress, fantastic fit. I got the six and the four and wore the four. Felt like a queen!

Wore this to a friend's engagement party and I LOVED it. Fit great, true to size. I wore a strapless because the top was a little loose on me without one. There is a slit in the back but it isn't too revealing. So many pretty details that make this dress special.

My girlfriend wore this, I ordered two choices. She was stunning in this dress. Fit perfectly and works especially well if you have a full busy. The details on this dress are great, the stock photo doesn't do it justice.
Wore this for a rehearsal dinner and loved it! Stunning color and fit was flattering! Recommend !
Got tons of compliments on this. I really like the design. There is a significantly high slit but I wore it to work anyways

links_Review_Title: Fun print with a hint of sexy, turned a few heads
links_Review_Text: The bust is a bit big I had to use fashion tape but don’t let it stop you from renting. Great fit in the hip. The split in the front is subtle but has sex appeal.

I rented this for a friend's outdoor wedding on a hot day in VA. I have an athletic frame and 90% of the time wear a size 4, but ended up wearing the 6 because the 4 was too narrow on the bottom. I had to tape the top as it was a little big but got tons of compliments! You can also adjust the slit to your liking. Highly recommend!
This dress was gorgeous, clipped perfectly around my chest so there was no spillage and gave me an awesome hourglass frame! Loved it!

links_Review_Title: This dress was a huge hit with my husband on date night! Two thumbs up!
links_Review_Text: Dress fit perfectly. Super comfortable fabric and fit.

links_Review_Title: Great spring dress for formal occasion
links_Review_Text: Slit goes a little high and fit is a little tight but got lots of compliments. It's very pretty on. Highly recommend colorful shoes

This dress is pretty and vibrant, but it required several safety pins to get the fit right. I sized up based on reviews, so it fit well around the rib cage/waist, but it was very loose around the sides and bust. I safety pinned about a half inch from each underarm and shortened the straps with safety pins as well. Fashion tape is also a must for this dress. I recommend wearing a Nu-bra since the straps and back of the bra will show otherwise.
Super lightweight and comfy dress. Fun colors for a Charleston wedding.

I wore this dress for a wedding rehearsal dinner but it would also be great for a wedding! It fit very true to size but was a little big on top for me. I was a little fearful that I was going to flash someone at some point.

links_Review_Title: Felt so chic but not overdressed.
links_Review_Text: It fit a little tight under the bust, but overall was very comfortable and perfect for the bridal shower.
This dress made me feel so beautiful! Perfect for a night out while on vacation!

I wore this to a nice lunch during a bachelorette party in Miami. I received so many compliments! The fabric has a great pattern, and is very flattering. There is not a lot of stretch in the fabric but if you order the correct size you should be fine. The slit has an adjustable tie. You cannot wear a bra with this because the back is open, but I am pretty busty, almost always wear a bra, but felt comfortable in this dress without a bra! That hardly ever happens to me!
Loved this dress, felt like a million in it! Sexy but comfortable and never felt like anything was out if place.

I did get a lot of compliments on this dress. I didn't realize from the picture there is a slit up one side. The slit is somewhat adjustable with the strings so you can make it more dramatic if you like. The colors are pretty and the design of the dress is pretty- the only drawbacks for me were that the straps weren't adjustable (so I was a little worried about them sliding down all night) and the material up top is thin. If you have a larger chest, it may be too thin for you. It even made me a little nervous on if the clasp would hold. But from the pictures and all the compliments, no one else noticed the things I was worried about.

I love this trendy dress by SALONI! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for cup sizes A-C. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or no bra since there is a small bit of support for smaller cup sizes. At 5’4”, the length hit tea length on me. The pattern on the dress is vibrant and amazing in person. Pair with black or colorful heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

Loved the color/print of this dress! Especially for a black tie event over St. Patrick's Day weekend. No surprise that the silk fabric was a little unforgiving. Design of the dress is tight and flat across your tummy.

Classic sheath shape that hugs in all the right places while giving you room to breathe and move. The roucheing around the stomach/waist is super flattering, and the slit up the left side adds an alluring touch. Would definitely rent again.

I absolutely loved this dress and wish I could buy it! It runs a little small though in the waist and kind of big in the bust-the straps are super loose and the fabric kind of sags underneath your armpits. I love the drawstring on the leg slit- you can pull it to exaggerate the slit a little more! Overall though it was a great dress for the occasion, tons of compliments!
Cool pattern but the top fit too loosely and the straps were falling off, despite being quite fitted around the hips. Adjustable slit was a bonus though.

links_Review_Title: beautiful print, but not quite what i wanted.
links_Review_Text: this print was beautiful in person, but the fit wasn't great for my body type. I'm a curvy 2/4 and even the 6 this was TIGHT across my butt/thighs. beyond that it's very lightweight which is great but didn't provide enough support to go braless for a busty girl.
No complaints it's just that I've rented prettier from RTR. This was more of a 7 or 8 out of 10 for me

links_Review_Title: Loved everything about this dress. Wish I owned it!
links_Review_Text: Sexy yet classy
Gorgeous print and details, size 10 was too big the 8 was unavailable. Side rouching detail is great for curvy or post baby. Im a true size 8 post 2 babies, 34dd 145 lbs 5'4

links_Review_Title: Absolutely beautiful... if only it fit
links_Review_Text: I was so looking forward to wearing this, but sadly could not even zip up the back all the way. Beautiful color, pattern. Will definitely try again in the next size (or two) up.
Wore to an NYC wedding. Straps don't adjust so I wish I had fashion tape. Comfortable and cute!

links_Review_Title: The pattern was so beautiful, great styling and shape for any body type
links_Review_Text: Love the mixed pattern and taping around the waist adds a little something !
Slit in leg is higher than normal although very striking
This dress was very eye catching. Like other items in this brand it is a very tight but forgiving material. Nothing overly special but great fall dress to switch up your wardrobe.
Loved it - too expensive to buy - but great for work or get together
Great travel dress. I wore it to a business dinner and felt great amongst the suits. (Great day to night)
True to size. Comfortable with lots of stretch.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a family thanksgiving
links_Review_Text: Comfortable, stretchy beautiful dress. More flattering in person. Beautiful fall colors.
Gorgeous so original!
I really loved this dress! It hugged my curves flawlessly. While the XL was fine I had a lot of room in the busy and hips and could've done a L and still would've been okay for a sexier look.

links_Review_Title: Couldn't decide if it was flattering
links_Review_Text: I had a love/hate relationship with this one. I rented it for work, but I couldn't decide if it was flattering and made me look curvy in a good way or if it just made me look big. Also be wear that it rides up! A complete stranger stopped me on my morning commute to tell me to pull the slip down
I found a large in store but it fit because of the stretch. I had to clip the chest area to keep it from being too revealing for work.

I rented this for a work event. It fit like a glove, very flattering. I wasn't the biggest fan of the cowl neck, but otherwise loved this piece. I paired it with a sexier heel to give it a more edgy look. Kind of felt art-teacher-esk, but I went for it haha.

Pretty fall dress but kind of a mystery. What do you wear this for? It's incredibly fitted and sheer for work but it doesn't really feel wedding guest or cocktail-worthy. Probably best for a casual-ish date night?
Got itchy throughout the day. Would be a good travel dress. Very form fitting, but stretchy - can't hide anything. My husband loved this dress.
As with any dresses from fuzzi, They are 110% comfortable and fit like a glove. Highly recommend this dress and just about everyone of them from this designer.

This dress, like all Fuzzi items I've ever rented, was amazing! Stretchy, printed tulle with a fun cowl neck in gorgeous colors. I always forget to order my smaller instead of my bigger size, though! This one had a little extra fabric around the middle and the sleeves were a bit long. My mistake, so I'm not removing any stars! Order down if you're between sizes.

When I first put this on, I thought I would never take it off. The print and fit are so beautiful. BUT then I realized that it was completely impractical. The inner lining rides up, leaving only the sheer outer layer that exposes your legs. All day I had to tug it down, again and again. Every time I sat down or walked somewhere. Tried fashion tape, no better. Unless someone has a trick I don't know, it's just not worth it.

I rented this dress to break out of the doldrums of being required to work from home. This dress looks great on camera for Zoom meetings, very professional and because it's stretchy it's also comfortable. The only caution is that the under layer tends to ride up when walking.
I have worn both the XS and S in this and I would say either works. The XS is probably the right fit but for work if you want it slightly roomier but still fitted the S also works.

links_Review_Title: Flattering on. Felt good in it.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! Wore it twice- to work. And out for Valentines dinner
Fits tight but is slimming.
Fuzzi clothing fits every body type. This dress did not disappoint. The dress is sheer so if you're a conservative girl, slip, slip, slip.
very cute and fun
This dress is gorgeous and very flattering. I recommend sizing up if you are more pear shaped.

links_Review_Title: The colors were great, comfortable and great looking
links_Review_Text: LOVED LOVED

links_Review_Title: The dress looked amazing on me.
links_Review_Text: Fit snug and showed off curves without being "in your face" about it. Would definitely buy this !
It was clingy but wow did it work! No question this dress made me the hottest turkey at my Thanksgiving dinner. Wear a slip!

I love the Fuzzi brand and this was another winner. I did not have the same issue with the lining that some other reviewers did. Maybe it was because I wore tights? Anyway, I know how these dresses fit and it was as I expected.

links_Review_Title: It is a great fit. Enhances curvy body shape elegantly.The colors are perfect. Pink shawl look great
links_Review_Text: The neckline is absolutely beautiful. The fabric stays on your body. No unwanted shifts.
I am normally an 8. I could've easily worn a M instead of the recommended L.
The lining of this dress would rise up constantly and kept needing pulled down. Maybe a larger size could have helped this? I liked the pattern though!
Wonderful fall colors not too hot for Texas October weather
So kind of itchy but worth it because it's beautiful, really flattering on hour glass shape, stretchy so comfortable in that way
The large hugs my66 year old body. Not sure how she appropriate this is. I paired with tall tan boots and a denim jacket.
I loved, loved this dress. I wore it to two religious functions and it was perfect. It's the perfect length and overall fit. I got tons of compliments.

Rented for an Autumn-themed work event. Great ruched bodycon dress (ruching and a bustier body shaper took care anything unflattering). Many compliments. Paired with Vince Camuto burgundy python ankle strap chunk heel sandals & a Tory Burch burgundy clutch. Will definitely rent again!
Fit beautifully and couldn't have been more comfortable! Felt like a superstar all day!
This dress looks much better on than on the hanger. It was comfortable which was unexpected and I received a ton of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Lovely purple color. The color is perfect for the fall season
links_Review_Text: Fuzzi dresses never fail me yet. I got lots of compliments from the ladies. It's all about the stretchy fabric and the patterns of the fabric that camouflages the waist and stomach. You must wear spanxs to give you a smoothe no panty line effect.
Loved this dress. Great for. Comfortable and perfect for a CA beachside wedding

links_Review_Title: Feeling really good in this dress!
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this dress. It fits well, is flattering and is very comfortable!
great spring or summer dress, feminine and flattering. will rent again and wear when it gets warmer. could be dressed up or down. SUPER comfortable.

It was just a bit snug because I wore my usual size at 33 weeks pregnant. I loved the dress and received so many compliments. Will definitely rent again (with the band this time being at my waist instead of right under my chest). For ref, I'm 5'4", usually a 00/0 (108 lbs pre-preg) and was 145 lbs at 33 weeks.

I wore this twice - to a work event and my baby shower. It's not a maternity dress, but so flowy that I had no issues wearing it at 9 months pregnant. Got loads of compliments, it's so comfy, and I'd definitely rent it again.
Great print. Too much fabric for my petite frame. Almost didn't wear it. Made me look top heavy. Would not rent again. Would be beautiful on someone taller.
Wore to work- very comfortable and flattering
Loved this! Was true to size and I didn't feel like I was swimming in it with my short stature. Great for work or day time date. I may have to buy this.
This dress was perfect! It's super girly and cute! I'm a size 10/12 and a 36-38 C and a 10 was perfect!
The neckline made this dress very conservative looking. I was unsure what shoes to pair it with in 95 degree weather.
Enjoyed this dress, forgiving and could work for someone with a little bump. Worked well for work to drinks. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Very flattering and pretty. A little too little house on the prairie
links_Review_Text: Overall I thought this dress was really pretty. Very girly but comfortable and looked good on

I rented this dress for a Western themed party. I wanted something that looked a little bit prairie and give it some edge with modern cowboy boots. It totally did the job! This dress is the most comfortable, flattering and sweet. The waist is elasticized (hello eating and sitting with ease) the length was mid-calf on my 5'4 frame (a total win for us petites) and the fabric is very lightweight and airy (perfect for 100 degree weather) I didn't need a bra at all. This is a winner. It's very versatile too, you can dress it up or down and looks good every time. I seriously want to buy it.
A dress that can go formal or informal, I wore this to my son's graduation. Very comfortable and flattering. Waistline will rise up a bit (it's elastic) to your narrowest point. I felt great in it.

I wore this around the city (with sneakers) and to my birthday lunch (with heels) with the husband. It fits perfectly but the arm holes are a bit tight. The clasp on the back is also hard to work with. Rented this two months in a row and will rent again at some point.
Beautiful dress! Fit true to size. I am 5'3", and I thought the length was ok on me.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for my engagement photo shoot!
links_Review_Text: The pattern and ruffles give it a great romantic feel. It is super flattering and comfortable too! The waistband is elastic so no need to worry about it digging in or creating bumps!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a weekend getaway in Napa, CA! Loved it!
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a 4 or 6. This dress has no zipper, and is very stretchy around the waist. I ordered a 6 and had to exchange for a 4 for a more snug fit (I'm bottom heavy and my waist and chest are not that wide). 4 fit perfect! The material is not see through and very high quality. Great way to wear a look I might not otherwise buy!
Wore at 28 weeks pregnant - went 2 sizes up from normal. Very pretty dress, plan to rent again for baby shower and possibly photo shoot once baby is here
Fit well and was comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Versatile dress. Great for warm weather
links_Review_Text: Fun dress. I dressed it up for work with a white blazer. Neckline is little high but a nice change.

links_Review_Title: I LOVE this dress. I felt feminine and professional.
links_Review_Text: I was nervous about the synched waist but it actually looked good on me. I loved the weight of the dress - excellent quality. I got many compliments - I wore it with nude heeled sandals and my black leather jacket. Will definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Flawless, perfect to dress up or down, work or play
links_Review_Text: Excellent fit, great flow, cool material
This is definitely not a sexy dress, but it's perfect for a conservative workplace or event.

Despite the fact that this dress was super girly, it fit so well that I couldn't help but love it. If you're a curvy gal like me, get this dress! It just feels good on. Too hot to do this, but I imagine it'd look cute with a denim jacket and some brown booties, something to give it a little more funk. But definitely recommend this dress and this designer!

links_Review_Title: romantic and regal at the same time.
links_Review_Text: So flattering!!!! Elastic waist, high neck with fluttery cap sleeves. So easy to dress up and down. Wore multiple times before returning and HIGHLY recommend !!
Beautiful dress - great print, not too poofy. Too long / too much going on for work dress but works perfectly for a shower or nice brunch.

links_Review_Title: Feminine, and a nice change from all the other dresses
links_Review_Text: I’m not sure why people have described this as “frumpy.” It’s so feminine and lovely! This is a dress that makes you just feel... pretty. The fabric is beautiful and the dress flows so well with the extra ruffles on the side. The neckline feels fresh and it’s a nice alternative to so much that’s low cut these days. The dress came with compliments galore, and the fit was just right and flattering for this size 10/12 gal. I don’t want to take it off!

Wore this dress to work and was complimented all day. The fabric, pattern, shape and fit were all amazing. I highly recommended this for honestly any event. Only negative is that it was a bit tight in the armpit area but not too bad that I wouldn't wear it again.

I LOVED this dress. I wore it to work and then threw it on for the playground on the weekend. While the picture doesn't show the whole story I thought it did a great job showing how versatile it is. I looks polished with a pair of blush heels at the office and then was able to run around with my daughter at the park in a pair of flats. Super flattering shape! I think I could have gone a size down and still loved it tho!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a work event!
links_Review_Text: This dress is pretty but covers it all up for a work event. It works better if you are tall ! It was like camouflage at The Greenbrier!
Nothing to report, I would definitely rent it again

links_Review_Title: GREAT DRESS!!! One of my favorite pieces so far!
links_Review_Text: This fits beautifully and is very flattering and ladylike. I highly recommend...get this you will love it!

The best parts of this dress are difficult to see in the photos--the pattern is incredibly precise and beautiful, and the fabric is lovely (honestly, the movement in the dress makes it much more flattering irl than in the photos!). It was a little more frillly/feminine than I'm used to, but I was incredibly comfortable (elastic waist yes! Fit my bust yes!). May be better for taller ladies--fell just below my knees.
The stress just wasn't terribly flattering. I also didn't feel like there was anything very special about it

links_Review_Title: Yuck. Plain and elderly looking dress
links_Review_Text: If you have hips and dark coloring please avoid this dress unless you want everyone to ask if you've become a Quaker. Not flattering.
Loved this feminine dress. Good length for my height. A little tight under arms.
Love love love this dress! So comfortable and breezy for an 80 degree day. Lots of compliments. The only issue I had was the eye hook at the nape of my neck unclasped a few times.

Felt like a faerie princess in this dress. Wore this dress to brunch feeling very fancy. Paired with long, dangly earrings, and my hair in a bun. Favorite part of this dress is the way it moves when twirling around. Ladies, give this dress a try when you are needing some girlie in your life.
I have pretty large breasts, but this dress was super baggy in the bust and fitted in the hips. I rented it for an '80's concert, but it didn't work.

I felt great in this dress. I am large breasted and I'm wary of dresses that have a wrap front neckline held together by a small snap. It never unsnapped the whole night which was great. It's very flattering and true to size.

links_Review_Title: Fun colors - great cut - super flattering, fun dress!
links_Review_Text: I alllllmost bought this one, I love it so! Flirty little skirt, just enough cleavage, gorgeous colors. Highly recommend!!

Loved this dress! I felt so girly and fancy. I wore it for my birthday dinner and a night out. It was super comfortable and I got a ton of compliments! It fit true to size and was super flattering. Instagram: molly__mcfadden
Great dress, material was very nice. It fit well though it was a little loose and big through the bust and shoulders. Overall it was flattering and comfortable.
This dress color popped and hugged me in all the right places. It was perfect with a pair of jeans that I wore to a holiday party!
I wore this to an 80's party and it was a total vibe. A little roomy in the chest but not too short and so so fun!
This dress fit perfectly. I loved that it still had the tags on it. Perfect fit. Color is amazing. I will definitely rent this dress again.
Got so many compliments! Great dress for work (make sure you wear a cami underneath, deep v-cut neckline) OR a date night ! Beautiful bright teal color.
The print was a little to bright for me and there was too much fabric on the ruching.
Would have been perfect for an 80's party. Just a tad short.
Loved this dress, it was very flattering and received tons of compliments

links_Review_Title: Looks like a 90s prom dress on the hanger, but looks chic, fun, and young on.
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved everything about this dress. I think it could work on nearly every body type. It is definitely at mid-thigh/above, so if you don't like short, might not be for you. It falls somewhere between mid-thigh and mini. I had so many compliments, and I was very comfortable despite feeling bloated because of the ruching around the stomach.

links_Review_Title: flattering for waist lines and hip curves
links_Review_Text: i ordered XS but it's more size for 4 or above not good for size 0 or 2. though it's not hugging my bust area, it's overall an awesome dress. the color, cut, detailed of the ruffles made it stand out- you can tell it's a deluxe from far.

links_Review_Title: Runs true to size, big puffy shoulders
links_Review_Text: I sized up and wish I hadn't! It's too big in a small and the fit is loose around the belly and shoulders. Not cute but super soft fabric and would be cuter if I'd stayed TTS.
Looks like a tight party dress in photo, but is more loose and blousy in person. Size down. The top gapes. I wish it had been tighter, for a night out. Returned. Print is beautiful though.
You have to be really cool and really in shape to wear this and not look like a plumpy cult follower. I'd love this if I were Zendaya. But on me it's neither hip nor flattering.
it fit a little small, great style and midi length

Wanted so badly for tnjs dress to work. The style and color would be perfect for transitional weather. But it was super tight in the arms and chest area. Like couldn't zip it tight. Not even sure the next size would work. Seems off. But the green is so unique so maybe I'll try to size up if available
You don't need a bra with this dress thanks to the ruching. The skirt poofs out where the bodice and skirt come together. It was perfect to wear grocery shopping and running errands.
From the side, no matter how skinny you are it makes you look a little pregnant

I read other reviews and sized up to a Large. It was still bodycon tight. It's also unforgiving. That being said I loved the concept and wore it anyway. I received so many compliments from the color to how sweet it was. I just had to keep my stomach tucked in all day! I'm glad I gave it a chance. BTW even the sleeves are tight! Definitely size up.
I am normally a medium, but it was way too tight. Left nothing to the imagination, but maybe it would work okay if I sized up

links_Review_Title: Runs small, but still a very cool dress
links_Review_Text: Runs really small. I wear a size small, ordered a size medium, and it was still too tight. Definitely body con on top.
Gorgeous fabric but sooo tight and unflattering in the stomach area.

Great color and great fit. Incredibly comfortable while also being cute and stylish. The flowey panels are fun to spin in (see the photos) and make the whole outfit seem flattering. Just an overall fun and cute jumpsuit that's worth renting!

links_Review_Title: I'm wearing this to the Super Bowl after party in Miami, FL
links_Review_Text: Loved this!! So many compliments 😊
Walking in it is unforgettable! You will feel like queen :)
Small in the hips, but it loved it! Boyfriend hated it

Loved this outfit - perfect for hourglass shape. Wore it for my birthday celebration and it was a great combination of dressy and casual... My legs are a little bigger so the S felt tight without spanx or leggings - other than that it was perfect. I'll probably rent again and try the M. Also the tie belt breaks up the float fabric perfectly so you don't get lost in it at all.
I'm usually a large but I went with the XL here because of reviews. It just fit. Anything smaller wouldn't have fit at all so size up.
Loved the fun colors. Fit well

links_Review_Title: I loved it so much I bought it
links_Review_Text: I rented this jumpsuit because I absolutely love jumpsuits and it made me so happy that I bought it. It's so fun in motion - very dramatic. The colors are super vibrant and the pockets are extremely functional. It's a bit long and I have to pay attention to legs when I'm walking up stairs so I don't step on them, but on flat ground it's not an issue.

links_Review_Title: LOVED this jumpsuit. So unique. Lots of Compliments.
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size
I'm super short and this wasn't very long which was great. Actually walked a lot in it without stepping all over it too much. Definitely a show stopper!
This a little big on the top (despite my large chest). I probably could have worn a large but I have a long torso. Two layers made it heavy for hot weather but good for evening. Would rent again
Unique and flattering. Completely comfortable.

Loved wearing this! I'm a 4 and usually wear size M, but the S fit great for me! Had to wear wedge platform sandals due to the length. Love how the pink, white and yellow panels are attached at the top so they flow around below the tie belt.

links_Review_Title: It was fabulous! I got so many compliments. Comfortable. Supportive, Fun!
links_Review_Text: Great fit. Loose and roomy but true to size. It has pockets. Nice with a pair of heels. I got so many looks and compliments!
Perfect

links_Review_Title: So many compliments at our Studio 54 party!
links_Review_Text: Received so many compliments on this outfit! I normally wear a size 14 and the XL fit great. And it has pockets!

This jumpsuit was amazing. The fit was perfect. Loved the colors. Loved that it was different. It didn't even look like I was wearing a jumpsuit. Compliments all night long. The material was soft against my skin.

links_Review_Title: WOW. I had fun with this one. I attended an event with Oprah with this event. AMAZING.
links_Review_Text: It was amazing. I loved this outfit.

links_Review_Title: When you want to look wider
links_Review_Text: The colors and fabric were on point, but the fit was horrific. I'm tall, athletic, and equipped with hips. I wear a lot of jumpsuits... but this one? I looked incredibly wide and disproportionate. My husband and I both couldn't stop laughing. Considering that the tags were still on this garment, I'm guessing other renters felt the same.

It was a little short in the torso, and I have a short torso. But it was comfortable enough to wear for a few hours. I would recommend sizing up. The colored pieces are attached to the black jumpsuit at the neck and flow down. It would look pretty neat if you chose not to wear the belt/sash.

I am normally a size 6 (hourglass figure), ordered a M and it JUST fits. Pretty snug below the hips so I probably would have been better off with a Large. I'll still wear it though! Just can't move around so much ha.

Wore this to work with a cardigan and then out for a dinner party. I am 5'6" and the torso fit fine, though was a little tight when sitting. I run between a 4 and a 6 and I thought the small was a good fit. Note that the pant legs definitely run on the longer side so I had to wear 2.5" heels to avoid stepping on the fabric. All in all a great piece!

links_Review_Title: Little too tight through hips and too long
links_Review_Text: Choose another dress

links_Review_Title: Great pantsuit but runs small. Like 2 sizes small.
links_Review_Text: Great pantsuit but runs small. Like 2 sizes small. I'm a size 12 and my daughter is a size 8 it fit her and it did not fit me and it's a 12 hour. I did not get to wear the outfit to my function.
Ill-fitting garment made of cheap, unbreathable material. Glad it was a rental; it was returned right away.

links_Review_Title: I was unable to wear it because it was tight in the hips.
links_Review_Text: It runs small.

links_Review_Title: I rented this to wear on a date, but didn't wear it
links_Review_Text: I'm tall, and this fit well in the shoulders and waist. HOWEVER, I've had 2 children and my little 'bump" under my belly button stood out significantly while wearing this.

I wanted to wear this to work but since I am tall and full-figured, it was just a little too uncomfortable. It looked very cool on with the jumpsuit and the "swishy" parts together. Definitely something you could take from the office to drinks very easily.
This dress is definitely meant to fit tight and hug, so be ready to wear some Spanx, but the material is nice enough that it doesn't necessarily highlight small flaws. Still very flattering!

This dress was beautiful. I got many compliments and the thicker material helped make me feel more confident. If you plan to dance, the arm that's off the shoulder would have made it a little difficult to do so, IMO. Overall, very pleased!
Unique style that stands out and elegant. Great for Valentine's Day!

links_Review_Title: I had several people tell me I looked like a model - I felt amazing in this dress!
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a medium but wore the L in this dress. It fit like a glove and showed all my curves but also had plenty of stretch/give. Super easy to sit, walk, and dance in. I got compliments on it all night long!
The fabric was really nice and thick (without feeling heavy or too hot) and comfortable. I loved the fun shoulder, even though it was a bit restrictive for dancing.

Loved how this dress looked on me. Wore it for a wedding & I received tons of compliments; I felt very sexy and classy! I do feel it runs small, regardless of how stretchy the dress fabric is. I ordered it in a size Small with Medium being the back-up size, and the medium could've worked but the zipper wouldn't budge and close all the way, so I ordered a replacement in size Large and that fit fine, albeit a bit roomy but I was fine with it; it didn't constrict my movements (I danced a lot!).

Gorgeous little cherry red number! It fits snug, but I thought true to size. The material is very thick and I would definitely recommend spanx. The right arm is pretty constricted, so I wouldn't recommend if you really want to dance, and it's difficult to get a coat on over it. Definitely a showstopper!

links_Review_Title: Love love love this dress. Felt sexy but classy. Hugged in the right places.
links_Review_Text: I got tons of compliments both in person and when I posted pictures asking where I got this. The material is great quality/thicker which held me nicely while eating a big dinner but stretched enough to be comfy after. Wish I could keep it- gorgeous color. Feels sexy with one shoulder out while also being elegant.

links_Review_Title: Fun and artsy. Perfect for the event and a great color
links_Review_Text: Zipper was not easy to use and it was a bit of an awkward style to get on but it hugged well and stood out among a sea of black dresses.

The off-the-shoulder side made it difficult to wear a coat, so if the weather is cold, you'll need to wear a cape (I slipped my arm out of the sleeve to wear a coat). But otherwise - it's a flattering and comfortable dress with good stretch. The length is appropriate for a work function and the color is gorgeous. My date's jaw dropped when he saw me, and I overheard a couple "I love her dress!" comments, so I'm not the only one who loved it. I'd wear it again without question!

links_Review_Title: Simple, classy and a little bit of fun!
links_Review_Text: Wore for a school formal event. Standout - simple and classy but with a fun shoulder cut! The XS didnt lay flat on the top so I opted for the S. Even though the S wasn't skin tight I liked the way it fit better and there was more movement for my arm. Be aware that you can't wear a jacket over this because of the sleeve detailing. I had to drape my jacket over my shoulders to stay warm. Four stars because the shoulder cut was a little awkward of a fit.
This dress fit like a glove and was so flattering! I wore this to a wedding and got so many compliments. Contemplating adding to my closet!

links_Review_Title: This dress is fab; great for those with curves
links_Review_Text: I loved wearing this dress and got tons of compliments. It is stretchy, it also has a lot of structure. I’m 5’5 about 122 lbs , 32F and I ended up wearing the XS.
