This was for a formal work function and while it hugged curves the neck line was not revealing and made it work appropriate.

links_Review_Title: Well priced dress - fun color and great material
links_Review_Text: Great dress, good material

links_Review_Title: We had so much fun at the party we didn't get a chance to take a good photo!
links_Review_Text: Forgive the messy room! The dress was an amazing fit!! I'm 5ft 3, 125lbs and wear size 26 jeans. In formal dresses I usually wear size 2-6 depending on fit. This dress in a small was a snug fit! It took me and my husband to zip me up haha. But the Medium fit way too big and baggy. I wore the small and was comfortable all night. The fabric has a lot of stretch to it. I love this dress and would wear it again.
Loved this dress! So many compliments. Fabric is thick. Fits a little snug but with a pair of spanx fits just right.

Material was an A+ and loved the style. I was just a little sad because I happened to be caught in between the size small - which was really tight and made me feel like a sausage and the medium - which was falling off my shoulder a bit. Overall I still felt great in it though...(went with the larger size for more comfort).
Very stretchy and a great color !

Ordered an XS by accident and it was a little small but the dress stretched great and hugged the right places!! I would go with a small next time but got so many complements on it, felt confident! Would absolutely rent it again.
Wore this for a work holiday party! Received so many compliments on it and I loved the fit on me! For reference I'm currently running around the size range of 6-8 and the medium was perfection!

This dress was perfect. Not over the top but just enough sexiness. A few heads were definitely turned and I received compliments all night. It's for fitting and and very flattering. Material is stretchy but thick enough to cover the flaws. Many many compliments. Definitely a classy show stopper. Size up for sure. I'm a firm size 6. Sometimes 4, I went with the reviews and so glad I did. :-)

links_Review_Title: It hugged all my curves perfectly! Great quality fabric. Received compliments all night.

links_Review_Text: Rented this for a formal wedding, and felt amazing in it! Got lots of compliments, and the dress fit perfectly! The fabric was thick and forgiving, but had some stretch to it, so it was the perfect middle ground. Fit details: 155 lbs, 5'4, 34DDD wore a size L. I have an hourglass figure and a larger chest/butt. My lower half fit no problem, but I had to wear a strapless bra that compressed me up top in order to fit comfortably. I'm normally a size 8 (M) in dresses, but the L was a better fit.

I loved everything about this dress. It runs a little small though and I had to wear the x-large and am normally a perfect size 6 or 8. It was a very comfortable fit and the color was amazing. Wish I owned this dress.

Rented this for a fundraising gala. The material was high quality with a little stretch. The zipper was tough to get over the thick seams. I had to pull the dress over my head which meant I needed to put it on before doing my hair and makeup but other then that it was perfect.

Loved this dress that I recently wore for a November wedding. I received so many compliments on the color and style. I typically wear a 4 or 6 in dresses but was 4 weeks postpartum when I wore it and the large fit great. I probably could have done the medium but the large worked perfectly fine. Very flattering and nice thick material with good stretch - worked well for a cold night.

Got this dress for a friends wedding. It didn't disappoint! Get ready to receive compliments all night long if you rent this dress too. I'm 5'1" and I have an athletic build. I would have usually gone with the medium but I felt more comfortable sizing up to the large. Loved everything about this dress...
Great dress, actually very comfortable to wear and dance in! Fits true to size, lots of compliments all night!

links_Review_Title: Getting to wear a pretty dress.
links_Review_Text: Fit great. I'm a 32 DD so the XS was a little more snug up top than I would have liked but on the plus side it was supportive. Lol I tried the small as well & that fit perfectly up top but the sides (hip area) were too big for me so I opted for the XS.
Great fit. Material has a little elasticity to it making comfortable and easy to dance in.

What a fabulous dress! I'm 5'6 135lbs and wore a size small and it was perfect in all the right places! Definitely a show stopper for a wedding, but in a good way. Easy to get on and off, and comfortable enough. So glad I went with this dress!

links_Review_Title: I love the dress and color and style. It's elegant and sexy at the same time.
links_Review_Text: Got lots of compliments on the dress and color. Its stretches but still tight. Its hard to zip it up even though it wasn't tight on me. I definitely would order your regular size and a size up. It does run small. I would buy this dress if its on sale to buy.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress! Nice fit--sexy but not over the top
links_Review_Text: Was tight but the top cut helped it from being too over the top. The top didn't fall off should on me like in the model but its possible the dress was just too tight. Still liked how it looked.

links_Review_Title: The off the shoulder was so much fun
links_Review_Text: The dress was tight in the right places for my body type. I wore it to dinner so it was a great dress for that type of event. It would be hard to dance in for a wedding and keep it looking ok though

links_Review_Title: Comfortable, sexy, thick fabric and hugged my curves perfectly. I received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: The M fit but it was a little snug so I chose to go with the L, especially since I was going to be eating and dancing. I would definitely wear this again and my BF says I need to go ahead and buy it because I was definitely feelin myself all night :)

links_Review_Title: Cute, but don't expect to move your arms
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a girls night out and although it was cute and stylish, I felt completely restricted! Since the shoulder is off on one side, you lose most mobility in that arm. We were at an event where we were clapping and cheering, so I had to completely take my arm out of that side of the dress so I could raise my arm. Great dress, but more hassle than it's worth

I ordered this dress for a wedding and loved it. The dress fit true to size - the S ended up being a little baggy so I moved forward with wearing the XS instead. Received plenty of compliments being my first time ever doing RTR. I cannot wait to continue to order dresses from here for all the future weddings & formal events ahead!

links_Review_Title: Massive amounts of compliments on this dress. A little bold for a wedding, but certainly fun.
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable material. Unique cut and design that received a lot of compliments. Because I'm only 5'3", the length was a little longer than I preferred, but all in all excellent rental.
This dress hugs you in all the right places! I loved this fun dress for a Red and Blue themed party.
Beautiful flowy dress. Length was midi since I am short but still looked great.

The material is floaty and sheer and the dress is so patterned that this works in a variety of ways. I didn't use the included slip at all and instead wore it over straight leg ripped jeans and then with the striped MSGM sweater from RTR. Both were warm and chic options and I liked how eclectic the dress could be styled.
Loved this dress! Very easy to wear and flowy. The material doesn't wrinkle so it would be good for travel.

I love the way the dress flows. The fabric is bright and fun. It's a good piece for fall/spring as the fabric is thin and light and airy. The under-slip is comfy too. I love Anna Sui. I might rent this one again.
I made it more 'lunar new year' esque with the belt and some cute hair ornaments. All in all a very nice dress!

This one will be hard to give back. I love it! I'm plus size so I have been wearing my own slip underneath but the floatiness of the size L can definitely fit most sizes! I love it with black tights and boots.

Got it for work/weekend use. It's made to be oversized so would work great if you are expecting. I liked the print a lot, and wore this dress with leather jacket and ankle boots. You can wear this with sneakers also. Cool fall/winter piece but for warm weather only, i live in CA. This dress is very sheer and wouldn't work for the east coast winter weather...
Great dress. Nice and long. Translucent material with slip so still nice and modest. Lots of fabric/very flowy.

Dress is really wide. Didn't find it flattering. Tried it on with an oversized black sweater because I found the print too overwhelming - didn't work. Didn't work with a black leather jacket either. Probably just not my style.

links_Review_Title: I wore this beauty everywhere - job interview, vacation, church
links_Review_Text: Extremely light and voluminous, but the slip is cut on the bias and clings close to the body so in certain light you can see the shape of the body through the very-sheer outer layer and the effect is quite nice. Despite the expected over-size I got the S as it was the only thing available and frankly I doubt the sizing on this one matters too much - probably anyone could go up or down a size with little problem.

This is a really fun dress. Great pattern and cut - I wore it both loose and with my own belt. I loved how the fabric moved and it was a great piece both for work and for the weekend. The slip is a bit sheer but I wore it with black tights and it was totally fine.
Beautiful and unique dress. Great fabric. Runs a little large, I sized down to a small and it was perfect

This dress was gorgeous! I rented it for a birthday and ended up wearing it to two more events. The flowers at the bottom are actually dancers and it's stunning. The dress itself is very loose fitting - it looks great with heeled booties and simple make-up

Gorgeous frock! Size down if you don't want the free flowing, tent look. At 6 months pregnant, this was a great comfy option, but I definitely could have sized down. It comes with a separate slip that's a must; both the slip and dress are pretty sheer. The patterns are unbelievably beautiful in person, especially the "flowers" at the bottom that are actually ballerinas! Thanks for adding Anna Sui, RTR.
Didn't wear, my mistake. Forgot I feel more flattered in something fitted around the waist unless its above the knee.

Loose and casual but very flattering. The top layer is very sheer with a sleek black slip that comes with it. I wore with leggings and booties on a mid-winter day. Will rent again this spring when I can go bare legged with sandals. Very versatile. Lovely vibrant fabric. Refined boho?
Loved this dress so much! It was perfect over black leggings with Doc Martin style boots.
Got lots of compliments. Could fit a wide variety of body types. Definitely fit larger, but was expecting that, so sized down 1 size. It hit me mid calf and was more 3/4 arms length.
What makes this dress is the print. Not noticeable from the photo, but some of the "flowers" are actually ballerinas. The dress is very loose. Comes with a slip. Fun wear.

links_Review_Title: Brings a smile to other's faces.
links_Review_Text: I wore this out to a dinner and everyone who saw me was all smiles. Something about the dress is fun and seems to call out to others. I really enjoyed wearing it.

I was worried this would make me look like I was wearing a tent, but the fabric lays so nicely and it's very flattering! Love the patterns too. It's great to wear everyday, or can even be dressed up for a date night.

links_Review_Title: Love Love Love this little boho dress with the amazing fabric!!!
links_Review_Text: Anyone can wear this dress and that's one of the things I like so much about it. Skinny, heavy, pregnant, any shape figure (pretty much). At 5'4", the dress is longer than the official picture on the 6 ft, size 0 model but that's fine w me. I'm going to wear it to a bridal luncheon even if I might be a tad too old for it. I do not have much of (well any) butt or hips so the under slip fit me just fine and I wore a M. I was more worried about it fitting me in the shoulders and bust, but it fit my broad shoulders just fine. The dress itself is flowy and hides sooooooo much!!! I'm recovering from cancer and wear a medication pump and this lovely dress hides all my stupid gadgets and gear I have to wear right now. l love that it's fairly sheer bc I get warm easily. I'm going to pair it w black tights and suede boots and some funky earrings and I think it will be perfect for the hostess of a luncheon at Brennan's. I have tried several times to upload a photo but I am doing something wrong bc I just can't get any review pictures to load! I can't imagine anyone who wouldn't love Anna Sui's fabrics (while the bottom layer of the dress looks like it's covered in flowers, it's actually ballerinas twirling around). Can't say enough good things about this darling (expensive) dress!
Loved this dress! Wore to work and then friends dinner. Goes well with a leather coat and booties.

This dress is amazing. The detail in the pattern is beautiful and it garners compliments all day. I'll be holding on to this one for a few wears - if it was cheaper I'd buy it. A great statement dress!
This dress was comfortable & forgiving (given its oversized nature!). I would have preferred if the neckline was lower and if it had pockets. But the dress was still fun to wear at the office.

links_Review_Title: LOVED but didn't wear bc crazy NYC weather
links_Review_Text: This is a gorgeous dress! I LOVE Anna Sui and am so happy to see her designs on RTR. The dress includes a black slip to wear underneath the sheer floral fabric. Very loose and flowy. I rented this to wear in September but NYC is still in the high 80s so it didn't work out. I am planning to rent this again as soon as it cools down.
Cute and comfy for a spring wedding! The color is very, very, like, bubblegum pink. Fair warning - it is not a muted pink at all. You will stand out in a crowd!
Very beautiful and easy to wear, true to size

links_Review_Title: Liked it! Feels like garden party!
links_Review_Text: I liked it but ended up going for another one. It feels so airy, light and femenino. Thought about adding some statement earrings and nice platform shoes. I loved the pleated skirt and made me want to swirl. I'm between 2 and 4 and though 4 closed alright maybe 2 would have felt like a better fit.

I really loved this dress. I was 4 months PP, and felt like it was very flattering and I was able to easily nurse my little one. Comfortable dress as well! I think I sized up, but that was also because I still had some extra baby weight on me.
Fit so perfectly and was so comfortable! I'm 15 weeks pregnant and it was flattering for my growing tummy.

Was such a fun piece to wear, I was actually sad to see it go! Twirls like a dream and the high waist is so flattering. I am more on the square side of shapes but it hit at the exact spot of the smallest part of my body. I wish I had thought to get a better picture but the night was non stop dancing.
Loved this dress for a formal wedding. Was incredibly comfortable all night and received tons of compliments. Straps do not look cheap & work for the larger chested.
So much fun to dance in that skirt!! Am usually self conscious without a bra and felt totally great in this. Please forgive terrible tan lines.

Loved this dress!!! I wore it for my bridal shower and I loved everything about it including the adjustable straps. I received so many compliments! I want to rent the blue version of this dress now, I would love to buy it.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding
links_Review_Text: The dress is a bit heavy but the color, fabric and design are beautiful. I got a ton of compliments and would definitely rent again. One major plus is that it can easily be accessorized to be appropriate for a formal event or dressed down for a more casual look.

Pretty pink, nice weight to the fabric, but i would recommend wearing a slip underneath since the dress has a tendency to go between your legs and look weird when walking (i'm sure no one but myself noticed, and def not necessary, but good to throw a slip on if handy).

links_Review_Title: Perfect color, gorgeous fit, fun to twirl!
links_Review_Text: It was beautiful! Loved wearing it and it looked great even after eating and drinking all night! Probably my favorite rental ever. Color is gorgeous! It is a heavy material, but I wore it to an outdoor wedding in 98 degree heat and it was fine. You won't be sorry you rented this.

I LOVEEE this dress! I got complimented on all night. It was perfect for dancing. I felt like a million bucks and I loved every minute of it! Totally worth it, and super happy this dress was my first one from RTR

I'm a size 4/6, 135 lbs 5'7, hourglass figure, the 4 wasn't available so I ended up with the 6- which I'm happy about. The dress fit like a glove. It was just fitted around the rib cage area, if I wore the 4 it would've been uncomfortably tight. The straps are adjustable and the flowy top meant no bra was necessary. Like other reviews said, the fabric is a bit heavy. The wedding was in Vermont so it was cooler anyways, but wouldn't suggest this for a hot summer wedding. Also incredibly fun dress to dance in!!

links_Review_Title: Fits perfect super flattering and great length for formal wedding
links_Review_Text: Great fit at high waist- super flattering. Great length if you're on the taller side like me. Color was more pink in person and I loved it

I'm usually between a 6 and 8 for flowy dresses. The 6 fit perfectly. The 8 was a little too loose in the chest area. This dress is so flattering and the length was perfect. The straps were a tad bit tight and later realized I could have adjusted them *face palm* however that didn't take away from the dress. I didn't wear a bra but little pasties and was perfectly fine because the dress held up the girls. I was able to eat and dance because it wasn't form fitting. The pleats are super gorgeous and feel like they added to uniqueness of the dress.

links_Review_Title: Lovely dress for a family wedding
links_Review_Text: Love this dress. It seems simple but the pleats and drapey top are really special details. It's really pretty and soft. I recommend sizing up if you've got a bigger bust. My chest felt crushed in my typical size so I went with my backup and it was perfect.

links_Review_Title: This dress was absolutely perfect!! Very comfortable and fun to dance in!
links_Review_Text: Amazing!! Want to rent again!!

links_Review_Title: Loved the color and fit! So comfortable and gorgeous.
links_Review_Text: This fit really well! I ended up with the smaller of my 2 sizes. It cinches in at the waist and flows our really nicely. Was perfect for dancing and a beach wedding! The color is so pretty!!! I love the pleats also and the midi length. Definitely recommend. This was my first experience with rent the runway and I was very happy!
The dress fit like a glove, and it was incredibly comfortable. The color was exactly as shown in the pictures and matched perfectly with the aesthetic I was going for. Would rent again for sure!
Wore to annual work party. Received plenty of compliments. Very comfortable and great to dance in. True to size.
I loved this dress. It has adjustable straps which is key to getting the top ruffle to look right. Extremely comfy and fun to twirl. Fits a tall person well.

links_Review_Title: Hands down my favorite rental! Everything was perfect about this dress!!
links_Review_Text: Was not 100p about this dress when I ordered it, but boy I'm glad I did!! Have never received so many compliments on a dress before! The fit, skirt, color, style was all perfect. Ordered for a bridesmaids luncheon. The skirt is a lot of material which was a tad hot while sitting, but honestly not a problem. Would rent again. Looked beautiful in pictures and while walking! And didn't have to wear a bra! #wedding
Dress fit perfectly in the waist. The adjustable straps were key to making the top sit properly. Loved twirling and dancing in this dress all night!

links_Review_Title: Got tons of compliments. High quality material and good fit
links_Review_Text: May size up if larger bust

I liked this dress more than I expected! The fit was great overall. I went for the length because I am short (5'4") and it worked out well. Heavier material than expected - might be a bit warm in high heat. Comfortable!
So comfortable and stylish. True to size. Bonus: I didn't have to wear a bra!
This is a BEAUTIFUL dress. I received so many compliments. It's very figure flattering and so fun to twirl through the night! A very classy and elegant dress. I want to wear it again!!

links_Review_Title: Fun dress that was perfect for a formal wedding and to dance in!
links_Review_Text: Loved the length of the dress. I was able to get away with not wearing a bra, but would be easy to wear one if needed. The fabric was thicker, which I prefer.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress, so fun to wear and dance in!
links_Review_Text: Had so much fun wearing this dress, loved the fitted top and flowy bottom. Straps are adjustable and don't fall off easily. Definitely recommend, they also offer in navy blue.

I wore this dress for a spring wedding and it was perfect! The color is beautiful and the pleated skirt is so fun. I am small-chested and I was able to wear it without a bra, which is always a plus. I am 5'5" and the dress hit just above my ankles. I felt like it fit true to size. Overall this dress was flattering and fun to wear. I would definitely recommend this dress!
I absolutely loved this dress. I thought the color was beautiful for a spring or summer wedding and the fit really extenuated my waist. The pleating adds such an elegant look as well as the length!

links_Review_Title: Class and fun all in one :)
links_Review_Text: This dress is a classic. The color is such a pretty shade of blush/rose. It's elegant and romantic, comfortable and so fun to dance in! I'm 5"2' and 107 lbs and I still liked the length on me. I would buy this dress in a heartbeat!

links_Review_Title: Perfect Dress for a Spring Wedding
links_Review_Text: Wore this dress to a wedding in Miami. The pleats on the dress make it extremely flattering for most body shapes. The dress does have straps but I preferred it to be strapless. The only negative thing about the dress is it is a bit heavy so it can you can feel a bit warm at times. All and all I would recommend this dress to my friends and wear for another occasion.
Great fit and was perfect for beach wedding. Material wasn't too heavy either.

links_Review_Title: So comfortable and great for dancing !
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable and easy to move around in. Danced in very easily and was able to not wear a bra which is always a plus!!

links_Review_Title: it was fun and feminine! a little heavier than expected would recommend. super soft and comfortable
links_Review_Text: I wore a 2R and am usually a 4

I'm 125lbs and 14 weeks pregnant. This dress was perfect! I normally am a 4 so I sized up and it was a great fit. I'm busty and it's hard for me to find a dress that works with my tatas. Great dress all around! I would definitely recommend it.

links_Review_Title: The dress fit perfectly, and it was easy to dance in all night long!
links_Review_Text: The pleats were so flattering and I got a ton of compliments. The material is very sturdy so the dress really holds its shape, which I love. I can see how some may find it too heavy, though.
Absolutely stunning and so much fun turning around on the dance floor
This piece draped off my body perfectly- super flattering. I almost felt like I could have gone smaller, but there was no need, it looked better hanging a bit. Super classy!
The fabric is so beautiful. I was instantly in love with the color. So bright but not overwhelming. I loved the fit. But right around the hips. Wore for a brunch date. Gorgeous. So many compliments.

This is gorgeous and flattering and well Made! No complaints. It runs a little loose but it's supposed to I believe. I wore it for Christmas and everyone was complimenting the color and how well it lays. Highly recommend!
I wore this to three Christmas events. It was low cut and required a black tank under but was definitely a statement piece.

links_Review_Title: deeper v neck than you think
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit and style but with a larger chest can become necessary for a tank under
This was so baggy on me. The cut and the color were gorgeous though. Size down.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful top. Beware of sleeves at dinner.

links_Review_Text: The perfect mix between professional and sexy. The color and fabric are amazing. The only issue is that silk shows wear and tear fast and when I received it, this already had a small stain in the back and a fabric pull on the sleeve. I wore it anyway, and parted my hair sideways and made sure it covered the sleeve. Otherwise it was a great blouse to wear to a conference event.

This is a very slimming and flattering top, even for somewhat of an apple shape. The V was a little deep for me, but nothing I couldn’t fix with a small piece of double-sided tape. If I could find the top, I would buy it. But it’s sold out everywhere. It fits true to size and I would definitely rent it again.

links_Review_Title: I loved the color and the style - perfect for this time of year.
links_Review_Text: The fit was great for a 40DD with no need for a cami!
This is super flattering. The color is great! Fabric is awesome. I highly recommend!

Loved the jewel green color. A bit low cut but I wore it anyway without a cami. Received many compliments on it! Sleeves were nice accents and tie was easy to knot. I did. It tuck it in but you could.
Has a small hook in front to hold the shirt together to be more conservative

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color, luscious feel, great for work.
links_Review_Text: I loved loved loved this green color and silk-feeling of the this top. Wore it to work with a black tank top underneath. It was comfortable and fell nicely on me. I did have to retie the bow on the side a few times. Also, be very careful of the sleeve; the feel into my lunch a little because I wasn't paying attention.

links_Review_Title: Fantastic dress for wedding dress shopping!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for a day of wedding dress shopping with the girls, and it was the perfect option since I wanted to be comfortable and had to take it on and off all day at salons. The top is big and blousy - even for me, and I have a big chest! - so I had to pin it, which was a bit awkward. It worked out, though! The fabric is gorgeous, high quality, and so flattering.

links_Review_Title: So pretty, and comfy lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. I rented it for every day and ended up wearing it to an event.
Saved this dress to rent again! The fit is very flattering. It runs slightly large. There's room to size down. The v neck can be a little low. I am 5'8 and this sat right at my knees.
Nice dress but not one I must have.

I adored this sweet, silky dress. It was perfect for dinner with my hubby on vacation. The fit was flowy and easily accommodated lots of seafood and sangria ;) my husband liked it so much he offered to buy it on the spot. Don't hesitate to rent this beauty - it fits like a dream!

Love love love this pretty dress! Feels like silk and skims beautifully. Based on reviews I sized down which was perfect. For work, Large busted ladies will likely prefer to pin or wear a shell as the neckline is low and loose. Got compliments from both men and women and will definitely rent again. I paired it with nude wedges, statement necklace and a ponytail since this is a lot of dress and pattern. Spanx weren't necessary but wore them anyway for added security.

links_Review_Title: This dress is a perfect summer / spring dress.
links_Review_Text: It's not clingy, very flattering and just the right amount of fabric. It is low cut and it needed a little bit of fashion tape to hold the bust in but overall it's cute. I did receive three or four compliments on it! Nice for work.
Gorgeous dress. I received so many compliments! It's light and airy and the material is so so soft! Wore it to an outdoor concert.
Super cute dress! Rented for a bridal shower. Very light and airy. Loved the details on the sleeves. Fit TTS.
This dress fit great, was comfortable for all day wear, and had plenty of room for the ladies. The material felt nice too.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for walking around the art gallery in DC
links_Review_Text: Unique sleeve design. Mock wrap style so it won't open up while wearing. Light silky polyester fabric.

links_Review_Title: Much better than other reviews described!
links_Review_Text: Surprised by the silky shiny material, from other reviews thought it wasn't going to be that great but I felt so awesome in it that I made my husband take me out for a dinner date that night! Very figure flattering and so soft also had a super cool sleeve detail (I thought they were butterfly sleeves which I'm not a huge fan of) but it came with slits in the sleeve that then came back together at the cuff. Will probably request again!

links_Review_Title: Cute comfortable - was an ok dress but nothing crazy. I didn't find it particularly flattering
links_Review_Text: I did love the fabric and print though! Great colors and fun for summer

links_Review_Title: I love this dress. Wish I could buy it
links_Review_Text: I love this dress so much. It's light weight, the arms are covered but still open, great length and can be dressed up or not. I would buy it if it wasn't $405 - only 10% off. I'm guessing they don't what people to buy it. :( I paired it with a stretchy black belt because I was going to wear a mic pack. It looks nice without also.

This dress came new with tags on! It is so comfy and I got so many compliments just walking down the street. The fabric is silky but not clingy. If you have a flatter chest you may need to wear a bandeau to keep it from gaping when you sit... but overall highly recommend!!!
loved the fabric and the colors. The fit was flattering, got lots of compliments. only con, is the deep v-neck but a tank underneath will do the trick.

links_Review_Title: So comfortable and soft. Very different look.
links_Review_Text: Runs large and feels like pajamas. Loved wearing it but may not be super flattering. Large on top.

links_Review_Title: It is a great dress but the sleeve button at the end is odd. Sleeve is better just loose.
links_Review_Text: Pretty dress.
Nice dress. Facing kept coming out though. Really pretty drape!
Beautiful pattern and fabric. Nice and flows.

Took this on 2 week beach vacation and only ended up wearing it twice. It is a cute dress with flattering sleeves that are nice when you want a little more warmth at night. Other than that it was just OK, the cut and style were fine but not particularly flattering. Probably just a matter of taste.

links_Review_Title: The fabric and feel of this dress is amazing, however...it looks like a robe when I put it on.
links_Review_Text: It is so beautiful, but the cut at the waist makes it look like a robe. It is extremely comfortable and the fabric is very flattering, but I couldn't wear it because it looked like I forgot to get dressed and was wearing my robe to dinner.
Really nice fabric and colors! Felt very elegant. Had to tape the top up because pretty large in bust.
The dress is very pretty and flowy. Great for a bloated day! I got lots of compliments but I felt a little like I was wearing a fancy nightgown sometimes.
Pretty fabric and pattern but runs a little big
Dress looks beautiful but on me it did look like a bath robe :( had to return without wearing. Sleeves are interesting but too elaborate for the style

I wanted to wear this to work but it wasn't appropriate. It falls under a bathrobe or elegant wear possibly. It is definitely not for everyday. I was not comfortable leaving the house in it. HOWEVER, it is absolutely gorgeous and so silky.

Loved the silky flow of the dress. I wear between 6 and 8, the 6 was perfect. It did make me self conscious about my elbows, something I never thought much about before. Will rent again. Hard to get the wrinkles out but they don't show with the print and flow of the fabric.
A size smaller would have been just perfect but loved this dress.
It was super cute and I got tons of compliments.

links_Review_Title: The most beautiful dress I have ever worn!!
links_Review_Text: Little big on the top

The sleeves can be awkward, so I chose to push the part that wraps around your wrist up to my elbows which made the dress look like a short sleeve verses and exposed gapping arm. So many compliments on the dress. The fabric is super posh.

links_Review_Title: Great dress many compliments lovely fabric
links_Review_Text: Great dress

links_Review_Title: Took a lot of modifications for me to love this dress....but then got a ton of compliments
links_Review_Text: First off, this material is fantastic. The dress itself seemed a little large and looked somewhat kimono like when I first put it on. I added a tank top (it's a little low cut), belt (the built in belt doesn't do a great job of giving your waist definition) and finally ticked the cuff of the sleeve back inside to give it more of a short sleeve winged look (arms were too long with the cuffs too big and flows, which just added too much volume). But then it looked great! If you are between sizes, size down. That could help too.

links_Review_Title: Will fit a lot of body types.
links_Review_Text: I rented size 2. At 34D, the seams at the neckline keep popping out, so I will need a lot of fashion tape to hold them flat. I notice that some of the wearers pictured actually have the seams out to give them more coverage. One can def get away with that but I think that gives it too much of a bathrobe style, bringing down the whole look. Material is very flowy and silky. I find the material a little bit warm for peak summer heat, but it would be great for milder temperatures.
This felt lovely on, but the fit was enormous on me - I would probably need to size down twice in order to wear it. The dress itself was lovely, though!

I wore this dress out to dinner with my husband and to a baby shower. I loved the pattern and received so many compliments on it. It is made of polyester, but it feels, moves and looks much more expensive. The opening at the arm with the wrist buttons was odd, because the opening was so large and I didn't love that, but I wore it anyways. I'd probably rent again as it was perfect for a warm evening out.
ordered down a size but still too big
Gorgeous pattern & flowing, silky fabric. Received many compliments. Wore during day with flat sandals & again at night with strappy heels - easy to dress up or down.
The arms are a little weird
